[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde cha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D110}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya g+ha na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyan stug po bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_
[\[1b.2\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba 'dod pa nas/_
[\[1b.3\]]gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na stobs mnga' ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis 
[\[1b.4\]]rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed 
[\[1b.5\]]pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po brnyes pa dang /_
[\[2a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang /_de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba bye ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum 
[\[2a.4\]]pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa/_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_kun gzhi'i spyod yul las yongs su 'das pa/_ye shes dang yid kyi lus su gnas gyur pa/_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba dang /_chos kyi sprin gyis dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[2a.5\]]dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/_khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad mo chen po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de na mur 'dug dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[2a.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyad pa bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'byin pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs du ma ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so/_/bzhengs nas kyang pho brang 'ja' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang /_lhab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste/_zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang stengs su gshegs so/_/
[\[2b.2\]]gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rgyan seng ge'i gdan dam pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir gzigs te gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po 'od zer 
[\[2b.3\]]stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas phyung ste/_'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang 
[\[2b.4\]]bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang /_gza' dang /_zla ba spangs pa ste/_'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis 
[\[2b.5\]]shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi_/gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_nam mkha' dang ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan 
[\[2b.6\]]dag na spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu phyung ba de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur 
[\[2b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal pa/_rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stug po'i rgyan zhes bya 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas gyur pa'i 
[\[3a.2\]]phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang gis brgyan pa/_gseng med pa/_ring du gnas pa/_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_nor bu dang /_glog dang /_'ja' dang /_byi ru dang /_ba bla dang /_
[\[3a.3\]]ldong ros dang /_mtshal dang /_mgo nag gi 'bru dang /_king shu ka dang /_in dra go pa dang /_gser dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_pad mo dang /_dung dang /_rma bya'i mgul dang /_mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu thob nas sa dang sar zag pa med 
[\[3a.4\]]pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu'i bsngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod 
[\[3a.5\]]pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[3a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam 
[\[3a.7\]]par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang /_ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]smros shig_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[3b.2\]]ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te/_gnas sam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/_
[\[3b.3\]]rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol 
[\[3b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das pa'i steng gi phyogs cha na tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_de bzhin du sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_skar ma'i rgyal po de bzhin 
[\[3b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/_sangs 
[\[3b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag 
[\[3b.7\]]gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang /_mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang /_yi ge dang bral ba de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs par ston/_de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/_de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod 
[\[4a.2\]]dam zhes smras pa de'i lan du ngas 'di smras so/_/rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems par ma zad kyi/_byang 
[\[4a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'di yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang spyi gtsug tshad med pa la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye 
[\[4a.4\]]ba stong phrag brgyar song nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/_sangs rgyas 
[\[4a.5\]]kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/_spyi gtsug tshad med pa yang ma mthong ste/_des ma mthong ba dang /_ngo mtshar du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_spyi gtsug bltar tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_yang dag par 
[\[4a.6\]]rjes su dran zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes te mngon par bstod nas/_
[\[4a.7\]]bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song ste gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sa dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]phra ba dang dmigs su phebs pa dang /_rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4b.2\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/_/bcom 
[\[4b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang /_ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros 
[\[4b.4\]]shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang /_'tshang rgya 
[\[4b.5\]]bar bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_yang dag par bsdu ba'i 
[\[4b.6\]]lta bar ltung ba rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang /_rdul dang /_gces pa dang /_dbang po dang /_phyogs dang /_dus dang /_nam mkha' dang /_bdag dang /_yid dang /_dbang po dang /_don nye bar 'du ba'i lta 
[\[4b.7\]]bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dang /_las dang /_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_snang ba dang /_de las skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang /_gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]shes pa can dang /_rgyu dang /_de ma thag pa dang /_dbang dang /_dmigs pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med par smra ba'i rtogs pa can dang /_chos 'di ba'i phung po dang /_gang zag stong pa nyid 
[\[5a.2\]]du lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi yang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_/chos kyi dbang po thos par 'gyur gyis bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_/rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la sogs/_/mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par/_/sangs 
[\[5a.3\]]rgyas blo dang shes bya dang /_/ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing /_/shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams/_/thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te/_/chos rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na/_/mya ngan 'da' dang mnyam gshegs pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge'o 
[\[5a.4\]]dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba/_rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/_mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed pa dge'o/_/rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ba/_sangs rgyas dang 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' zhig ltad mo 
[\[5a.5\]]byung ba ma yin gyi/_sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang /_rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltad mo byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig_/ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_'on te gzugs las gzhan 
[\[5a.6\]]zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/_nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/_rdul phra mo med pa 
[\[5a.7\]]thugs su chud pa'i phyir shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul te/_mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo/_/kye 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]rgyal ba'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu de bas na dge bar shin tu nyon te yid la gyis shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 
[\[5b.2\]]'das las phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_phung po las gzhan na yang med de/_phung po la gnas pa yang ma yin/_phung po 
[\[5b.3\]]yang gnas ma yin/_skye ba dang 'jig pa yang gnas ma yin/_shes par bya ba yang ma yin/_shes pa yang ma yin/_don kyang ma yin/_dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_yul rnams ni mno bsam med 
[\[5b.4\]]pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las nang ngam phyir yang mi blta'o/_/gzugs ni skyed pa med cing sems med pa ste/_'byung ba med pa'i chos can/_mthar 'jig pa/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_bong rdo dang 'dra ba/_shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 
[\[5b.5\]]'dra ba'o/_/tshor ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o/_/'du shes ni bum pa dang /_snam bu dang /_cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/_de yang gnyis las skyes pa'i smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/_dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i 
[\[5b.6\]]sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya skom gyis nyen cing chu tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed do/_/de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/_de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs 
[\[5b.7\]]su 'jug pa/_yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes pa/_dpyod pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shig tu mi dmigs pa/_bong bu'i rwa dang /_mo gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad pa ste/_rmi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o/_/
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dper na rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong bas sad pa'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa dang /_bud med bzang mo yang dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba yang mngon par sangs rgyas na mi dmigs 
[\[6a.2\]]so/_/'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying po lta bu ste btsal na/_lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do/_/rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid med pa ste/_sgyu ma byed pa'am/_de'i slob mas nan 
[\[6a.3\]]tan du rtswa dang shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_mi dang /_rgyan ma btags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang /_gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams 
[\[6a.4\]]la ma yin gyi bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drid pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/_rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtog ste de yang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/_sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig 
[\[6a.5\]]po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[6a.6\]]dang /_nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang /_byung ba dang /_'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang 
[\[6a.7\]]rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa gnyis po 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o/_/rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa ni nyes pa 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang 'jug go/_/skyon med par 'da' ba ni byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du mos te/_sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas 
[\[6b.2\]]nas lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/_de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang zhing snying rje chen po dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par byed cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mur 
[\[6b.3\]]'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam du glang po che chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/_rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon 
[\[6b.4\]]du mi bya zhing /_ma reg pa dang /_nye bar mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o/_/de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa/_sprul 
[\[6b.5\]]pa'i yul can/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor ba/_sa brgyad pa las 'das pa/_chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa 
[\[6b.6\]]'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te thams cad du 'gro ba ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/_lhun gyis grub pa/_rtag pa/_ther zug pa/_brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/_rdo rje'i dbang po sa la dbang 
[\[6b.7\]]ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa ston par 'gyur te/_gnas gyur pa/_yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin can/_stobs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang la spyod pa/_ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu'i zla ba lta 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bur 'gro ste/_blta ba'i don yod pa/_mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 
[\[7a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang /_dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myang bar byas te sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba 
[\[7a.3\]]rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i mthar thug par bsku ba grub pa'i sngags 'chang ltar mi snang zhing khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer dang /_'phrul pas sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro'o/_/song nas 
[\[7a.4\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/dbang po phung po sprul yin te/_/srid dang ma rig las kyang yin/_/bag 
[\[7a.5\]]chags kyis bcings mi bzad pa/_/yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung /_/rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags rnams/_/zhags pa sems spyod de yin no/_/khro ba me lce mnyam pa ste/_/zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin/_/thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyis/_/'di dag rtag 
[\[7a.6\]]tu rnam gzhigs te/_/phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rnal 'byor spyod/_/gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te/_/phung po lhag ma gzugs med pa/_/ji bzhin bar snang ri mo dang /_/grib la sdong dum la sogs med/_/mkha' la rlung gzugs 
[\[7a.7\]]mi snang dang /_/bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni/_/mkhas pas so so rang rig pa/_/yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'/_/tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni/_/sangs rgyas dngos po mi snang ste/_/sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das/_/mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te/_/rnam 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rtog rtog dang bral bas na/_/de ni bstan du mi nus pa'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste/_/yod dang med kyis rnam par spangs/_/rdo ba phye mar btags pa la/_/gser ni yod par mi snang ste/_/sbyang ba'i las kyi khyad par gyis/_/gser ni snang bar 'gyur ba 
[\[7b.2\]]yin/_/gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te/_/mkhas pas phung po lhag ma dang /_/khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang /_/rnam par shes dang dbang po dag_/gcig dang tha dad dngos po yang /_/rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na/_/dngos por sangs rgyas yod 
[\[7b.3\]]pa min/_/sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te/_/rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong /_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/_/gang na sdug bsngal de na bde/_/de nyid la ni snang ba yin/_/sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste/_/sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag pa 
[\[7b.4\]]yod/_/rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can/_/rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste/_/'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang /_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/'di dag sangs rgyas lngar gsungs so/_/sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying 
[\[7b.5\]]po yod/_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/_/de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste/_/rnal 'byor can gyi thub pas mthong /_/khams rnams gsum po 'das pa dang /_/rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing /_/rgyal sras bzang pos 
[\[7b.6\]]kun tu gang /_/de na thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas/_/rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag_/chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad/_/shes rab ma shes shes byed la/_/stug po de na 
[\[7b.7\]]rnam par spyod/_/stug po de yi sems can su/_/sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun/_/skad cig 'jig par shin tu 'das/_/ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos/_/dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul pa gang /_/rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong /_/stug po nas gshegs 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]glang po ste/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug na bzhugs/_/sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te/_/sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam gzhag pa/_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang /_/sna tshogs gzugs 
[\[8a.2\]]kyi nor bu ni/_/tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na/_/mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par mdzes/_/thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar/_/gcig dang tha dad spangs par te/_/dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni/_/skyes bu dam 
[\[8a.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen/_/rdul las ma yin dus las min/_/dbang po las min gces las min/_/rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang /_/sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa/_/rgyu yi tshul du sangs rgyas ni/_/'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes/_/'jig 
[\[8a.4\]]rten sku la 'khod bya ste/_/rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang /_/de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas/_/mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes/_/bya ba thams cad phyi nang du/_/gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams/_/phyir yang phyag gi mthil bkod de/_/yungs 'brur 
[\[8a.5\]]'gro ba kun 'dzud pa/_/sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'/_/thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o/_/'jig rten rnams la byed pa med/_/sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste/_/'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul/_/rab 
[\[8a.6\]]rib mi shes myos mdongs pa'i/_/rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin/_/bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i rnams/_/yod dang med pa'i smra bas bcom/_/'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang /_/cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams/_/'di la med dam cung zad 
[\[8a.7\]]dam/_/bdag dang bdag med ga la yod/_/sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na/_/rnal 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes/_/dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams/_/ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na/_/rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams la smig rgyu 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bzhin/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag_/gdeg la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang /_/rlung ldan sogs pa'i thag pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen pa'i mchog_/mi la 'khrul 'khor skor ba ste/_/rgya mtsho'i skya ba 'dzin pa 'dra/_/stug 
[\[8b.2\]]po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[8b.3\]]shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[8b.4\]]chos spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa spong ba rnams dang /_mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams dang /_ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang /_tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang /_ba lang dang /_dgum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 
[\[8b.5\]]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 
[\[8b.6\]]'grol bar 'gyur te/_de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/_/chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro/_/zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i 
[\[8b.7\]]sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo /_/chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to/_/'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'dus par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bzhon pa sbyin pa dang /_gdugs sbyin pa dang /_dar sbyin pa dang /_gos sbyin pa dang /_chos gos 
[\[9a.2\]]dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag gam/_dam pa'i chos spong 
[\[9a.3\]]ba dag gam/_'phags pa spong ba dag gam/_mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam/_bskal par gnas pa dag gam/_sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring ba'am/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod pa byed pa'am/_
[\[9a.4\]]tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/_chung ngu na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung /_phyag dar ba yang rung /_sme sha can yang rung ste/_'jam dpal sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_chung ngu na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste rjod pa dang /_su 'ang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang /_nang par langs nas 
[\[9a.6\]]ngo phrad par byed cing lta ba dang sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang /_lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs 
[\[9a.7\]]su 'grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam/_de'i dur ram/_ro'am/_ro bam pa zhig yod la/_de'i ngo mthong na yang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[9b.2\]]dpal sus mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gror byas te/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang /_chos smra 
[\[9b.3\]]ba de yang mchod par bya ste/_ji ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed na yang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o/_/chung du na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug 
[\[9b.4\]]pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/_de la nem nur dang /_
[\[9b.5\]]the tsom dang yid gnyis mi bya'o/_/sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las yongs su mnyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 
[\[9b.6\]]rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra/_/bsam 
[\[9b.7\]]gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog_/dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa/_/chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs/_/bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i/_/de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te/_/thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams/_/kun gyi snying la 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gnas pa yin/_/yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral/_/sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med/_/blo dang shes bya bral ba ste/_/tshad dang dbang po spangs pa yin/_/sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin/_/de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul/_/mtshan 
[\[10a.2\]]rnams kun kyang snang ba ste/_/de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang /_/dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad/_/mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med/_/g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med min/_/chags med lam la gnas pa ste/_/lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams 
[\[10a.3\]]dang /_/dri za lha min mi'am ci/_/thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis/_/bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo/_/de la ngo mtshar sred pa med/_/'gro ba gang na'ang g.yo ba med/_/sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi/_/de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i 
[\[10a.4\]]spyod pa yis/_/bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis/_/mthong yang de dang 'di na med/_/ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra/_/rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni/_/dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong /_/rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams/_/gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa/_/
[\[10a.5\]]de la de lta'i chos ston te/_/rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing /_/rgyal ba'i tshul dang gsum po dag_/rgyal po'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang /_/rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang /_/dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams kyi/_/phun 
[\[10a.6\]]sum tshogs pa de las byung /_/lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang /_/rin chen 'byung khungs rnam dag pa/_/lha yi lha yi mthu yis na/_/phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin/_/'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams 
[\[10a.7\]]kyis/_/gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag_/sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu/_/de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi/_/dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang /_/gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang /_gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o/_/dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]rten gyis/_/mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas/_/'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel pa dang /_/cod pan can dang lag na gzhur/_/dam pa rnams kyis kun du mthong /_/stug po nas ni de ma bral/_/yul 'di thub pa de yis te/_/thams cad na yang shin tu 
[\[10b.2\]]snang /_/rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra/_/'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la/_/ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang /_/rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i/_/rmi lam bzhin du bus pas mthong /_/khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni/_/
[\[10b.3\]]rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin/_/lha yi lha yi yul yin te/_/de yi sras kyi dus kun du/_/mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang /_/sa nan ta dang sa nan da/_/sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang /_/ne tso la sogs rnams bsams kyang /_/de yi yul la 
[\[10b.4\]]rnam par bslad/_/de dag rnal 'byor gyis mi mthong /_/thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang /_/byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa/_/de dag yul na gang yang min/_/lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i phyir/_/sa dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i/_/rdo rje'i snying po de la 
[\[10b.5\]]bstan/_/lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi/_/stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis/_/'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de/_/mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan/_/rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/_/ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag_/dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag_/bzo 
[\[10b.6\]]bor gyur pas byas pa ni/_/gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste/_/brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min/_/skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste/_/ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo/_/kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi/_/yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags/_/mar me bzhin 
[\[10b.7\]]du gsal byed pa/_/rgyu rnams dgos pa sgrub pa dag_/mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de/_/'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o/_/'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang /_/yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med/_/rkyen du bya rnams med par yang /_/brtags pa'i 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dngos po gang yang med/_/rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la/_/dngos po yod pa ma yin te/_/rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur/_/yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang /_/med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin/_/phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par 
[\[11a.2\]]brtags/_/phung po rdza ma ras la sogs/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin/_/rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste/_/gtsug lag nor pa dug dang bcas/_/rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis/_/'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dang /_/mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med/_/de 
[\[11a.3\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po/_/lag pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa/_lus dpe med pa/_dpung rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_gtsug gi nor bu dang /_se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs 
[\[11a.4\]]te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_theg pa gsum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba/_lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje snying po'i 
[\[11a.5\]]dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/_/rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan can dag la chos ston 
[\[11a.6\]]pa yin te/_de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyis bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas 
[\[11a.7\]]ston cig_/des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste/_yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang sgyur zhing stobs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang gi gzhal med khang gi gnas gyur te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa spangs te/_sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/_rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang stug por stug po na spyod pa 
[\[11b.2\]]rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje snying pos smras pa/_rgyal po smros shig dge'o dge'o/_/cod pan can la khyad par du/_/chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa/_/stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa/_/sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag_/rnam 
[\[11b.3\]]rtog spyod yul yin zhe na/_/rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa/_/'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te/_/'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/_/chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyis/_/rgyal po nga la de nyon cig_/dpyid kyi smig 
[\[11b.4\]]rgyu ji bzhin pa/_/de yi rnam pa 'gro ba 'di/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog_/blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te/_/rtogs bya de'i khyad gyur pa/_/gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa/_/nyi ma dang ni grib ltar 
[\[11b.5\]]gnas/_/sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min/_/tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med/_/rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag_/shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa/_/sems tsam de ltar yin na ste/_/
[\[11b.6\]]shes bya sems tsam yin pa ni/_/rtag tu tsam la shes yod min/_/sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid/_/gang zag dag dang g.yo ba rnams/_/gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na/_/rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin/_/brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur/_/
[\[11b.7\]]dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te/_/bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis/_/dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang /_/mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste/_/sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing /_/rtag cing zhi ba bde la brtan/_/'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te/_/stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes/_/rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/_/de bzhin sangs 
[\[12a.2\]]rgyas sa bsam med/_/stug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa/_/ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu/_/rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin/_/gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste/_/rdul yang mchog phra'i de bzhin du/_/dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la/_/rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin/_/
[\[12a.3\]]zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o/_/ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba/_/phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar byed/_/de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me/_/phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya/_/gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing /_/sems dang 
[\[12a.4\]]rtog pas rnam spangs pa/_/chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro/_/stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes/_/bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/sa la gnas pa ma yin pa/_/lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i/_/bdag med nyid la skyabs su song /_/rgyud kyi rgyun 
[\[12a.5\]]rnams chad pa'i phyir/_/'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas/_/lta ba thams cad zad byed pa/_/bdag med nyid la skyabs su song /_/zhir gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas/_/zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du/_/lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir/_/bdag med nyid la skyabs su 
[\[12a.6\]]song /_/sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni/_/bdag med pa la bdag med pas/_/mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang /_/rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste/_/bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du/_/bdag nyid zhir 'gyur de nyid du/_/de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags 
[\[12a.7\]]te/_/bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa/_/lta ba'i chos la bder gnas kyi/_/so so rang rig spyod yul la/_/thog ma med nas nyes dri med/_/'phags pa rnams kyi sa la gnas/_/'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'phags la gnas/_/sems kyi sa las rab gyur te/_/stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes/_/mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams/_/thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa/_/rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon/_/gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[12b.2\]]yod min med pa min/_/phung po'i skye shing rnam bsregs te/_/dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas/_/stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas/_/shes bya dri med zhi ba la/_/skyabs su song shig grogs po dag_/rtog dang tshad las bral ba ste/_/blo dang rtogs bya'i 
[\[12b.3\]]gnas ma yin/_/stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can/_/de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so/_/rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing /_/zhing mchog bzang ba stug pa'o/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mang pos gang /_/stug po de la skyabs su song /_/spros pa kun dang 
[\[12b.4\]]bral ba ste/_/lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs/_/ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang /_/rmi lam mo gsham bu 'byung dang /_/rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar/_/thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong /_/dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin/_/skra phung mgal ba bskor ba ltar/_/smig 
[\[12b.5\]]rgyu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sred mtshungs su/_/yod dang med pa rnam par spangs/_/sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang /_/'phrul pa'i sprul par de dag ni/_/'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste/_/sa dang sa la thub pa rnams/_/bsdor med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa/_/sgyu ma'i shing gi 
[\[12b.6\]]'bras bu ltar/_/sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang /_/thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong /_/rdza la sogs pa'i bzo bzung ltar/_/'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung /_/yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang /_/chos lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang /_/'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod 
[\[12b.7\]]pa ni/_/bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste/_/bag chags thog ma med pa yi/_/sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yog_/'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni/_/kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin/_/rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la/_/phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dba' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med/_/'od pa'ang med par mi 'gyur te/_/snga med bag chags gnas can rnams/_/'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag_/sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni/_/rnam par tha dad ma yin te/_/dus gcig 
[\[13a.2\]]tu yang de dag 'byung /_/bar bar du ni rim gyis so/_/thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa/_/skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang /_/lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang /_/ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la/_/rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste/_/rim gyis kyang ni shes par 
[\[13a.3\]]byos/_/yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul/_/mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin/_/lus kyi 'jug pa rim gyis kyang /_/srog la rten cing 'byung ba yin/_/rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la/_/tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste/_/mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la/_/
[\[13a.4\]]tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min/_/ro dang dri yi rnam pa la/_/rim gyis tha dad 'byung ba yin/_/rim gyis kha dog khyad par gyi/_/sna tshogs la yang dus gcig tu/_/rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab/_/rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[13a.5\]]snying po ste/_/rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas/_/yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung /_/yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te/_/rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang /_/sa yi khyad par byed pa'o/_/bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu/_/sa bon kun pa'i kun gzhi ni/_/kun 
[\[13a.6\]]nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i/_/rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs/_/nges dang ma nges dge ba yin/_/rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du/_/tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su/_/de bzhin kun gzhis 
[\[13a.7\]]khyab par byed/_/sa dang sa la rnam dag cing /_/gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes/_/yang dag ji bzhin don ston la/_/rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/_/mthong zhing thos te shes pas na/_/sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis/_/spobs pa can la bstan par 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]gyis/_/khyad par du'o khyad par bdag_/khams phran rnams kyi khams rnams dang /_/sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang /_/kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na/_/sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/_/'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba yi/_/'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[13b.2\]]dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du/_/mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur/_/dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te/_/dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag_/gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te/_/gzugs med 'du shes med 
[\[13b.3\]]sems can/_/bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang /_/yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas/_/yang dag mtha' la ma reg par/_/'jigs med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan/_/bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms/_/de 
[\[13b.4\]]ni stug por smon pa yin/_/khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis/_/chags med mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_/mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su/_/rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas par/_/chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te/_/rten las gzhan du gyur cing 
[\[13b.5\]]bde/_/rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos/_/stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas/_/chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes/_/'jig pa med pa mi yi mchog_/mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa min/_/mur 'dug rnams kyis jir rjod bzhin/_/mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi/_/
[\[13b.6\]]rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis/_/theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste/_/stug po tshol ba'i khyad par yang /_/rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur/_/sa dang sa la gnas pas so/_/'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur/_/'chi ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te/_/rgyal po 'jig 
[\[13b.7\]]pa mthar ma yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku/_/sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba/_/de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na/_/sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang /_/sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur/_/sems can khams rnams zad gyur na/_/rgyal ba'i shes 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bya dngos po med/_/mya ngan 'da' med shes bya med/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med/_/me mar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang /_/sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gis/_/rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams/_/lus can rnams la thar pa ston/_/
[\[14a.2\]]yod dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis/_/thar pa'i bde las de dag ring /_/bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de/_/lugs su 'jug dang bzlog pa dag_/gzugs med 'du shes med pa dang /_/mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang /_/ma nyams nyams pa med pa 
[\[14a.3\]]dang /_/chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa rnams/_/sa yi khams la mkhas pa dag_/mi yi dbang po stug por 'gro/_/yod dang med pa 'jig pas ni/_/de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste/_phrad pa gsum po 'jig med cing /_/rgyu dang dmigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang /_/
[\[14a.4\]]de ma thag dang dbang yang ste/_/sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag_/mig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te/_/phrad pas gang rnams 'jug gyur pa/_/gzugs rnams mngon byed ye shes dang /_/de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur/_/phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni/_/
[\[14a.5\]]phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/_/yod dang med pa'i lta ba las/_/de ste grol nas 'jig na ni/_/sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyir/_/rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te/_/mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing /_/de yi rang bzhin mi gnas la/_/gang tshe dmigs 
[\[14a.6\]]pa spang ba la/_/rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing /_/gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te/_/rtog med rtog pa spangs pas na/_/de tshe sems ni mnyam par bzhag_/'gro ba rnam rtog med par mthong /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste/_/bsam gyis mi khyab shes la 
[\[14a.7\]]gnas/_/rten pa las ni gyur pa ste/_/ye shes gnas ngan len pa spangs/_/yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste/_/sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing /_/rgyal po stug por rab tu 'gro/_/gzugs dang sems dang sems 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]las byung /_/mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas/_/nang dang phyi yi sa rnams dang /_/tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing /_/so so rang gi ye shes mkhas/_/lta ba'i chos la rnam par gnas/_/rgyal po stug por 'dod pa ni/_/ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor can/_/mtshan 
[\[14b.2\]]ma ming dang de bzhin nyid/_/rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang /_/yang dag mtha' yi gnas pa yis/_/so so rang rig spyod yul du/_/rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu/_/rnal 'byor sems pa'i rnal 'byor can/_/rgyal po stug por 'dong ba na/_/sangs rgyas bstod 
[\[14b.3\]]pa'i zhing du'o/_/phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te/_/bdag gi phyogs las 'phags gyur na/_/phyogs las nyams pas 'jig pa ni/_/rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro/_/ma grub pa dang yang dpe yi/_/rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog 
[\[14b.4\]]dang nyes pa'i mtshang /_/de dag rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/phrad pa gsum po sun 'byin pa/_/chud zos bung ba ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin [(]'jin [,]'jig [)]rten sun 'byin pa/_/yang dag ma yin rtog pa smra/_/de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste/_/rtog pa bslad pa'i mig can la/_/'dra 
[\[14b.5\]]chos mi 'dra'i chos skyon can/_/nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang /_/bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo/_/pha rol phyogs la rten pa dang /_/lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni/_/thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o/_/sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'/_/rgyal po yod pa 
[\[14b.6\]]ma yin te/_/kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag_/'byung ba dog par rgyug pa'o/_/de dang de yi lam rgyud du/_/thugs rje dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs/_/sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis/_/zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor/_/snga ma'i las dang tshul 'thun par/_/pha 
[\[14b.7\]]skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad/_/rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la/_/chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te/_/de ste mya ngan 'da' 'jig na/_/rgyal bas yon tan ci zhig brnyes/_/dbang sgyur gsum po rnams dang yang /_/rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong /_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]rkang pa bzhi po dang /_/dran pa nyer gzhag stong pa nyid/_/tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang /_/'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang /_/dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag_/rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te/_/gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang /_/dbang po 
[\[15a.2\]]stobs rnams bcas pa dang /_mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang /_/rnam par shes dang de rgyu dang /_/'dus byas ma byas chos rnams dang /_/byang chub yan lag gang zag dang /_/rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad/_/sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang /_/
[\[15a.3\]]zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /_/ye shes mngon du chud pa bcu/_/sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog_/sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes/_/'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang /_/'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang /_/
[\[15a.4\]]'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang /_/'gog pa dag la chos shes dang /_/'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang /_/'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang /_/lam la chos kyi shes pa dang /_/lam la so sor rtog pa dang /_/lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes/_/shes pa rnams 
[\[15a.5\]]dang slob pa bcu/_/brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang /_/rigs las rigs dang lan cig 'ong /_/bar chad gcig po gang zag dang /_/bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang /_/gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang /_/mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang /_/steng ma'i rgyud kyang 
[\[15a.6\]]de bzhin te/_/rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang /_/ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs/_/rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te/_/tha ma mchog dang bar ma'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du/_/mchog dang bcas par de la sgom/_/rang sangs rgyas 
[\[15a.7\]]ni dbu mar te/_/nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o/_/bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa/_/lnga gsum [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dag tu yang /_/sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni/_/rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed/_/gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin/_/sems ni rang bzhin 'od snang 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]can/_/zag pa gang yin de sems min/_/sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'ang med/_/ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin te/_/da ltar byung ba gnas pa med/_/sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par/_/'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba med/_/bsam gtan bzhi na sems med de/_/'byung 
[\[15b.2\]]ba'i rgyu la gnod pa med/_/'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te/_/yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o/_/rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas/_/dba' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin/_/brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba/_/thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o/_/yod dang med las lha rdzas su/_/
[\[15b.3\]]gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing /_/stug po dang ni stug dkyil du/_/zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes/_/de ni mi 'jig bde bar gnas/_/stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas/_/tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen/_/ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur/_/bsam yas rnal 
[\[15b.4\]]'byor yul can te/_/rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod/_/rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'di/_/rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi/_/rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir/_/khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog_/'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang /_/tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang /_/
[\[15b.5\]]gzugs med shes med sems can du/_/rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis/_/stug por 'dod pa'ang 'thob par te/_/bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir/_/rgyal po'i ye shes bcu po rnams/_/bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur/_/chos dang rjes su 'gro shes 
[\[15b.6\]]dang /_/pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang /_/sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang /_/'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang /_/byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang /_/khong bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te/_/sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang /_/ig shwa khu dang so ma'i rigs/_/
[\[15b.7\]]yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog_/khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags/_de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing /_/zhum pa med par stug por song /_/lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi/_/rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du/_/sbud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing /_/'gro 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste/_/rnga phrug bzhin du lus phyed kyis/_/'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni/_/thams cad lus la yid yin te/_/sgyu ma'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du gnas/_/sgyu ma'i shing ltar shin tu snang /_/chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du/_/smin ma mig dang 
[\[16a.2\]]yan lag rnams/_/sgyur bas rgyal po bzhin du rtse/_/sems dang sems las byung dang yid/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag_/chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med/_/sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste/_/kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di/_/bag chags rnams 
[\[16a.3\]]kyis yongs su dkris/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang /_/'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du/_/lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/_/de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin/_/lu ma'i pad mo lta bur dag_/dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/_/gsal ba 
[\[16a.4\]]gdon mi za ba'i rigs/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas/_/mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste/_/mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin/_/mtshan ma ming dang 'brel pa ste/_/rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags/_/mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag 
[\[16a.5\]]las/_/rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung /_/rnam par rtog pa skyed pa yi/_/rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/_/phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang /_/bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te/_/sems dang lhan cig ldan pa ni/_/khong pa la ni gnas pa yin/_/
[\[16a.6\]]yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni/_/rnam shes lnga yi rgyu yin te/_/rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis/_/'jig rten rgyu la rnam par lta/_/de ltar byed dang bya ba med/_/de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min/_/thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid/_/phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung 
[\[16a.7\]]ba ste/_/rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar lta/_/de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong /_/rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni/_/chos rnams chos nyid de yin te/_/brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du/_/chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/_/stong pa ngo bo nyid med de/_/yod 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa/_/sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang 'dra/_/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/_/skra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin/_/du ba sprin stug lta bu ni/_/mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis/_/ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi/_/tshig dang yi ge mang po dang /_/
[\[16b.2\]]ming rnams mang po la yang ste/_/kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan/_/yid don dbang po 'dus pa las/_/sa bon kun can bag chags dang /_/tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas/_/rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung /_/gzhan gyi 
[\[16b.3\]]dbang gi rang bzhin yang /_/phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so/_/so so rang rig shin tu phra/_/mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste/_/rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di/_/'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/'phags pa'i rang bzhin thugs chud pas/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[16b.4\]]rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/_/rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_/yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na/_/skye ba zad ces rnam par gsungs/_/tshangs pa'i lam yang non ches so/_/byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med/_/phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[16b.5\]]kun las rnam par grol/_/g.yo ba thams cad shin tu byung /_/bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing /_/bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni/_/chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste/_/sa bon rnams dang bral bas na/_/sems kyi tshogs 
[\[16b.6\]]rnams mi 'jug go/_/thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i/_/yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i/_/spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas/_/mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin/_/ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags/_/bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med/_/de bzhin 
[\[16b.7\]]grol ba thams cad kyang /_/me zad bzhin du bsil ba yin/_/zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su/_/zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas/_/ting nge 'dzin kyi zas gnas pas/_/mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas/_/rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul/_/rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis/_/de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas/_/stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/zhing gi 
[\[17a.2\]]mchog ni stug pa'o/_/de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms/_/rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis/_/ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung /_/mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/_/mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung /_/grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par/_/rdza las 
[\[17a.3\]]sogs pa dbang po'i yul/_/phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams/_/rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di/_/skye ba la ni rgyu yin no/_/khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste/_/gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed/_/'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi/_/gti mug rnams kyang shin tu 
[\[17a.4\]]skye/_/ring po thung ngu kha dog dang /_/rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams/_/sgra dang dri la sogs pa'i yul/_/mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul/_/ji snyed dge dang mi dge dang /_/'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[17a.5\]]pa ye shes yul/_/skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung /_/byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste/_/de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro/_/rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung /_/yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas/_/khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor/_/kha gnyis sbrul ni ji 
[\[17a.6\]]bzhin pa/_/yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te/_/kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed/_/gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung /_/yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas/_/rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog_/bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed/_/bdag gir bya ba'ang 
[\[17a.7\]]'phel bar byed/_/lus la drod kyang skyes pa ste/_/sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod/_/zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang /_/gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang /_/mchod pa dag dang rgyug par yang /_/mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin/_/gar dang gad mo rtsed mo dang /_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste/_/skra tshogs mgal ba bskor ba dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang /_/smig rgyu la yang de bzhin du/_/rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug_/pra bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems/_/bdag sems khong du mi chud pas/_/lus dang snod kyi 
[\[17b.2\]]rnam par yang /_/phyang mo nyug ltar gnas pa'o/_/nyam chung snying po med pa ste/_/rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa/_/bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod/_/mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni/_/lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste/_/
[\[17b.3\]]bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed/_/'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag_/rgyal po rnam shes gsum po yi/_/'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste/_/'di rnams dang bral grub pa yi/_/rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no/_/bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams/_/shugs 'dzin 
[\[17b.4\]]gyis ni mthong ba dang /_/'phags pa maud gal bu yis kyang /_/lus dang lus che mdzes pa rnams/_/de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags/_/stug po'i zhing na'o sa yi bdag_/thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa/_/de dag dpe'am char mi rung /_/bde ba yod dang mngon 
[\[17b.5\]]dga' dang /_/'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag_/de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod/_/stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med/_/rang byung 'phrul pa de yin te/_/zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas sar/_/'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas/_/
[\[17b.6\]]de ni bde ba nyer len med/_/khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral/_/ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste/_/brtan pa stug por 'dus ma byas/_/yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu/_/'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu/_/sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su/_/sangs 
[\[17b.7\]]rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de/_/de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag_/sprul pa dag dang thabs cig rol/_/thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar/_/gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba/_/de la de 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ltar 'byung ba ste/_/'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang /_/sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang /_/sdong pos brgyan dang dru ma yi/_/gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo/_/dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang /_/rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang /_/sgyu ma dpal 
[\[18a.2\]]las 'gro ba sogs/_/mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/stug pa'i rgyan nas rnam par byung /_/stug po'i rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di/_/mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin/_/rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang /_/rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis/_/gzugs med 
[\[18a.3\]]'dod dang gzugs rnams dang /_/'du shes med pa de bzhin te/_/gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang /_/bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na/_/pad mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang /_/gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na/_/lha rdzas rmad kyi ye shes te/_/
[\[18a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis/_/rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang /_/de na bcom ldan thabs cig bzhugs/_/stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs/_/sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la/_/de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa/_/
[\[18a.5\]]rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis/_/de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pa/_/gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi/_/thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams/_/gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang /_/stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing /_/thams cad 
[\[18a.6\]]rnal 'byor can gyis bstan/_/ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsam pa ka dang rma bya'i mgrin pa pad mo 'dra/_/de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha yi yang lha gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste/_/de gzugs lha rgyal go pa ka dag glog dang 'ol ma byi ru'i 'od bzhin du/_/la las 
[\[18a.7\]]bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtswa la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs par/_/mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la/_/thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs par mthong /_/thub pa'i thor tshugs 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]tshogs ni lag gis 'gro yi mgo bo glod pa bzhin du ste/_/la lar gzugs ni rdo rje an+da rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro/_/la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong /_/la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin 
[\[18b.2\]]du thub pa mthong /_/lha rdzas phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing /_/khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin ba lang rmig par shong bar mdzad/_/sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i gtsug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab 
[\[18b.3\]]mchod cing /_/la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams na mkhas gyur cing /_/chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni/_/thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste/_/rang gi 
[\[18b.4\]]yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing /_/la las gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang /_/dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar/_/la las yul la chags 
[\[18b.5\]]med spyod yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te/_/'di dang gzhan med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro/_/snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das/_/la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod sprin mchod 
[\[18b.6\]]bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste/_/sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin tu mthong /_/bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni/_/mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can 
[\[18b.7\]]dag ste/_/lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor can gyi bdag_/lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi nang rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul/_/de dag brgya char mi phod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po dag gi bde de la/_/gzhan du bdag cag 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing gi me de dag_/mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can/_/rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang /_/rnam 
[\[19a.2\]]pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga sbyangs pa'i nags tshal shing /_/lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam par mdzes/_/gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog pad mo de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[19a.3\]]zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun mi yang pad mo skyes/_/thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas la ni rab tu mos/_/bdag gi ston pa la ni bdag bstan yid can pad mo dag las skye ba ste/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni 
[\[19a.4\]]bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan/_/dpe byad bzang po bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas/_/yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dri med rdzub pa dag go/_/de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur/_
[\[19a.5\]]sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i skra yi brgya cha'i gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur/_/la lar bde gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang /_/gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag_/rnal 'byor 
[\[19a.6\]]mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas tshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs/_/de skad bshad nas yang smras pa/_/sna tshogs gzugs can rgyal ba'i sras/_/sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang /_/ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang /_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang /_/
[\[19a.7\]]de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste/_/gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang /_/rnam thar tha dad yang dag rig_/stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang /_/phung po khams rnams zag med pa/_/'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob/_/rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo /_/chos 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang /_/rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang /_/bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs nas/_/gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag_/sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskon/_/mi zad smon lam bcu po dang /_/
[\[19b.2\]]lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul/_/rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam/_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams/_/sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang /_/rgyal ba pad mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun 
[\[19b.3\]]du byas/_/yod dang med pa phyogs bral ba/_/rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis/_/dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang /_/lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs/_/ri rab sa la 'dong rgyu zhing /_/nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang /_/ji ltar snang bar ma gyur 
[\[19b.4\]]pa/_/de bzhin rgyal sras gces pa'i rnams/_/rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan/_/sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na/_/rgyal ba mchod la mngon par mos/_/smon lam dbang la gnas pa'i rnams/_/pad mo'i khang par rab tu skye/_/
[\[19b.5\]]dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag_/zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'/_/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston/_/lhun gyis grub par thams cad du/_/chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te/_/nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa/_/snang ba sems can spyod yul du/_/yang dag mtha' la mi reg 
[\[19b.6\]]par/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu ldog_/gru la gnas pa'i bung ba dag_/gang chen mtsho la 'gro ba bzhin/_/gang du gru 'gro der rgyug ste/_/dpag tshad shin tu mang bar yang /_/thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i lus/_/sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du/_/de 
[\[19b.7\]]dag 'byung ba rab tu ston/_/phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste/_/'jig pa dag kyang rnam mkhyen nas/_/zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa/_/gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams/_/gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams/_/gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na/_/mtshan 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med/_/'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams/_/yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin/_/bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la/_/gcig la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang /_/byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong /_/'ju ba'i gnas dang rten 
[\[20a.2\]]med par/_/de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/_/sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa yi/_/rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams/_/sa yi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir/_/rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang /_/sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung /_/'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyi 
[\[20a.3\]]chos/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis//_//'phags pa rgyan stug po/_bam po gnyis pa/_kun tu bzang po mi yi bdag_/gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/_/rdo rje'i snying po la smras 
[\[20a.4\]]pa/_/'thun pa dag la dbang byed dang /_/lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang /_/rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na/_/gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i/_/rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag_/gang gis stug ces bya thos te/_/thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams/_/
[\[20a.5\]]gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol ba dag_/gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing /_/ting 'dzin de yi tshul song ba/_/stug por ring por mi thogs 'gro/_/sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos/_/'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang /_/'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_
[\[20a.6\]]mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang /_/zla ba la sogs gzungs dbang rgyal/_/blo gros shin tu zhi ba dang /_/lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig_/dru ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang /_/phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang /_/rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams/_/gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag 
[\[20a.7\]]nas/_/chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams/_/stug po'i rgyan la gzhol ba dag_/rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang /_/khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste/_/rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso/_/sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras/_/rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris/_/
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'jigs med rdo rje snying po la/_/rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang /_/dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang /_/ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas/_/sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smros/_/dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid/_/'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung /_/rdza la 
[\[20b.2\]]sogs pa'i dngos po dag_/ji ltar chu 'jim thal sbyar las/_/las su bya ba thams cad bskyed/_/'gro ba 'di dag de bzhin byas/_/rnga dang pi bang sgra la sogs/_/las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ci/_/bskyod pa'i las las 
[\[20b.3\]]kun 'byung ngam/_/rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du/_/dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas/_/sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du/_/dngos dang dngos la rab tu gnas/_/de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ci/_/dngos po gcig la rab gnas sam/_/gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag 
[\[20b.4\]]snang /_/khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas/_/dga' ldan mtshe ma rab rnams dang /_/dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci/_/mi'am ci dag du ma dang /_/gya nom snang bas byas sam ci/_/'og min thor tshugs can gyis sam/_/'on tam gzugs med rnams 
[\[20b.5\]]kyis byas/_/lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis/_/gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam/_/'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad dam/_/'on tam rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/_/zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam/_/rnal 'byor la 
[\[20b.6\]]mkhas rnal 'byor can/_/sangs rgyas zhing du bzhugs rnams kyis/_/sa rnams thams cad byas sam ci/_/gang la nor pa rab tu gnas/_/gang 'di nor pa snang ba dag_/smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te/_/rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin/_/'gro ba gang gi phyogs la 
[\[20b.7\]]gnas/_/yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can/_/yon tan med dang yon tan gnas/_/ma yin phan tshun 'brel pas na/_/yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas/_/nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du/_/ga la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam/_/'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]sa rnams la ni gang snang ba/_/'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba'am/_/'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam/_/khyu mchog gis sam spun zas sam/_/ser skya yis sam rang gis sam/_/gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa/_/rang bzhin gyis sam dbang 
[\[21a.2\]]pos sam/_/dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa'am/_/'on tam ma rig sred pas sam/_/lha yi drang srong the tsom za/_/lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te/_/grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams/_/sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can/_/'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul lam/_/
[\[21a.3\]]'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam/_/rmi lam yin nam smig rgyu 'am/_/sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang /_/kha gnyis sbrul bzhin gnas pa'am/_/'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam/_/'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam/_/
[\[21a.4\]]mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba'am/_/'on tam skra yi tshogs lta bu'am/_/byed dang las kyis ma byas shing /_/dbang po ku be ras ma byas/_/mchod sbyin sbyin bsreg mchod 'bras sam/_/smrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam/_/rgyu rnams shin tu phal che bas/_/nan 
[\[21a.5\]]tan rtag pa ma yin te/_/'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min/_/rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste/_/'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub/_/las kyi bag chags rnams las byung /_/rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni/_/kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste/_/des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun/_/
[\[21a.6\]]rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor/_/til bkrum til mar ji bzhin du/_/lan tshwa'i tsha bro ji lta bur/_/gzugs la mi rtag nyid ji bzhin/_/skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas/_/ji ltar bsung la sogs las dri/_/yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan/_/nyi zla gnyis 
[\[21a.7\]]kyi 'od zer bzhin/_/de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin/_/dgos dang byed pa med pa ste/_/yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs/_/gcig dang tha dad med pa ste/_/mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs/_/rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med/_/nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]grol ba'i so so rang rig pa/_/sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyi/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste/_/snga med sems dang sems byung gis/_/rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste/_/nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o/_/de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin/_/phan tshun mtshan 
[\[21b.2\]]nyid tha mi dad/_/'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste/_/de yi ldan pa rig pa min/_/ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin/_/mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong /_/rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min/_/de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes 
[\[21b.3\]]rnams/_/de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong /_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin/_/des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/ji ltar nor bu phug pa rnams/_/skud la brgyus dang 'khor lo bzhin/_/las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa/_/
[\[21b.4\]]ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang /_/lag dang thal sbyor bskor ba yis/_/kun tu bskor cing snod byed pa/_/yon tan sna tshogs rnam par ldan/_/de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi/_/khams kyi gzugs brnyan lhan cig tu/_/sa ni rnam par byed pa ste/_/phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba 
[\[21b.5\]]rnams/_/gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun/_/nam mkha'i skar tshogs ji bzhin du/_/gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/_/rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor/_/ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams kyi/_/rjes ni snang ba ma yin te/_/bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang /_/bya rnams rgyu ba'i byed 
[\[21b.6\]]pa med/_/de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i mi/_/bdag yod ma yin gzhan yod min/_/rnam dag bar snang 'dra ba dag_/dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung /_/bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis/_/mi chags pad mo'i zla ba bzhin/_/pad mo la ni chu med min/_/chu la zla gzugs 
[\[21b.7\]]med pa yang /_/chu song zla ba yod pa ste/_/pad mo'i 'dab la de bzhin chu/_/mig la bud med gzhon nu dag_/mig gis mthong ba jir mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/_/las rnams cig car byed pa ste/_/'gro ba dag gi lus la ni/_/khyab gnas sa bon kun 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]can no/_/stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang /_/sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas/_/tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog_/drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang ston/_/
[\[22a.2\]]rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la/_/spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o/_/ba lang sogs pa'i ru mthong zhing /_/bong bu rwa ni med pa ste/_/ma mthong bar ni med pa med/_/ba lang rwa yi med pa yang /_/phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med/_/phyin ci log tu mnar sems la/_/shin tu phra ba'i 
[\[22a.3\]]rdul gshig na/_/yod pa de dag med par 'gro/_/med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te/_/med pa yod ces rtog pa ni/_/yod pa med las bltos pa ste/_/phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so/_/blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste/_/khong du chud pa skye ba med/_/mgal ba'i 'khor lo 
[\[22a.4\]]'khor lo min/_/ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin/_/dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag_/ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin/_/blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par/_/yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa/_/rtogs bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed/_/lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te/_/ming dang 
[\[22a.5\]]'du shes 'brel ba dang /_/rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyis/_/mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung /_/grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o/_/thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags/_/gnas ngan len gyi yul las byung /_/rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las/_/sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung 
[\[22a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang /_/kun tu skye ba mi yi sems/_/rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs/_/snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te/_/'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas/_/rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min/_/blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni/_/
[\[22a.7\]]bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi rigs pa/_/bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams/_/rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang /_/dus gcig tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sngon med bag chags ldan pas na/_/kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can/_/
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du/_/rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar/_/gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung /_/rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do/_/blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag_/yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir/_/sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis/_/bdag la 
[\[22b.2\]]bdag gir 'dzin par byed/_/ji ltar sa la rnam rtog med/_/'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni/_/de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o/_/ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis/_/rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang /_/phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus 
[\[22b.3\]]la/_/bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang /_/ji ltar shed can la la dag_/bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa/_/de bzhin blo ni brtags don la/_/don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o/_/blo yi yul du bya ba 'di/_/khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas/_/phyi dang nang gi bya 
[\[22b.4\]]bar yang /_/rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs/_/sa la ji snyed snang ba dag_/rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs/_/sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so/_/chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang /_/rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa/_/
[\[22b.5\]]mi smra'i dngos la dgar gyur te/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi/_/lha yi bsam gtan mi g.yo ba/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa dang /_/stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs/_/mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa/_/thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus/_/rnal 
[\[22b.6\]]'byor btang ste yang gnas so/_/'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med dang /_/'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi/_/mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste/_/stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab 
[\[22b.7\]]nas/_/gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi/_/sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas/_mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul/_/su blo ci 'dod phan par ro/_/stug po yi ni ming phyung nas/_/rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang /_/phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te/_/gcig la 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gcig ni rab smras pa/_/stug po dri med bsod nams te/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/_/rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog_/sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul/_/yu bus de yi sgra thos te/_/thos nas bdag cag dga' ba'i yid/_/stug po rnal 
[\[23a.2\]]'byor can gnas kyi/_/brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya/_/'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can/_/gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa/_/zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang /_/sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab/_/tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su/_/gtsang ma'i gnas 
[\[23a.3\]]kyi 'jigs med rnams/_/de dag thams cad sems pa ni/_/tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi 'gro/_/tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can/_/mun pas de dag bslad par gyur/_/thub pa mi shes thub rig gi/_/ji ltar gnas ni thob par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa de na kun tu 
[\[23a.4\]]sems/_/blo yis tshangs pa rig pa'i mchog_/'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag_/rgyu ba de na med pa ste/_/nam mkha'i khang pa gnas rnams dang /_/'du shes med pa de bzhin te/_/mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi/_/rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro/_/bdag 
[\[23a.5\]]gis bya ba byas sam ci/_/bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur/_/bdag 'gro'am brtan zhing rtag pa yi/_/ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu/_/gal te yang na thub pa ste/_/rnal 'byor mnga' ba lha'i yang lha'i/_/mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi/_/pho brang 
[\[23a.6\]]stug po der 'gro 'am/_/thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de skad smras nas thor tshugs can/_/mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi/_/sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams/_/gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i rnams/_/khyed la ci 'tshal ci gyis shig_/sangs 
[\[23a.7\]]rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol/_/stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzugs yul 'di las phyir log shig_/der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams/_/stug po de ni thub chen yul/_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing /_/'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste/_/
[\[23b\]]
