[\[44b.5\]]ma'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dra/_/sems can gcig min shes par dka'/_/yod dang med par rnam par brtags/_/rdul dang gtso bo skyes bu dang /_/mi gsal tshangs pa'ang de yin te/_/rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtog can rnams/_/kun gzhi la ni rtag tu rtog_/sa rnams lta bur 
[\[44b.6\]]gnas pa la/_/sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog_/sa la gang gis rtog gyur pa'i/_/yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya/_/ji ltar ri mo mtho dman dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gyi gzugs/_/'ja' dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sred byed dang /_/sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin te/_/rab rib 
[\[44b.7\]]can gyi phreng ba dang /_/bzang mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du/_/rmi lam dag na rnam sna tshogs/_/dri za'i khang pa gnas rten dang /_/ro langs chu yi shing rnams dang /_/brag ca sprin dang du ba dang /_/me long mig la gzugs brnyan dang /_/chu la chu yi zla ba dang /_/rnam rtog 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]'di dang mang por yang /_/'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog_/gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kun mthong ste/_/'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang /_/de'i tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/_/chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi/_/bag chags snyems 
[\[45a.2\]]la sogs pa dang /_/rtog pas rnyog pa can du byas/_/gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med/_/zag med ngang lugs rab thob nas/_/de dag rtag cing brtan par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam/_/'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te/_/mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pa la/_/
[\[45a.3\]]mi zag chos rnams skye bar 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang /_/thabs dang stobs dang mngon shes dag_/'bri med mi zad de bzhin te/_/nam mkha' zad kyi mthar snyegs shing /_/dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang /_/
[\[45a.4\]]mthar phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing /_/yid bzhin shin tu brtan pa'i lus/_/rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can/_/gzhan du gyur nas rab tu 'thob/_/'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin/_/sems can yod min skye ba med/_/'bri med gang ba med par yang /_/rgyal ba 
[\[45a.5\]]rnams kyis 'gro ba bshad/_/zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi/_/chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste/_/skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang /_/chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin gnas/_/rnal 'byor ldan pa grol ba la/_/rtag med chad pa med pa ste/_/sems can khams rnams 
[\[45a.6\]]zhig gyur na/_/thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo /_/ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang /_/'das dang da ltar byung ba dag_/mnyam pa ma yin 'thun pa min/_/shes bya zad nas de dag 'byung /_/bdud rnams tshar bcad log pa ste/_/brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang /_/de ste sems 
[\[45a.7\]]can 'jig na ni/_/sdug bsngal sbubs las mi 'grol lo/_/lcags kyi gar bu bsregs pa las/_/me las byung ste bsil gyur cing /_/lcags ni rtag par 'dug pa bzhin/_/de ltar rnal 'byor can dag 'khod/_/phung po'i khyim dang nges byung ba'i/_/bag chags rnams 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]kyang gyur pa dang /_/thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams/_/de dag rtag cing grol ba yin/_/rnam shes rnams ni dba' rlabs bzhin/_/kun gzhi mtsho las 'byung ba ste/_/chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis/_/rab tu bskyod cing shin tu rgyu/_/gnas ngan len gyi 
[\[45b.2\]]spros pa yis/_/bcom pa gnas med don gyi gzugs/_/lta ba'i yul du rnam par g.yo/_/de ltar shes nas phyir log ste/_/gzhan gyur mi bzad rtag pa'i rnams/_/mgon po dag ni stug por 'dong /_/stug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin/_/rtag tu gzugs brnyan 
[\[45b.3\]]rnam par mdzes/_/phung po stug pa kun gzhi ste/_/yid ni de la nye phan no/_/rnam par shes pa rtogs par byed/_/gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu/_/rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni/_/dbang por bcas shing yul gzhol bas/_/sna tshogs yid la 'dzin 
[\[45b.4\]]par byed/_/kun gzhi yul can ma yin no/_/tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/_/yid ni drod du rab tu gnas/_/yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/_/lhag ma dbang po lngar yang gnas/_/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes/_/phung po'i dbus na rnam par gnas/_/bag chags 
[\[45b.5\]]las dang 'brel ba'i rnams/_/sngon cad byas pa rnams kyis 'byung /_/'dod chags sred las byung ba yi/_/las kyis bya ba byed pa ste/_/sngon chad de dag las byas pas/_/rgyun du las rnams 'byung ba yin/_/lus las lus ni gzhan la 'gro/_/'pho ba srin bu pad pa 
[\[45b.6\]]bzhin/_/sems dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnams/_/rgyun chags par ni shin tu 'dong /_/yang zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams dang /_/rnam shes srid pa dog par yang /_/tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni/_/las rnams shin tu 'byung ba'i phyir/_/tshe dang drod dang 
[\[45b.7\]]rnam shes 'dis/_/gang tshe lus ni bor gyur pa/_/de tshe lus ni dor ba ste/_/shing bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/_/sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes/_/ngar sems bdag nyid yid yin no/_/gang zhig yul la 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni rnam par shes zhes bya/_/sems ni las rnams 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]sogs pa ste/_/yid ni khong du chud par byed/_/rnam par shes pas rnam par rig_/lnga pos snang ba rtogs par byed//_//'phags pa rgyan stug po/_/bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/_lus ni sems kyis bzung ba yin/_/yid ni lam rgyud 
[\[46a.2\]]'dod pa ste/_/rnam par shes pas rnam par rig_/snang ba gcod pa lnga po'o/_/rgyu la dmigs shing rnam shes rnams/_/skye ste gzhan ni de rjes 'brang /_/yid la dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang /_/mthar chags su ni rab tu 'byung /_/yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni/_/
[\[46a.3\]]dbang gi yon tan rnams kyis byas/_/dbang ni lnga dang lhan cig tu/_/rnam par shes pa rab tu byed/_/'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu/_/ro langs 'gro dang 'dra ba ste/_/smig rgyu dag ni gzugs dang mnyam/_/log pa ma yin bden pa min/_/'di ni bdag med stong pa ste/_/
[\[46a.4\]]srid pas kun du drangs pa yin/_/'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag_/thams cad dus yid lhan cig ste/_/sems byung yid ces bya ba dang /_/lhan cig rnam par shes pa 'byung /_/rnam shes lnga po de dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni/_/gnas ngan len 
[\[46a.5\]]dang sred bsgos pa/_/rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung /_/lus can kun gyi kun gzhi yang /_/sems dang sems byung ldan pa 'byung /_/kun gzhi rnyed nas de dag rgyu/_/rgyu nas rgyas par byed pa ste/_/sems rnams lam rgyud thams cad du/_/rtag par gcig las gcig 
[\[46a.6\]]rgyas 'gyur/_/sa 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung /_/kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni/_/rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin no/_/phan tshun rgyu yi stobs ldan pa/_/rnam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste/_/kun gzhi mtsho las dba' 
[\[46a.7\]]rlabs bzhin/_/sa bon dag dang myu gu'i rgyud/_/chu bo'i rgyun kyang mtshams med cing /_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung mod kyi/_/tha dad bye brag dag kyang snang /_/de bzhin rnam shes spyod pa ste/_/mtshams med pa yi rgyun du yang /_/rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung /_/gsum dang 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ldan zhing gsum las yang /_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams/_/bag chags sred pas bskyed pa dang /_/rang sems rnam par 'khrul pa yis/_/dba' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung /_/chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba dag_/phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te/_/
[\[46b.2\]]thub pa'i gnas kyang rnam bsgoms nas/_/mnyam par gzhag pa stug por 'gro/_/rdo rje'i snying po khyod dang yang /_/rgyal sras 'jigs med gzhan dag kyang /_/stug por 'jug par byed pa'i chos/_/thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal 
[\[46b.3\]]sras rnams/_/thabs cig rab tu rnam dgongs te/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe med pa/_/rmad du byung ba 'di bstan to/_/rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa/_/rin chen sna tshogs zla snying gi/_/seng ge'i khri la rab 'dug ste/_/shes rab chen pos rnam bsgoms kyis/_/rgyal 
[\[46b.4\]]ba'i sras kyis mdun bdar ba/_/stug po'i rgyan la rnam par bsgoms/_/rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di/_/rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston/_/zla dbang rgyal ba des bstan la/_/bag med par ni ma byed cig_/zla ba'i dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das/_/sprul par bya ba mang 
[\[46b.5\]]sprul cing /_/'dod pa'i khams kyi bsnyems bral dang /_/gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su yang /_/rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor/_/lha rnams kyis kyang mdun bdar cing /_/tshul gyis dam pa ston pa ni/_/'jigs med stug po'i rgyan yin no/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[46b.6\]]can gyis spyod pa'i mchog_/tshul bzang rnal 'byor spyod pa ste/_/so so rang rig shes pa yi/_/ting nge 'dzin dang bde ba'i rnams/_/yang dag mtha' la mi rig par/_/rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang /_/rnal 'byor bde las mngon langs shing /_/gcig la gcig 
[\[46b.7\]]ni phan tshun lta/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul dge 'di/_/gang gis shin tu mthong bar gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi/_/stan gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams/_/kun kyang ngo mtshar rab tu rnyed/_/bsam byed bsam gtan bsam pa dang /_/bsam gtan 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]rnams kyi dgos pa dag_/rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/_/kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas/_/stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la/_/lta ba mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams/_/mgo la cod pan thogs pa dag_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[47a.2\]]kyis/_/yan lag bris pa de dag kun/_/bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste/_/g.yo ba rnams dang shin tu bral/_/thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te/_/blta'o rdo rje snying po la/_/rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod la/_/chos la 
[\[47a.3\]]mos pa yang dag tu/_/mthong ste de nas de kun dang /_/phyogs rnams bzhi por blta byas te/_/'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas/_/'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su smras/_/rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams/_/rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/_/gang la rtog 
[\[47a.4\]]can myos 'gyur ba/_/de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis/_/gang bsam gang gis ji lta bur/_/bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag_/'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben/_/rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas/_/dga' bde dben las skyes par yang /_/bsam 
[\[47a.5\]]gtan dang po skye ba yin/_/de lta bu yi rim tshul du/_/bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu/_/mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang /_/bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed/_/nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang /_/rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te/_/kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan 
[\[47a.6\]]byed/_/chos rnams dang ni sa dag gi/_/rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang /_/phung po'i skye mched tshogs kyi rnams/_/'di dag thams cad bdag med de/_/byed pa med cing g.yo ba med/_/gsum po 'dus las rab tu byung /_/'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste/_/byed pa rnams 
[\[47a.7\]]kyis rnam par spangs/_/thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed/_/stong par lta ba'i lta ba can/_/chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams/_/chud gson mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams/_/bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]kyi bsam gtan dag_/lha rdzas bsod nams lta sbyong ba/_/rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras/_/mnyam bzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed/_/'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste/_/mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min/_/phung po rnams med khams yod min/_/
[\[47b.2\]]thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med/_/rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang /_/de dag de ltar mi gnas so/_/rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni/_/dngos po sa dang chu la sogs/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa/_/mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog_/kha dog sdug 
[\[47b.3\]]dang mi sdug dang /_/kha dog snang gzhan de bzhin te/_/'ja' dang in dra go ba ltar/_/kha dog sna mang sprin lta bu'i/_/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis/_/thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste/_/rgyas pa'i skye mched ces bya bas/_/'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te/_/
[\[47b.4\]]rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis/_/lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong /_/gang la dmigs te mnyam bzhag pa/_/de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang /_/gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa/_/de dang de ni dmigs pa yin/_/rnal 'byor can med rnal 'byor med/_/
[\[47b.5\]]de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid/_/kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad dang /_/thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la gnas/_/chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing /_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag_/
[\[47b.6\]]mnyam bzhag ldan pa rab tu ston/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rnam phye bas/_/rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrug pa/_/blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye/_/chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur/_/yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/_/chos rnams ston par byed pa ni/_/mtshan nyid rnam 
[\[47b.7\]]par rtog pa yis/_/bdag kyang chud zos gzhan chud gson/_/mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med/_/'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par snang /_/mngar ba'i rnams ni mkhris pa sel/_/bad kan tsha skyur lan tshwa ste/_/ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang /_/lan tshwa la sogs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rnam pas sel/_/mkhris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa las/_/rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_/lus can rnams kyi lus yul du/_/'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang /_/rims dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/thub pas bsdu ba byas pa ni/_/khar 
[\[48a.2\]]la sogs yan lag drug_/sha dang skol ma khu ba dag_/tha dad mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba/_/lus can rnams kyi rims kun to/_/rnam shes rnams ni kun gzhi la/_/phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te/_/gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam/_/mtshan nyid gcig ni yod 
[\[48a.3\]]gyur na/_/de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra med par 'gyur/_/rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel mi nus/_/mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro/_/sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste/_/gzhan du kun gzhi rnam 
[\[48a.4\]]shes pa/_/rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste/_/sgyu ma'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin 'khor ba/_/rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin/_/mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste/_/phung po rnams las phung po can/_/gzhan med yan lag nying lag las/_/yan lag can med 
[\[48a.5\]]yan lag la/_/'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te/_/'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med/_/'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min/_/phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o/_/de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du/_/ci yang rtsom par mi byed de/_/dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i 
[\[48a.6\]]phyir/_/rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dong /_/de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa/_/yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du/_/'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis/_/'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste/_/'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min/_/chos gsum pas kyang ma byas te/_/bag 
[\[48a.7\]]chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems/_/rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas/_/snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi/_/lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang /_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams/_/'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags/_/'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te/_/
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]sgyu ma'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du gnas/_/sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las/_/gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste/_/sa la stong zhes brjod par bya/_/sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas/_/rdza la sogs pa'i yul med de/_/sems ni rdza ma lta bu'o/_/sa la gzugs 
[\[48b.2\]]rnams yod pa dang /_/lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba/_/de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin/_/kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste/_/kun tu kha mig mgo bo yang /_/cig car ba dang rim gyis kyang /_/sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas/_/
[\[48b.3\]]bus pa rnam par myos byed de/_/gang gi snying la gang gnas pa/_/de ni de la gnyis tshul du/_/lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas/_/stong min dngos po gang yang med/_/tho bas ji ltar rdza bzhin du/_/dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i/_/dngos po dngos su yod pa min/_/
[\[48b.4\]]de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na/_/'jig med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur/_/gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang /_/de ni rnam par rtog pas brtags/_/ri rab ri bo tsam 'gyur ba'i/_/bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi/_/stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni/_/nga rgyal mi bden brtags 
[\[48b.5\]]pa'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/_/gnas ma yin par sbyar mi bya/_/gnas min gal te sbyar gyur na/_/bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba yin/_/lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung /_/lus can rnams la yod pa yi/_/lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/_/stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[48b.6\]]tshul bstan to/_/stong pa nyid kyi lta thos kyang /_/la la'i lta ba ma zhig na/_/gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te/_/sman pas btang ba'i nad pa bzhin/_/ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa'i me/_/bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so/_/de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/_/stong nyid me yang 
[\[48b.7\]]'gag par 'gyur/_/lta bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang /_/ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste/_/nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed/_/nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes/_/thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams/_/ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag_/de bzhin 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog_/stug po der ni rab tu 'dong /_/ri bong rwa yis ri bo rnams/_/mngon par gzhig bya ma mthong ste/_/'di la mo gsham bu yis kyang /_/srog chags gang yang bsad pa med/_/ri bong rwa yi gzhu yis kyang /_/su yang thab mo mi 
[\[49a.2\]]byed de/_/mo gsham bu la su yang rung /_/khyim gyi las su mi sko'o/_/stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid/_/rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te/_/yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang /_/de bzhin gcig pa nyid du gyur/_/mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang /_/gzugs rnams gzhig 
[\[49a.3\]]par brtson pa ste/_/gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min/_/gzugs med par yang de med de/_/khyad par med par 'byung ba ni/_/ma bsgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin/_/de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang /_/lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste/_/phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du/_/
[\[49a.4\]]de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las/_/rnal 'byor can gyi las sgrub bo/_/lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te/_/ro langs 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'dra/_/sred pa'i srad bus bcings byas shing /_/yul gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin/_/lha rdzas stong pa 
[\[49a.5\]]nyid bshad pa/_/lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste/_/mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis lta med bshad/_/stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni/_/yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir/_/blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yi/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom/_/rtswa dang shing 
[\[49a.6\]]dang gyo mo dag_/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te/_/sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par/_/gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed/_/gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang /_/sred dang mig rnams rgyur byas shing /_/mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin/_/smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o/_/
[\[49a.7\]]gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med/_/yul gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro ba min/_/'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la/_/yod dang med par brtag mi bya/_/skra yi tshogs dang bong bu'i rwa/_/mo gsham bu dang smig rgyu dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dag_/ming du grag gi yod pa min/_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]stag dang gzig dang dom dag dang /_/rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang /_/g.yi dang mtsha' dang rus sbal la/_/rwa ni yod pa ma yin na/_/thub pa rtsod par brtson pa yis/_/de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing /_/bong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya/_/ci go de dag bsgrub nus sam/_/shes rab can 
[\[49b.2\]]gyis sar bstan pa/_/de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya/_/rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni/_/blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra/_/sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med/_/so so rang rig yul yang med/_/gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la/_/rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus/_/stug por 
[\[49b.3\]]gnas par rnam par rtogs/_/de la brtags shing dge ba 'thob/_/rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor can/_/de na gnas pa bzhin du snang /_/lha yul gnas pa'i bsnyems bral dang /_/zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang /_/rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams/_/
[\[49b.4\]]ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin/_/de bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun/_/bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi/_/kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can/_/de la brten cing rab tu rgyu/_/ji ltar sa la kun brten cing /_/sa skye kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin/_/sems can kun gyi gnas yin te/_/
[\[49b.5\]]'byung khungs kun gyi khyad par du/_/de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang /_/rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te/_/sems dang sems las byung bar ldan/_/dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung /_/ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgro rnams/_/'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste/_/gtsug 
[\[49b.6\]]phud can rnams 'dab sgro yis/_/rma bya mo dang longs rtse ba/_/de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang /_/sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas/_/thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong /_/ji ltar rgya mtsho chu bo yis/_/nyin gcig bzhin du dgang bya 
[\[49b.7\]]yang /_/chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad/_/rgya mtsho rtog par yong mi byed/_/de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang /_/zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste/_/rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin/_/bag chags chu bos rab tu dgang /_/ji ltar rin chen ldan pa'i sa/_/sna 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]tshogs kun du phan 'dogs te/_/sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho/_/yon tan dngos su rton pa yin/_/de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang /_/rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung /_/de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de/_/gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[50a.2\]]yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can/_/spyod pa legs spyad gtsang ba ste/_/sa bcu pa las mngon byung ste/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sar zhugs nas/_/yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa/_/sna tshogs sems can rnam sprul par/_/'jig pa med 
[\[50a.3\]]par 'byung ba ni/_/rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no/_/sos ka me tog mang po'i gzugs/_/mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong /_/de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems/_/thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed/_/ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i sras/_/'byung las byung ba 
[\[50a.4\]]ma yin pa/_/med pa'i blo can de bzhin te/_/log par smra la brtson pa dag_/chos dang mi 'thun phra ma can/_/lce gnyis log par lta ba dag_/rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos/_/rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig_/'bras bu 
[\[50a.5\]]sna tshogs ston byed pa/_/'bras bu me tog de na med/_/sngags dang khong bzos zo mdog bde/_/'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa/_/rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras/_/kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas/_/bstan 
[\[50a.6\]]pa gzhan la ji snyed du/_/bstan pa byas pa de dag kun/_/bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/_/bstan pa stug po'i rgyan la bstan/_/khams rnams drug dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bstan/_/skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi/_/yid kyi srad bus btags pa dag_/
[\[50a.7\]]sems can kun du rab tu 'khor/_/rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs/_/khams dang skye mched phung po ste/_/yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing /_/lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu/_/'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste/_/'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan/_/lus can kun gyi skyes 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]bu ni/_/'gro yang byung ba ma yin te/_/khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin/_/skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba/_/dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste/_/dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa/_/nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang /_/dga' ldan 
[\[50b.2\]]la sogs bsnyems bral dang /_/mtshe ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad/_/rdo rje snying po dbang can la/_/rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/_/dge'o dge zhes dga' 'bod cing /_/thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub ldan rnal 'byor spyod pa dang /_/rgyal 
[\[50b.3\]]ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras/_/zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang /_/lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang /_/rnal 'byor bdag po rnal 'byor can/_/ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang /_/dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang /_/thal mo sbyar te gnas par gyur/_/phan tshun 
[\[50b.4\]]gcig la gcig lta zhing /_/rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni/_/'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang /_/mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste/_/thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni/_/thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan/_/'das dang da ltar byung ba yis/_/sngon byas ma byas thob pa ni/_/
[\[50b.5\]]sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o/_/ji ltar mkha' la bya rjes rnams/_/rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/_/sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams/_/gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan/_/ji ltar shing las me dag gi/_/me 
[\[50b.6\]]lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur/_/bsreg pa gzhan ni ma rnyed cing /_/rlung gis bab na gtan mi 'bar/_/bya rjes rnam par bzhag pa ni/_/mkha' la gnas pa mi snang ste/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yi/_/'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin/_/bya rnams rkang 
[\[50b.7\]]pas mi 'dong ste/_/de dag sgro yi shugs kyis 'dong /_/bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni/_/skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstan/_/las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni/_/'khor rnams rtag tu 'khor ba ste/_/bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa/_/byas pa'i las ni chud mi za/_/ji ltar 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]zhing pa rnams kyi las/_/'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te/_/don dang ldan pa de dag ni/_/gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med/_/lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni/_/rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston/_/lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing /_/de ni dge ba'i las 
[\[51a.2\]]byed do/_/'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang /_/lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing /_/'khor las sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur ba'i/_/bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed/_/thar dang pha rol phyin rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun/_/'gro ba'i skyes bu 
[\[51a.3\]]med na ni/_/kun kyang 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/lha yi bde ba thams cad dang /_/dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang /_/de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur/_/las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong /_/las rnams don med ma yin te/_/
[\[51a.4\]]'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang /_/mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi/_/lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin/_/'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na/_/sred pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'gyur/_/'khor dang bral na thar pa ste/_/blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so/_/'jug pa'i skyes bu 
[\[51a.5\]]med na ni/_/mo gsham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bong bu'i rwa yang rno 'gyur te/_/bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung /_/phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni/_/phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/_/gang dang gang du 'gro ba dag_/de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin/_/lha dang lha yi bu mo'i 
[\[51a.6\]]tshogs/_/dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang /_/dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang /_/sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang /_/thub la mchod par 'os pa yi/_/rdo rje'i snying po sras bcas la/_/mchod de gsol ba 'debs par byed/_/thams cad dge'o dge zhes smra/_/
[\[51a.7\]]nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul/_/rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa ni/_/gzhan gyi rgol ba 'joms pa ste/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/_/bgab zungs ltag chod tshar gcod pa/_/bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston/_/shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol/_/'gro ba 'di 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dag nyan par 'gyur/_/ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang /_/lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon/_/shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu/_/brtags 'das rtogs dang bral ba yi/_/rgyu dang dpe yi me tog ste/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyi thub dge ba/_/stug po'i rgyan ni bshad par bya/_/
[\[51b.2\]]de ni thub la rnal 'byor ston/_/stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te/_/stug na spyod pa'i thub pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog_/thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o/_/sa stengs thub pa'i dru ma la/_/rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/_/rtag par dru ma khyod kyis kyang /_/chos kyi dngos nyid 
[\[51b.3\]]shes par gyis/_/dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/_/dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes/_/'di 'dra'i lta dang ldan pa yi/_/thub pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo/_/chos pa gcig pu rtogs pa yis/_/chos par mngon du shes pa ste/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang /_/dngos po gcig gis 
[\[51b.4\]]shes par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho/_/sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur/_/dngos po ji med stong pa nyid/_/dngos po dngos por yod pa'ang med/_/'di dag kun gzhi rnam pa ste/_/stong 
[\[51b.5\]]nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o/_/rgyal sras dru ma 'jigs med pas/_/rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/_/lus can rnams kyi khams kyi mi/_/ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur/_/'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing /_/'byung las 'byung ba'i ji lta bu/_/g.yo gsher tsha dang sra ba yi/_/khams rnams 
[\[51b.6\]]ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis/_/dru ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas/_/mi'am ci bdag khyod dge ste/_/khyod ni dge 'o yang dge 'o/_/rnal 'byor can gyi snying po'i mchog_/yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa/_/sems kyi skyes bu'i lus can la/_/khams rnams skye 
[\[51b.7\]]'gyur ji lta zhes/_/de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la/_/de ni dge bar bshad par bya/_/de bas mi'am ci yi bdag_/pi bang slob dpon bdag las nyon/_/ji ltar mi'am ci yi bdag_/khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa/_/bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis/_/nam mkha' las ni rab 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]'dong zhing /_/rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor du/_/pi bang sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas/_/thub pa dru ma ltos shig ces/_/phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung /_/bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs na/_/mi'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing /_/pi bang bai dUr+yas spras pa/_/
[\[52a.2\]]len cing mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe/_/pi bang yid 'ong shin tu snyan/_/dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyang ba ste/_/mi'am ci yi bdag po yis/_/rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe/_/nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de/_/nyan thos de dag gyur pa de/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong ba dang /_/'od srung 
[\[52a.3\]]rnal 'byor bzang can dang /_/lha yi cod pan la smras pa/_/rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi/_/pi bang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/_/'dod chags bral ba ci phyir gyur/_/'od srung khyod kyis nged la ston/_/rgyal sras stobs chen dmu rlung bzhin/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dang 'dra ba ni/_/nyan 
[\[52a.4\]]thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams/_/bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can/_/nyon mongs rnam rtog byung bas mnar/_/yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas/_/bag chags dri ma yongs bsal te/_/bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing /_/shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na/_/sems kyi khams las gzhan 
[\[52a.5\]]gyur pa/_/de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur/_/khyod ni dbang chen phra yul ldan/_/shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas/_/dbang po 'jig rten phyol ba yi/_/gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te/_/mi'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dge/_/
[\[52a.6\]]sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas bya la/_/bslab ste zla ba bzhin gnas pa/_/mi'am ci yi dbang po khyod/_/sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes/_/khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes zhing /_/thub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su/_/khams kyi sems las skyes pa'i mi/_/kho bo la ni sras kyis 
[\[52a.7\]]dris/_/mnyam sems mnyam par gzhag pa yis/_/thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis/_/khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang /_/sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la/_/rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi/_/de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya/_/chu ni rlan rnams skyed par 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]byed/_/drod ni me'o sra ba sa/_/gdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams/_/rlung gi khams kyis kun nas rtsom/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i sa mtshams ni/_/nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed/_/rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni/_/bag chags rnams kyis rab tu bskyed/_/srid 
[\[52b.2\]]kyi mtshams dang mig dag gis/_/skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te/_/rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang /_/nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas/_/dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/_/rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa/_/rgyal sras rnams 
[\[52b.3\]]kyis mdun bdar cing /_/so so'i stan las kun langs te/_/yang dang yang zhing phyag 'tshal nas/_/rim gror rdo rje'i snying po la/_/mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed/_/rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing /_/yang dang yang du gsol ba byed/_/dge'o dge'o yang dag ste/_/dge 
[\[52b.4\]]ba ldan la rab gnas zhing /_/chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas/_/sangs rgyas sa la rab bzhugs te/_/dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan/_/rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis/_/de nas yang du mchod byas te/_/rnal 'byor che can 
[\[52b.5\]]dge'o dge/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/_/lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/chos de bdag la bstan pas na/_/nor bu rin chen sna tshogs nas/_/bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas/_/thub ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/blo gros chen po byams pa dang /_/
[\[52b.6\]]blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang /_/'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_/lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag_/shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros dang /_/gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_/rin chen gtsug phud 'phrul chen dang /_/yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang /_/mtshe ma'i rab 
[\[52b.7\]]dang 'gro 'dzin dang /_/rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che/_/rnal 'byor can la sems ston pa/_/thub pa thams cad don grub pa/_/thub sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/_/'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste/_/rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams/_/so so'i stan 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]las kun langs nas/_/de dag gcig la gcig bltas te/_/rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/_/chos kyi tshul ni brtan par gyis/_/khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis rab tu mchod/_/sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang /_/
[\[53a.2\]]khyod la thams cad shin tu gnas/_/khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/_/rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang /_/rnal 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag_/sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang /_/'jig rten rnams 
[\[53a.3\]]kyi ngo mtshar gzhi/_/mdo sde kun gyis dri med cing /_/bstan dang bklag pa rnams spangs pa/_/stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis/_/sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste/_/de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang /_/zag pa 
[\[53a.4\]]med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/_/so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul/_/lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde/_/'phags pa rnams la de ston cig_/phung po lhag ma ma lus par/_/gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnams/_/rnam par 
[\[53a.5\]]thar dang dbang rnams dang /_/yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi/_/lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas dang /_/mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/_/rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phra dang /_/skra rtse 
[\[53a.6\]]brgya char phra ba dag_/rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis/_/bstan dang bklag dang rnam bral zhing /_/brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi/_/stug po zhing gi dam pa der/_/ci nas thub pa 'dong ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar/_/thub pas de 
[\[53a.7\]]dag kun bltas te/_/'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la/_/brtag par mi nus brtag bral ba'i/_/chos tshul rab tu bstan par bya/_/blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na/_/rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshul/_/sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ste/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/_/rgya chen lce yis rab snyan par/_/rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bshad/_/seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba/_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/_/rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bstan/_/kim ka'i sgra la mkhas pas na/_/sgra yi mtshan 
[\[53b.2\]]nyid grags pa yis/_/mdor na de yi nyis gyur tu/_/rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston/_/sang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs/_/mthong zhing ring ba'i sgra skad dang /_/gan da ra dang ran ldan par/_/rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan/_/rI Sha b+ha dang d+hai ba ta/_/ShaD+dza ke shi lnga po yi/_/sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa 
[\[53b.3\]]yi/_/dbyangs kyis thub pa rnam par gsung /_/[{]rings [,]ring [}]dang dal ba med pa'i tshig_/zab cing snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs te/_/mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la/_/de bzhin sim par byed pa yi/_/tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig_/rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni/_/lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste/_/sprul 
[\[53b.4\]]pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin/_/thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni/_/ci yang brjod par mi byed par/_/thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra/_/yan lag rnams la mngon par 'byung /_/smin ma dpral ba spyi bo dang /_/phrag pa sna rtse byin pa las/_/chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing /_/
[\[53b.5\]]dge ba'i sgra rnams byung bar gyur/_/rdo rje snying po thub pa yi/_/smon lam legs las byung ba ste/_/bre mo'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus/_/dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/_/thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/_/dpa' chen 
[\[53b.6\]]rdo rje'i snying po de/_/rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o/_/skar ma'i dbang po skar ma de/_/gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa bzhin/_/rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can/_/dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes/_/ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang /_/zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med/_/de bzhin 
[\[53b.7\]]rdo rje'i snying po dang /_/rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med/_/yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i/_/rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che/_/rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa/_/stan las legs par ldang byas shing /_/rgyal sras rnams la 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]mngon bltas nas/_/tshig dge rnam par smras pa ni/_/kye ma theg chen theg pa ni/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang /_/rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston/_/bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang /_/rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang /_/dri med 
[\[54a.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab chos/_/dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni/_/mchog tu phra zhing dkon pa ste/_/gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog_/rtog pa can gyi yul ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul/_/rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed/_/bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi/_/
[\[54a.3\]]de bzhin khyad par byed pas na/_/bag chags spros pas 'phangs pa de/_/yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang /_/sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing /_/rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung /_/lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba dang /_/gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur/_/rnam dag rigs la 
[\[54a.4\]]gnas pa dag_/sangs rgyas rigs su de dag 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs/_/mur 'dug nyan thos rnams spangs pa/_/thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog_/stug por de bzhin 'dong bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang /_/ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[54a.5\]]snying pos gang thob phyir/_/tshul dge 'di ni ston par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang gnyis la/_/thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyi/_/rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod/_/ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin/_/ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci/_/gang 
[\[54a.6\]]la gnas shing tshul 'di yang /_/rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/_/dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyis/_/'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang /_/tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu 
[\[54a.7\]]stobs dang /_/blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang /_/nus sam mi nus zhes bltas nas/_/blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang /_/rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis/_/thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par byos/_/gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dge ba/_/dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang /_/thub 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]pa rnams la bshad par bya/_/theg pa chen po 'od can gyi/_/ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te/_/de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams/_/tshul dge rab tu ston par byed/_/bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong /_/de dag mgon po de bzhin no/_/rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa rnams/_/de dag rang 
[\[54b.2\]]gi zhal ston to/_/dge'o dge zhes rab tu gsung /_/'di ni rnal 'byor bzang ldan lam/_/lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba/_/thob nas sangs rgyas dri med gyur/_/gang yang sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes/_/theg pa chen po snang ba yi/_/ting nge 
[\[54b.3\]]'dzin gyi phra sems pa/_/de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang /_/rgyal ba bsam yas spyod yul can/_/sprul pa bye ba mang po yis/_/so so rang rig spyod yul gyi/_/ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/_/shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do/_/so so rang gis rig tshul ni/_/gang la sangs 
[\[54b.4\]]rgyas gnas pa yin/_/chos 'di mtshan ma med pa ste/_/sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs/_/ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa yin/_/mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/_/rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skyes/_/chos rnams kyi ni de bzhin nyid/_/de ni yang dag sus mthong ba/_/
[\[54b.5\]]de yi ye shes yang dag mtshon/_/rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te/_/mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung /_/ming dang mtshan ma med pa na/_/rang bzhin don gyi dam pa ni/_/thams cad lus la kun nas gnas/_/kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste/_/bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod 
[\[54b.6\]]gnas/_/yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs/_/yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa yis/_/yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas/_/rnam shes lnga po yul can dag_/'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa yin/_/rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni/_/sems can bzhin gnas lus can la/_/kun 
[\[54b.7\]]gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las/_/dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung /_/rnam shes kun gzhi mtshor gnas pa/_/bag chags rnams kyis brnyogs pa'i rnams/_/yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pa dag_/rnam par rgyun chad med par rgyu/_/chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi/_/
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste/_/mngon sangs rgyas shing chos ston to/_/phung po gang zag bdag med par/_/rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing /_/chos kyi dngos yod ma bshig par/_/nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/_/bdag 
[\[55a.2\]]med gnyis la mkhas pa nyid/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed/_/rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni/_/tshul bshad bzhin du yang dag mtha'/_/yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing /_/snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni/_/sems can dgos pa'i rgyun bcad pas/_/de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob bo/_/
[\[55a.3\]]bsam yas kye ma ye shes 'di/_/sems can rnams kyi bde ba skyed/_/mkhyen cing rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/_/blo chung rnams la tshul ston to/_/ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi/_/dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad mo dag_/thub pa rnams dang lha dag gi/_/nye ba'i longs spyod rgyu yin no/_/de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las/_/rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[55a.4\]]rnams 'byung ba ni/_/sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing /_/lha la yid du 'ong ba yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang /_/lha yi khrod du khyad par du/_/rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste/_/'khor lo can du khyad par du'o/_/lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang /_/dri za rnams kyi de bzhin te/_/theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi/_/lus can 
[\[55a.5\]]rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob/_/de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/theg pa che la brtson par gyis/_/mthar gyis bde gshegs gnas rab dang /_/rgyal po dag tu'ang 'gyur bar 'ong /_/kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang /_/rnam par byung ba'i yod pa kun/_/rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/_/sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin/_/
[\[55a.6\]]spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam/_/'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyang /_/gtso bo rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyis/_/'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas/_/khyad par can gyi rgyu brjod pa/_/ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_/rgyu med rang yang med par 'gyur/_/bya med byed pa'ang med par 'gyur/_/rnam par byang dang tha mi dad/_/kun 
[\[55a.7\]]gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba min/_/de ste rnam byang tha dad na/_/kun gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur/_/sngon med 'jig med rtag pa ste/_/mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag_/sprul pa ye shes sgrar yang grag_/phan tshun snying po tha mi dad/_/de ni 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]sor gdub bzhin du gnas/_/sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste/_/bde gshegs snying po dge ba'ang de/_/snying po de la kun gzhi sgras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad/_/snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang /_/blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes 
[\[55b.2\]]so/_/gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi/_/gser las sor gdub byas pa ni/_/sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes/_/phan tshun tha dad mtshan yin te/_/sor gdub ces kyang brjod mod kyi/_/las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur bas/_/gser 
[\[55b.3\]]ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas/_/chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/_/sems dang rnam par shes pa'i yul/_/bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang /_/'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldog_/'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi/_/so so rang gis mthong ba dang /_/
[\[55b.4\]]spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa/_/thams cad brjod par mi nus so/_/ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung /_/sems dang rnam shes spyod yul du/_/sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang /_/rnam shes yin te yul med do/_/sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/_/
[\[55b.5\]]gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/_/rdza phru snam bu sogs pa yi/_/yul ni gang yang yod pa min/_/ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing /_/nyi zla gza' yi tshogs kyi rnams/_/bral ba med par rtag tu 'khor/_/de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi la/_/rnam 
[\[55b.6\]]dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni/_/rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar/_/kun gzhi snying por bsgrags pa ni/_/rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin/_/rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dag_/rtog par nus pa ma yin dang /_/yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[55b.7\]]yang /_/rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong /_/yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni/_/bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos/_/smig rgyu sgra tshogs byung ba ste/_/'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs/_/stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las ji snyed pa'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]{D111}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ka ru NA puN Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[56a.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[56a.3\]]dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa do mod kyi nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas/_khyod kyis shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal chos shig_/kun dga' bo 'dus byas su brtags pa thams cad 
[\[56a.4\]]legs par bcom pa'i shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/_ngas gnas med pa'i chos zhi ba rab tu zhi ba mchog gya nom pa zab pa/_mthong bar dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_brtag 
[\[56a.5\]]mi nus pa ma brtags pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/_phul du phyin par 'phags pa'i bdud rtsi ni bstan/_kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am/_bdud dam/_lha'am/_tshangs pa 
[\[56a.6\]]'am/_gzhan gang gis kyang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba ni bskor/_ngas chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdungs/_ngas chos kyi dung chen po ni bus/_ngas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgrengs/_ngas 
[\[56a.7\]]chos kyi mar me chen po ni bus/_ngas mun pa chen po ni bsal/_ngas stong gsum ni snang bar byas/_ngas gru chen po ni bcas/_ngas stegs chen po ni btsugs/_ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/_ngas pha rol tu 'dong ba mang po ni bton/_ngas thar pa'i lam ni yang 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dag par bstan/_ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phab/_ngas lha dang mi rnams ni tshim par byas/_ngas gdul ba rnams ni btul/_ngas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni skrag par byas/_ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/_ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/_ngas 
[\[56b.2\]]bdud kyi gnas ni g.yo bar byas/_ngas seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/_ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/_ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyung /_ngas sngon gyi yi dam ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/_ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis brlabs/_ngas nyan thos chen po 
[\[56b.3\]]rnams las byed du ni btsud/_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/_kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba ma gtogs par phyis bya ba nga la med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[56b.4\]]kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rnam pa de lta bu de thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug rngus zug par gyur nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu myur 
[\[56b.5\]]bar mya ngan las 'da' zhing bde bar gshegs pa rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ste/_'jig rten gyi mig rab tu myur bar mi snang bar 'gyur/_rab tu myur bar 'jig rten mgon ma mchis pa dang skyabs ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56b.6\]]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig_/smre sngags ma 'don cig_/gang gnas pa dang byung ba dang 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa ni rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jig par 
[\[56b.7\]]ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo ngas thog ma nyid du khyed la dga' ba dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur bral bar 'gyur bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma bstan tam/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la byams pa'i lus kyi las 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]phan pa dang bde ba dang gnyis su med pa dang tshad med pa dang /_mi 'thun pa med pas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/kun dga' bo gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa la bskal pa'am bskal pa las 
[\[57a.2\]]lhag par bsnyen bkur byas bas gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yud tsam zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de de bas 'bras bu shin tu ches kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig_/smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa ni 
[\[57a.3\]]don che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang phan yon che ba dang rgya che ba dang bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang /_bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang /_bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mchi ma phyis nas smre sngags 'don cing shing sA la 
[\[57a.4\]]zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sA la zung ga la ba der gshegs nas shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal lo/_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shing 
[\[57a.5\]]sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na shing dang rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam po yan cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gang du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 
[\[57a.6\]]las 'da' ba de logs su gzhol 'dud/_rab tu 'dud cing mngon par 'dud par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klung ngam 'bab chu'am chu mig gam mtsho'am lteng ka'am khron pa'am rdzing ngam/_pad ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yod pa 
[\[57a.7\]]de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang po dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra mi 'byin par 'khod 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]cing mi za mi rgyu bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dam/_skar ma'i gzugs sam/_nor bu'am me 'am srin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste/_lham mer ma 
[\[57b.2\]]yin/_lhan ner ma yin/_lhang nger ma yin par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/_mi 'bar bar gyur/_mi tsha bar gyur/_mi tshig par 
[\[57b.3\]]gyur/_yongs su mi gdung bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi zhing bsil bar gyur to/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig de dang 
[\[57b.4\]]yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/_gcig la gcig gnod sems med/_rnam par 'tshe ba med/_rnam par tho btsam 
[\[57b.5\]]pa med cing gnod pa byed pa med par gyur to/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkres pa dang /_skom pa med par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang lus dang sems tshim pa dang /_
[\[57b.6\]]sdug bsngal rgyun chad pa dang /_bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po 
[\[57b.7\]]dang /_btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po dang /_spos kyi ngad ldang dang /_gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang /_gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang /_rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]'gul rab tu 'gul/_'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_ldeg rab tu ldeg par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i tshe mi ldang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe skad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang 
[\[58a.2\]]bar gyur te gnyid med/_chod pa med sgrib pa med rtsom pa med cing mi 'dzer bar gyur te sgra chung ca co chung zhing yid mi g.yeng bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[58a.3\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur te 'od med gzi brjid 
[\[58a.4\]]med par gyur par shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[58a.5\]]chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi stan dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas par skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur to/_/stong gsum 
[\[58a.6\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po gang dag zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba 'di snyam du sems shing bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag byas/_bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag sprul/_bdag 
[\[58a.7\]]cag gis 'jig rten byas/_bdag cag gis 'jig rten sprul to snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/_/rang rang gi gnas thams 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]cad dang ldan pa yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur par shes so/_/de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur par shes te rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/_/'jig rten skyong ba dang 
[\[58b.2\]]dbang phyug chen po dang gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga ltas yin snyam du sems so/_/de nas stong 
[\[58b.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa la bltas so/_/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa 
[\[58b.4\]]po dbang phyug bdag po dbang sgyur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do mod mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_gang gis bdag rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' ba dang /_gang gis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 
[\[58b.5\]]'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas yin 'di ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/_de mi dga' zhing yid dung zhes byed de spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te myur ba myur bar [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[58b.6\]]par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang /_ma 'dus pa dang /_tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur/_'phags pa'i chos la gnas 
[\[58b.7\]]par gyur to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang ji ltar 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa khyod nga ni tshangs pa/_tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa kun 
[\[59a.2\]]shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur ba yin te/_bdag gis sems can rnams byas/_bdag gis sems can rnams sprul/_bdag gis 'jig rten byas/_bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing de skad zer zhe na bden nam/_gsol 
[\[59a.3\]]pa bcom ldan 'das mad do/_/bde bar gshegs pa mad do/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa khyod sus byas/_sus sprul/_de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/tshangs pa chen po de cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[59a.4\]]bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa 
[\[59a.5\]]khyod nyid kyis byas sam/_khyod kyis sprul tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sa chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la brten/_chu yang rlung la brten/_rlung yang nam mkha' la brten te 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad 
[\[59a.6\]]stong yod cing mi 'jig pa de la ji snyam du sems/_'di khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i 
[\[59a.7\]]bu dag lam me ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin zhing gzhal med khang rnams stong par 'khod pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/_tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang sos ka dang /_dbyar dang /_ston dang /_dgun dang /_dgun smad dang /_dpyid kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/_de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin 
[\[59b.2\]]nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang chu'am/_me long gi dkyil 'khor ram/_'bru mar dang mar gyi snod dam/_nor bu dang shel rnams kyi nang ngam/_de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna 
[\[59b.3\]]tshogs snang ba 'di lta ste shing ljon pa dang nags tshal dang kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang snang ba'am/_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal snang ba'am/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_lug dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_
[\[59b.4\]]bya rnams snang ba'am/_zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i tshogs rnams snang ba'am/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ba'am/_sa dang ri dang klung snang ba'am/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang de 
[\[59b.5\]]las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa g.yang sa dang ri dang ri'i 'bab chu dang 
[\[59b.6\]]rdzing rnams na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang glu gar dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya dang mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag ca dang /_gang de dang 'thun pa'i sgra brnyan 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_
[\[59b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmi lam na gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang /_sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang /_dri sna tshogs snom pa dang /_ro sna tshogs myong ba dang /_reg bya sna tshogs reg pa dang /_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]chos sna tshogs shes pa dang /_dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs myong ba dang /_mchi ma byung ba dang ngu ba dang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/_myong ba'am shes pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin

[\[60a.4\]]'am/_dbul ba'am/_bsod nams che ba'am/_tshul khrims bzang ba'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_shes rab bzang ba'am/_shes rab 'chal pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_

[\[60a.6\]]gcan gzan khro bo dang dgra dang mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/_gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[60a.7\]]ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa dang /_dus dang /_khams mi 'thun pa las gyur pa'am/_gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang /_sngon gyi las 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus na ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_
[\[60b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang mu ge dang /_chu dang /_'brog dang /_sbrul dang /_chom rkun dang /_dgon pa dang /_mtshon cha dang /_nad dang /_bar gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin 
[\[60b.3\]]gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pha ma dang /_spun dang /_sring mo dang /_grogs dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /_
[\[60b.4\]]bu pho dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo dag dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs 
[\[60b.5\]]yang ba'i las la sbyor ba/_skra dang phabs dang rgya skyegs dang 'khor lo 'tshong pa'am/_rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba dang /_'brog dgon par 'jug pa'am/_phyogs sna tshogs su skyas 'degs pa'am/_zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs

[\[60b.7\]]len pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha dang mi'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /_gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_legs par spyad pa rnams sam/_gang 'jig rten na mi 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la mi phan pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang gnod pa dang /_ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /_
[\[61a.2\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags 
[\[61a.3\]]so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/_mgo gcad pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang rna ba dang sna gcad pa'am/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gcad pa'am/_mer bsregs pa dang /_'bru mar 
[\[61a.4\]]gyis gtor ba dang /_srog dang dbral ba dang ral gri dang mdung thung dang /_mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang /_gsad pa dang bcing ba dang go rar gzhug pa dang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis 
[\[61a.5\]]byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis ma la log par spyod pa dang /_sring mo la log par spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log 
[\[61a.6\]]par spyod pa dang /_sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /_khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 
[\[61a.7\]]kyi gnod par byed pa sna tshogs byad dang ro langs dang rig sngags dang sngags dang sman dang 'byung po dang gdon 'bebs pa dang /_gang de las gzhan pa dug sbyor ba dang /_gang sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_srog 'chad par 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta 
[\[61b.2\]]ste/_skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang /_zad pa'i chos nyid dang /_'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang /_mdza' ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang /_med par 'gyur ba dang bral 
[\[61b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba dang bye bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang 
[\[61b.4\]]dang gti mug dang sgrib pa dang chod pa dang bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa dang kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba dang /_sdang bar 'gyur ba dang rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[61b.5\]]las mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang 'di sems can 
[\[61b.6\]]dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[61b.7\]]pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang 'di 'byung po'i tshogs dang /_sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal chu na gnas pa dang /_thang la gnas pa'am me tog 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dang spos shing rnam pa sna tshogs sam/_mngar ba dang /_kha ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mngon par grub pa gang sems can 
[\[62a.2\]]rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du sems/_tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gang 'gro ba lnga po 
[\[62a.3\]]dag na yongs su 'khor bar skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'thon pa dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'di dag dang /_tshangs pa gang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[62a.4\]]ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyud ma chad pa gang na lha dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thags 'khrugs pa lta bu/_dru gu 'dzings pa lta bu 'ong ba dang /_'gro bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di 
[\[62a.5\]]nas 'jig rten pha rol dang /_'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/_'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/_tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/_
[\[62a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar ngas sems can 'di dag byas/_ngas sprul/_ngas byin gyis brlabs/_ngas 'jig rten byas/_ngas sprul/_ngas 
[\[62a.7\]]byin gyis brlabs snyam du sems/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ma 'tshal ba/_rtag tu lta bar gyur pa ma spangs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rtag tu ma thos pas 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]sems can rnams bdag gis bgyis/_bdag gis sprul/_'jig rten bdag gis bgyis/_'jig rten bdag gis sprul zhes bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[62b.2\]]'das 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis/_'jig rten 'di sus sprul/_sems can rnams sus bgyis/_sus sprul/_bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu lags/_sus byin gyis brlabs/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de la 'di skad ces 
[\[62b.3\]]bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa 'jig rten ni las kyis byas las kyis sprul to/_/sems can rnams ni las kyis byas/_las kyi rgyu las byung /_las kyis rab tu phye ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen 
[\[62b.4\]]gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i 
[\[62b.5\]]rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa ma 
[\[62b.6\]]rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag pa'i bar du 'gyur te/_tshangs pa las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams yod na sems can rnams 'byung bar snang ba dang /_las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang bral bas 'byung ba med par snang ba ma 
[\[62b.7\]]gtogs par 'di la byed pa po'am/_byed du 'jug pa'am/_nye bar 'jog pa po gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa zad pa dang /_sdug bsngal zad pa dang /_sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang /_nges par byung ba dang rnam par 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]zhi ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa de la las gang yin pa de zad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang /_sdug bsngal gang yin pa de rnam par zhi ba dang /_nub pa ma gtogs par yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[63a.2\]]'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos nyid de lta bu dag 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa mi 'byung gi_/
[\[63a.3\]]tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba zab pa zab par snang ba chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/_de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las 
[\[63a.4\]]yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_sems can rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i bar dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/_'du byed thams 
[\[63a.5\]]cad ni mig yor lta bu mi rtag pa g.yo ba mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes tshangs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de rnam par phye zhing gsal bar mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[63a.6\]]so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na yang 'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid byin gyis brlabs yin no/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed thams cad mig 
[\[63a.7\]]yor lta bur ma gzigs su zin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur mi ston pa zhig na tshangs pa gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang brag ca lta 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bu dang mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mkhyen pa de'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur ston no/_/de la mkhas pa de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag yod de de'i mtshan ma mthong nas rgyu de dang rkyen de dang dmigs 
[\[63b.2\]]pa'i mtshan ma des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par khong du chud cing g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes rnam par 'byed do/_/'du byed thams cad ni 'jig cing 'gyur ro/_/dus dang tshigs dang dus tshigs kyis kyang 'jig go/_/skad cig dang thang cig dang phyogs tsam dang yud 
[\[63b.3\]]tsam dang zhag dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo dang lo brgya dang bskal pa dang bskal pa brgya dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/me'i phung po chen po yang 'bar nas shi bar 'gyur ro/_/chu'i phung po chen po yang bab nas mi 'bab bo/_/rlung gi phung po chen po yang langs nas mi 
[\[63b.4\]]ldang ngo /_/sa'i phung po chen po yang byung nas med par 'gyur ro/_/ri'i phung po chen po khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_lhun po dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_de las gzhan pa ri nag po dag kyang byung nas ye med par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i 
[\[63b.5\]]tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag kyang byung nas lham mer ma yin lhan ner ma yin lhang nger ma yin zhing slar ltung ngo /_/lha yul ba'i lha'i gzhal med khang bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal 'di dag dang /_shing ljon pa dang nags 
[\[63b.6\]]tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba 'di dag kyang byung nas 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang 'pho ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu mdzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag kyang mtshan ma de mthong nas kye ma'o 'du byed 
[\[63b.7\]]'di thams cad mi rtag pa'o 'jig go/_/'du byed 'di thams cad med par 'gro'o/_/'gyur ro/_/'du byed 'di thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu mdzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag rgyu de dang rkyen des khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ngo /_/de dag dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung nas kyang 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag ca lta bur rig ste/_mtshan ma de dang dmigs pa de dang rkyen des byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/chu'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[64a.2\]]'khor dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /_skar ma'i gzugs snang ba de dag mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gdams pa'am/_bdag gi blos brtags pas 'du byed thams cad rmi lam 
[\[64a.3\]]dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur rtogs nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa dang /_gang zag 
[\[64a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bzod pa dang po thob pa dang /_bzod pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa thob pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa dag yod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[64a.5\]]rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_de thos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung 
[\[64a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs su rig par bya ste/_tshangs pa gang gis skyes bu mkhas pa dag gis 'du byed 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba/_g.yo ba mi brtan pa/_zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_rmi lam dang 
[\[64a.7\]]mig yor dang brag ca lta bu'o/_/zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma de mthong nas yang dag par skyo bar 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs so/_/sngon spyad cing sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yongs su smin par bya ba dag gis/_chos 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di thos nas 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed rnams ni 'jig pa ste/_'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam dang brag ca lta bu'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la mos par 'gyur/_mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gis 
[\[64b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa'am/_khyim par gyur pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur pa de dag kyang rgyu de dang rkyen des 'di ltar 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa dang /_'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /_'du 
[\[64b.3\]]byed rnams 'jig pa dang /_'du byed rnams rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang brag ca lta bu'o zhes 'du byed rnams de lta bu'i tshul du rtogs par 'gyur te/_rgyu de dang rkyen des dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung 
[\[64b.4\]]yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs nyid dang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshangs pa stong 
[\[64b.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te tshangs pa 'di ni nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad 
[\[64b.6\]]med grangs med bskyed de/_tshul khrims dang dka' thub dang tshangs par spyod pa dang de las gzhan pa'i dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_dus dang tshod 
[\[64b.7\]]dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba nye bar bzung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ngo /_/yongs su sbyangs so/_/ngas sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyad pa dang don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdus te/_de dag 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]nga'i smon lam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes nas ngas chos bstan pa'ang shes so/_/nga'i chos bstan pas 'dul bar yang 'gyur te/_brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/_tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin no/_/tshangs 
[\[65a.2\]]pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yin gyi/_brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/_tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin/_gzhan mu stegs can dang /_spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams 
[\[65a.3\]]kyi ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'bum phrag bcu'i bdag po tshangs pa de dang /_de las gzhan pa'i tshangs pa rnams skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/_tshig 'di skad ces ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa ngo 
[\[65a.4\]]mtshar to/_/ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to zhes smras so/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rmad du 'dzin par gyur te/_
[\[65a.5\]]ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa ngo mtshar to snyam mo/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slob mar khas blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste/_
[\[65a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa/_bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la bka' lung yang nod par gyur to/_/
[\[65a.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin/_'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/_tshangs pa stong gsum 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyod la gtad kyis/_khyod ci nas kyang nga'i rjes su 'jug par gyis la dge ba'i lam 'di dang /_dge ba'i tshul 'di dang /_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[65b.2\]]gyis shig_/nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o/_/tshangs pa nga'i bu'i thu bo gzhon nu thugs las skyes pa/_zhal nas skyes pa/_chos las byung ba/_chos kyis sprul pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_skye bo mang po'i don 'dod 
[\[65b.3\]]pa/_phan pa 'dod pa/_bde ba 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji ltar ngas gnas pa bzhin du chos kyis gnas par 'gyur gyis ji ltar nga la rjes su 'thun par byed pa de bzhin du de la rjes 
[\[65b.4\]]su 'thun par gyis shig_/ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam 'di dang /_dge ba'i tshul 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa ji tsam du dge ba'i tshul 'di lta bu'i rgyun mi 'chad
