[\[65b.5\]]pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong dang /_lha dang mi'i tshul dang thar ba'i tshul nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs 
[\[65b.6\]]pa de lta bas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyod la gtad do/_/tshangs pa khyod la bka' stsal pa ni 'di yin/_rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin gyis khyod kyis 'di bzhin du gyis shig_/nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o/_/
[\[65b.7\]]de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur te/_tshangs pa chen po de gcig pu ni ma gtogs so/_/tshangs pa chen po stong gi tshangs pa de yang 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu btul zhing bzhag par gyur to/_/tshangs pa'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de'i tshe bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das la dad cing dang ba chen po 
[\[66a.2\]]thob par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur/_skyo zhing yid byung la spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas myur ba myur bar rings pa'i tshul du 
[\[66a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gsol pa 
[\[66a.4\]]'tshal na sman par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams 
[\[66a.5\]]kyi don dang sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ha cang myur du long ba dang /_mig ma mchis pa dang /_ston pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dren pa ma mchis pa dang /_dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang /_skyabs ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[66a.6\]]rten ma mchis par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ded dpon khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can gyis nga la bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol/_
[\[66a.7\]]bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das khyod deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes gsol ba btab nas khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can la ngas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras te/_ded dpon bdud sdig can la ngas yongs 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]su mya ngan 'da' bar bya ba'i skabs phye'o/_/ded dpon sdig can de la ngas khas blangs pa de bya ba'i dus la yang bab bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can de ni bdag 
[\[66b.2\]]gi pha ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi dgra lags/_gshed po slar rgol ba lags shing /_bcom ldan 'das bdag dang mi mdza' ba lags te/_gnod par 'tshal ba mi sman par 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sdig can de ni bdag la grub 
[\[66b.3\]]pa dang bde ba ma lags par 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi sgron ma 'di lta bu dang /_shes rab kyi snang ba chen po dang /_ye shes snang ba'i sgron ma chen po 'di lta bu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba'i sdig can de ni/_sdig pa'i bsam 
[\[66b.4\]]pa can/_sdig pa'i sbyor ba can te/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sun 'byin pa'i dgra lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems can sdig pa chen po 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes gang yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni/_bcom ldan 
[\[66b.5\]]'das bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang bdag la mi phan par zhugs pa dang /_gzhan la mi phan par zhugs pa dang /_skye bo mang po la mi phan par zhugs pa zhes gang yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66b.6\]]bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/_/lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu la gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_grub pa dang bde ba ma lags pa dang /_log par 
[\[66b.7\]]ltung ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/_/chos dang ldan pa'i dam bcas pa dang /_chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bzung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang bdud sdig can gyis dam bcas pa de ni chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod ni dam bcas pa 'di la brten zhing snying por 'du shes pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po 
[\[67a.2\]]la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs na de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba 
[\[67a.3\]]dang /_lha dang mi rnams la bde bar 'gyur te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste myur du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dar gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la 'di 
[\[67a.4\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ded dpon legs so legs so/_/ded dpon khyod skye bo mang po'i don 'dod pa dang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pas de ltar bya'o/_/ded dpon gang dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la 
[\[67a.5\]]bsnyen bkur byed cing phan pa dang bde bas khyab par byed pa dang /_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i yul 'khor dang grong rdal dang ljongs rnams dang /_gzhon nu rnams dang /_blon po rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa la zhugs par 
[\[67a.6\]]gyur pa de dag ni ded dpon rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba las nor mang po dang longs spyod chen po 'thob cing rgyal po rgyal rigs de lan du phan chen po 'dogs te/_bu dang chung mar bcas/_grogs po dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su bcas pa la phan pas khyab par 
[\[67a.7\]]byed do/_/ded dpon de bzhin du gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa la sems dang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu 'di 'bul na/_ded dpon de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang bas bsnyen bkur dang rim gro 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bya ba'i phyir khyod la dbugs dbyung ba sbyin no/_/khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i longs spyod chen po sbyin no/_/ded dpon khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na dbugs dbyung ngo /_/ded dpon khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang dad pa dang /_dang ba 
[\[67b.2\]]'dis nga mya ngan las 'das nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas snying rje can zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu dang /_tshe de lta bu yod kyis shes par gyis shig_/ded dpon nga 'das nas dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi thams cad du nub pa na bdud sdig can rab tu mgu bar 
[\[67b.3\]]'gyur ba dang dga' ba dang rangs par 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu dang tshe de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/_/de shin tu dga' zhing mgu ba las bdud kyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/de bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lus 
[\[67b.4\]]'thob par 'gyur te/_der yang de mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ded dpon 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi sgron ma chen po shes rab kyi snang ba chen po 'di lta bu med par 'gyur ba la dga' ba'i phyir ro/_/ded dpon gang 
[\[67b.5\]]bdag gsod pa dang /_bdag la gnod pa dang /_bdag mi sgrub par zhugs pa zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni bdud yin no zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bya'o/_/ded dpon de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas 
[\[67b.6\]]pa de srid du bdud sdig can bdud kyi gnas na 'dug go/_/ded dpon nga'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can rangs pa chen po skye bar 'gyur zhing /_tshim pa chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang /_mgu ba chen po dang /_yid bde ba chen 
[\[67b.7\]]po skye bar 'gyur te/_de skad cig de nyid dang /_thang cig de nyid dang /_yud tsam de nyid la bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mtshams med par ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig shing sA la ljon pa me tog 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dang 'bras bu mang po dang ldan pa chen po la 'dzegs nas/_des shing sA la ljon pa de las me tog dang 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba yid du 'ong ba dag spyad de/_yal ga gang la gnas pa'i yal ga de nyid bcag na/_ded dpon de ji snyam du sems/_mi de yal ga 
[\[68a.2\]]chag pa de la gnas su rung ngam/_gang yal ga gang la 'dzegs te bde bar 'dug pa'i yal ga de nyid gcog pa'i mi de yang ci mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/_/bka' 
[\[68a.3\]]stsal pa/_ded dpon bdud sdig can gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod cing de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nub par dga' ba yang de ltar snang bar ngas bsams so/_/
[\[68a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nga'i dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas pa de srid du de bdud kyi gnas na 'dug go/_/nga'i chos nub par gyur na/_bdud sdig can de dga' ba skyed de mgu rangs shing yid bde ba skyed de/_de de ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas sems can 
[\[68a.5\]]dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/_ded dpon 'di lta ste dper na/_mi de shing sA la ljon pa de la bdag la gnod pa dang gzhan la gnod par byed pa ltar bdud sdig can yang de lta bu yin par mthong ngo /_/ded dpon bdud sdig can ni bdag la gnod pa'i 
[\[68a.6\]]phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/ded dpon bdud sdig can ni gzhan la gnod pa'i phyir zhugs pa ste/_ded dpon bdud sdig can de de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par lhung nas/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa tsha ba srog 'phrog pa myong nas 
[\[68a.7\]]'chi ste 'chi kar tshor ba myong nas nga rjes su dran par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung ba/_gzhan du mi gsung ba/_log par mi gsung ba des lus bsdams pa legs/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ngag bsdams pa legs/_yid bsdams pa legs te/_lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug pa dang 'dod pa dang dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub bo/_/lus 
[\[68b.2\]]kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mi sdug pa dang mi 'dod pa dang mi dga' ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub bo zhes gsungs pa de legs par gsungs pa'o/_/bdag ni sngon lus kyis 
[\[68b.3\]]nyes par spyad pa dang ldan par gyur/_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan par gyur te/_bdag las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes nas 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa tsha ba yid tu mi 'ong 
[\[68b.4\]]ba 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur ba srog 'phrog pa'i tshor ba myong bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de de'i tshe ngas legs par smras pa thos nas sems dang bar 'gyur te/_de sems dang bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba chen po nas shi 'phos te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba 
[\[68b.5\]]mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ded dpon de ni 'di lta bu yin te/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la nyes pa'i bar du gcod pas kun tu spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la nyes pa'i bar du gcod pas kun tu spyad pas lus zhig nas sems can 
[\[68b.6\]]dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pas kun tu spyod kyi nyes par ma yin pa de dag ni lus zhig nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[68b.7\]]'das rnams kyi chos nyams su blangs nas de nyid du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de rim gyis nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de bas na ded dpon khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sems dang bar byas pas 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ded dpon khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang rgyu de dang rkyen des gang gi tshe byams pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba de'i tshe ded dpon khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab de la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang sems can gnyid kyis log pa 
[\[69a.2\]]dang /_myos pa dang rab tu myos pa rnams la kye sems can khyed longs la sbyor bar gyis/_'bad par gyis/_rtsol bar gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/_'di lta ste 
[\[69a.3\]]dper na/_shing u dum bA ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas med pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/_yang 
[\[69a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos ston pa yang brgya la brgya lam na'o/_/mi'i lus 'thob cing 'phags pa'i gnas na tshul bzhin du gnas pa yang brgya la brgya lam na snang ngo /_/mi khom pa brgyad spangs nas de lta bu'i dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[69a.5\]]rnyed pa yang brgya la brgya lam na ste/_bag yod pas legs par brtson par gyis shig_/phyis 'gyod par ma gyur cig ces skul bar 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sangs 
[\[69a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing du de'i gsung gi tshig rjes su 'dzin cing rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa'i sems kho na med pa dang 'gran zla med pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang phan pa dang bde bas khyab par byed par 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdud sdig can 'das pa'i 
[\[69a.7\]]'og tu bdud kyi gnas na dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po bdud byed par 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ded dpon dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'chi bar nye bar 'gro mi 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'chi ba la gzhol mi 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur ro/_/ded dpon khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgya chen po myong nas/_bskal pa brgyad cu'i srid pa tha ma la lus tha ma 'thob pa na/_rang sangs rgyas snying rje can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[69b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ded dpon khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra thos nas nga la sems dang ba chen po bskyed de/_sems can rnams la yang snying rje'i sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir nga la bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 
[\[69b.3\]]las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i bstan pa la yang sems can de dag la snying rje bskyed nas gnyid kyis log pa dang myos pa dang rab tu myos pa'i skye bo rnams la sgo zhing skul ma 'debs/_dge ba'i 
[\[69b.4\]]chos tshad med pa la yang skul bar 'gyur te/_ded dpon khyod rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di yin rkyen 'di yin no/_/ded dpon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i longs spyod chen po 'di lta bu sbyin gyis ded dpon dga' zhing mgu ba dang rangs shing yid dga' bar gyis shig_/ded dpon khyod 
[\[69b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dga' ba dang chos kyi longs spyod 'di byin pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad 
[\[69b.6\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad du gsol kyang de ste bzhugs su mi gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan cad 'di ltar yi dam 'cha' zhing smon lam 'debs te bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 
[\[69b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams la snyen par mi bgyid do/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yang chags pa dang rtse ba dang yongs su spyod par mi bgyid do/_/gos gzhan yang mi 'tshal/_me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa yang mi snyen no/_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos ji srid du nub par ma gyur gyi bar du de las gzhan pa'i lha'i longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa dag kyang mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag sang nang par 'di lta bu'i skyes bu rin po che dang 'bral bar 'gyur 
[\[70a.2\]]zhing lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /_dbye ba dang 'gyes pa dang shin tu mi snang bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ba dang rtse bas ci zhig bgyi/_bde bas ci zhig bgyi/_yid bde bas ci zhig bgyi/_shes rab kyi sgron ma chen po 'di lta bu dang shes rab kyi mar me 
[\[70a.3\]]chen po 'di lta bu dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bcom ldan 'das bdag mgu ba'am/_yid bde ba'am dga' ba'am rangs pa'am rab tu dga' ba myong bar ga la 'gyur/_ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'od zer brgya stong du mas bskor ba/_
[\[70a.4\]]ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba 'di lta bu dang /_'od snang bar mdzad pa 'di lta bu nub par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ba'am bde ba ga las mchi/_bdag sems can rin po che 'di lta bu dang bral na dga' ba dang rtse ba ga las mchi/_sems can snang ba/_sems 
[\[70a.5\]]can rtogs pa/_sems can ma smad pa/_sems can kha na ma tho ba med pa/_sems can ma rmongs pa/_sems can mchog_/sems can bla na med pa/_sems can gong na med pa/_sems can mtshungs pa med pa/_sems can mnyam pa med pa/_sems 
[\[70a.6\]]can mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad pa'i sems can/_sems can rab/_sems can mchod pa/_sems can kha lo sgyur ba/_sems can 'dul ba/_sems can phan par dgyes pa/_yang dag par gsung ba/_dus su gsung ba/_
[\[70a.7\]]tshigs su gsung ba/_phyin ci ma log pa gsung ba/_ji skad gsung ba de bzhin mdzad pa/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_byams pa chen po la gnas pa/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa rab tu ma spros 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa/_nga rgyal mi mnga' ba/_len pa mi mnga' ba/_gzhi mi mnga' ba/_gnas mi mnga' ba/_mi skyo ba dri ma mi mnga' ba/_skyob pa 'dren pa rnam par 'dren pa/_yongs su 'dren pa/_yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_yongs su skyong ba/_dran par mdzad pa/_rtogs par mdzad pa/_skul 
[\[70b.2\]]ma 'debs pa/_mya ngan spang ba/_zug rngu 'byin pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po sems kyi gso ba mdzad pa/_sman chen po sbyin pa/_shin tu sdug bsngal ba las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_ston pa po/_ded dpon khrid pa/_'bab stegs mdzad pa/_gdos pa 'dzin pa/_
[\[70b.3\]]sgron ma 'dzin pa/_snang ba mdzad pa/_'od mdzad pa/_gsal bar mdzad pa/_mig sbyin pa/_lam ston pa/_yul bde bar phyin par mdzad pa/_dri ma dang tha ba dang mdud pa thams cad spangs pa/_sred pa mi mnga' ba/_bag la nyal mi mnga' ba/_mdud pa dang kun du sbyor ba/_
[\[70b.4\]]thams cad rab tu bshig pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba/_nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rtsod pa dang bral ba/_de lta bu'i skyes bu chen po/_skyes bu dam pa/_skyes bu mchog_/
[\[70b.5\]]skyes bu dpa' bo/_/skyes bu rtul phod pa/_skyes bu pad ma/_skyes bu pad ma dkar po/_skyes bu glang po/_skyes bu seng ge_/skyes bu gtso bo/_/skyes bu brtan pa/_skyes bu mchog_/skyes bu cang shes pa/_bla na med pa/_yid yongs su mi skyo ba/_bsam gtan chen po 
[\[70b.6\]]la bsam gtan pa/_bsam gtan thams cad la bsam gtan pa/_bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad spyod yul ba/_shes rab chags pa med pa/_shes rab sgrib pa med pa/_shes rab kyi spyod yul mnyam pa med pa/_rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba/_
[\[70b.7\]]'dam las rgal ba/_thang la gnas pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa/_mi 'jigs pa'i gnas su phyin pa/_sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_'jig rten thams cad dbugs 'byin pa 'dir do mod kyi thun tha ma la 'bral zhing 'bye bar 'gyur te/_bdag gis 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa phyin cad mi mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ba'am yid bde ba ga las mchi/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[71a.2\]]ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'chi ba'i dus bgyis pa na sems can byas pa gzo zhing byas pa rig pa/_byas pa rjes su skyong ba/_sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa kha cig mchis pa de dag de na dgung gcig gam/_
[\[71a.3\]]gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_drug gam/_bdun nam/_zla ba phyed dam zla ba gcig tu mya ngan bgyid de mchi ma 'byung zhing gnas pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na dam pa'i chos 'di ji srid du gnas pa 
[\[71a.4\]]de srid du bdag gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya mi snyen to/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yang chags par mi bgyid mi rtse yongs su mi spyod do/_/gos gzhan yang mi 'tshal zhing me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa yang mi snyen yongs su mi spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[71a.5\]]ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams kyang mi snyen to/_/ded dpon gyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[71a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du 
[\[71a.7\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gang lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi go cha bgos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la g.yul bshams te rgol ba'i dus de lta bu dang tshe de lta bu mchis so/_/gang gi tshe lha dang lha ma yin g.yul shom zhing lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi tshogs par 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gyur pa de'i tshe 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu yang mchis te/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu mchis nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de bzhi chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod do/_/de ltar bgyis pas lha dang lha ma yin rnams 'thab pa ma ma mchis/_'gyed pa ma ma mchis/_mtshang 
[\[71b.2\]]'dru ba ma mchis/_rtsod pa ma mchis shing bde bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das maud gal gyi bu yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyang da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_de lta bas na bdag cag 'thab pa dang 'gyod pa chen por 
[\[71b.3\]]'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi g.yul shom pa de'i tshe ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[71b.4\]]stsal to/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa'i sems la smon pa 'grub ste tshangs par mi spyod pa'i ma yin no/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'grub kyi 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i ma yin no/_/zhe sdang dang 
[\[71b.5\]]bral ba'i 'grub kyi zhe sdang dang ma bral ba'i ma yin no/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i 'grub kyi gti mug dang ma bral ba'i ma yin no/_/shes rab dang ldan pa'i 'grub kyi shes rab 'chal ba'i mi 'grub bo/_/kau shi ka ji srid du dam pa'i chos 'di nub par ma gyur pa de srid du/_kau shi 
[\[71b.6\]]ka lha dang lha ma yin g.yul shom par 'gyur ba na nga'i ming smos pa tsam gyis lha rnams rgyal bar 'gyur zhing lha ma yin pham par 'gyur bar ngas deng nas byin gyis brlabs kyis kau shi ka mi dgar ma byed/_mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don 
[\[71b.7\]]cig_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgra 'di lta bu thos nas skyo zhing mi dga' ste/_spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di lta bur byin gyis rlob pa mdzad/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[72a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po khyed cag mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don/_yongs su yi 'chad pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyed rnams kyang lha rnams kyi dbang por 'gyur 
[\[72a.3\]]ba'i dus de lta bu dang /_tshe de lta bu yod de/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha rnams pas ches phyug pa dang /_'thab pa med pa dang rtsod pa med pa dang 'gyed pa med pa dang /_'gal ba med cing rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir/_khyed 'thab pa med pa dang /_mtshang 
[\[72a.4\]]'dru ba med pa dang /_'gyed pa med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_'gal ba med par lhur long la/_byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs par gnas par gyis shig_/grogs po dag srog ni rgyun mi ring /_dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 
[\[72a.5\]]ni mi rtag go/_/grogs po dag phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni mthar 'jig go/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi rtag pa nyid kyis mthar thug pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su dengs par byed pa la ltos/_nga ni sems can thams cad la khon med 
[\[72a.6\]]pa dang /_'thab pa med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_'gal ba med par byed pa la gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad 'dum zhing 'thun par byed pa la zhugs pa yin yang de lta na khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa phan tshun 'thab pa dang rtsod pa la mngon par dga' ba 
[\[72a.7\]]rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_grogs po dag gang gzhan la rnam par tho 'tshams pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba la zhugs par gyur pa de ni yun ring du rnam par tho 'tshams pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni tshe thung 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag 'thab pa dang rtsod pa la dga' ba'i skyes bu gang zag ni rtag tu skrag pas 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing dbang che bar grags pa dang g.yog 'khor mang por mi 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag dge ba dang sdig pa'i las rnams chud za ba med do/_/de bas na grogs 
[\[72b.2\]]po dag khyed phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kun tu spyod cig_/'thab pa med pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa lhur long la gnas par gyis shig dang /_de 
[\[72b.3\]]yun ring por don du 'gyur ba dang /_phan pa dang bde ba dang 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[72b.4\]]de de lta lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan cad g.yul shom pa mi bgyid do/_/phan tshun byams pas kun tu 
[\[72b.5\]]spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la mya ngan byed de/_gdong la mchi ma zag par ngu zhing sdug bsngal yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[72b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan cad bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas pa de srid du gzugs la mi snyen pa nas/_reg bya la mi reg pa dang /_slas kyi nang du mi 'jug pa dang /_gos gzhan mi 'tshal bar bgyis te/_bcom 
[\[72b.7\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa rig pa byas pa rjes su skyong ba de dag rje bo gum par gyur na/_de de'i slad du sdug bsngal zhing mchi ma 'byung ba de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na bcom ldan 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'das kyi dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas pa de srid du mchi ma dbyung bar bgyi/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mi snyen/_slas kyi nang du mi 'jug_/de las gzhan pa'i gos 'tshal bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[73a.2\]]las 'das pa'i ston pa 'di lta bu dang sang nang par 'bral zhing mi mthong ba dang mi 'grogs par 'gyur ba lags pa lta/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de skad ces gsol nas mchi ma zag bzhin du mgo smad de 'dug go/_/brgya byin gyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs 
[\[73a.3\]]so//_//de nas gnas brtan sgra gcan zin 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la bdag mngon sum du lta bar mi spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon sum du mthong na bdag rangs par ga la 'gyur 
[\[73a.4\]]te/_mgu ba ga la yod/_yid bde ba ga la yod/_dga' ba ga la yod/_yi rangs pa ga la yod kyis/_bdag nges par 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bcu 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[73a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i drung du 'gro'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin ku sha'i grong khyer gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_byang shar gyi phyogs ga la ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[73a.6\]]gshegs pa bsnyen par dka' ba ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen par dka' ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas sdug 
[\[73a.7\]]bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen par dka' bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra gcan 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]zin sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes pa dang 'bye ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no/_/sgra gcan zin 
[\[73b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa'i sA la'i tshal na shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal te do mod kyi thun tha ma la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[73b.3\]]pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis sgra gcan zin khyod der song ste/_khyod nges par der 'dug dgos kyis sgra gcan zin khyod song shig_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'gyod par gyur ta re/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[73b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen par dka' ba la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do mod kyi thun tha ma 
[\[73b.5\]]la yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bgyi ba'i sgra de yang thos par mi bzod na/_bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon sum du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag der mchi bar mi spro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 
[\[73b.6\]]zin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen par dka' ba de'i bka' ma mnyan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rim gyis bcu pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[73b.7\]]ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gdong mchi ma can du ngus te/_smre sngags 'don cing phyogs 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin thong /_mi 
[\[74a.2\]]dgar ma byed/_mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/sgra gcan zin skye ba'i chos can mi skye ba dang /_rga ba'i chos can mi rga ba dang /_na ba'i chos can min pa dang /_'chi ba'i chos can mi 'chi ba dang /_zad pa'i chos can mi zad par 'gyur ba de lta bu ga la yod/_sgra gcan 
[\[74a.3\]]zin de lta bu'i gnas dkon no/_/sgra gcan zin sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyang zhi zhing bral te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[74a.4\]]'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/sgra gcan zin bskal pa'am bskal pa brgyar gnas pa yang nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' dgos so/_/
[\[74a.5\]]sgra gcan zin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shin tu rnam par zhi ba ma gtogs par chos nyid gzhan med gnas gzhan med do/_/sgra gcan zin shin tu rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu zhi ba/_shin tu bsil bar gyur pa/_shin tu mthar thug pa/_shin tu bde 
[\[74a.6\]]ba/_shin tu grub pa dang bde ba ste/_'di lta ste gzhi med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings so/_/sgra gcan zin skye ba sdug bsngal/_rga ba sdug bsngal/_na ba sdug bsngal/_'chi ba sdug bsngal/_yang dang yang mdza' ba dang bral ba sdug bsngal/_mi mdza' ba dang 'grogs 
[\[74a.7\]]pa sdug bsngal/_phung po'i khur thogs pa sdug bsngal lo/_/sgra gcan zin gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde ba yin gyis sgra gcan zin khyod kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_gang na skye ba med/_rga ba med/_na ba med/_'chi ba med/_mdza' ba dang bral ba med/_mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa med/_sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba med pa der khyod gnyi ga 'dod par gyur gyis sgra gcan zin khyod mi dgar ma byed/_
[\[74b.2\]]mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/sgra gcan zin chos nyid rjes su dran par gyis shig_/yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa ma gtogs par 'di la skye ba gang yin/_'di la rga ba gang yin/_'di la 'chi ba gang yin/_'pho ba gang yin/_'byung ba gang 
[\[74b.3\]]yin/_sgra gcan zin byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_'phags pa'i chos rnams ma mthong ba/_'phags pa'i chos rnams ma bslabs pa/_'phags pa'i chos rnams la mi mkhas pa/_'phags pa'i chos rnams la mi gnas pa/_'phags pa'i chos 
[\[74b.4\]]rnams kyis ma dul ba/_'phags pa'i chos rnams ma shes pa'i phyir 'du shes phyin ci log dang /_lta ba phyin ci log tu phyin ci log pas skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang 'pho ba dang 'byung ba dang /_kun tu rgyug pa dang 'khor ba pa dang rnam par brkam pa dang rgud pa dang mi 
[\[74b.5\]]dga' ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang brang rdung bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ni 'du byed thams cad rnam par zhi bas phyis gong du bya ba ci yang med do/_/sgra gcan zin ston pa'i nyan thos bcom ldan 'das kyi sras kyis gang bya ba 
[\[74b.6\]]de khyod kyis byas zin to/_/sgra gcan zin ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyan thos rnams kyi bya ba gang yin pa de mdzad zin te/_da gong du mdzad pa med kyis sgra gcan zin khyod da mya ngan ma byed mi dgar ma byed smre sngags ma 'don par sgra gcan zin khyod bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[74b.7\]]thub pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po chen po de la tha mar blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song shig_/phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_sgra gcan zin de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de da ltar gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal na seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]ba mdzad de khyod kyang gzigs par bzhed kyis sgra gcan zin khyod nges par de na 'dug dgos so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang bcom 
[\[75a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bgyi ba'i sgra de lta bu yang bdag thos par mi spro na/_bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom 
[\[75a.3\]]ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bgyi ba'i sgra de lta bu de thos pas bdag lus dub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rin po che 'jig rten thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/_'jig rten thams cad la phan 
[\[75a.4\]]pa dang thugs brtse ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi mtshungs pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi 'od mdzad pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mig_/shes rab kyi sgron ma chen pos snang bar mdzad pa/_de lta bu dang bdag sang nang par 'bral 
[\[75a.5\]]zhing 'bye ba dang mi 'grogs par gyur pa ji ltar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon gyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin thong smre sngags ma 'don/_sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75a.6\]]des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/_chos thams cad bdag med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o zhes thog ma nyid du chos ma bstan tam/_sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das des/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste/_skye zhing 'jig pa'i 
[\[75a.7\]]chos can yin/_skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste/_de dag rnam par zhi ba bde zhes bya ba de skad kyang gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]des sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes pa dang 'bral ba dang 'bye bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji srid yun ring du gnas kyang nges par nyams par 'gyur ro zhes thog ma nyid du ma bstan tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/bde bar 
[\[75b.2\]]gshegs pa de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sgra gcan zin gang skyes shing byung ba/_'dus byas pa/_bsams pa/_kun du rtog pa las byung ba/_rten cing 'brel bar byung ba de dag 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ga la yod de/_de'i gnas med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra 
[\[75b.3\]]gcan zin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yab shAkya thub pa de rjes su dran nas chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma byung bar gyur to/_/bdag sang nang par bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing chos ston pa mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[75b.4\]]ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par byung zhing lhag ger snang ba lta bu/_zla ba nya ba skar mas yongs su bskor ba ltar mtshan brgyas brgyan pa/_nyi ma 'od stong dang ldan pa nam mkha' la thal ler snang ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho ltar zab cing tshad med la rin po che du ma'i tshogs 
[\[75b.5\]]yod pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar 'khor du mas yongs su bskor ba/_gangs ri'i rgyal po ltar dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog kun du rgyas pa/_ri khor yug chen po ltar phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis rab tu mi g.yos pa/_pad ma 
[\[75b.6\]]ltar mtsho'i nang na 'dug kyang 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/_tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na tshangs pa lta bu/_brgya byin mig stong dang ldan pa ltar seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_seng ge ltar 'jigs shing skrag pa med par seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs 
[\[75b.7\]]pa/_phyin cad bdag gis mi mthong ngo zhes tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis de skad smras nas ngu zhing sems khong du chud de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon gyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin khyod 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du song zhig_/bcom ldan 'das de khyod gzigs par bzhed kyis sgra gcan zin khyod nga'i ngag ma gcog par song zhig_/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku 'o brgyal bar ma byed/_sgra gcan zin khyod nges par de na 'dug dgos so/_/
[\[76a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra gcan zin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas khyab par mdzad pa dang /_gang dgongs par mdzad pa dang /_gang zhig bzhed na de dag nges par yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_de'i tshe de dag nges par bzhugs 
[\[76a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod gzigs par bzhed kyis song la khyod nges par de na gnas par gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_'di lta ste 
[\[76a.4\]]dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba'am/_brkyang ba las skum pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ded dpon gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang 
[\[76a.5\]]bar gyur te/_ku sha'i grong khyer gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa'i shing sA la'i tshal shing sA la zung gi bar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/_mchi ma byung bzhin 
[\[76a.6\]]du thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin tshur shog_/sgra gcan zin khyod mi dgar ma byed ma ngu smre sngags ma 'don yi ma 'chad cig_/sgra gcan zin khyod 
[\[76a.7\]]kyis nga la pha'i bya ba byas/_ngas kyang bu khyod la bu'i bya ba byas so/_/sgra gcan zin de ltar ngas pha'i bya ba byas/_khyod kyis kyang bu'i bya ba byas te/_bdag cag gnyi gas kyang bya ba byas shing byed pa byas zin gyis sgra gcan zin khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don/_yi 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]ma 'chad cig_/sgra gcan zin bdag cag gnyis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang khon med pa dang 'gran zla med pa dang rnam par tho 'tshams pa med pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba med par zhugs pa la ltos/_da yang nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i 
[\[76b.2\]]phyir gnas te phyin cad su'i phar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin khyod kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das na phyin cad su'i bur yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin bdag cag gnyis sems can thams cad la rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang mi 'thun pa med par gnas pa la ltos/_de 
[\[76b.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dar gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_bde ba dang 'jig 
[\[76b.4\]]rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bskal par bzhugs su gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sgra gcan zin chos gang dag dang ldan na 'jig rten na de bzhin 
[\[76b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro ba'i chos de dag sgra gcan zin zad pa'am rnyings pa'am skye ba'am 'gro ba'am 'ong ba'am 'byung ba'am 'gag pa'am srid pa'am 'jig pa'am gnas pa'am 'dug pa'am nyal ba'am ldan pa'am/_
[\[76b.6\]]mi ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra gcan zin chos de ni gnas pa ste/_shin tu mi 'byung ba/_shin tu mi skye ba/_shin tu mi 'gag pa/_shin tu stong pa/_shin tu skye ba med pa/_shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa/_nye bar zhi ba/_grangs med pa/_gzhi med pa/_brjod du 
[\[76b.7\]]med pa/_ngag gi lam ma yin pa'o/_/sgra gcan zin 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_'di lta ste/_shin tu gnas pa nyid dang /_nye bar zhi ba nyid dang /_shin tu dben pa nyid dang /_shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_shin tu 'gags pa nyid dang /_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]shin tu ma 'dres pa nyid dang /_shin tu ma byas pa nyid dang /_shin tu ma zad pa nyid de/_sgra gcan zin ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid 
[\[77a.2\]]dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_chos 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa nyid do zhes bshad do/_/sgra gcan zin de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims kyi phung po bsnams te yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po ma yin/_shes 
[\[77a.3\]]rab kyi phung po ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po bsnams te yongs su mya ngan las mi 'das/_sgra gcan zin khyod mi dgar ma byed cig_/smre sngags ma 'don/_yi 'chad pa ma skyed cig_/sgra gcan zin 'du byed thams cad ni 
[\[77a.4\]]mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_dbugs 'byin pa med pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_zad cing 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te/_sgra gcan zin de bas na 'du byed thams cad la yid byung bar bya ba'i rigs/_ma chags par bya ba'i rigs/_rnam par grol bar bya ba'i rigs te/_sgra gcan zin 'di 
[\[77a.5\]]ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o/_/sgra gcan zin la bden pa mthong ba'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun tu shes nas dge slong gnas brtan drug cu tsam len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha dang mi tshad med pa dag chos la chos kyi mig 
[\[77a.6\]]rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' drug khri brgyad stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_thams cad kyang kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o sangs rgyas/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing /_de 
[\[77a.7\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor/_mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ston pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur cig_/'di ltar chos ston par gyur 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]cig_/bla na med pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'dra ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po 'di lta bus yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/
[\[77b.2\]]sgra gcan zin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//bam po gsum pa/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi phangs na gzims khri la bsnyes nas ngus te mchi ma byung smre sngags 'don cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchi ma zag par 
[\[77b.3\]]ngu zhing shing ljon pa chen po bcad de bsgyel ba bzhin du sa la 'gyel te bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ha cang myur ches so/_/bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ha cang myur ches so/_/thugs rje can mi bzhugs par 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/
[\[77b.4\]]sems can rin po che mi bzhugs par 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/mar me chen po 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/sgron ma chen po 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/'jig rten gyi mchog 'jig rten na 'gag par 'gyur ba ha cang myur 
[\[77b.5\]]ches so/_/sems can rin po che sems can pad ma dkar po 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/sems can cang shes pa sems can dul ba sems can ma dul ba 'dul ba 'jig rten na med par 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/ded dpon ston pa po bde ba'i lam 
[\[77b.6\]]ston pa 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/mig chen po shes rab kyi snang ba ston pa 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/sems can rnams kyi pha ma 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/'jig rten na long bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur 
[\[77b.7\]]ches so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa ma 'chis par 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/sang nang par nas ming mtshan tsam zhig lus te sems can rin po che mi mthong bar 'gyur ba lta/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo thong mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang tha dad par 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur ba dang /_'bye bar 'gyur ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur bar ngas thog ma nas ma bshad dam/_kun dga' 
[\[78a.2\]]bo gang skyes pa byung ba/_'dus byas pa/_bsams pa/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/_'jig pa'i chos can de mi 'jig par ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/de lta bur gyur pa dag gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo ji ltar ring du gnas kyang nges 
[\[78a.3\]]par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/de bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas shing ljon pa bcad de bsgyel ba bzhin du yangs la 'gyel 
[\[78a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo thong mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo don 'di mya ngan byas pa dang smre sngags 'don pas rnyed par sla ba ma yin no/_/sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang tha dad du 
[\[78a.5\]]'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur bar ngas thog ma nas bshad do/_'du byed rnams ji srid ring du gnas kyang nges par rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pa'i lus kyi las phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_gnyis su med pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[78a.6\]]kho na med pa dang /_'gran zla med pa dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las bde ba nas 'gran zla med pa'i bar gyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las langs nas mchi ma phyis te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[78a.7\]]ldan 'das bdag sems can rin po che de lta bu dang tha dad du 'gyur/_bdag thugs rje chen po 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa/_'jig rten thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/_'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/_'jig rten thams cad la gces pa/_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]kyi ston pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su 'dren pa/_'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sbyin pa/_sems can chen po de lta bu dang sang nang par 'bral zhing tha dad du 'gyur na ci'i slad du bdag mya ngan mi bgyid smre sngags mi 'don/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchi ma 
[\[78b.2\]]mang du phyung nas mchi ma phyis te yang tshig 'di skad smras so/_/kye ma'o gang du mar me chen po/_sgron ma chen po/_snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur/_ye shes kyi nyi ma chen po 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba/_kun tu 'od kun tu snang ba kun tu lam 
[\[78b.3\]]me ba/_kun tu 'od zer kun tu rtog_/kun tu gzigs pa kun tu mkhyen pa/_kun tu shes rab kun tu dran pa/_kun tu spyod yul kun tu 'od kyi sems can shes rab kyi snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du nub par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams ni g.yon can no/_/brnyas thabs can no/_/
[\[78b.4\]]kye ma'o 'jig rten na 'od byed pa mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon po mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang myur ches so/_/kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul dang bcas pa 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ba ha cang yang myur ches na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[78b.5\]]ci'i slad du bdag mya ngan mi bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag smre sngags mi 'don/_bcom ldan 'das bdag snying rnam pa brgyar ma gas pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma gum pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag de la 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[78b.6\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag ma gum mo snyam bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis gang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon du mnos/_mngon du kun tu chub par bgyis mngon du kun bzung ba de dag da dung skye bo mang po la phan par ma gyur/_phyogs mang por rgyas par 
[\[78b.7\]]ma gyur pas bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du bdag ma gum pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu lags pa snyam bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ci'i slad du mya ngan mi bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ci'i slad du smre sngags mi 'don/_bcom ldan 'das bdag grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bltams pa'i sar mchis nas shAkya rnams tshogs pa la shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po shin tu mi 'byung bar bzhugs so zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mchis nas lus 'phags mo'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra la yang dag 
[\[79a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i nyi ma chen po nub ste mtshams med pa'i las kyi zug rngu 'byin pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po de gshegs lags so zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mchis nas thugs rje chen po brnyes pa/_phan pa bzhed pa/_'jig 
[\[79a.3\]]rten la thugs brtse ba can de mi snang bar gyur to zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_mgon med zas sbyin la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar ji ga bzhugs par 'gyur ram zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por mchis nas lid 
[\[79a.4\]]tsa bI'i tshogs rnams kyi mdun du ded dpon phan par bzhed pa de nub par gyur to zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams nas rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag zhu ba yongs su zhu ba'i slad du mchi ba de rnams la mkhyen pa chen po dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[79a.5\]]khams mkhyen pa mkhas pa the tshom zhus pa thams cad sel ba de nub par gyur to zhes bgyi'am ji skad bgyi/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams nas dbyar gyi gnas su gnas gnas pa'i dge slong bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_
[\[79a.6\]]zhu ba dang brtag pa'i slad du mchi ba de rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung zhing mi'i chos bla ma rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na bdag gis mi mthong ngo mi thos so/_/cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa de lta bu 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 
[\[79a.7\]]'das bdag ci'i slad du mya ngan mi bgyid/_ci'i slad du bdag smre sngags mi 'don/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo thong mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig kun dga' bo nga'i tshangs par 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan par gyur pa lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs pa dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mnos pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong 'od srung dang kun dga' bo khyed gnyis lo bzhi bcu lhag tsam du cho 'phrul dang 
[\[79b.2\]]bcas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa lha dang mis so sor mnos pa de spyod par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/nga'i dam pa'i chos skye bo mang po la phan par gyur pa lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs par gyur pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[79b.3\]]dga' bo nga 'das nas dge slong 'od srung dang khyed gnyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di dang /_nga'i dge ba'i chos dkon mchog 'di rnam par 'phel zhing yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir zhugs 
[\[79b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung ni 'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_rab tu dben pa/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/_spros pa med pa la dga' ba/_mnyam par bzhag pa/_shes rab rno ba'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 
[\[79b.5\]]'od srung ni skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa thams cad la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung ni 'khor 
[\[79b.6\]]bzhi po dag gi pha ma lta bu'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung ni 'jig rten la yun ring du lta zhing snying brtse ba can no/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i 
[\[79b.7\]]phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong 'od srung skye bo mang po ji snyed cig gi don la dga' ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar dga' ba la zhugs pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'da' ba de'i tshe 'di ltar byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur te/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'jig rten du ma byung gi bar du bdag gi lus gzhan du ma gyur cig_/gos dang spu dang skra dang 
[\[80a.2\]]pags pa dang mdog dang dbang po rnams gzhan du ma gyur cig_/bdag gi lus sam yan lag thams cad kyang gzhan du ma gyur cig_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'jig rten du byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'dus pa dang po dang /_de bzhin du 'dus pa gnyis pa 
[\[80a.3\]]dang /_de bzhin du 'dus pa chen po gsum pa dang bcas pas bdag gi lus ma zhig par gzigs par gyur cig_/bdag gis chos bshad pa la nye bar brten pa dang bdag gi byin gyis brlabs dang /_bdag la dmigs pas srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag 
[\[80a.4\]]mang po dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams dul bar gyur cig_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa dang nyan thos 'dus pa gsum po dbang po ma yengs pa gos ji lta ba bzhin du bgos pa de rnams kyis bdag gi lus ma zhig par gzigs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi 
[\[80a.5\]]lus nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas lus kyi me'i khams kyis lus tshig par gyur cig_/tshig pa de'i sol ba yang mi snang bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/kun dga' bo gang de ltar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba'i dge slong 'od srung de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de ltar skye 
[\[80a.6\]]bo mang po la phan pa dang /_de ltar skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang brag gi ri bzhi lhan cig tu tshogs nas 'od srung gi lus bskor te gcig tu 'byor par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo brag gi ri de bzhi'i 
[\[80a.7\]]nang na dge slong 'od srung gi lus gcig tu mkhregs shing ma zhig par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ji srid du 'jig rten du ma byung ba de srid du dge slong 'od srung gi lus gos dang bcas par ma zhig par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]tshul khrims dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa'i sems la smon pa 'grub ste tshangs par mi spyod pa'i ma yin no/_/shes rab dang ldan pa'i 'grub kyi shes rab 'chal pa'i ma yin no/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'grub kyi 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i ma yin no/_/kun dga' 
[\[80b.2\]]bo de bas na dge slong 'od srung sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'jig rten du ma byung gi bar du lus gzhan du mi 'gyur/_skra dang spu dang sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang de las gzhan pa'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams dang dbang po rnams dang /_
[\[80b.3\]]gos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing lus kyi dri nga ba med par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'jig rten du byung nas 'dus pa dang po'i dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang thabs cig tu 'od srung gi lus ga la 'dug pa der gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[80b.4\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas dge slong 'od srung gi lus dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag la bstan nas 'di skad kyang bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos chen po dge slong 'od srung zhes bya ba yin te/_'di ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan la 
[\[80b.5\]]gnas pa rnams dang /_'dod pa chung ba rnams dang chog shes pa rnams dang /_rab tu dben pa rnams dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa rnams dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin te/_spros pa med 
[\[80b.6\]]pa la mos shing spros pa med pa la dga' ba/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa'o/_/dge slong dag 
[\[80b.7\]]dge slong 'od srung ni 'khor bzhi'i pha ma lta bur gyur pa'o/_/ring du rjes su lta ba/_shin du rjes su lta ba/_skye bo mang po la rjes su lta ba'o/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_lha 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa la ltos/_lan gnyis su yang de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa nyan thos bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig sa phyogs der gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo lan gsum du yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[81a.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa nyan thos bye ba dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu dge slong 'od srung gi lus ga la 'dug pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs shing /_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa de yang dge slong bye ba dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams la 
[\[81a.3\]]dge slong 'od srung gi lus ston par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos chen po sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog_/'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pa nas skye bo mang po dang lha dang mi rnams la phan pa 
[\[81a.4\]]dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i bar la ltos/_kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas de'i tshe phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas dge slong 'od srung chen po'i mgo la nyug par 'gyur ro/_/byugs nas kyang dge 
[\[81a.5\]]slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/gzigs nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos ji ltar yongs su bzung ba de lta bu da lta nga'i dge slong gi dge 
[\[81a.6\]]'dun mang po 'di'i nang na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na gang dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i dge slong gcig kyang med do zhes bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de nas dge slong 'od srung 'dus pa chen po gsum pa de nyid du sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang la mngon 
[\[81a.7\]]par 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/_rang gi me'i khams kyis rang gi lus sreg par 'gyur te/_bsregs pa de'i sol ba yang mi snang /_thal ba yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa de'i tshe dge slong 'od srung las 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]brtsams nas ci nas kyang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge slong bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[81b.2\]]dga' bo dge slong 'od srung ji ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa la ltos/_kun dga' bo khyod kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs so/_/'jug par yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar na dge slong 'od srung dang khyod gnyis lo bzhi bcu lhag tsam du nga'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[81b.3\]]'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs par gyur pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung gi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[81b.4\]]mya ngan ma byed cig ces bya ba nas rgyas par kun dga' bo khyod tshangs par spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan par gyur pa/_lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs pa dang /_yang dag par mnos pa spyod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/kun dga' bo nga 'das shing nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[81b.5\]]grong khyer bcom brlag na ri spo dang ngos che ba zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'dam bu can zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur te/_de na yul slan pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba/_gsal ba/_dul ba/_'jigs pa med pa/_mang du thos pa/_
[\[81b.6\]]mdo 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[81b.7\]]de yang tshangs par spyod pa 'di cho 'phrul dang bcas pa dang lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs par byed par 'gyur gyis/_kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas ri spo dang ngos che ba de nyid na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'dam bu can zhes bya ba de nyid 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]na dge slong dga' ba can zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med ces bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de yang nga'i bstan pa 'di yangs shing rgyas pa dang lha dang mis yang dag par 
[\[82a.2\]]mnos par byed par 'gyur gyis/_kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas ri spo dang ngos che ba de nyid na ri u shi ra zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/der dge slong bzhi khri bzhi stong 'dus par 'gyur te thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba 
[\[82a.3\]]dbang che bar grags pa/_gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa/_mang du thos pa mdo 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa sha 
[\[82a.4\]]stag ste/_de dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa cho 'phrul dang bcas pa 'di rgyas par byed de lha dang mi rnams la rgya che zhing yangs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 
[\[82a.5\]]'das nas ri spo dang ngos che ba de nyid na dge slong nye sbas zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba nas de yang tshangs par spyod pa cho 'phrul dang bcas pa 'di yangs shing rgyas pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par mnos par byed par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/der yang 
[\[82a.6\]]nga'i dgra bcom pa mang po 'dus par 'gyur te/_dge slong gso sbyong gi las gcig pa/_nga rgyal med pa/_kun shes pa/_brda sprod pa/_brgyad khri brgyad stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rdzu 'phrul dang bcas pa'i spyod par 'gyur te/_lha dang mi rnams la yangs 
[\[82a.7\]]shing rgya che bar byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo dge slong nye sbas nga'i tshangs par spyod pa yang yangs shing rgya che bar spyod cing lha dang mi rnams la yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas grong khyer skya snar gyi bu zhes bya ba 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba lam zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur te/_der dge slong rta sbas zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba nas de 
[\[82b.2\]]yang tshangs par spyod pa 'di yangs shing rgyas par byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher thams cad du sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas de nyid du bya gag gi kun dga' ra bar dge slong bla ma zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu 
[\[82b.3\]]che ba zhes bya ba nas/_de yang bstan pa 'di cho 'phrul dang bcas par byed cing lha dang mi rnams la so sor yangs shing rgyas par byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgyas pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams la yangs 
[\[82b.4\]]shing rgya che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing 'das pa'i 'og tu yul yan lag ces bya ba de na nyan thos rnams la lo lnga'i dus ston byed par 'gyur ro/_/der dgra bcom pa khri sum stong 'dus par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba 
[\[82b.5\]]dbang che bar grags pa nas rgya cher tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa sha stag gi bar du'o/_/de na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dad ldan drug pa zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur te/_rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa nas rgya cher tshangs pa 
[\[82b.6\]]mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa'i bar du ste/_de yang nga'i tshangs par spyod pa cho 'phrul dang bcas pa lha dang mi rnams la rgyas par byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas grong khyer gser gyi 
[\[82b.7\]]bre zhes bya ba na bram ze'i rigs las rab tu byung ba dge slong mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba gnyis 'byung ste/_rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa nas de gnyis kyang tshangs par spyod pa cho 'phrul dang bcas pa 'di rgyas pa'i bar du byed par 'gyur 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas grong khyer gnas bcas zhes bya ba na dge slong brtson 'grus che zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba de yang tshangs par spyod pa 'di lha dang mi rnams la cho 'phrul dang bcas 
[\[83a.2\]]par byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_kun dga' bo dge slong nyi ma'i gung de yang nga'i chos 'dul ba 'di rgyas par byed cing lha dang mi rnams la cho 'phrul 
[\[83a.3\]]dang bcas pa dang yangs shing rgya che bar byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na yul spos 'dzin zhes bya ba na dge slong 'od srung zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa 
[\[83a.4\]]gsal ba 'jigs pa med pa/_mang du thos pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_mdo 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa nas de yang nga'i bstan pa rgyas par byed pa'i bar 
[\[83a.5\]]du 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na grong khyer rdo 'jog ces bya ba phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sgra grag pa yod par 'gyur te de na khyim bdag ral pa can zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_bsod 
[\[83a.6\]]nams dang ldan pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_dad pa can dang ba can zhig 'byung ste/_de nga'i lus dang nyan thos rnams la bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_mchod 
[\[83a.7\]]pa dang rjed pa la spro bar 'gyur te/_rim gyis byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rdzogs pa dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa bzang byed ces bya ba la bkod pa chen pos 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]legs par brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag ral pa can de yang nga yi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams la rgyas par byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun 
[\[83b.2\]]dga' bo nga 'das nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor ba rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba rgyas ldan zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur te/_de na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nga'i bstan pa 'di la dad cing sems dang bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de dag kyang nga mya 
[\[83b.3\]]ngan las 'das pa'i lus dang nyan thos rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang rjed pa dang /_ri mor bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba dbang che bar grags pa brgya phrag mang po 'dus par 'gyur te rgya cher sbyar 
[\[83b.4\]]ro/_/kun dga' bo de na 'khod pa'i khyim pa rnams kyang phal cher gsal ba/_dul ba 'jigs pa med pa/_mang du thos pa/_thos pa sogs pa/_mkhas pa shes rab che ba sha stag go/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas ldan de na khyim pa gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[83b.5\]]byas ma thag tu phal cher dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu byung ba gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de dag ni phal cher log par ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag yo byad bsnyungs pa la mi gnas shing sdom pa la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[83b.6\]]rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas ldan na dam pa'i chos gnas bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos nub bo snyam du sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de'i tshe na dge slong phal cher lhod pa dang /_yo byad mang ba dang spong ba 
[\[83b.7\]]las nyams pa dang /_ldog pa la thog mar 'gro ba dang /_rab tu dben pa la brtson pa bor ba dang /_'khor bzhi po dag dang 'dre ba dang /_tshul nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal bar 'gyur te/_de dag bram ze dang khyim pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul nyams shing tshigs las 'das 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]pa dang /_gcig la gcig mi gus par me tog dang 'bras bu dang bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin par byed pa la mngon par dga' zhing ma bsdams par 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang bu dang chung ma spyod par byed de/_de dag gis de mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[84a.2\]]dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas rab tu 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe yang rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas ldan de na dge bsnyen chos 'phel zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa/_gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa mang du thos pa thos pa 
[\[84a.3\]]nges par byed pa la mkhas pa zhig 'byung ste/_der bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang 
[\[84a.4\]]dag par rab tu dga' bar byed cing tshig 'di skad kyang smra bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ma 'jigs shig_/dogs pa ma skyed cig_/the tshom ma skyed cig_/yid gnyis ma za shig_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dam pa'i chos da dung gnas shing ma nub kyis khyed 
[\[84a.5\]]ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba gyis shig_/brtsal ba gyis shig_/'bad pa gyis shig_/da dung 'phags pa'i chos thos par bya sla'o/_/de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams tshim zhing 
[\[84a.6\]]mgu ste yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed cing nga'i ring bsrel la rim gror bya ba nas rjed pa dang mngon par mchod par bya ba'i phyir spro ba skye bar 'gyur zhing thos pa dang tshul khrims dang spong ba la yang brtson par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84a.7\]]de ltar khyim bdag chos 'phel gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dga' bar byas pas phal cher mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag chos 'phel de yang nga'i bstan pa 'di rgya cher rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar nga 'das nas nga'i 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]bstan pa 'di la sems dang zhing mngon par dga' ba/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i khyim bdag kyang mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang nga'i lus dang nyan thos 
[\[84b.2\]]rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon par mchod par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo de dag kyang nga'i bstan pa 'di rgyas par byed cing lha dang mi rnams kyis mnos par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[84b.3\]]dga' bo nga 'das nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang phyogs kyi rgyud du dge slong 'tsho byed ces bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_
[\[84b.4\]]skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/_mang du thos pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa/_theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pa/_theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de nga'i sku gdung gi mchod rten zhig cing ral ba mthong nas 
[\[84b.5\]]gser gyis brgyan par byed cing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang /_dar dang /_dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba g.yogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang mchod rten gyi khang pa dang mchod rten rnams seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan te/_lha dang mi rnams dga' ba skye zhing de 
[\[84b.6\]]yongs su bskyang ba dang /_nga'i bstan pa yongs su bskyang ba dang /_sems ma dang ba rnams dang bar bya ba dang /_dang ba rnams phyir zhing 'phel ba dang /_skye bo mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir lo lnga pa byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe na dge slong mi brtson pa/_
[\[84b.7\]]lhod pa yo byad mang ba spong ba las nyams pa/_tshul nyams pa tshul khrims 'chal pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/_'du 'dzi la dga' ba/_rab tu dben pa la mi lta ba/_brtson pa bor ba/_gnas gcig na 'khod pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dang 'dres pa/_dkon mchog gsum dang ma 'dres pa/_ma gus pa dge sbyong ltar bcos pa dag ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de na dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_rab tu dben pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_mnyam par bzhag pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa/_sems 
[\[85a.2\]]rtse gcig pa dge ba'i chos can/_'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_bsod snyoms la rgyu ba/_'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa/_mang du thos pa thos pa bsags pa dag ni nyung ngu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la dge slong 'tsho byed khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang /_dbang po ma nyams pa dang /_
[\[85a.3\]]dad pa dang dang ba mchog dang ldan pas/_gos ngur smrig bgos shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i 'du shes can thams cad la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed nas sbyin pa sbyin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed de/_de byang chub sems dpa' byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs bsags nas 
[\[85a.4\]]'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma 
[\[85a.5\]]med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo dge slong 'tsho byed de yang nga'i bstan pa 'di yangs shing rgyas par byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgyas pa dang lha dang mi rnams kyis mnos par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[85a.6\]]dga' bo nga 'das nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mtha' 'khob kyi yul nags kyi sa na rgyal po'i pho brang zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur te/_de na rgyal po mes sbyin zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan pa dang ba zhig 'byung ste/_de nga'i sku gdung dang nyan thos rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba nas rjed par bya 
[\[85a.7\]]ba'i bar la spro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po mes sbyin de yang rgyal po'i pho brang zhi ba der nga'i nyan thos rnams bsdus nas dang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/der dgra bcom pa sum stong lhag tsam 'dus par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba dbang che bar grags pa nas tshangs pa 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la chos 'chad pas ngal ba med pa sha stag go/_/kun dga' bo de dag kyang nga'i bstan pa rgyas par byed de lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya che bar byed par 'gyur gyis kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo nga 'das nas byang 
[\[85b.2\]]phyogs kyi rgyud na grong khyer shing kun skye ba zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur te/_der nga'i mche ba la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan la sogs pa dang /_gos dang dngul dang gser 
[\[85b.3\]]dang rin po che rnams kyis bsti stang byed bla mar byed rim gror byed mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nga'i mchod rten yang gser gyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo sa phyogs der rab tu byung ba'i skye bo mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_dge 
[\[85b.4\]]ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams dang /_dge slong gi tshogs brgya stong du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de na khyim pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_mang du thos pa mkhas pa yid gzhungs pa/_nga'i bstan pa 'di la dad pa dang dang ba dag kyang mang du 'byung ste/_de dag nga'i sku gdung dang nyan thos
