[\[124b.2\]]byas pa'i bde ba/_'phags pa zag pa med pa'i bde ba/_de dag ni nams kyang phyis yongs su mi 'gyur zhing chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bya ba byos shig_/kun dga' bo ye shes kyi bya bas bya ba byos shig_/ngas ni byas zin to/_/kun dga' bo spyod pa gzhan 
[\[124b.3\]]yang tha na sems dad pa gcig bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa ngas bshad zin to/_/kun dga' bo sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa dag kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang 
[\[124b.4\]]dag par rjes su dran nas nga 'di lta bur zad cing yongs su nyams pa thos na dga' ba tsam mam dad pa tsam gyis mchi ma 'byung ba dag kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran nas shugs ring po 'byin pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/_spu zing zhes byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sems can 
[\[124b.5\]]de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba dag go/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang la la nga rjes su dran nas chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung ba'am/_spu zing zhes byed pa'am/_
[\[124b.6\]]shugs ring du 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad ni kun dga' bo dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro'o/_/log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gro'o/_/kun dga' bo de bas na bag yod pa la brtson par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124b.7\]]rnams kyi byang chub ni bag yod pas thob cing de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang bag yod pas thob bo/_/kun dga' bo gang 'doms pa pos bya ba dang /_gang don 'dod pa dang /_phan pa dang bde ba 'dod pa dang /_phan par dga' ba dang /_snying rje can dang /_snying brtse ba can gyis snying 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]brtse ba'i phyir bya ba de dag ngas byas kyis/_da ni khyed kyis ci nas kyang dge ba'i lam rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig_/kun dga' bo ci nas kyang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya 
[\[125a.2\]]cher 'gyur bar gyis shig_/kun dga' bo chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di ci nas kyang rab tu mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la gtad do/_/'di ni ngas rjes su bstan pa'o/_/'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[125a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bsgrubs na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[125a.4\]]'das chos kyi tshul 'di bdag gis ji ltar yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi/_ji ltar rab tu bstan par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong gnas brtan dag 'dus nas chos 
[\[125a.5\]]dang 'dul ba yang dag par sdud par byed de/_de la kun dga' bo gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gnas brtan dag khyod la 'di skad 'dri'o/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa chen po dag gang du gsungs/_gleng gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs dag gang du/_mnyam par bzhag pa chen 
[\[125a.6\]]po gang du/_lnga pa dang gsum pa gang du/_lhas zhus pa dag gang du/_brgya byin gyis zhus pa dag gang du/_lha yul nas babs pa gang du/_tshangs pa'i dri ba gang du gsungs zhes/_kun dga' bo dge slong de dag rnam grangs de dag gis khyod la de skad 'dri bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas mdo'i sde 
[\[125a.7\]]dag gang du gsungs/_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde dag gang du gsungs/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos kyi sde snod gang du gsungs/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod gang du gsungs/_theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang du gsungs zhes/_kun dga' bo de na dge slong de dag 
[\[125b.2\]]gis khyod la de skad dris pa dang 'di skad lung ston cig_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yul ma ga d+hA na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[125b.3\]]ri ga yA la bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na ra rdzi'i shing n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul bA rA Na sI na drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs/_
[\[125b.4\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri dang lus 'phags ri yangs pa'i steng na dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da 
[\[125b.5\]]ka gnas pa na bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri'i ngos srin bu'i brag la bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[125b.6\]]bzhugs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can na shing a mras skyongs ma'i tshal dang /_spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/_de bzhin du yul tsam pa na gargas brkos pa'i rdzing gi 'gram na bzhugs/_de bzhin du ga yA na

[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/zhes kun dga' bo rnam grangs de dag gis gang dang gang du de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa dang /_'khor gang dang gang dang /_dus 
[\[126a.2\]]tshigs gang dang gang du dang /_don gang la brten pa dang /_gang zag gang las brtsams pa dang /_ye shes gang dang gang bstan pa'i phyir rnam grangs gang dang gang gis gsungs pa dang /_don dang tshig dang yi ge gang dang gang dag gis rnam grangs gang dang gang gsungs pa de la khyod kyis gleng gzhi

[\[126b.1\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dag rab tu ngu ste mchi ma byung zhing tshig 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan

[\[128a.1\]]bo ran par mi smra ba'i gang zag gi nyes dmigs lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smra ba dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_phra ma'i tshig smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems can du 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'o/_/kun

[\[129a.1\]{D112}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ka ru NA puN+Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa snying rje pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[129a.2\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab 
[\[129a.3\]]shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol 
[\[129a.4\]]tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/byams pa la sogs pa gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 
[\[129a.5\]]ya phrag brgyad dang yang thabs cig go/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dang /_gzhan 'phrul gyi lha'i bu sa ya phrag brgyad dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha'i bu 'phrul dga' dang /_'phrul 
[\[129a.6\]]dga'i lha'i bu sa ya phrag bdun dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_yongs su dga' ldan lha'i bu sa ya phrag drug dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_rab 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu sa ya phrag bdun dang /_nyi 'bum dang yang thabs cig go/_/

[\[129b.3\]]rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te

[\[129b.5\]]sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te rab tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed blo gros dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub 
[\[130a.3\]]sems dpa' khris bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bstan pa bcad nas lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te rab tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba'i 
[\[130a.4\]]yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ring po ma lon par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 
[\[130a.5\]]la yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes mchi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa shul ni ji srid cig na bzhugs/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[130a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni yun ji srid cig lags/_gang na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa zhes bgyi ba bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_'jig rten gyi khams de'i bkod pa ni ji lta bu zhig gis brgyan pa lags/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[130a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pas cho 'phrul chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad/_rkyen gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cho 'phrul gang dag rnam par bstan pa de dag kyang mthong la bdag cag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin 
[\[130b.2\]]po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pas byang chub thob pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[130b.3\]]rnam par bstan par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dri ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni khyod kyi spobs pa dge ba yin te khyod kyis yongs su zhus pa legs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[130b.4\]]yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[130b.5\]]stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/_
[\[130b.6\]]spos sna tshogs kyis khyab pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i pad ma dag gis kun tu gang ba zhig yod de/_de nas gzhi ni bai dUr+ya sngon po las grub cing /_byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang la chos kyi sgras khyab pa yin no/_/bai dUr+ya las grub pa'i sa 
[\[130b.7\]]gzhi de yang ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam la/_rkang pa bzhag na ni sor bzhi tsam nems zhes byed/_rkang pa bteg na ni sor bzhi tsam par ces byed cing pad ma sna tshogs dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no/_/de na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa 'phang du dpag tshad bdun gyi srid tsam 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]pa dag yod de/_shing ljon pa de dag la lha'i gos ngur smrig dag rab tu 'phyang zhing /_lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang dag par 'byin pa dag kyang yod do/_/shing ljon pa de dag la bya sna tshogs dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra yid du 'ong ba 
[\[131a.2\]]rab tu sgrogs pa dag kyang yod do/_/shing ljon pa de dag gi lo ma dag phan tshun phrad pa na lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag gi sgra yang 'byung ngo /_/shing ljon pa re re'i dri rgya chen po lha'i las 'das pas kyang dpag tshad 'bum du khyab par byed cing shing 
[\[131a.3\]]ljon pa de dag la lha'i rgyan dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/shing ljon pa de dag gi bar dag na rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya rgyar ni dpag tshad brgya pa dag yod de/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kun la yang phyogs bzhi na rta babs dag yod 
[\[131a.4\]]do/_/rta babs de dag gi nang rol khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyi rol na rdzing bu srid du ni dpag tshad brgyad cu rgyar ni dpag tshad lnga bcu pa dag yod do/_/rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i them skas dag kyang yod do/_/rdzing bu de dag kyang kho ra khor 
[\[131a.5\]]yug tu me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dag gis kun nas yog ste/_me tog re re la yang rgyar ni dpag tshad tsam yod do/_/me tog de dag gi ze ba dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rab tu skyes te/_de dag kyang nam gyi gung thun dang po la pad ma de dag gi ze ba dag 
[\[131a.6\]]las skye zhing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba myong bzhin du skyil mo krung gis mtshan mo de 'da' bar byed de/_de na mtshan mo de'i nang par gyi dus kyi tshe phyogs bzhi nas dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing reg na bde bar byed pa'i rlung dag rab tu ldang ste/_de dag gis me tog kha 
[\[131a.7\]]zums pa rnams mngon par 'byed par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba spangs nas pad ma'i ze ba dag las babs te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu zhugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi stan dag la skyil mo 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]krung bcas te 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do/_/shing ljon pa de dag dang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug dag na rin po che 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ri 'phang du ni dpag tshad nyi shu rgyar ni dpag tshad gsum pa dag yod de/_ri de dag gi bar bar dag na chu shel dang /_
[\[131b.2\]]me shel dang /_an da rnyil dang /_nor bu skar mdog 'bum phrag du ma dag snang ngo /_/de na sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i 'od kyis ri dang nor bu dag la phog pa na sangs rgyas kyi 'od de dang /_nor bu'i 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma de rtag tu snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te/_de na 
[\[131b.3\]]nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mi mngon te gzhan du na gang gi tshe pad ma rnams kha zums shing bya dag sgra chung bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni mtshan mo zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur la de las bzlog pa ni nyin par yin no/_/ri de dag gi steng na bai dUr+ya sngon po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'phang du ni dpag 
[\[131b.4\]]tshad drug cu rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi shu pa dag yod de/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rta babs dag kyang yod do/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag yod de de la skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[131b.5\]]dpa' dag 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma de na byang chub kyi shing dbang po zhes bya ba 'phang du ni dpag tshad sum stong rgyar ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dag ni dpag tshad stong du legs par gnas pa yod do/_/byang 
[\[131b.6\]]chub kyi shing de'i drung na dngul las byas pa'i pad ma sdong bu'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya yod la/_de'i 'dab ma ni gser las byas pa bye ba phrag 'bum yod de 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga yod do/_/ze ba thams cad na rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa'i ze'u 'bru dag yod do/_/ze ba rnams ni rin po 
[\[131b.7\]]che sna bdun las byas pa ste/_'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun yod do/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/sangs 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rgyas kyi gdan pad ma de'i kho ra khor yug na yang pad ma dag yod de/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i cho 'phrul dag mthong bar gyur to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[132a.2\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pas cho 'phrul chen po ji lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad pa lags/_de 
[\[132a.3\]]skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa ni mdang gi nam gyi thun tha ma la bla na med pa 
[\[132a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_da nang nang par gyi dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par sprul nas dbu'i gtsug tor nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum rab tu 
[\[132a.5\]]bkye'o/_/'od zer de dag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas khyab par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe steng gi phyogs na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa dag gis thur du bltas na de dag la ri rab dang /_khor yug dang /_
[\[132a.6\]]khor yug chen po dang /_ri nag po rnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang /_gang dag ting nge 'dzin thob pa dag dang /_gang dag gzungs thob pa dag dang /_gang dag bzod pa thob pa dag dang /_gang 
[\[132a.7\]]dag sa las shin tu 'das pa dag dang /_de na gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang snang ba de khyab par gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa de'i 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dang /_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang byang chub 
[\[132b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mchog tu dga' ba dang /_bde ba skyes te/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag rang rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bor nas de bzhin 
[\[132b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams pad mar lhags so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa des kyang bzhugs pa 
[\[132b.4\]]dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_'chags bzhin du zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ljags kyi dbang pos yongs su khebs par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kyang ting nge 
[\[132b.5\]]'dzin las langs nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la mchod pa bya ba'i las la brtson par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pas ljags kyi dbang po'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir bsdus nas/_
[\[132b.6\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pas sku thams cad nas spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu'i sgo re re nas kyang /_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung zhing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[132b.7\]]dag snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mdzad nas/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi snang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams pad mar lhags so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[133a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir bsdus nas/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_theg pa chen po 
[\[133a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad ma dkar po las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang 
[\[133a.4\]]po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma de na mtshan mo dang nyin mor ni ji ltar 'tshal/_de na sgra ni ji lta bu dag grag_/byang chub sems 
[\[133a.5\]]dpa' de dag bsam pa ni ji lta bu dang ldan/_gnas pa ni gang gis gnas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma ni rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa yin te/_de na gang gi tshe me tog dag kha zums par gyur cing /_bya 
[\[133a.6\]]rnams kyang sgra chung bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bsam gtan dag gis rol cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba myong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe de na mtshan mo yin par shes so/_/gang gi tshe me tog de rlung gis kha bye bar gyur cing bya rnams kyang 
[\[133a.7\]]sgra yid du 'ong ba sgrogs par byed pa dang /_der me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par 'bab pa dang /_phyogs bzhi nas dri mchog tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing reg na bde bar 'gyur ba'i rlung dag ldang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs la/_byang chub sems 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs shing bcom ldan 'das pad ma dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam las shin tu 'das pa dag ston par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ni nyin mo 
[\[133b.2\]]yin par shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang mi 'bral lo/_/mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgra dang /_skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /_'gag pa med 
[\[133b.3\]]pa'i sgra dang /_zhi ba'i sgra dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /_byams pa chen po'i sgra dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgra dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang /_dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang mi 'bral te/_byang chub sems 
[\[133b.4\]]dpa' de dag ni rtag tu sgra de lta bu dag nyan par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pad mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing /_'od dpag 
[\[133b.5\]]tshad brgya pa yod la byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_snum pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 
[\[133b.6\]]dang /_spro ring ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_chos la dga' ba'i 
[\[133b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i gtam la mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam la mngon 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_phung po med pa la rtag tu rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_na ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[134a.2\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_bsam pa'i stobs can dang /_sbyor ba'i stobs can dang /_
[\[134a.3\]]rkyen gyi stobs can dang /_smon lam gyi stobs can dang /_snying po med pa dang /_ma 'dres shing gong du skyod par byed pa'i stobs can dang /_nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs can dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs can dang /_thos pa'i stobs can dang /_
[\[134a.4\]]gtong ba'i stobs can dang /_tshul khrims kyi stobs can dang /_bzod pa'i stobs can dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs can dang /_bsam gtan gyi stobs can dang /_shes rab kyi stobs can dang /_zhi gnas kyi stobs can dang /_lhag mthong gi stobs can dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[134a.5\]]pa'i stobs can dang /_dran pa'i stobs can dang /_byang chub kyi stobs can dang /_snying stobs kyi stobs can dang /_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i stobs can dang /_bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i stobs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 
[\[134a.6\]]'thun pas tshar gcod pa'i stobs can dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i stobs can sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams pad mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag 
[\[134a.7\]]la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed bskyed pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma der/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la kham 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]gyis za ba'i zas med pa bzhin du bsam gtan gyi zas dang /_chos kyi zas dang /_dri za'i zas dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/de na rnam pa thams cad du mi dge ba'i ming yang med do/_/de na rnam pa thams cad du bud med kyi ming yang med gdags pa yang med do/_/de na rnam pa thams cad du sdug 
[\[134b.2\]]bsngal gyi sgra yang med pa rnam pa thams cad du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sgra yang med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te nyon mongs pa'i sgra yang med/_yongs su 'dzin pa yang med do/_/de na mun pa yang med/_dri ma yang med do/_/sems ngal ba yang med do/_/lus ngal ba yang med do/_/sems 
[\[134b.3\]]can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra yang med do/_/ngan song du gdags pa yang med do/_/tsher ma dang /_thibs po dang /_rdo ba dang /_gseg ma yang med do/_/me yang med/_nyi ma dang zla ba yang med/_skar ma'i gzugs kyang med do/_/rgya mtsho 
[\[134b.4\]]chen po yang med/_ri rab kyang med/_khor yug gi ri yang med/_'jig rten gyi bar yang med/_ri nag po rnams kyang med do/_/rdo ba mi gtsang ba dag kyang med/_rdul gyi ri yang med do/_/sprin dang char pa'i sgra yang med/_rlung mar gyi sgra yang med do/_/rnam pa thams cad du ngan song 
[\[134b.5\]]gi sgra yang med/_rnam pa thams cad du mi khom pa'i sgra yang med do/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang /_bsod nams kyi 'od dang /_rin po che'i 'od kyi snang ba rgya chen pos rtag tu gsal bar gyur to/_/de na bya 
[\[134b.6\]]'bras bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dag rang rang gi sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag gis dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dag rab tu sgrogs par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[134b.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma de che khyad ni ji tsam zhig lags/_gong ma dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ring po ma lags pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]pa pad ma dam pa de yang yun ji srid cig tu bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston par 'gyur/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ni dam pa'i chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems 
[\[135a.2\]]dpa' gang dag skyes pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/_ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral lags sam 'on te de lta ma lags/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[135a.3\]]khams pad ma de ni sngon ming ci zhes bgyi bar gyur/_der rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub nas yun ji srid cig lags nas/_de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i rkyen gyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[135a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag cho 'phrul dag mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dag kha cig gis ni mthong la/_kha cig gis ni mi mthong bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[135a.5\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab la 'phang du ni dpag tshad 'bum drug khri brgyad stong yod la/_rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa skyes bu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_stobs dang ldan pa la la zhig 'ongs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ri'i rgyal po ri 
[\[135a.6\]]rab de yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du bkrum nas/_yungs 'bru tsam du gyur pa de dag ni bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pas na yungs 'bru tsam po de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus te/_yungs 'bru tsam po de dag ji snyed par de na 
[\[135a.7\]]gling bzhi pa'i tshad kyang de snyed yod do/_/'di lta ste dper na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad ma yang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa sum cur bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa yongs su mya 
[\[135b.2\]]ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams pad mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[135b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams pad ma de sngon ni tsan dan zhes bya bar gyur te/_da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma ltar yongs su dag par yang ma gyur la/_de ltar sems can dag pa dag gis gang bar yang ma gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan du ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[135b.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan par gyur te/_des kyang bar gyi bskal pa sum cur chos bstan par gyur to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[135b.5\]]'das pa'i dus kyi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu dong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma gang dag de na 'khod pa de dag ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[135b.6\]]sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa ni do mod nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par gyur na dam pa'i chos nub pa'i 'og tu su zhig bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[135b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam du sems par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba de sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa lung bstan par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur te/_nam gyi gung thun la nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur nas de nyid kyi nub mo'i thun tha ma la khyod bla na med 
[\[136a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 
[\[136a.3\]]'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa ga la ba der song ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[136a.4\]]sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa'i drung du lhags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la mchod de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_
[\[136a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bskal pa bar ma bcu po de dag 'da' bar bgyi bar 'tshal lags so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[136a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[136a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad pa yin la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]de dag kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston par mdzad cing /_gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston par 'gyur bas na khyod kyis kyang thams cad 
[\[136b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di zung shig_/tad ya thA/_dz+wa li dz+wa li ni/_ma hA dz+wa li ni/_hug ke/_bug ke/_sam pa de/_ma hA sam pa de/_de ba na/_a Ti/_ba Ti/_Ta ke/_Tha ra Tha ka ke/_a mi ma ka si/_hi li tsi li ti li/_ru ru ke/_ma hA ru ru ke/_
[\[136b.3\]]dza ye/_durdza ye/_dza ya ma ti/_shAn te/_shAn ta nir g+ho Sha Ni/_a mU le/_a mU la pa ri tshan ne/_mA ra sai n+ya/_bi tra sa ne/_muka te/_muka ta pa ri shud d+he/_a b+hI te/_b+ha ya mo tsa ne/_b+ha ra o ha ra Na/_dAn ta/_bi d+yA bi d+yA/_bi d+yA d+ha ru ta ta me/_ni a gra ha~M pa ra bA dI 
[\[136b.4\]]nA~M/_d+harma bA dI nA ma a nu gra han/_a rak+Sha d+harma bA dI nA~M/_tsa tur NA~M/_smr-i t+yu pa s+thA nA nA~M/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra kA sha na pa da mi dan/_bud d+ha kA sha ye/_a ma ma/_mi ma ma/_a bai bi/_ar+the/_ar+tha ni/_stI ra Ne/_lo ka a d+hi mug te/_sun d+ha re/_pa ri b+hA ba ne/_tsa tur NA~M/_

[\[136b.7\]]Da ta/_a ni ha ra bA tsa tab byo/_i dam pA lan/_ni yA ma pha lan/_sa mu drA na ya/_bi b+hU Sha pa sh+yo so man ta/_a nu man to/_a ku man to/_ts+tshe da ba ne/_man tra stA/_da sha ba la/_bi gra ha ta/_i su s+thA na/_su ni kha ma/_tIk+Sh+Na ma ti/_A lo ka_/a ti tr-iSh+Na/_a ti mi ta/_
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pra t+yud pan na/_bud d+ha pUrba pra ha re/_tsa tur NI/_sam myag pra hA NA nA~M/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra kA sha na pad mi dan/_an n+ya man n+ye ma ne/_ma ma n+ye/_bI ri bi ti re sha me/_sha mi te bi/_shAn te/_muka te/_ni ruka ta me/_sa me/_sa ma sa me/_k+Sha ye/_ak+Sha 
[\[137a.2\]]ye/_a dzi ti shAn te/_sha niSh+Te/_d+hAr Ne/_A lo ka_/a ba b+hA se/_rad na bra te/_ra smya ba te/_dz+nyA na ba te/_me ru ba te/_k+Sha ya ni dar Sha Ne/_lo ka pra dI pa ni dar Sha Ne/_tsa tur NIpra ti sa~M bi dAn/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra kA sha na pa da mi dan/_tsak+Shu A b+hA sa ni dar Sha Ne/_dz+nyA na A lo ka 
[\[137a.3\]]nir dar Sha Ne/_pra b+hA sa ne/_sarba in drI ya/_b+hU mi a ti krAn te/_sa ba sa ba/_bA mA na/_sarbe pra tha bA/_k+Sha yang ka re/_sho ka ar+tha bA tsa ne/_lo ka a nu dar Sha Na/_bi b+hU tsa tur/_rid d+hi pA dA/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra ka sha na pa da mi dan/_a tsa le bud d+he/_da d+ha pra tsa le/_sa 
[\[137a.4\]]twe gr-i h+Na/_sid d+hi kam pa ni ni srid d+ha sma ti te/_pa ri ka se re/_sau me/_tsaN De/_dAn te/_a tsa le/_a ma re/_bi tsi ba le/_ni ba re/_pra tsa tsa le/_pra sa re/_a na ya/_a bya se/_karka me/_pra b+ha bi ni/_o me ni dza se/_kra gra me/_na yu te/_in dri yA NA~M/_ba lA nA~M/_a d+hi 
[\[137a.5\]]muka ti pa dpra kA sha na pa da mi dan/_puSh+pe su puSh+pe/_dru ma pa ri ha re/_a b+ha ya ru tsi re/_tsi ka rak+She/_ak+Sha yam stu ni ni le/_ma ma le/_pany+tsa shi shi re/_lo ka s+ya bi dz+nyA ne/_na ya sam gr-i hi te tsa yuka te/_ts+tshan de na/_sapa tA na~M/_bo d+h+ye gA nA~M/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra ka sha na pa da mi 
[\[137a.6\]]dan/_tsakra badzre/_mai tres ma ma ti krAn te/_kre te/_kA ru Ne/_ru dik+Sha yi/_pri tirU pe k+Sha sa~M pan ne/_a ra te/_ba ra te/_kha ge kha ge_/a mU le/_mU la sho d+ha ne/_tsa tur NA~M bai sha ra d+yA nA~M/_a d+hi muka ti pa da pra kA sha na pa da mi dan/_bar te tsakre/_tsakrA d+ha re/_pa ra tsakre/_pa 
[\[137a.7\]]re pu re/_hi le hi le/_d+ha re a rU ba te/_hu hu re/_ya thA dzi b+ha~M gan/_ni ma ba re/_ya thA ag ne/_ya thA ba ran tsi ri ti ri sha ya thA/_b+ha ya ri ri shi/_sa t+ya nir ha re/_dza ra ba bi la/_bIr+ya nir ha ra/_tsu re mArga nir hA ra/_sa mA d+hi nir hA ra/_pradz+nyA nir hA ra/_bi muka ti nir hA ra/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bi muka ti/_bi muka ti/_dz+nyA na dar Sha Na nir hA ra/_nak+Sha tra nir hA ra/_tsan dra nir hA ra/_sUr+ya nir hA ra/_pa dA sh+tsa tu ruka tasta thA ga te na/_ad b+hU ta/_ni rad b+hU tAM/_sa~M bud d+ham/_a bud d+ham/_i ha bud d+ham/_ta tra bud d+ham/_bi ha~M gam pu re/_a pha la/_da pha la/_paN Da re/_paN 
[\[137b.2\]]Da re/_ta dra lan/_ta lu/_ma~M ga la d+ha ri Ni/_pU Da ni/_sa~M pra pU Da ni/_ga ta pra ga ma ta ni rU pa/_nA sha ni/_na sha ban d+ha ni/_tsid tsi ni/_tsid tsi ni/_sa yo d+ha/_hi [{]ding [,]deng [}]ga ma/_pa re pa ra/_ha na ne/_b+ha ram b+ha re/_b+hin de/_bi re bi re/_ru Sha re/_sha ra Ne/_da ra Ne/_pra bar te/_ba ra 
[\[137b.3\]]r+sha Da ye/_bi dun du mA/_bar khu mA/_pra h+ma tsa ri Ni/_in dra ba ni/_d+hi d+hi rA ya ni/_ma he shwa ra la la ni/_ma ma su me/_a la mi ni/_e ka ak+Sha ra ni/_pany+tsa ni tsa ra sti/_a b+hi tsaN Da la pu re/_sarba su re/_a bar su re/_pUr+N+Na ga ti tan/_paN Di tan/_a yi na kaN Da/_dzam b+ha 
[\[137b.4\]]me/_gan d+ha re a tra/_na ha ni ma ka ra b+hi ro hi ni/_sid d+ha man tre/_bi lo ka ma tre/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+thi te/_d+hA ra Ni mu khi/_da shA nA ma ba lA nA~M a d+hi muka ti pra kA sha na pa da mi dan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di gsungs 
[\[137b.5\]]ma thag tu/_de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/_g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 
[\[137b.6\]]'khrugs so/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/mtho ba dang rab tu dma' ba dang /_kun tu rab tu dma' bar yang gyur to/_/gang gi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung bgrang ba las yang dag pa 'das pa'i bye ma snyed dag snang ba rgya 
[\[137b.7\]]chen pos khyab par gyur pa de lta bu'i snang ba dag kyang byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na ri rab dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dag kyang mig lam na mi snang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]tu snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag na gnas pa de dag dang /_gang dag ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang bzod pa thob pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen 
[\[138a.2\]]pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[138a.3\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas de nyid du 'khod do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za bgrang ba las yang dag 
[\[138a.4\]]par 'das pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di mnyan pa'i phyir bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[138a.5\]]'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dir 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[138a.6\]]bskor ba yang mthong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyis gzungs 'di thob bo/_/gzungs thob 
[\[138a.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te de dag ngo 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te de nyid du 'khod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[138b.2\]]rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di bsgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'thob bo/_/gzungs kyi sgo bdun khri nyis stong yang 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo drug khri yang 'thob bo/_/gzungs kyi sgo 'di 'thob pa'i byang 
[\[138b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po yang 'thob bo/_/snying rje chen po yang 'thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtog par byed cing /_thams 
[\[138b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang gzungs 'di'i ngo bo nyid thugs su chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad cing shin tu myur bar yongs su mya 
[\[138b.5\]]ngan las 'da' bar yang mi mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di'i gzungs kyi mthus sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing snang ba byung bar gyur pa dang /_snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang ba rgya 
[\[138b.6\]]chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang /_snang ba des kyang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mu med pa 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag nas kun nas 'dir lhags pa la ltos//_//
[\[138b.7\]]bam po gnyis pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa mu med pa gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'jug pa 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di thob ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/yi ger 'dri bar byed na yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_
[\[139a.2\]]dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang mi 'bral lo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di kha ton du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni las dang po rnams ma lus par zad par byed cing tshe rjes 
[\[139a.3\]]nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di sgom par byed na/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' de la mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas shing bsags pa zhig yod na yang de'i 
[\[139a.4\]]las de dag yongs su zad cing gang gi phyir tshe rjes na yang sa dang po gnon par byed do/_/gang la mtshams med pa'i las rnams med pa de ni tshe 'di nyid la las gzhan thams cad ma lus par zad cing tshe rjes nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do/_/gang sgom par mi byed/_kha ton du 
[\[139a.5\]]mi byed kyang nyan cing chos smra ba la dar gyis 'ching bar byed na de la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur zhing /_sangs 
[\[139a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni der yongs su btang bas ring por mi thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig 
[\[139a.7\]]gis thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang la la chos smra ba la spos kyis mchod pa byed na de yang ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spos 'thob bo/_/chos smra ba la me tog gis mchod pa byed na bla na med pa ye shes kyi me tog dag 'thob bo/_/
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]chos smra ba la 'bras chan dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dag byin na de bzhin gshegs pa'i zas bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba la gos kyis bkab na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog bla na med pa 'thob bo/_/gang zhig chos smra ba la rin po che 
[\[139b.2\]]dag gis 'gebs par byed na de yang ring por mi thogs par byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rin po che rnams 'thob ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa de ni de ltar don che ba 
[\[139b.3\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thams cad der bstan pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob cing yid du 'ong ba'i chos bzhi 
[\[139b.4\]]yang 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 
[\[139b.5\]]de dag gis gtams pa de nyid kyi tshe yang de bzhin du sa g.yos par gyur cing /_'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de bzhin du sa phyogs mi 
[\[139b.6\]]mnyam pa dag kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par snang ngo /_/der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[139b.7\]]bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyid kyang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan du lhags so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub 
[\[140a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ngas mngon par shes te/_gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'da' bar byed do/_/
[\[140a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ma rnams kyis ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde 
[\[140a.4\]]snod kyi chos 'di nyid thos par gyur cing bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag la chos rnams thos nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[140a.5\]]la/_de dag la sems mngon par rab tu dang bar byas te sems rab tu dang ba'i rgyu des dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa la 
[\[140a.6\]]mchod pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya 'di chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa skor bar 'gyur lags sam zhes gsol 
[\[140a.7\]]pa dang /_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]te/_de gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur zhing /_der byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bar gyi bskal pa bcur thams cad mkhyen 
[\[140b.2\]]pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de la chos nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni chos de thos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed nas/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i 
[\[140b.3\]]phyag rgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_des byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo/_rab mchog gi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor te/_byang 
[\[140b.4\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing /_der bar gyi bskal pa bcur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos 'di ston pa na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de las nyan par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe de 
[\[140b.5\]]dag gis chos thos nas skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bskal par nyan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni de'i tshe na sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te de nyid kyi 
[\[140b.6\]]tshe na gzungs 'di yang mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag 
[\[140b.7\]]yang dag par bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la ting nge 'dzin sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bstan te/_lus rdo rje lta bur byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /_der bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bcur byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa dag gsal 
[\[141a.2\]]zhing snang bar byed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /_des byang chub kyi gdan la chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston par byed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i phreng ba zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /_de 
[\[141a.3\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa nyid la 'god par rig nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 
[\[141a.4\]]dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_rang rang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu zhugs te 'dug go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa yang de nyid kyi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[141a.5\]]'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te rang rang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu zhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag ni 
[\[141a.6\]]rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo /_/de na gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa nyid kyis bar gyi bskal pa bcu po de dag 'da' bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag 
[\[141a.7\]]rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te chos ston par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang bar gyi bskal pa bcur dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed par 'gyur te/_mdang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_des da nang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te cho 'phrul chen po bstan nas/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[141b.2\]]kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog 
[\[141b.3\]]pa la bkod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di thob bo/_/lha dang mi bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[141b.4\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na gzungs 'di 
[\[141b.5\]]'thob lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la legs par 
[\[141b.6\]]gnas pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gos ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' zhing chog shes la/_gos ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed cing /_de gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'thun par mi byed la/_
[\[141b.7\]]gos ma rnyed na yang yongs su gdung ba med cing /_gos rnyed na yang chags pa med pa dang /_zhen pa med pa dang /_'khren pa med pa dang /_mdud pa bor ba med pa dang /_brgyal ba med pa dang /_lhag par chags pa med pa dang /_lhag par chags par gyur pa med 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]par yongs su spyod par byed cing /_nyes dmigs su lta la nges par 'byung bar rab tu shes shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i rigs la legs par gnas pa dang po yin no/_/gos la ji 
[\[142a.2\]]lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang stan la yang de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' zhing chog shes la/_na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'i bsngags 
[\[142a.3\]]pa yang rjod par byed cing de na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'thun pa tshol bar mi byed la/_de na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma rnyed na yang yongs su gdung ba med cing rnyed na yang chags pa med pa dang /_zhen pa med pa dang /_'khren pa med pa dang /_mdud pa bor ba med 
[\[142a.4\]]pa dang /_brgyal ba med pa dang /_lhag par chags pa med pa dang /_lhag par chags par gyur pa med par yongs su spyod par byed cing /_nyes dmigs su lta ba la nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/_'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la legs par 
[\[142a.5\]]gnas shing /_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'di thob cing sgom par byed pa yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lnga dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i 
[\[142a.6\]]gzungs 'di 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang /_cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la 
[\[142a.7\]]yang 'jigs par lta ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs shing slob par byed la/_/gzhan tshul khrims dang bral ba dag mthong na yang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god pa byed pa ste/_byang chub 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dang po de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can lta ba la zhen par gyur pa rnams log par lta ba las rnam par bslang zhing /_yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 
[\[142b.2\]]'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can cho ga ma yin pa la zhen par gyur pa rnams yang dag pa'i cho ga yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[142b.3\]]'jug la/_'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gsum pa de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can bsam pa nyams par gyur pa rnams bsam pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[142b.4\]]pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[142b.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ste/_chos lnga po de 
[\[142b.6\]]dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni gzungs 'di 'thob bo/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos drug dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag 
[\[142b.7\]]nyid kyang thos pa mang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_thos pa bsags pa yin pas des chos tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]yongs su byang ba gang yin pa de mngon par brjod pas mngon par rjod cing /_de de lta bu'i chos mang po dag thos nas bzung ste/_kha ton yongs su byang ba dang /_yid kyis brtags pa dang /_mthong bas shin tu rtogs par byas shing /_de de ltar mang du 
[\[143a.2\]]thos par gyur pa na thos pa nyung ba'i sems can gzhan dag mang du thos pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/_chos dang po de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang /_ser sna med cing phrag dog dang /_
[\[143a.3\]]ser snas zil gyis non pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang phrag dog med pa dang /_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_rab tu 'god par byed pa'i bar du ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[143a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin par byed la gnod pa sna tshogs gnod par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gnod pa dag las yongs su thar bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa 
[\[143a.5\]]med cing kha gsag med pa dang /_sgyu med cing g.yo med pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyis lan mang du gnas par byed pa ste/_chos drug po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 
[\[143a.6\]]'di 'thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de lta bu dag dang ldan pas lo bdun du 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag thams cad la nyin gcig cing lan gsum gsum yan lag lngas mdo dang rgyas par phyag byas shing lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste/_
[\[143a.7\]]stong pa nyid las gnas pas 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di brjod par bgyi'o/_/langs nas kyang phyogs bcu kun nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dran par byed pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i byang chub 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lo bdun 'das nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 'thob bo/_/gzungs 'di 'thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi mig gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[143b.2\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ston par mdzad pa thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig kyang 'thob cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[143b.3\]]gi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa dag kyang mthong nas/_gzungs kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bdun khri nyis stong yang 'thob bo/_/chos kyi sgo drug khri yang 'thob ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 
[\[143b.4\]]la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po yang 'thob bo/_/snying rje chen po yang 'thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gzungs 'di 'thob par gyur pa des gal te mtshams med pa lnga'i las shig spyad par gyur na yang de'i tshe phyi ma la yongs 
[\[143b.5\]]su zad par gyur te/_tshe gsum gyis las de dag ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing sa bcu pa yang gnon par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' des mtshams med pa'i las dag ma byas na'ang de'i las gzhan thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing /_tshe rjes nas kyang sa bcu pa gnon 
[\[143b.6\]]par byed de ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag kyang 'thob la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di ni byang chub 
[\[143b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mthong na/_gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyan cing /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du 
[\[144a.2\]]phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di ni las yongs su zad par byed pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 
[\[144a.3\]]'phel bar byed pas na don che ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[144a.4\]]zad par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nges par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[144a.5\]]zhing gzhes pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag las gzungs 'di thos shing thob lags so/_/kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces bdag cag gis ni gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las so zhes gsol to/_/kha cig gis ni gsum snyed las so zhes/_kha cig gis ni bzhi snyed las so 
[\[144a.6\]]zhes/_kha cig gis ni lnga snyed las so zhes/_kha cig gis ni drug snyed las so zhes/_kha cig gis ni bdun snyed las so zhes/_kha cig gis ni brgyad snyed las so zhes gsol to/_/kha cig gis ni 'di skad du bdag cag gis ni 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[144a.7\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di thos shing rnam pa thams cad du thob lags so zhes gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa/_bdag gis ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na bskal pa chen po kun nas sgrol ba zhes bgyi ba zhig byung ste/_de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bgyi bar gyur pa der sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[144b.2\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mtha' yas pa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /_de bzhin du byang 
[\[144b.3\]]chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pas yongs su bskor ba zhig byung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di nyid bshad par gyur pa na/_de las gzungs 'di thos nas bdag gis bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing 
[\[144b.4\]]rtogs par bgyis lags so/_/de bzhin du bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa'i yang ches tshad ma mchis pa/_grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa dag la 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[144b.5\]]dag la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gis mchod par bgyis nas/_sangs rgyas re re las kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsrungs shing bsod nams 
[\[144b.6\]]kyi phung po yongs su bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dag gis lung bstan kyang /_bdag ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis dus la lta zhing 'di ltar yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur te/_de'i slad du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing /_sngar bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[144b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs ma rgyas lags te/_nga ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/_bdag gi shes rab kyi mgo la rnam par grol ba'i cod pan bcings lags so/_/de nas 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po las

[\[145a.3\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_byams pa khyod kyis ni myur ba nyid du bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par yang nus mod kyi/_byams pa khyod 'di srid du 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni smon lam gyi 
[\[145a.4\]]dbang gis dus la lta ba yin no/_/byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis da ltar nga las rgyal tshab yongs su blangs pa yin te/_khyod kyis ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las kyang rgyal tshab yongs su blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[145a.5\]]'khor la gzigs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/_de'i 
[\[145a.6\]]tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dAn ta b+hU mi/_dam tha b+hU mi/_smr-i ti b+hU mi/_pra dz+nyA b+hU mi/_bai sha ra d+ya b+hU mi/_pra ti sam bid b+hU mi/_a nu k+She pa b+hU mi/_sa ma tA pa rI k+She pa/_u pe k+Sh+ya b+hU mi/_dza tik+Sha ya b+hU mi/_ma mu dza/_mun dza/_bin mu dza/_ma lan mu 
[\[145a.7\]]dza/_bi sha kra/_da sha ba te/_be sha ta/_te ra Na/_bai shalA kra/_sha mu sha ba ta/_bi ma ti/_bi ma ti/_yo par hi ta/_ra ga ma ta/_ba shi sang kra ma/_a ti tso rab te/_me khe mu dra/_da ha ra ba te/_pra dz+nyA a ga tA bud ng+he/_da ha kra ma ti/_sa do Sha ban d+ha/_ba la ya til ya/_a hu ka Ta/_a 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]mun d+ha man/_arta ba ti/_mu ru ba ti/_di hI nad be d+ha/_a ga na di/_ba ka na te/_sa ma ke_/bi sa b+ha Te/_i Te/_i Ta ba le/_ad tra/_tad tra/_ku ru Sha Na/_la ba Sha Na/_la ta tha/_ru tha/_sarba na ta/_sarba ta ba/_a ni rud d+ha/_i da shwa ri hi pha la/_ba hu pha la/_

[\[145b.3\]]hu/_a la ha/_ni lang ha re/_ba na ta khye/_i dan pha lan/_ni yA ma pha lan/_na mu da ya/_bi b+hU kha/_pra dz+nyA tsakra su nir pr-i ti tsakra/_dz+nyA na tsakra/_mos pa'i tshig de dag gis lha dung phyur gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de nyid du phyir

[\[145b.6\]]ge la k+Sha/_u dAk+Sha/_ku kak+Sha/_bi ro d+ho/_bi rU pa mu kha/_a k+Shi hasta/_shag ti ba lan/_a su ro bi nA~M/_a su ro bi nA~M/_a su ro pra mar di te/_mos pa'i tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dung phyur phrag gnyis dang bye ba phrag gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ra/_de bA/_nA gA/_ni rug ti/_ba ri bA ra/_ni ru ga til b+hi/_smr-i ti pradz+nyA pa ri bA ra/_ma ti pra ti la b+hi/_ga ti d+h+r-iti/_pa ri bA ra/_ga ti d+h+r-i ti/_pra ti la b+hi/_pUrba ke Shu/_tsa ri ta ba na taH/_a b+hi s+thA ma ban taH/_shU ra ban taH/_tsi ra bIr+ya ban taH/_pi tA ba te/_

[\[146a.3\]]hwa shud d+he/_bA tsI ba ri karma/_pra dz+nyA bud d+hi/_smr-i ti ma ti/_ga ti d+h+r-i ti/_ga Na na/_pra ti sa ra Na bud d+hi/_dza ya tsakre/_shU n+ya ta tsakre bya ya/_mos pa'i tshig de dag gis lha ma yin lnga khri drug stong gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_

[\[146b.1\]]la la las ni ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs/_la la las ni shes rab sten cing /_dge ba'i las rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa mang du byas pas/_de'i phyir ngas da ltar bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas/_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i

[\[146b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni gzhan du gsung ba mi mnga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/_ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba la snyoms 
[\[146b.4\]]par zhugs nas/_zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu yog par mdzad nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu rab tu phyung ste/_'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba

[\[146b.7\]]kyis sprul pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs rnam par mdzes par gyur pa dag bzhugs te/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gis de mthong nas/_bde ba dang ldan zhing 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bde bas lus rab tu tshim ste/_sangs rgyas mthong nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob bo snyams du sems te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' zhing dang la gus pa skyes pa dang /_bcom 
[\[147a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/_kye sems can dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang rtag tu de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag 
[\[147a.3\]]gis thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod do/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /_sems dang ba des de nas shi 'phos nas/_kha cig 
[\[147a.4\]]ni lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/gang dag grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung dron po dag langs nas snga ma bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar du skyes so/_/de bzhin du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bkres pa dang skom pas 
[\[147a.5\]]lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis bkres pa dang skom pa'i me zhi bar byed cing bde ba'i tshor ba skyed de/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po 
[\[147a.6\]]brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa dag bzhugs par gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gis de mthong nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bde bas lus tshim par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob bo snyam du sems te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' 
[\[147a.7\]]zhing dang la gus pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/_sems can dag tshur sheg_/khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bar du gyur to/_/dud 'gro rnams la yang de bzhin du bskul/_mi rnams la yang de bzhin du bskul nas/_lha dang mi bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag chos 
[\[147b.2\]]mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'khod do/_/de'i tshe na lha dang /_mi'i tshogs bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/
[\[147b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis ni der ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs thob par gyur to/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad ma dkar po las gzungs kyi sgo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[147b.4\]]'das kyis rang gis rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa slar bsdus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros zhi bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas 
[\[147b.5\]]kyi zhing ni yongs su dag cing rnyog pa ma mchis la/_snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sna tshogs dag mchis la/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing bde ba sna tshogs dang 
[\[147b.6\]]ldan la/_de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang ma mchis na/_skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad par 'khrugs shing /_tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi 
[\[147b.7\]]snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma byung bar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum las brtsams te chos bstan par 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]mdzad lags/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su ma bzung lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam gyi 
[\[148a.2\]]dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[148a.3\]]yongs su ma dag pa yang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nga da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad pa 'di lta bur skyes pa yang ngas de ltar smon lam btab pa'i phyir te/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[148a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa 
[\[148a.5\]]na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_bskal pa chen po de la gling bzhi pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gling bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/rtsibs kyi mu khyud de la mdun na 'don bram ze rgya mtsho'i 
[\[148a.6\]]rdul ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus rnam par mdzes la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang ba yod la/_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab cing lta bas chog mi shes pa zhig btsas 
[\[148a.7\]]so/_/de btsas ma thag tu lha 'bum gyis mchod pa byas nas/_rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na nges par byung nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
