[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod par gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na nyan thos 
[\[148b.2\]]bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis gang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 
[\[148b.3\]]gnas pa'i grong khyer gzhan zhig tu gshegs so/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dzam bu'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal zhig yod pa na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[148b.4\]]phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po bdag gi yul du gshegs nas/_'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[148b.5\]]du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag song la phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_
[\[148b.6\]]rgyal po'i mthu chen pos srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_grong khyer nas byung zhing 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal ga la ba der song nas bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song ste phyin pa dang /_rkang pas kun 
[\[148b.7\]]dga'i ra bar zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[149a.2\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung 
[\[149a.3\]]bar gyur to//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/_de 
[\[149a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung zla gsum po 'di la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims 
[\[149a.5\]]cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la cang mi 
[\[149a.6\]]gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas 
[\[149a.7\]]song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang /_blon po phra mo rnams dang /_grong mi rnams dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams bos te smras pa/_gtso bo 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dag shes par gyis shig_/ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum po 'di la yo byad thams cad kyis nges par spyan drangs te/_nga la nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_
[\[149b.2\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ngas bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par byas te phul gyis/_khyed cag la gang zag gis nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_bsnyen 
[\[149b.3\]]bkur bya ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dang /_chung ma'i 'khor ji yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par phul cig ces bsgo nas/_de dag gis kyang de bzhin du phul lo/_/khyim bdag rin po ches kyang skyed mos tshal bzang po thams 
[\[149b.4\]]cad 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas shing skyed mos tshal de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brtsigs te/_de'i phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug dag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi sgo dag kyang btod do/_/skyed mos tshal thams cad kyang rin po che sna 
[\[149b.5\]]bdun gyi shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan to/_/shing ljon pa de dag kyang gos sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /_gdugs sna tshogs dang /_mu tig gi lda ldi sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan 
[\[149b.6\]]to/_/shing ljon pa de dag rin po che'i me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad kyis kyang brgyan to/_/skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad nor bu rnam pa du ma dag gis kyang brgyan nas me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing dar dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_be'u ras dang /_bgo ba sna tshogs dag gi gdan 
[\[149b.7\]]dag kyang bshams so/_/'khor lo rin po che de yang khang pa brtsegs pa'i phyi rol gyi steng gi bar snang la mi'i tshad tsam du red de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par 'bar zhing 'dug go/_/glang po rin po che thal kar yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi snam 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]logs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'dzin cing 'dug ste/_shing ljon pa de yang rin po che sna bdun dang /_mu tig gi lda ldi sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_me tog phreng sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing /_dar sna tshogs dang /_
[\[150a.2\]]ras bcos bu sna tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan nas shing ljon pa de la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag kyang dpyangs par gyur to/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi btsun mo dam pa gang yin pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa 
[\[150a.3\]]mchog pa dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dag 'thor bar byed do/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi nor bu rin po che 'od gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de yang rang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhag go/_/de nas nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis skyed mos tshal de dag 
[\[150a.4\]]thams cad rtag par rgyun du snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rtag par rgyun du khyab par gyur to/_/nyan thos re re la yang tsan dan sa mchog pa'i rkang rten dag bzhag go/_/nyan 
[\[150a.5\]]thos re re'i rgyab tu yang glang po che'i gtso bo thal kar snga ma lta bu dag dang /_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo rin po che'i mi'i tshad tsam pa bzhag pa de lta bu dag kyang bzhag go/_/nyan thos re re'i mdun du yang bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag bkod nas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i 
[\[150a.6\]]phye ma dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/nyan thos re re'i mdun du nor bu bai dUr+ya dag kyang bzhag go/_/skyed mos tshal gyi nang gi kho ra khor yug dag tu rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag kyang bsgrags so/_/skyed mos tshal gyi phyi rol gyi kho ra khor yug dag na blon po rin po che dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[150a.7\]]bzhi dang bcas pa dag kyang gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer nas byung ste/_de bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pas skyed mos tshal du zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[150b.2\]]'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_rang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po phyag chab gsol te/_bdag nyid lag dar nas bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_bsod pa mang po dag legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bdag 
[\[150b.3\]]nyid lag dar te legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas/_bdag nyid kyis bsil yab blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yabs so/_/rgyal bu stong dang /_khams kyi rgyal po stong gis kyang nyan 
[\[150b.4\]]thos re re la de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas nas bsil yab blangs te/_nyan thos rnams la g.yabs so/_/zhal zas brim pa rdzogs te gdugs tshod gyu ma thag tu srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir kun dga' ra bar lhags so/_/lha bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[150b.5\]]'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab nas/_lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag kyang rab tu bsgrags so/_/lha'i gdugs dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dag kyang rab tu dpyangs so/_/gnod sbyin gos sngon po can sa ya phrag bzhis kyang bcom 
[\[150b.6\]]ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bsrung ba'i phyir tsan dan gyi tshal nas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i sdong po dag blangs nas thun du blags te mel tshe byed do/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud nyid kyis kyang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mar me kha bye ba khrag 
[\[150b.7\]]khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bus so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_mgo'i steng du yang mar me'i kong bu gcig bzhag_/phrag pa gnyis dang /_lag pa gnyis dang /_rkang pa gnyis su yang mar me'i kong bu re re bzhag 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mtshan yal na ngas su mar me btang yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lus la ngal ba med cing /_'di lta ste dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur lus kyi bde ba tshor bar gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[151a.2\]]lus ngal ba med pa dang /_sems ngal ba med par zla ba gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de bzhin du rgyal bu stong dang /_khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du rgyal 
[\[151a.3\]]po'i yo byad dang /_de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur gyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/ci ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la bsnyen bkur byas pa de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa lha mo dpal gyis kyang zla ba gsum du spos dang /_me tog dag gis bsnyen bkur 
[\[151a.4\]]byas so/_/de bzhin du bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis zla ba gsum po 'das nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzam 
[\[151a.5\]]bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i rgyan brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la glang po rin po che la sogs pa glang po che thal kar brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/
[\[151a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la rta rin po che la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che la sogs pa nor bu me shel brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir khyim bdag rin po che la sogs pa rgyal bu brgyad khri 
[\[151a.7\]]bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir blon po rin po che la sogs pa khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi grong khyer la sogs pa grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]stong yang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rin po che'i me tog gi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos rgyan chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rin po 
[\[151b.2\]]che'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rgyan dang /_khri'u dang /_mgo lta bu dang /_mig lta bu dang /_snyan cha gdub 'khor dang /_gser gyi tsong tsong dang /_mu tig gi do shal dang /_chags dang /_gzims cha dang /_zhabs rten dang /_snod dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rol mo'i sgra 
[\[151b.3\]]dang /_dung dang /_dril bu dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ril ba b+h+ring ga ra dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_mar me'i kong bu dag kyang phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i bya dang /_rin po che'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bsil yab brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[151b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la sman bcud kyis len brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bzod pa mdzad 
[\[151b.5\]]cing /_bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du bzhugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das skyed mos tshal 'dir rtag tu dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag slad kyis kyang mchi'o/_/rgyal po rtsibs 
[\[151b.6\]]kyi mu khyud kyi bu stong po gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_so so nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag re res kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dgung zla gsum zhig yo byad thams 
[\[151b.7\]]cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas rgyal bu de dag la gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir song ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu de dag gi thu bo mig mi 'dzums zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[152a.2\]]la zla ba gsum gyi bar du ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur bya bas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la lta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir nyin mo skabs skabs 
[\[152a.3\]]su 'ong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i yab bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba de yang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad nyul zhing skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dag las zas slong bar byed de/_de la zas de sbyin pa na ji srid du khye'u 
[\[152a.4\]]dang /_bu mo de dag gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la rab tu 'god cing /_rab tu bkod nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi byed pa de srid du len par mi byed do/_/de ltar nyul ba na 'dzam bu'i gling na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des gang zas kyis 
[\[152a.5\]]yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_gang dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la ma bkod pa dang /_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dang /_gang bla na med pa'i ye shes la rab tu ma bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa'i mir gyur pa 
[\[152a.6\]]'ga' yang med do/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas la bkod do/_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 
[\[152a.7\]]'dzums kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs shing /_ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur gyis bsnyen bkur byas nas zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /_des kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]la 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs thams cad gser las byas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/_/glang po che dang /_rta dang /_nor bu dang /_bud med dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po rin po che rnams ma gtogs pa glang po che dang /_rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_de bzhin du nor bu me shel dang /_
[\[152b.2\]]khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_me tog gi phung po dang /_gdugs dang /_gos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_rgyan dang /_rin po che'i khri'u dang /_mgo lta bu dang /_mig lta bu dang /_snyan cha gdub 'khor dang /_gser gyi tsong tsong dang /_mu tig gi do 
[\[152b.3\]]shal dang /_chags dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_zhabs rten dang /_snod dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_dung dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ril ba b+h+ring ga ra dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_mar me'i kong bu dang /_rin po che'i bya sna tshogs dang /_
[\[152b.4\]]rin po che'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sna tshogs dang /_sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa sna re re zhing yang brgyad khri bzhi stong bzhi stong yang phul lo/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang de snyed phul lo/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 'dzums kyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa 
[\[152b.5\]]gsol te/_rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 'dzums kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur gyis bsnyen bkur byas shing de las mi nyung ba'i yon yang phul lo/_/de bzhin du 
[\[152b.6\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po'i tshogs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'byor pa yongs su btang zhing bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te rgyal bu gzhon nu nyon mongs med dang /_'jigs med dang /_nam mkha' dang /_
[\[152b.7\]]yan lag skyes dang /_grub pa dang /_'gran med dang /_mnyen des dang /_grum por 'grang ba dang /_'dron pa can dang /_shed bu dang /_sha bo che dang /_'dus pa can dang /_rtsibs can dang /_shes pa can dang /_gdong can dang /_nor mang dang /_dgra dbang dang /_mig 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]can dang /_glang po 'thob dang /_zla ba'i mu khyud dang /_nyi ma'i mu khyud dang /_dbang po'i mu khyud dang /_rdo rje'i mu khyud dang /_bzod pa'i mu khyud dang /_gnas kyi mu khyud dang /_shugs kyi mu khyud dang /_g.yul gyi mu khyud dang /_sgra gcan dang /_sgra gcan 
[\[153a.2\]]stobs med dang /_sgra gcan dgra med dang /_chun po sna tshogs dang /_rgyal por gnas dang /_'dod chags mi gnas dang /_nor bdag dang /_srung ba po dang /_lus [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_bsam pa dpog dang /_sdom brtson 'khor dang /_sprin chung dang /_ya ma tha dang /_
[\[153a.3\]]'gro ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nges 'tsho dang /_yas s+ya na dang /_skar ma 'dud dang /_chags med rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du byas te/_rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bu stong gi bar du re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying 
[\[153a.4\]]po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gsum du na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyi tshogs de lta bu dag gis bsnyen bkur bya bas bsnyen bkur byas nas rgyal bu thu bos ji ltar byas pa de 
[\[153a.5\]]bzhin du re res kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la gser gyi 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_sman bcud kyis len brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgya cher phul lo/_/de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byas nas de dag kha cig ni brgya byin nyid du smon/_kha cig ni 
[\[153a.6\]]tshangs pa nyid du smon/_kha cig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por/_kha cig ni longs spyod chen por/_kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg par smon cing /_lo nyis brgya lnga bcur bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod par gsol to/_/de'i tshe na mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram 
[\[153a.7\]]ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'ongs nas 'di lta ste/_na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang /_'tshog chas thams cad kyis lo bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas yab mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo la gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_ji ltar 
[\[153b.2\]]rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya bas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems la 'di lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa skyes te/_bdag gis srog 
[\[153b.3\]]chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug kyang bdag gis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'di lha'i rgyal srid dam/_mi'i rgyal srid 'dod dam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod 
[\[153b.4\]]dam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/_'di ci 'dod pa'i smon lam mi shes na/_ji ste bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre 
[\[153b.5\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las ma rgal ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa dang /_ma thar ba rnams thar bar byed pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[153b.6\]]byed par lta na rgyal po 'di lha'i dpal 'dod dam/_'on te mi'i dpal lam/_'on te nyan thos nyid dam/_'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/_'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/_ci 'dod pa lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_sangs rgyas sam/_
[\[153b.7\]]nyan thos sam/_bram ze 'ga' zhig gis bdag gi rmi lam du sbron grang snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi rmi lam na snang ba gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]mthong ba de lta bu'i snang ba mthong zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bram ze de la pad ma 'dab ma rnams ni gser/_sdong bu rnams ni dngul/_snying po rnams ni bai dUr+ya/_ze ba rnams ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa dag bskur te/_pad ma de dag 
[\[154a.2\]]thams cad la yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag kun tu snang zhing /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de dag gi steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag kun nas gnas pa dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re las kyang 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu byung bar gyur nas 'od zer de dag thams cad bram ze de'i 
[\[154a.3\]]khar zhugs pa dang /_bdag gi lus dpag tshad stong gi tshad tsam du gyur cing 'di lta ste/_dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa bzhin du yongs su dag par mthong ba dang /_lus kyi khong pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu pad ma dag la 
[\[154a.4\]]skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam gtan bsgom pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs de dag kyang bdag gi mgo la phreng ba dngar bar mthong zhing gdugs rnams kyang steng gi nam mkha' la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas pa mthong ngo /_/kho ra 
[\[154a.5\]]khor yug na yang pad ma sna tshogs dag yod par mthong zhing pad ma de dag las lha'i sil snyan mi'i las shin tu 'das pa dag byung ste sgra yang grag go/_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud lus khrag gis bskus shing phag gi gdong du gyur nas rgyug cing srog chags rnam pa mang po dag la za 
[\[154a.6\]]ba dang /_zos nas kyang e ran da'i shing drung na snyes shing 'dug pa dang /_srog chags sna tshogs dag 'ongs te rgyal po de zos pa nas keng rus kyi bar la thug par byas te bor ba dang /_de bzhin du yang dang yang phyir skyes pas phag gi gdong du gyur cing lus khrag gis bskus te srog chags 
[\[154a.7\]]rnam pa mang po dag zos nas e ran da'i shing drung na 'dug pa dang /_srog chags sna tshogs dag gis zos shing keng rus la thug par byas te bor ba dag mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang rgyal bu dag kyang la la ni phag gi gdong /_la la ni glang po che'i gdong /_la la ni ma he'i gdong /_la la ni 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]seng ge'i gdong /_la la ni spyang ki'i gdong /_la la ni wa'i gdong /_la la ni khyi'i gdong /_la la ni spre'u'i gdong du gyur par mthong zhing lus dag la khrag gis gtor te srog chags rnam pa mang po dag zos nas e ran da'i shing drung na 'dug pa dang /_srog chags rnam pa mang po 
[\[154b.2\]]dag gis zos shing keng rus la thug par byas te bor ba mthong ngo /_/yang lus de nyid la gnas shing srog chags dag la za bar yang mthong ngo /_/rgyal bu kha cig ni sna ma'i me tog gis brgyan cing ma he'i shing rta dag la zhon te lam gol bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su bltas shing dong 
[\[154b.3\]]bar mthong ngo /_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang 'ongs nas bram ze la smras pa/_kye bram ze khyod kyi kho ra khor yug na pad ma yod pa gang yin pa de dag las khyod kyis dang por pad ma gcig ni rgyal po'i skal bar phul cig_/de nas rgyal bu 'di dag la 
[\[154b.4\]]yang pad ma re re byin cig_/lhag ma rnams ni khams kyi rgyal po rnams la byin cig_/gzhan dag ni skye bo rnams la byin cig_/de thos nas bram ze lha rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du bya'o zhes smras te/_de nas bram ze de pad ma rnams 'god bzhin pa las sad pa dang /_de mal nas 
[\[154b.5\]]langs te rmi lam dran zhing 'dug pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dang /_rgyal bu kha cig ni smon lam dman zhing 'khor ba'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba ste/_de dag ni dman pa la mos pa yin no/_/gang dag bdag gis rmi lam na sna ma'i me tog 
[\[154b.6\]]gis brgyan cing ma he'i shing rta dag la zhon te/_lam gol bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su bltas shing dong bar mthong ba'i rgyal bu kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa yin no/_/bdag gis snang ba chen po mthong zhing snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[154b.7\]]mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de'i mtshan ma yin te/_gang gi phyir bdag gi 'dzam bu'i 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gling myul cing sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa dang /_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[155a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yo byad thams cad kyis lo bdun du spyan drangs pa des na/_bdag gis snang ba chen po mthong zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong la/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas 
[\[155a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis pad ma dag bskur zhing /_bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag la gdugs dag bskur ba yin na/_bdag gis pad ma de dag la nyi 
[\[155a.4\]]ma'i gzugs dag mthong ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag gis 'od zer de dag rang gi khar zhugs par mthong ba gang yin pa dang /_lus chen por gyur par mthong ba gang yin pa dang /_nyi ma'i gzugs rnams phreng ba dngar bar mthong ba gang yin pa dang /_khong pa na byang chub sems 
[\[155a.5\]]dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu pad ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam gtan byed pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i rmi lam dag rmi ba dang /_bdag gis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag mthong zhing pad ma 'di dag bgos shig ces bsgo ba 
[\[155a.6\]]gang yin pa dang /_bdag gis pad ma de dag bgos te byin pa gang yin pa'i rmi lam de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na bdag la de lta bu'i rmi lam dag rmis zhes bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu'o snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze rgya 
[\[155a.7\]]mtsho'i rdul gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang zhal zas sbyar nas nang par sngar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun phyag chab gsol to/_/phyag chab gsol nas kyang bdag nyid lag dar te 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas nas kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang rnam grangs du mas legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/rnam grangs du mas legs par bstabs shing tshim 
[\[155b.2\]]par byas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol lags te/_lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas/_stan shin tu dma' ba zhig blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud 
[\[155b.3\]]kyang bu stong dang lhan cig tu srog chags stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_de nyid du 'ongs nas de bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song ste/_bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang bcom 
[\[155b.4\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rmi lam ji rmis pa 
[\[155b.5\]]dag gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze gang khyod kyis snang ba chen po dang /_snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas khyod la pad ma dag bskur ba dang /_pad ma de dag la nyi 
[\[155b.6\]]ma'i gzugs 'od zer rab tu 'byung ba dag mthong ba dang /_'od zer de dag khyod kyi khar zhugs par mthong ba ni bram ze gang khyod lo nyis brgya lnga bcur 'dzam bu'i gling nyul bar byed pa ni khyod kyis myul ba des sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bsod nams bya ba'i 
[\[155b.7\]]dngos po gsum po dag la btsud cing rab tu bkod pa dang /_sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa dang /_theg pa chen po 'di la brtsam pa byas pa des 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]na gang dag gis khyod la pad ma gang dag la nyi ma'i gzugs dag snang ba'i pad ma 'dab ma rnams ni gser/_sdong bu rnams ni dngul/_snying po rnams ni bai dUr+ya/_ze ba rnams ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa dag bskur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[156a.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa/_de dag gis bram ze khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur te/_rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bram ze gang khyod kyi 
[\[156a.3\]]rmi lam na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis khyod la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag bskur zhing /_gdugs de dag 
[\[156a.4\]]kyang steng gi bar snang la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas pa dag mthong ba ni/_bram ze gang gi nub mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyi nub mo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[156a.5\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu khyod kyi grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po dag mngon par 'phags par 'gyur zhing /_khyod kyi spyi gtsug kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen tu mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi nus par gyur te/_bram ze rmi 
[\[156a.6\]]lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bram ze gang khyod kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa'i lus chen po dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phreng ba dag mgo la bcings par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bram ze khyod kyis sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bla na med pa 
[\[156a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yang dang yang du khyod kyi bsngags pa rjod par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bdag cag dang po 
[\[156b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na/_des da ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur zhing 
[\[156b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis khyod la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dag gtong bar 'gyur te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dag gis khyod la mchod pa byas shing /_der 
[\[156b.4\]]khyod las chos thos nas ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag thob nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ste/_khyod kyi bsngags brjod par 'gyur zhing dbyangs rjes su sgrogs par 'gyur 
[\[156b.5\]]te/_bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bram ze gang khyod kyi rmi lam na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu khong bar zhugs nas de dag pad ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam gtan sgom pa dag mthong ba ni bram ze khyod byang 
[\[156b.6\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_gang dag srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dag la 'god par 'gyur 
[\[156b.7\]]ba de dag kyang bram ze khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa'i 'og tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba na/_'di skad du bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[157a.2\]]sangs rgyas des bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pas na des da ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[157a.3\]]shing chos kyi rgyal srid kyang brnyes so zhes khyod kyi bsngags pa rjod par 'gyur te/_bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bram ze gang khyod kyi rmi lam na phag gi gdong dang /_khyi'i gdong gi bar du gyur cing lus khrag gis bskus te srog chags rnam pa du ma dag 
[\[157a.4\]]zos nas e ran da'i shing ngan pa'i drung na 'dug pa dang /_de yang srog chags rnam pa du ma gzhan dag gis zos shing keng rus kyi bar la thug par byas te bor ba dang /_yang lus phyir skyes nas lus khrag gis bskus shing khyi'i gdong gi bar du gyur pas srog chags rnam pa mang po 
[\[157a.5\]]dag zos nas yang e ran da'i shing ngan pa'i drung na 'dug pa dang /_srog chags rnam pa du ma dag gis zos par mthong ba ni khyod kyis skyes bu blun po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing rab tu 
[\[157a.6\]]bkod pa de dag lha rnams kyi nang du 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal 'dod pa dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i sdug bsngal 
[\[157a.7\]]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du gti mug gi mun pa dang /_mgo gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du gnod pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ba dang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum po dag la rab tu 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]bkod pa rnams lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i rgyal srid 'dod la mi rnams kyi nang du ni gling gcig gi dbang phyug 'dod de/_de dag der sems can thams cad la longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /_de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi kha zas dang /_longs spyod du 'gyur bas de ltar skyes bu 
[\[157b.2\]]blun po de dag yun ring por 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bram ze gang khyod kyi rmi lam na mi kha cig sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dag gis mgo brgyan cing /_ma he'i shing rta dag la zhon te lam 
[\[157b.3\]]gol bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su lta zhing dong bar mthong ba de yang bram ze khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pa'i rigs kyi bu dag gcig bdag dul bar bya ba dang /_bdag zhi bar bya ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang 
[\[157b.4\]]dag par zhugs par 'gyur te/_bram ze de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag gi snga ltas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po'i mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'/_dal ba phun 
[\[157b.5\]]sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar yang u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar rnyed par dka'/_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yang rnyed par dka'/_yang dag pa'i smon lam 
[\[157b.6\]]yang rnyed par dka' lags so/_/rgyal po chen po lha'i rgyal srid ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags so gling gcig gi mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyang sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags so/_/gling gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_gling bzhi pa'i rgyal srid kyang sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu 
[\[157b.7\]]lags te/_rgyal po chen po yun ring por 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bgyid pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po lha dang mi'i 'byor pa ni rlung gi shugs bzhin du g.yo zhing mi gnas pa lags so/_/byis pa rnams ni chu zla lta bu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ngoms 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]mi myong zhing yul rnams la myos nas lha dang mi'i dpal 'tshal bar bgyid de/_byis pa de dag ni yang dang yang du sems can dmyal ba rnams su gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du kun tu gti mug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[158a.2\]]rnams kyi nang du bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_lha rnams kyi nang du 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal dang /_yang mngal du gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_gcig gis gcig mgo gcod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_
[\[158a.3\]]gcig la gcig 'tshal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_byis pa rnams 'khyam pa na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par 
[\[158a.4\]]bgyi ba dang /_mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i smon lam mi 'debs shing rtsol bar mi bgyid pa'i slad du ste/_de ltar byis pa glen pa dag ni gang la sdug bsngal thams cad bas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis skyo bar bgyid cing gang la 
[\[158a.5\]]yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor bas skyo bar mi bgyid cing yid 'byung bar mi bgyid do/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa lags par yongs su brtag pa mdzad cing rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis ni bcom ldan 
[\[158a.6\]]'das kyi bstan pa la lhag par mdzad pa mdzad de dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bskrun/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni brnyes/_longs spyod chen po'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la dbul ba ni phul/_mtho ris su skye ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du tshul khrims ni bsrungs/_bcom ldan 
[\[158a.7\]]'das la chos gsan pas khyod shes rab chen po brnyes par ni gyur/_mchod sbyin ni mdzad lags kyis/_rgyal po chen po khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed cig_/smras pa/_bram ze kho bo ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]'dod de/_bram ze kho bos ni 'khor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i don du sbyin pa byin zhing tshul khrims bsrungs la chos nyan to/_/bram ze bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni thob par dka' ba yin pas bram ze mi dgos so/_/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po 
[\[158b.2\]]la lan gnyis su smras pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi lam ni yang dag pa lags pas bsam pas smon lam btab par bgyi ba ste/_lam de ni sgrib pa ma mchis pas rdzogs shing shin tu dang ba lags so/_/lam de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par dag cing drang po lags 
[\[158b.3\]]so/_/lam de ni nyon mongs pa bsal bas g.yo med cing dag pa lags so/_/lam de ni sgrib pa ma mchis pas rgya che ba lags so/_/lam de ni bsam pa las byung bas yang dag par gzhol ba lags so/_/lam de ni sdig pa thams cad mi bgyid pas 'jigs pa ma mchis 
[\[158b.4\]]pa lags so/_/lam de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par 'byor pa lags so/_/lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsil ba lags so/_/lam de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/_/lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[158b.5\]]rol tu phyin pas byin gyis brlabs kyi rten lags so/_/lam de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnyog pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu rtogs pa lags so/_/lam de ni snying rje chen pos ngo bo nyid kyi shes pa rjes su rtogs 
[\[158b.6\]]pa lags so/_/lam de ni dga' ba chen pos mchog tu dga' ba thob pa lags so/_/lam de ni btang snyoms chen pos snying po dang 'thun pa lags so/_/lam de ni 'dod pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag ma mchis pas tsher ma dang 
[\[158b.7\]]bral ba lags so/_/lam de ni khong khro ba'i sems ma mchis pas bgrod bde ba lags so/_/lam de ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnam par rig pas g.yo dang bral ba lags so/_/lam de ni khams dang skye mched shin tu mthong bas bdud dang 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa lags so/_/lam de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud dang bral ba lags so/_/lam de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bgyid pa dang bral bas sems rgya chen por mchi ba lags so/_/lam de ni de 
[\[159a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang bcas pa lags so/_/lam de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che dang 'thun pas rin po che chen po nges par sgrub pa lags so/_/lam de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu bstan pa lags so/_/
[\[159a.3\]]lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su zin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ston cing rjes su spyad pa lags so/_/lam de ni rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spangs pas mtho dman dang bral ba lags so/_/lam de ni gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_khro ba ma mchis pas rdul nges par 
[\[159a.4\]]bcom pa lags so/_/lam de ni mi dge ba thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror mchi ba la sman pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi lam de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas bde ba 'thob pa lags kyis rgyal po chen po byang chub tu thugs skyed cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[159a.5\]]bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni skye dgu lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi nang du 'jig rten du byung bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ngan song thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa ma spyod de/_sems can gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni 'bras bu la gnas par gyur/_la 
[\[159a.6\]]las ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa bsgrubs/_gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa kha cig gis ni lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur te/_sems 
[\[159a.7\]]can rnams rang rang gi dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis 'phyan par gyur pas na 'di ltar sems can gcig tsam gyi sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar ma mdzad na bcom ldan 'das kyis btul ba'i sems can gang zhig yin/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni zhing du gyur pa 'ba' zhig 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]tu zad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams sdug bsngal las thar bar ni mi mdzad do/_/kho bo ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod la/_kho bo ye shes chen po bsags pa dang /_chos kyi sgo rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug pa 
[\[159b.2\]]des sems can rnams 'dul zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byed mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'di lta bur byang chub kyi phyir sems yongs su bsngo ba 'ba' zhig ni mi byed do/_/gal te gang gi tshe kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[159b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing der kho bos sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba lta na de'i tshe kho bo byang chub tu sems skyed cing kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang spyad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas 
[\[159b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/_de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin me long bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[159b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin me long bkod pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_'di lta bu'i snang ba byung bar gyur te/_snang ba des phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi 'jig rten gyi rdul snyed dag gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad snang bar gyur te/_
[\[159b.6\]]la la dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_la la dag na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug nas bdud pham par byed pa rnams 
[\[159b.7\]]dang /_gang dag na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba rnams dang /_gang dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ring po ma lon par chos ston pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]kyis khyab pa dang /_gang dag na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa dang /_gang dag na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[160a.2\]]kyis stong pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kha cig snyigs ma lngas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa dang /_kha cig snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba'i yongs su dag pa dang /_kha cig na sems can mchog rnams dang /_kha cig na dman pa rnams dang /_kha cig na tshe ring ba rnams dang /_kha cig na tshe thung 
[\[160a.3\]]ba rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kha cig mes 'jig pa rnams dang /_kha cig chu dang /_kha cig rlung gis 'jig pa rnams dang /_kha cig 'chags pa rnams dang /_kha cig chags shing gnas pa de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par kun tu snang ngo /_/thams cad dang 
[\[160a.4\]]ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthong nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag la gzigs la/_rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs 
[\[160a.5\]]skyed cig_/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu bzhed par yang gzung bar mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[160a.6\]]las gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa nas/_gang gis sems can rnams bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_gang gis sems can rnams tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i bar du rgya cher gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[160a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis yongs su ma dag pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/rgyal pos 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag grong khyer du zhugs te/_rtse gcig tu mchis nas smon lam bsam par bgyi zhing bdag snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu la dga' ba der dge ba'i spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[160b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[160b.3\]]thad nas song ste grong khyer du zhugs nas rang gi khyim du nang du yang dag 'jog la rtse gcig tu 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag sems par byed do//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu thu bo mig 
[\[160b.4\]]mi 'dzums la smras pa/_mig mi 'dzums khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed la/_khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba spyad cing bsod nams bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[160b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/des smras pa/_mkhan po bdag kyang rang gi khyim du mchis la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag bsam par bgyi ste/_gal te byang chub kyi slad du sems skye bar 'gyur ba lta na 
[\[160b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du slar mchis nas byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal bu des kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ste/_rang 
[\[160b.7\]]gi gnas su song nas gcig tu dben par song ste 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag sems par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu gnyis pa la bos te smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod byang chub tu sems skyed cig 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/_rgyal bu stong gi bar du thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_gzhan yang sems can dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis kyang byang chub yang dag 
[\[161a.2\]]par 'dzin du bcug pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag kyang rang rang gi khyim du mchis la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag bsam par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces smras nas thams cad rang rang gi khyim dag tu 
[\[161a.3\]]dong ste gcig pu dben par 'dug nas lo bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sems par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems la 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes te/_bdag gis srog chags bye ba 
[\[161a.4\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing /_bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'di yang lo bdun gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs 
[\[161a.5\]]pas/_gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du smon lam 'di yang 'grub pa lta na de'i phyir bdag gis lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum rnams 
[\[161a.6\]]mchod sbyin chen po 'di la yang dag par gzud par bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 
[\[161a.7\]]bdar nas/_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze khyod kho bo las ji zhig 'dod/_bram zes smras pa/_khyod su zhig yin/_rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_bram ze chen po khyod kyis 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos pa de ni kho bo yin na bram ze bsgo ba ci yod/_ci zhig bgyi/_bram zes smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyang mchod sbyin chen po 'di la spro ba skyed cig_/des smras pa/_bram ze khyod ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bya'o/_/
[\[161b.2\]]smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo'i tshig gis gnod sbyin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la 'di skad ces kyang bsgo shig_/gal te gnod sbyin khyed cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa lta 
[\[161b.3\]]na/_khyed cag deng la rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas tsan dan sa mchog pa dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dag long shig_/kha cig gis ni spos sna tshogs dang /_kha cig gis ni me tog sna tshogs dag long shig_/ces bsgo shig dang /_des kho bos nyin gcig bzhin du bcom 
[\[161b.4\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bram ze de ltar bya'o zhes bram ze de'i ltar mnyan nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/_rnga bo che brdungs nas gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dag bsdus te 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/gang 
[\[161b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen 
[\[161b.6\]]bkur byed kyis/_de'i phyir khyed cag gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyed cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis thal mo sbyar te 
[\[161b.7\]]smras pa/_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyun dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]rgyun gang yin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag thams cad la bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_khyed cag 
[\[162a.2\]]nyon cig_/khyed cag las gang su dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod pa dang /_bsod nams 'dod pas lo bdun du gang gi phyir bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhal zas sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i tsan dan sa mchog pa dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying 
[\[162a.3\]]po dag rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas long shig_/de nas gnod sbyin dgu khri nyis stong gis tshig 'thun par smras pa/_grogs po dag bdag cag gis lo bdun po 'di la gang gi phyir bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal zas sbyor 
[\[162a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba'i tsan dan sa mchog pa dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dag blang bar bya'o/_/gnod sbyin bzhi khri drug stong gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni spos blang bar bya'o/_/gnod sbyin lnga khri nyis stong gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni me tog sna tshogs dag blang bar bya'o/_/
[\[162a.5\]]gnod sbyin nyi khris smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir sman bcud kyis len sna tshogs dag gi mthu blangs la zhal zas dang /_stsang nan sbyor bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa der mthu gzhug par bya'o/_/gnod sbyin bdun khris smras pa/_grogs 
[\[162a.6\]]po dag bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhal zas sbyar bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ga la ba der 
[\[162a.7\]]song ste phyin cing grul bum bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_klu dang /_dri za bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus gling bzhi ba gnyis pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi gan du 'ongs pa dang /_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de dag bla na med pa 
[\[162b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/_de dag kyang dong ste rang rang gi 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam thos kyi bu ther 'bum 'khor dang 
[\[162b.3\]]bcas pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/'phags skyes po ther 'bum dang /_mig mi bzang ther 'bum dang /_yul 'khor srung ther 'bum 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang 
[\[162b.4\]]dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi re ba yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur la/_gal te bdag gi 
[\[162b.5\]]smon lam yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la mchod sbyin chen po 'di'i bsod nams yang dag par bgo bsha' byed par gyur cig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig_/gal te 
[\[162b.6\]]bdag bsod nams des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na deng lha'i dbang po brgya byin bdag la lta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur cig_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_lha'i bu rab 
[\[162b.7\]]'phrul dang /_lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyang bdag la blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze de lta ba'i phyir 'ongs so/_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_lha'i bu rab 'phrul dang /_lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyang bram ze de lta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas/_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de dag la khyed cag su yin zhes dris pa dang /_lha'i rgyal po lnga po dag gis rang rang gi ming 
[\[163a.2\]]rus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye bram ze kho bo cag la bsgo ba ni ci zhig yod/_mchod sbyin chen po 'di la kho bo cag gis yo byad dag sbyar bar bya ba lta ci yod/_bram zes smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir khyed cag lha'i 'jig rten na 
[\[163a.3\]]thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag dang /_spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang /_me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang /_lha'i 
[\[163a.4\]]na bza' dag dang /_lha'i gdan dag dang /_lha'i gding ba dag dang /_lha'i rin po che'i snod dag dang /_lha'i rgyan dag dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lhab lhub dag dang /_lha'i rol mo'i sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i tshal 
[\[163a.5\]]thams cad brgyan par gyis shig_/lha'i rgyal po lnga po de dag gis grogs po de ltar bya'o zhes bram ze'i ltar mnyan te/_bram ze'i drung nas phyir log nas lha'i 'jig rten du dong ste phyin pa dang /_lha'i bu 'khri byed dang /_lha'i bu 'khyil byed dang /_lha'i bu snar ma skyes dang /_
[\[163a.6\]]lha'i bus rtsom dga' rnams bos te 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag khyed cag deng la 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal rgyan gyi khyad par sna tshogs dag dang /_gdan dang /_gding ba sna tshogs dag gis ji ltar 
[\[163a.7\]]lha'i 'jig rten 'di brgyan pa de lta bu dag gis brgyan par gyis shig_/grogs po dag rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu yang brtsig tu chug shig_/'di lta ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i ba gam can 'di ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs brtsig tu 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]chug shig_/lha'i bu de lngas lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mtshan gcig gis 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal thams cad rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi bar dag gi rgyan de lta bu dag gis brgyan 
[\[163b.2\]]to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i ba gam can ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang brtsigs te/_'dzam bu'i tshal thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mthar thug par brgyan nas lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi 
[\[163b.3\]]gan du song ste smras pa/_grogs po dag mkhyen par mdzod cig_/ji ltar lha'i 'jig rten 'di legs par brgyan pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal yang lha'i rgyan gyi khyad par rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mthar thug par 
[\[163b.4\]]brgyan cing 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i ba gam can ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i rin po che thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang brtsegs lags te/_grogs po dag lha'i 'jig rten dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed 
[\[163b.5\]]mos tshal ni khyad par cung zad kyang ma mchis so/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po lnga po brgya byin dang rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi drung du song ste 'di skad 
[\[163b.6\]]ces smras so/_/bram ze bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir 'dzam bu'i tshal ni brgyan zin na yang kho bo cag gis bya ba lta ci yod/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i bu lnga po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i rgyal 
[\[163b.7\]]po khyed lnga ni lha'i ris so so na rgyal srid byed pa yin pas de na khyed cag gi dbang du 'gyur gyis lha'i rgyal po dag deng la rang rang gi lha'i 'khor rnams bsdus te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du sheg 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]la bcom ldan 'das las chos kyang nyon cig_/de nas lha'i rgyal po de lnga rang rang gi gnas kyi khyad par rnams su dong ste phyin pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsdus te 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag shes par 
[\[164a.2\]]gyis shig_/'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs shing ri mor byed de/_bram 
[\[164a.3\]]ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas kho bo cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir skyed mos tshal thams cad brgyan zin gyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[164a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis thal mo sbyar te tshig tu smras pa/_grogs po bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po de la rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing rjes su yi rang ba de las byung ba'i bsod 
[\[164a.5\]]nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis kyang 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams bsdus te/_rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_lha'i 
[\[164a.6\]]bu 'phrul dga' dang /_lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag bsdus nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis thal mo sbyar te tshig tu smras pa/_grogs po dag bdag cag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bsod nams 
[\[164a.7\]]gang yin pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing /_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byas/_grogs po dag de'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab cing bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/lha'i rgyal po de lnga nub mo lha'i rgyal po re re zhing yang skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag dang lhan cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge 
[\[164b.2\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_sna ma dang /_bar shi ka dang /_a 
[\[164b.3\]]ti mug ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char dag 'bebs shing lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag kyang rab tu sgrogs par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/_gal 
[\[164b.4\]]te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing smon lam 'di yang 'grub pa lta na/_'di ltar lha ma yin dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu des sems bskyed ma thag tu gnod sbyin 
[\[164b.5\]]gyi dbang po lnga bram ze de ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa nas/_bram ze'i tshig gis lha ma yin skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_bcom 
[\[164b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs nas chos nyan pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du bram ze de bdud 'dod pa dang /_de'i tshe na bdud gang po zhes bya ba 'ongs pa nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag 
[\[164b.7\]]khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul tshangs pa chen po gnas pa'i grong khyer zhes bya ba 'ong 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bar 'dod pa nas bram ze las mnyan cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag 
[\[165a.2\]]bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nas babs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i brgya byin mthong bar 'dod cing lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs 
[\[165a.3\]]su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po de lnga yang bram ze'i drung du lhags nas bram ze des de dag yang dag par rjes su bstan pa dang /_de dag kyang rang rang gi lha'i gnas dag tu 
[\[165a.4\]]dong nas bram ze'i tshig gis rang rang gi 'khor rnams kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[165a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag kyang brgya byin dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[165a.6\]]lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu skyes pa dang /_
[\[165a.7\]]bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so/_/gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_bdud dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du gling bzhi pa gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa'i bar dag gi brgya byin dang /_lha'i 
[\[165b.2\]]bu rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_bdud dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir de dag 'khor dang bcas te gling bzhi pa 
[\[165b.3\]]'dir lhags so/_/de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bar dag nas kyang brgya byin ther 'bum dang /_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral ther 'bum dang /_yongs su dga' ldan ther 'bum dang /_'phrul dga' ther 'bum dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ther 'bum 
[\[165b.4\]]dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po ther 'bum dang /_bdud ther 'bum dang /_tshangs pa chen po ther 'bum dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus tshangs pa chen po'i bar du re re zhing yang tshangs ris kyi lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[165b.5\]]'bum phrag du ma'i bar dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phrad par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so/_/de'i 
[\[165b.6\]]tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag kyang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs de ni cung zad kyang med do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[165b.7\]]'gyur zhing /_ji ltar rnam thos kyi bu ther 'bum dang /_tshangs pa chen po the 'bum gyi bar 'di dag bdag dang 'thun par 'jug pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang bdag dang 'thun par mdzad pa lta na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar mdzad la bde ba'i tshor ba skyed nas de dag re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa bzhugs shing des sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[166a.2\]]byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mdzad par gyur cig snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 
[\[166a.3\]]thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rab tu gdung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu gdung ba la thugs mnyam par bzhag pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer bgrang ba las yang 
[\[166a.4\]]dag par 'das pa snyed dag byung ste/_'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab par gyur to/_/de la 'od zer kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar dong nas grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la rlung dron po dag langs so/_/
[\[166a.5\]]gang dag tsha ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung bsil ba dag langs te/_des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_ngal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas nas bde ba'i tshor ba 
[\[166a.6\]]bskyed do/_/sems can dmyal ba pa re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs legs par spras pa bzhugs so/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa bde ba dang ldan 
[\[166a.7\]]pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_rkyen gang gis bdag cag gi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi zhing bde ba skyes par gyur snyam pa dang /_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]mdzes pa de mthong ngo /_/de dag gis de mthong nas 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'di'i mthus bdag cag 'di ltar bde bar gyur to zhes zer zhing de dag dga' ba dang /_bde ba skyes nas rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[166b.2\]]'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces sems can dag khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes legs par tshig tu brjod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang /_khyed cag phyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde ba'i tshor ba 'di lta bu 
[\[166b.3\]]dag 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bdag cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag cag gi las kyi sgrib pa zad par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de 
[\[166b.4\]]nas kha cig shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag mes sreg pa de dag la yang 'od zer de dag gis rlung bsil ba dag rab tu btang ste/_de dag gis de dag la reg pa dang bkres pa dang /_skom pa rab tu zhi 
[\[166b.5\]]zhing sdug bsngal med par gyur nas/_kha cig de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam par skyes pa'i bar du gyur to/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar la yang brjod par bya'o/_/'od de 
[\[166b.6\]]yang phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub pa lha dang /_mi dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[166b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to/_/sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs thob par gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi ched kyi phyir lha rnams kyis rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin gyi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal lha'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dag gis brgyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag dong ste blta zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 
[\[167a.2\]]dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun yang blta'o/_/der song nas bcom ldan 'das las chos kyang mnyan par bya'o zhes smras nas/_de'i tshe na mi rnams las skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi 
[\[167a.3\]]dge 'dun la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_phrad par bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_skyed mos tshal de yang mthong bar 'dod pa'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin du 'ong ngo /_/skyed mos tshal de la yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo nyi khri yod de/_
[\[167a.4\]]skyed mos tshal gyi sgo re re zhing rin po che'i khri'u lnga brgya lnga brgya bshams nas de dag la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya lnga brgya 'khod nas sems can gang dag 'ongs shing skyed mos tshal der 'jug pa de dag bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong /_chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[167a.5\]]la skyabs su gtong zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_'dzud cing sems kyang skyed du 'jug go/_/gang dag nye ba na gnas pa rnams dang /_gang dag ring ba na gnas pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_
[\[167a.6\]]phyag bya ba dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang blta ba'i phyir/_phyis skyed mos tshal der 'jug go/_/de ltar mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun po de dag las lha bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[167a.7\]]yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_dri za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes ba bgrang ba 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]las 'das pa'i bar dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de lo bdun po de dag 'das nas kyang lha'i 'khor lo rin po che ma gtogs par 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_
[\[167b.2\]]glang po rin po che ma gtogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dag kyang 'bul bar 'dod do/_/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang lo bdun po de dag 'das 'das su 'dod chags la 'dun pa ma skyes 
[\[167b.3\]]so/_/zhe sdang la 'dun pa med/_gti mug la 'dun pa med/_rgyal srid la 'dun pa med/_nor la 'dun pa med/_bu la 'dun pa med/_bu mo la 'dun pa med/_zas la 'dun pa med/_skom la 'dun pa med/_gos la 'dun pa med/_spos la 'dun pa med/_
[\[167b.4\]]bzhon pa la 'dun pa med/_gnyid la 'dun pa med/_bdag tu 'dun pa med/_gzhan du 'dun pa med par gyur to/_/lo bdun du glos phab ste nyal bar ma gyur kyang /_de la mtshan mo'i 'du shes ma skyes/_nyin mo'i 'du shes ma skyes so/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes ma yin/_sgra'i 
[\[167b.5\]]'du shes ma yin/_dri'i 'du shes ma yin/_ro'i 'du shes ma yin te/_reg bya'i 'du shes kyang ma skyes so/_/lo bdun du de dag gis lus la ngal ba ma skyes te/_rtag par rgyun du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 
[\[167b.6\]]snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong yang de'i mig lam du ri rab snang bar ma gyur/_ri gzhan dag kyang ma yin/_khor yug kyang ma yin/_khor yug chen po dag kyang ma yin/_'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang ma yin/_nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang ma yin te/_
[\[167b.7\]]lha'i gzhal med khang dag kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur cing ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa dag la lta zhing smon lam sems par byed do/_/ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de lta bu'i 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]bde ba'i yon tan gyi gnas pas lo bdun du gnas pa dang /_de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sems shing 'dug pa de bzhin du rgyal bu thu bo mig mi 'dzums dang /_
[\[168a.2\]]mu khyud dang /_dbang po'i tshogs dang /_de bzhin du rgyal bu stong po de dag thams cad dang /_khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_gzhan yang srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis po thams cad kyang de ltar lo bdun du gcig pu dben par song ste nang du 
[\[168a.3\]]yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang mthong la/_lo bdun gyi bar du de dag 'dod chags la 'dun pa ma skyes shing /_zhe sdang la 'dun pa med/_gti mug la 'dun
