[\[188b.4\]]sems skyed par gyur cig_/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas rnams su skyes par 
[\[188b.5\]]gyur pa dag gis kyang bdag mthong bar gyur cing snga ma bzhin du gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/lha rnams la yang de bzhin 
[\[188b.6\]]du sbyar te/_bdag gi 'od kyang nyis gyur du snang bar gyur cig_/bdag gi tshe yang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur la/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thogs par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i 
[\[188b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis gang dag bsgrags par 'gyur ba bdag gi bsngags pa rjod par gyur cig_/de na sems can gang dag gis bdag gi bsngags pa thos 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]par gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar gyur cig_/de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa 
[\[189a.2\]]la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ma gtogs pa dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis bdag gi ming thos par 'gyur zhing 
[\[189a.3\]]bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba 'tshal bar gyur cig_/de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na yang bdag tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing rab rib ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 
[\[189a.4\]]zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i legs pa bshad pas sems can de dag tshim par bgyid par gyur cig_/dad pa de nyid kyis sems med pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig_/sems dga' ba'i chos kyis bzod pa yang thob par gyur cig_/'gum 
[\[189a.5\]]pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na sems can gang dag nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /_theg pa gsum don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag 
[\[189a.6\]]don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_dge ba yongs su btsal ba don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_chos ma lags pa dang /_'dod chags la chags pa rnams dang /_'dod 
[\[189a.7\]]pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang /_chos log pas sems dkris pa de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na bdag tshogs du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du mchis nas 'od dang ting nge 'dzin gyis chos ston par gyur cig_/de dag la bdag gi sangs rgyas 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]kyi zhing yang ston par gyur cig_/byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol par yang gyur cig_/sems can de dag kyang bdag la mchog tu dga' zhing dad pa thob par gyur nas byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig_/de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad 
[\[189b.2\]]rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/de dag gis ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i sgron ma thob par gyur nas gti mug spangs par gyur cig_/de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu 
[\[189b.3\]]dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ni smon lam bzang por btab bo/_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[189b.4\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig_/
[\[189b.5\]]bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur cig_/de yang bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang ba bskyed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[189b.6\]]khams gzhan dag tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char bab pa de yang bdag nyid kyis mthong la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa gang dag gi thal mo sbyar te byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu shin tu myur bar spos kyi char yang bab la sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod seng ge spos zhes bya bar gyur cig_/seng ge spos khyod ni bskal pa 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa 
[\[190a.2\]]der 'jig rten gyi khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/_seng ge spos khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[190a.3\]]snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i spos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[190a.4\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de la bka' stsal pa/_lha mi lha min rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba longs/_/srid pa'i 'gro bar sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis sgrol/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'ching ba khyod kyis chod/_/mi yi rgyal ba 'phags 
[\[190a.5\]]pa'i gang zag nyid du 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu brgyad pa gnod pa med ces bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can khri sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul 
[\[190a.6\]]bral ci 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar yongs su dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par gnas par 'gyur ba srid du 
[\[190a.7\]]byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na slad kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]ni ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mi spyod pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag lo bdun po 'di la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon 
[\[190b.2\]]tan yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su dag pa la sems shing mchis pa na/_bdag gis ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin khri chig stong bskyed cing thob ste bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni 
[\[190b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la 
[\[190b.4\]]sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston pa de dag dang /_gang dag dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su gtams pa de dag mthong zhing der 'jug par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[190b.5\]]ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin des bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gnas ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul 
[\[190b.6\]]phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kyis re re la yang phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig_/re re la yang bdag gi lus re res rin po che dang /_me tog sna tshogs bla na ma mchis pa dag dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra bla na ma mchis pa sna tshogs dang /_bkod 
[\[190b.7\]]pa bla na ma mchis pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yang bdag bskal pa rgya mtsho bye ma snyed du spyod par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag gis lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas re re'i 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'tshal bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin yon tan 'byung gnas kyis de dag re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bstod pa bla na ma mchis pa 
[\[191a.2\]]dag gis stod par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig mi 'dzums pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdul gcig gi steng du sems kyi skad cig gi tshad kyis rgyal ba rnams kyis bltams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[191a.3\]]'das bdag gis nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar gyur cig_/btsun 
[\[191a.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can dmyal ba rnams su zhugs te/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su sprul nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig_/
[\[191a.5\]]de na sems can de dag kyang byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir 
[\[191a.6\]]mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur cig_/dud 'gro rnams la yang de bzhin/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la yang de bzhin/_gnod sbyin rnams la yang de bzhin/_srin po rnams la yang de bzhin/_lha ma yin rnams la yang de bzhin/_klu rnams la yang de bzhin/_mi'am ci rnams la yang de bzhin/_lto 'phye 
[\[191a.7\]]chen po rnams la yang de bzhin/_sha za rnams la yang de bzhin/_srul po rnams la yang de bzhin/_lus srul po rnams la yang de bzhin/_mi gdol pa rnams la yang de bzhin/_tshong pa rnams dang /_smad 'tshong ma rnams la yang de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rigs ji lta bur skyes 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]pa rnams dang /_de dag gis lus ji lta bu thob pa dang /_sems can las kyi rkyen ji lta bus bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba rnams dang /_bzo'i gnas ji lta bu dag dang /_las kyi gnas ji lta bu dag la chags pa rnams la de lta bu'i lus su sprul nas/_bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas 
[\[191b.2\]]de lta bu dag la brtson pa ston par bgyid cing /_de lta bu'i yi ge brjod pas sems can rnams kyi sems mgu bar bgyid cing chos kyang ston par gyur cig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud pa dang rab tu 'god par yang gyur cig_/bla na 
[\[191b.3\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa la 'god par yang gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu po thams cad dag na sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la yang ci nas kyang sngon gyi las 
[\[191b.4\]]dang /_nyon mongs pa ma lus par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 'ga'i sems kyi rgyud kyi lam yang bdud bzhis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de'i slad du bdag 
[\[191b.5\]]gis sangs rgyas kyi khri yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po skar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul bral gyi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ltar yongs su dag par 'jog par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_
[\[191b.6\]]bdag gi 'khor yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge spos kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin du gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag gi sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[191b.7\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/thams cad kyang sems mnyen par gyur cig_/sems las su rung bar gyur cig_/rang rang gi gling bzhi pa dag na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dag mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can de dag la rin po che sna tshogs dag dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag bdog par gyur la/_des sems can de dag sangs rgyas de dag la yang mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa'i mthus 
[\[192a.2\]]bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig_/tshig de brjod ma thag tu ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kho ra khor yug tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[192a.3\]]dag pa khri 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la mchod pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag byed par spro bar yang 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[192a.4\]]de'i phyir khyod kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig_/kun tu bzang po khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/_bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug cu'i 
[\[192a.5\]]bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi chu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/_kun tu bzang po khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[192a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag 
[\[192a.7\]]lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_brtul zhugs bzang po rab tu dga' ba sems dul longs/_/dam bcas brtan pa sems can rnams kyi rgyud sbyongs la/_/khyod kyis sems can nyon mongs mi bzad klung las sgrol/_/khyod ni 'jig rten ye shes 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]sgron mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu yang de'i tshe na srog chags le lo can khris tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 
[\[192b.2\]]yongs su dag par 'jog par 'gyur ba na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[192b.3\]]der skye bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos srog chags khri po de dag la 'di skad ces lung bstan te/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_khyod cag 'jig rten gyi 
[\[192b.4\]]khams de'i kho ra khor yug dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_stong stong zhing mtshan 'thun pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa me lce thab khung dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni 
[\[192b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa gya nom 'jigs med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur 
[\[192b.6\]]ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri med dbyangs kyi gzi brjid dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga brgya yang mtshan 'thun te/_'di lta ste nyi ma'i dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nyis stong lnga brgya ni 'jigs bral grags pa'i rgyal po dang /_'od zer bral dang /_'od zer bral ba'i 
[\[192b.7\]]dbyangs dang /_grags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs dang /_rnam grol chos grags dbyangs dang /_snying po grags pa'i rgyal po dang /_rin chen rgyal mtshan dang /_snang ba'i dbang phyug dang /_thub chen ye shes 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dang /_gnas kyi gos bstsags rgyal po dang /_ye shes blo gros bsam yas 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]snying po dang /_ye shes lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang /_brtson 'grus chen po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang /_lhun po'i dpal lta bu dang /_ye shes rdul bral shugs dang /_ci'i dbang phyug sa bon dang /_ye shes shin tu dri med sgrogs pa'i dbang phyug 
[\[193a.2\]]dang /_yon tan rgya mtsho'i zil mnan rgyal po dang /_ye shes 'byung ba stobs kyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub rdul bral rgyal po dang /_thub pa dpal brtsegs shugs kyi me tog dang /_ye shes dpal brtsegs blo dang /_rdo rje seng ge dang /_tshul khrims 'od gsal dang /_bzang mchog dang /_
[\[193a.3\]]'od zer mtha' yas dang /_seng ge dga' dang /_ye shes mi zad brtsegs dang /_rin chen snang ba dang /_ye shes dri med dang /_ye shes rgyas pa dang /_seng ge grags pa dang /_mngon shes yon tan rgyal po dang /_chos kyi sna ma'i me tog char 'bebs dang /_'od byed dang /_lhun po mngon 'phags dang /_
[\[193a.4\]]chos yang dag 'phags rgyal po dri med dang /_spos kyi dbang phyug dang /_dri med spyan dang /_rab tu che bstsags dang /_thogs med stobs spos kyi rgyal po dang /_rang gi ye shes bsod nams stobs dang /_ye shes chos gos dang /_dbang sgyur dang /_chags med phan bzhed dang /_ye shes yang dag 
[\[193a.5\]]'byung dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_stobs kyi snying po dang /_yon tan 'byung gnas dang /_'khri shing me tog rgyal mtshan dang /_yon tan 'od dang /_gti mug rnam bral yon tan rgyal po dang /_rdo rje mchog dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_dbyangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_legs sbas dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan 
[\[193a.6\]]dang /_rin chen dbang phyug dang /_mngon 'phags rgyal mtshan dang /_ri bo lta bu dang /_dga' sprin dang /_chos byed dang /_sA la'i rgyal po dang /_kun sbed dang /_rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang /_ye shes yang dag bstsags dang /_ye shes 'od 'phro dang /_me tog tshogs can dang /_
[\[193a.7\]]glang po che'i dbang po'i dbang phyug dang /_u dum bA ra'i me tog dang /_gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang /_tsan dan dang /_shin tu brtan pa dang /_mthus gnon dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sgron ma dang /_ye shes [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dang /_rgya mtsho'i 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_rnam rgyal chos grags dang /_nga rgyal sgrogs dang /_yon tan 'od 'phro dang /_ye shes 'od dang /_ye shes sgron ma dang /_bde ba'i rgyal po dang /_ye shes dbyangs dang /_rgyal mtshan bsdus pa dang /_rdo rje'i sgron ma dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal ba'i grangs dang /_rab tu 
[\[193b.2\]]brtan pa dang /_blo gros zla ba'i rgyal po dang /_rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang /_sA la'i dbang po seng ge'i sgra dang /_sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po dang /_yon tan rin chen yang dag bstsags dang /_skar ma'i snying po dang /_skar ma rnam 'jig grags pa dang /_bsod 
[\[193b.3\]]nams stobs sA la'i rgyal po dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /_tshangs mchog dang /_yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni spos kyi pad ma rnam rgyal grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /_snang ba'i rgyal po dang /_spos kyi pad ma dam 
[\[193b.4\]]pa'i shugs dang /_yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas ye shes bla ma dang /_'dzam bu'i grib ma dang /_yon tan ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang /_seng ge'i tog dang /_klus spangs me tog gzi brjid rgyal po dang /_dri zhim sa bon bdag med dang /_yon tan bdud rtsi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur 
[\[193b.5\]]ro/_/gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos sbyin rgyal po klu dbang rnam grol sad byed 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i mig gi ri bo zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /_gzhan dag tu nyi ma gcig dang /_dus gcig tu bla na med 
[\[193b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/srog chags khri po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgos gtugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[193b.7\]]snying pos bka' stsal pa/_klu ltar brtan par sgrogs pa dag ni re shig longs/_/dge ba'i nor rnams dag ni yang dag [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]gyis la/_/pha rol phyin pa rnams la myur du brtson gyis dang /_/lha mi 'jig rten rnams kyi 'dren pa dag tu 'gyur//_//
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bam po bdun pa/_rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu dgu pa sdig med ces bya ba la smras pa dang /_snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[194a.2\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams bdag gi dpang lags par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[194a.3\]]bdag gis khyod kyi spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'gyod pa'i sems skye bar ma gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung 
[\[194a.4\]]ba'i bar du dam bcas pa brtan zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par gyur cig_/sems can gzhan gyi sems 'khrug par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems mi bskyed par gyur cig_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi sems dang /_sems 
[\[194a.5\]]las byung ba skye bar ma gyur cig_/rmugs pa dang gnyid dang ldan par ma gyur cig_/rgod pa dang ldan par ma gyur cig_/'gyod pa dang ldan par ma gyur cig_/the tsom dang ldan par ma gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_srog 
[\[194a.6\]]gcod pa ma mchis pa dang /_ma byin par len pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ma mchis pa dang /_phra ma ma mchis pa dang /_ngag rtsub po ma mchis pa dang /_tshig kyal pa ma mchis pa dang /_brnab sems ma mchis pa dang /_gnod sems 
[\[194a.7\]]ma mchis pa dang /_log par lta ba ma mchis pa dang /_the tsom dang ldan pa ma mchis pa dang /_chos la mi gus pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang /_slu ba'i sems ma mchis shing chos de dag ma mchis par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du gom pa 'dor 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ba tsam la yang rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'jug par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/tshe rabs 
[\[194b.2\]]thams cad du yang rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig_/tshe rabs thams cad du phyag dar khrod par gyur cig_/chos gos gsum pa dang /_shing drung pa dang /_cog bu pa dang /_dgon pa pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_chos ston pa dang /_
[\[194b.3\]]tshig btsun pa dang spobs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar ma gyur cig_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams kyis phas kyi rgol ba 'dul bar ma gyur cig_/bud med la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos ston par ma gyur cig_/stong 
[\[194b.4\]]pa nyid yid la bgyid pas bud med la chos ston par bgyid par ma gyur cig_/lag pa sgyur zhing chos ston par ma gyur cig_/rtag tu bdag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur cig_/bdag chos smra ba gang la chos 
[\[194b.5\]]nyan pa na de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag chos smra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ji lta ba de ltar rim gro bgyid pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_bla mar bgyid pa dang /_ri mor bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid par gyur cig_/chos smra 
[\[194b.6\]]ba la bdag gi sha dag gi bar gyis kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag snod dang snod ma lags par mi rtog par sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig_/bdag chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag skyed par ma gyur cig_/bdag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i 
[\[194b.7\]]sems can rnams la rang gi srog gi sbyin pas yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_smon lam gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i rdzas kyis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]rab tu byung ba'i rtags can nam/_khyim pa'i rtags can ltung ba byung ba'am/_ltung ba ma byung ba dag la skur bar bgyid par ma gyur cig_/bdag rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dag la rtag tu me dang /_dug dang /_mtshon cha lta bur 'du shes skyed 
[\[195a.2\]]par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam 'di dag byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa gnyis su 
[\[195a.3\]]lha'i 'khor lo rin po che'i rtsibs stong mchis pa/_lte ba dang bcas pa/_mu khyud dang bcas pa/_nyi ma'i kha dog ltar 'od gsal ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/rgyal bu sdig med kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu lag pa gnyis su ji ltar 'dod pa de lta bu'i 'khor lo dag byung bar gyur 
[\[195a.4\]]pa dang /_yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du 'khor lo 'di dag 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sgras mngon par go bar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[195a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' lung ston pa dran pa mi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_stong pa nyid bsgom pa la spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod du stsal ba'i slad du ji ltar klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo gnyis mchis pa de lta bu'i sgra gsang mthon pos 
[\[195a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag du mchi bar gyur cig_/gang dag der skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rna ba'i dbang po dag tu yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur cig_/grags ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 
[\[195a.7\]]gyur cig_/zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bgyid pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu rgyal bu sdig med kyis 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]'khor lo rin po che de dag btang ba dang /_de dag 'di ltar mgyogs par song ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgyogs pas gshegs pa de bzhin du 'khor lo rin po che de dag kyang song ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dpag tu med 
[\[195b.2\]]grangs med pa dag tu song nas/_sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' lung ston pa dran pa mi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa la spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod du bcug go/_/sems can gang dag gi rna ba'i dbang por chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[195b.3\]]'di grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_ser sna'i bar gyi sems dang sems las byung ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul yid la byed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'khor 
[\[195b.4\]]lo de dag kyang yud tsam gcig gis phyir log ste rgyal bu sdig med kyi mdun du 'dug go/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos rgyal bu sdig med la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ni smon lam shin tu bzang po 
[\[195b.5\]]btab ste/_lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu btang bas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag rnyog pa med pa'i sems la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mi 
[\[195b.6\]]'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur cig_/mi 'khrugs pa khyod ni 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur gyis/_mi 'khrugs pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa longs shig_/mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji ltar 
[\[195b.7\]]sa gzhi thams cad gser las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/_lha'i nor bu rin po che rnam par bkram pa gseg ma dang gyo mo dag ma mchis/_gor ma'i ka ba dang /_pha bong dang ri dag ma mchis shing /_ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam la/_rkang mthil 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bzhag na ni nems zhes bgyid/_rkang mthil bteg na ni par ces bgyid pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag 'tshal te/_de na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dag ma mchis 
[\[196a.2\]]par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dri nga ba dag ma mchis par gyur la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag gis kun tu gang bar gyur cig_/de na sems 
[\[196a.3\]]can rnams la rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'gum pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang /_gcig la gcig tho 'tsham pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems can rnams la dus ma lags par 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang /_'gyod cing 'gum pa ma mchis 
[\[196a.4\]]pa dang /_mnyam par ma gzhag par 'gum pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bgyid par gyur cig_/ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig_/
[\[196a.5\]]byang chub cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /_zhe sdang chung ba dang /_gti mug chung bar 
[\[196a.6\]]gyur cig_/de na thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams bzo bgyid par ma gyur cig_/de na ngan song gi rgyu mtshan ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la bdud kyis 
[\[196a.7\]]glags rnyed pa'i lam ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la mdog ngan pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la 'di lta ste/_rje bo dang /_bran gyi rim pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la bdag gi ba ma mchis shing yongs su 'dzin 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tha na g.yar lam na yang khu ba 'byin pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can thams cad chos 'tshal ba dang /_chos yongs su tshol ba lhur len par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 
[\[196b.2\]]na sems can 'ga' yang log par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing gzhan mu stegs can yang ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la lus ngal ba ma mchis shing sems ngal ba yang ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na sems can de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang 
[\[196b.3\]]ldan par gyur cig_/de na sems can thams cad la bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_rnam par tho 'tsham par ma mchis par gyur cig_/ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams bzhin du kha zas ji lta bu dag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag mdun du rin po che'i snod dag nas 
[\[196b.4\]]'byung bar gyur cig_/bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_mchi ma dang /_lus kyi rngul dag ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na grang ba ma mchis pa dang /_tsha ba ma mchis par gyur cig_/dri bda' ba dang /_nyams dga' bar gyur cig_/de na reg na 
[\[196b.5\]]bde ba'i bser ma dag ldang bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag lha dang mi rnams spos kyi bya ba bgyid par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji lta bu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe gcig ni bser ma bsil ba 'tshal la cig shos ni dron po 'tshal ba dang /_la la ud 
[\[196b.6\]]pa la'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal la/_la la ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal ba dang /_la la ni dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi dri bda' ba dang /_la la ni rgya spos kyi dri bda' ba dang /_la la ni a ga ru'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal la/_la 
[\[196b.7\]]la ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bser ma ye mi 'tshal ba 'tshal bar 'gyur na yang de dag gis ji ltar sems bskyed cing dmigs pa de bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de snyigs ma lnga dang bral bar gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams la rin 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag mchis par 'gyur la/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na gang du mi dag mchis par 'gyur bar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri shing bal gyi sngas 'jam po dag gis kun tu g.yogs shing ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na 'jam 
[\[197a.2\]]pa dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi khor yug dag tu gang du mi de dag chab kyi bya ba bgyid par 'gyur bar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char gyis yongs su bltams pa'i rdzing dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/sna ma'i me tog gi shing dang /_shing ta la dang /_shing 
[\[197a.3\]]ljon pa'i phreng ba dag gis brgyan par gyur cig_/shing ljon pa de dag kyang me tog sna tshogs dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs dang /_gdugs sna tshogs dang /_mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dag gis brgyan par gyur 
[\[197a.4\]]cig_/de na sems can rnams gos dang rgyan ji lta bu 'tshal ba dag dpag bsam gyi shing de dag las blangs te gyon par gyur cig_/de bzhin du me tog rnams dang /_rgyan dag gi bar yang blangs te thogs par gyur cig_/bdag gi byang chub kyi shing ni rin po che sna bdun las grub 
[\[197a.5\]]par gyur la/_'phang du ni dpag tshad stong mchis/_sdong po'i sboms su dpag tshad gcig mchis/_yal ga gyes pa'i khyon du yang dpag tshad stong mchis par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi shing de bser mas bskyod pa las pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang 
[\[197a.6\]]po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra lha'i las shin tu 'das pa 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos par gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi dran pa so sor thob par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[197a.7\]]de na bud med rnams ni 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mo ltar yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig_/de na bud med rnams la dri nga ba ma mchis shing /_lce gnyis dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser snas dkris pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na mi rnams 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bud med dang lhan cig tu lus sbyor zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/de na skyes pa gang dag kun tu chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur na/_de mchis te kun chags pa'i sems kyis yud tsam zhig bud med la bltas pas skyes pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur 
[\[197b.2\]]nas shin tu yid byung ste/_slar log cing gtsang ma rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin des bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su grol nas slan chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye bar gyur cig_/de na bud med gang lags pa de dag kun tu chags pas 
[\[197b.3\]]skyes pa la brtags pa tsam gyis sbrum par 'gyur zhing /_brtags pa tsam gyis gnyi ga'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang lags pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_
[\[197b.4\]]rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong ba de lta bu'i lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang /_bu mo dag gdugs mtshan bdun du de lta bu'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur cig_/bud med sbrum ma de dag 
[\[197b.5\]]kyang 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na dge slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig_/sems can de dag kyang mngal gyi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang bas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /_dgung bdun pa la mchog tu dri bda' ba dang /_bde ba'i yo byad 
[\[197b.6\]]dam pa dang ldan bzhin du btsa' bar gyur cig_/bud med de yang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur zhing gnyis ka rdzing bur zhugs te khrus bgyis nas/_bud med des gang gis 'dod chags dang bral ba gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur 
[\[197b.7\]]cig_/ting nge 'dzin des 'dod chags kyi chos rnams las yongs su grol zhing rtag par rgyun du mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig_/gang gis tshe rabs snga ma dag la bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por bud med kyi lus nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gang lags pas kyang ting nge 'dzin de mngon par bsgrubs pas bud med kyi lus thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su bas par 'gyur zhing /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du slan chad bud med kyi lus thob par ma gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis gang 
[\[198a.2\]]gi slad du bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag tu mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa de dag gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa'i ming thos shing dad pa thob par gyur nas/_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas 
[\[198a.3\]]kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig_/der sems can de dag gi las de thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su bas par gyur cing /_sems can de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du slan chad mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig_/sems 
[\[198a.4\]]can gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag las yongs su bas nas mngal du gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bud med dam/_mngal na gnas par mngon pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/
[\[198a.5\]]sna ma'i me tog gi shing dang /_shing ta la dag bser mas bskyod par gyur pa na mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra skad nyams dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/sgra des mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes 
[\[198a.6\]]bgyi ba thob par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin des sems can de dag gis stong pa nyid snang ba'i chos zab mo dag rtogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra ma mchis par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi shing drung du mchis nas 
[\[198a.7\]]yud tsam gcig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zums pa ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mi mngon par gyur cig_/lha'i mig gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od dag bdag gis gtong bar gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 
[\[198b.2\]]gang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgras chos ston par gyur cig_/de na sems can gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur cig_/de dag gang dang gang du mchi ba dang /_'chab pa dang /_mchis pa dang /_ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[198b.3\]]de dag gis rtag par rgyun du bdag mthong bar gyur cig_/de dag chos rnams la ji ltar the tsom du gyur pa na/_de dag gis bdag la bltas pa tsam dang /_bdag mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gi the tsom ma mchis par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[198b.4\]]zhing dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_bla na med pa'i theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag mchis pa de dag gis bdag gi ming dang /_bsngags pa thos par gyur cig_/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas 
[\[198b.5\]]kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/de dag gis der bdag las chos thos nas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang lags pa de dag ni rnam par thar ba brgyad kyis bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur cig_/de na gang dag theg pa chen po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[198b.6\]]lags pa de dag gis ni bdag las chos thos nas ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_bzod pa zab mo dag thob par gyur cig_/de dag de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par yang gyur cig_/bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni dpag tu 
[\[198b.7\]]ma mchis par gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thogs par gyur cig_/bdag gis byang chub thob pa na gang dang gang du mchis shing sa phyogs gang dang gang du rkang mthil bzhag pa de dang der pad ma 'dab ma stong mchis la/_gser 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gyi mdog lta bur gda' ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/pad ma de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gzhan dag tu mchis nas bdag gi bsngags pa dang /_sgra dang /_dbyangs rjod par gyur cig_/sems can de dag gis bdag gi ming dang /_bsngags pa dang /_snyan pa 
[\[199a.2\]]thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skye bar gyur cig_/de dag rab tu dang ba skyes nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye 'tshal bar gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang der yongs su sngo bar gyur cig_/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi 
[\[199a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dge sbyong gi dri ma dang bral ba dang /_dge sbyong gi skyon dang /_dge sbyong gi gya gyu dang bral ba dang dge sbyong gi g.yo dang bral bar gyur cig_/'khor rnams kyang chos lhur len cing yo byad lhur len pa ma 
[\[199a.4\]]lags pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur len pa ma lags pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur cig_/bdag gi 'khor rnams brtson 'grus brtsams shing chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la 
[\[199a.5\]]bab par gyur cig_/de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir mi ldog par gyur pa de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa la zhugs pa'i dran pa thob par gyur cig_/de dag tshe 'phos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam rjod par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du 
[\[199a.6\]]de dag gis chos de dag mi brjed par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bskal pa chen po khri'i bar du gnas par gyur cig_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa stong du gnas par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[199a.7\]]pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su blangs pa ni legs so legs so/_/mi 'khrugs pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/_grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na shar 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]phyogs logs su 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i yon tan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[199b.2\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs 
[\[199b.3\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gang dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyis yongs su zin pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/kho na ma 
[\[199b.4\]]mchis pa'i sems dang /_rnyog pa ma mchis pa'i sems su gyur cig_/de dag 'di lta bu'i lus kyis bde ba myong bar gyur cig_/'di lta ste dper bgyi nas bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad ma la snyoms par zhugs shing des bsam pa la spong ba 
[\[199b.5\]]rnam par dag par gyur pa de lta bur sems can rnams kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad gser gyi kha dog lta bur gda' bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi 
[\[199b.6\]]bu des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can thams cad kyang ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[199b.7\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rab mchog sems mi 'khrugs pa longs/_/lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo mchog rab gnas/_/mi rnams mang po snying rje'i sems la bkod/_/blo gros dge khyod 'gro ba'i ston par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu de nas 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu pa gangs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rgyal bu gangs kyi nor bus kyang ji ltar mi 'khrugs pas smon lam btab pa de bzhin du smon lam btab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 
[\[200a.2\]]gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bgyid pa thob par gyur cig_/thams cad kyi sug par yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'byung bar gyur cig_/de dag thams cad kyis dri de yang 
[\[200a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku dag la yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smon lam rgya chen po btab pa ni legs so legs so/_/gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi lag tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po bzhag pa dang /_bsam 
[\[200a.4\]]pa thag pas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa skyed pas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod spos kyi glang po che zhes bya bar gyur cig_/spos kyi glang po che khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la 
[\[200a.5\]]bab pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_dam pa'i chos nub nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_spos kyi glang po che khyod 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[200a.6\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/spos kyi glang po ches yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[200a.7\]]'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du me tog tsam pa ka'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du me tog tsam pa ka'i char mngon par rab tu bab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' 
[\[200b.2\]]stsal pa/_shin tu dri zhim tshogs rab mchog sems longs/_/me tog tsam pa mchog gi char 'di babs/_/rab tu gya nom dge ba'i lam ston la/_/'gro ba mang po 'jigs med sgor 'khod cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu gcig pa 
[\[200b.3\]]seng ge zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/ji ltar spos kyi glang po ches smon lam btab pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la rin po che'i rgyal mtshan phul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa legs so 
[\[200b.4\]]legs so/_/khyod rin po che'i tog ces bya bar gyur cig_/rin po che'i tog khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon 
[\[200b.5\]]par dga' ba zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i dam pa'i chos nub nas bar gyi bskal pa gsum 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[200b.6\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa glang po rnam par bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs 
[\[200b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i tog gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/_
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/_slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa sems can thams cad 
[\[201a.2\]]kyis thob par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la phyag byas pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad snying rje'i sems la bkod 
[\[201a.3\]]par gyur pa de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros legs pa gzugs mchog brtan pa longs/_/sems can phyir ni dam bcas rab brtan byas/_/skye 
[\[201a.4\]]bo mang po rdul bral sems la bzhag_/mi mchog sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/de ltar snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_mnyan des la sogs pa rgyal bu lnga brgyas kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 
[\[201a.5\]]dag yongs su blangs pa de ltar smon lam btab cing /_de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[201a.6\]]pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang rgyal bu bzhi brgyas kyang rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis ji lta bu de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas 
[\[201a.7\]]de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang rgyal bu dgu bcus kyang kun tu bzang pos ji lta ba de lta bu'i smon lam btab cing de lta 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su blangs so/_/khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad kyis kyang so so nas smon lam khyad par can dag btab cing /_so so nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[201b.2\]]po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de bzhin du srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis kyis kyang so so nas smon lam 
[\[201b.3\]]btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de bzhin du khyod cag kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[201b.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i gcen gcung po brgyad cu po de dag gi thu bo bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang 
[\[201b.5\]]phyug khyab bdag ces bya ba zhig yod de/_rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyed kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su longs shig_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[201b.6\]]rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis smras pa/_yab je khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig_/rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa/_bu je khyod kyis smon lam thob shig dang kho bos phyis smon lam gdab par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_yab cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 
[\[201b.7\]]yongs su blang bar bgyi lags sam/_'on tam yongs su ma dag pa blang bar bgyi lags/_mdun na 'don gyi gtso bos smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can yongs su len par byed 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]cing sems can bsam pa nyon mongs pa can lta ba log par gyur pa dag 'dul ba yang yongs su len par byed pas khyod bdag rang gis shes par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag de de bzhin gshegs pa rin po 
[\[202a.2\]]che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skye dgu lo brgyad khri thub pa na byang chub dam pa la reg par gyur pa de lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[202a.3\]]byang chub btsal lags te/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar gyi sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /_zhe sdang chung ba dang /_gti mug chung ba dang /_skyo ba'i bsam pa can dang /_'khor ba la 'jigs pa dang /_skyon du lta ba de ltar gang du bdag mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[202a.4\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams kyang de lta bur gyur cig_/de dag kyang bdag las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_bdag kyang sems can rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[202a.5\]]bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs 
[\[202a.6\]]pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog ces bya ba la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye 
[\[202a.7\]]dgu'i lo brgyad khri thub pa na byang chub mngon par thob par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du kun dga'i ra ba 'di thams cad du mu tig dmar po'i char dag rab tu 'bab par gyur cig_/shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u rgya 
[\[202b.2\]]mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du mu tig dmar po'i char dag kyang rab tu bab/_shing ljon pa de thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil 
[\[202b.3\]]snyan gyi sgra dag byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_mthu mchog mi zad shes rab mdzod longs shig_/sems can snying brtse phan 'dod byams pa'i sems/_/khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa rdzogs 'gyur te/_/'jig rten sems can don 
[\[202b.4\]]mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bram ze'i bu gnyis pa yang dag 'byung zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis ji lta ba de bzhin du gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyang bskal pa ud pa la 
[\[202b.5\]]yang dag rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu'i lo brgyad khrir 'phel ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[202b.6\]]gsum pas kyang gsol pa dang /_lo nyis stong pa na skar ma'i dri zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sna ma'i me tog dang /_ri bo'i rgyal po dang /_spyan bsdams dang /_tshangs 
[\[202b.7\]]mchog dang /_'dzam bu'i grib ma dang /_gang ba dang /_bla ma dang /_rin chen ri bo dang /_rgya mtsho'i snying po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_gser thub dang /_thub dbang dang /_kauN+Di n+ya dang /_seng ge'i rtsal dang /_ye shes rgyal mtshan dang /_sangs 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rgyas sgrogs dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_rgyal ba dang /_phan bzhed dang /_shes rab snang dang /_dbang chen dang /_zhi ba dang /_shes rab 'byung gnas dang /_dga' ba dang /_n+ya gro d+ha rgyal po dang /_gser spyan dang /_phan bcas 
[\[203a.2\]]dang /_gnyi dga' dang /_rin chen gtsug tor can dang /_spyan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshangs pa dang /_mdzes pa dang /_tshangs pa khyu mchog dang /_sgra rab dang /_chos kyi zla ba dang /_don mthong dang /_snyan pa dang /_dga' can dang /_grags mchog dang /_gzugs bzang dang /_
[\[203a.3\]]dri zhim dang /_grims g.yar dang /_rab mchog spyan dang /_rab spong dang /_don bcas brtul zhugs dang /_thugs kyi re ba bzang dang /_shes rab mchog dang /_gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_spyan mdzes dang /_dag pa'i lha dang /_zas gtsang dang /_legs mthong lha 
[\[203a.4\]]dang /_'phags skyes rgyal mtshan dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_tshangs dbyangs dang /_dpal 'byung dang /_nga rgyal dpal dang /_rdul bral dang /_nor bu bzang dang /_'od zer can dang /_shAkya thub pa dang /_dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang /_bde 'byung dang /_thu bo dang /_
[\[203a.5\]]yang dag 'byung dang /_me tog dang /_yang dag me tog dang /_mi 'khrugs pa dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang /_klus byin dang /_rdo rje'i 'od dang /_grags pa'i rgyal po dang /_stag gi 'od zer dang /_spyod bcas dang /_ye shes 'byung dang /_spos kyi 
[\[203a.6\]]dbang phyug dang /_sA la'i dbang po dang /_sred med kyi bu'i snying po dang /_skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don kyi bu thams cad kyi tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'jigs pa'i gdung bral zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[203a.7\]]pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i khye'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag thams cad bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog gi yang skye ba gnyis pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan pa lags pas na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog pas par 'gyur ba na thams cad 
[\[203b.2\]]kyi tha mar byang chub mchog la reg par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur cig_/de dag gi 'dul ba ji snyed mchis par gyur pa dang /_ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum 
[\[203b.3\]]po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur ba bdag gcig pu'i yang de snyed du gyur cig_/ji ltar de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed mchis par 'gyur ba bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de 
[\[203b.4\]]dag byung ba'i bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog de la sems can gang dag gis mi'i lus thob par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa bas par 'gyur ba na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[203b.5\]]theg pa gsum po dag gi nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan 
[\[203b.6\]]du gsol/_rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jigs pa'i gdung bral la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la snying rje zhing phan par byed par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/_/
[\[203b.7\]]bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog de zad kar thams cad kyi tha mar khyod bla na med pa yang 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral yang dag 'phags mngon 'phags zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po 
[\[204a.2\]]de dag gi tshe bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod gcig pu'i yang bskal pa phyed du 'gyur te/_ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re 
[\[204a.3\]]ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du me tog sngon po'i char shin tu dri bda' ba dag 'bab par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[204a.4\]]can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams rab tu dang zhing mi 'thun pa ma mchis par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'jigs pa'i gdung bral 
[\[204a.5\]]gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du me tog sngon po'i char dag kyang rab tu bab/_sems can thams cad kyis kyang dri de tshor bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyi 
[\[204a.6\]]khams rnams kyang snyoms shing mi 'thun pa med par gnas par gyur/_de na sems can thams cad la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_snying rje'i brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs shig_/
[\[204a.7\]]'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing /_/nyon mongs g.yo mdud dam po gcod 'gyur te/_/dge ba dam pa shes rab mdzod du 'gyur//_//bam po brgyad pa/_rigs kyi bu bram ze'i de'i slob ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga'i ra ba'i sgo na 'dug 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pa de dag gis kyang sems can 'ongs pa rnams gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la smras pa/_kye bram ze'i khye'u dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[204b.2\]]chub tu sems bskyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang long shig_/smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa/_lam ji lta bu dang /_tshogs 
[\[204b.3\]]ji lta bu dang /_spyod pa ji lta bu dang /_rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang chub 'thob par 'gyur lags/_mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par bsgrub par bya 
[\[204b.4\]]ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa ste/_rigs kyi bu lam de ni de lta bu yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[204b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba tshogs nyams su len par byed pa/_chos kyi sgo sbyin pa'i tshogs yongs su gtong bar byed de/_des ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 
[\[204b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[204b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye 
[\[205a.2\]]bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[205a.3\]]rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni 'dul ba la mi skyo bar byed par 
[\[205a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[205a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i 
[\[205a.6\]]tshogs ni dge ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba sgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[205a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo'i bye brag 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la so sor rtog par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 
[\[205b.2\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang /_sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sdom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[205b.3\]]'joms par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying por byed pa drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su dag par 
[\[205b.4\]]byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/_bram ze'i khye'u tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su lon par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no/_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs ni longs spyod chen po dang /_g.yog 'khor mang por 
[\[205b.5\]]'gyur bar gsungs la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /_dad pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed par bstan to/_/mdun na 'don gyis smras pa dang /_
[\[205b.6\]]bram ze'i khye'u gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bram ze'i khye'u de yang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni dul ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/zhi gnas kyi 
[\[205b.7\]]sems kyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/_/rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/snying rje chen po'i sems kyis bsgom pa bsgom par bya'o/_/chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/_bram ze'i khye'u de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no/_/tshogs de lta bus byang chub thob par 'gyur te/_bram ze'i khye'u bsgom pa ni de lta bu yin/_dran pa ni de lta bu yin/_byang chub kyi lam 
[\[206a.2\]]gyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyis/_bram ze'i khye'u byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed cig_/bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam ni yang dag pa yin gyis bsam pa thag pa nas smon lam thob shig dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u bsam pa thag pas byang chub kyi 
[\[206a.3\]]lam ni dang ba yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u g.yo med pas rnam par dag pa ste/_nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal bas byang chub kyi lam ni drang ba yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang /_bde ba yin 
[\[206a.4\]]gyis smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa'am/_yongs su ma dag pa ji lta bu 'dod pa long shig_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas 
[\[206a.5\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_sems can 'dod chags chung ba rnams dang /_zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang /_gti 
[\[206a.6\]]mug chung ba rnams dang /_sems 'khrul pa ma mchis shing ma 'khrul pa rnams dang /_'khon pa'i sems ma mchis pa rnams dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems rnam par spangs pa rnams dang /_log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang /_yang 
[\[206a.7\]]dag pa'i lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang /_dge bar sems pa rnams dang /_dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang /_ngan song gsum gyi lam rnam par spong bar sems pa rnams dang /_mtho ris kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams dang /_bsod 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang /_theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems pa rnams kyi slad du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[206b.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom 
[\[206b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi mthus de'i lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo thal kar yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas/_des smras pa/_khyed cag [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam zhig thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la deng la yan lag 
[\[206b.4\]]brgyad dang ldan pa'i char shin tu dri zhim pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig_/de'i thigs pas sems can gang dag gi lus la phog gam/_gang dag gis dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi sgrib pa lnga spangs par gyur cig_/'di lta 
[\[206b.5\]]ste/_'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig_/gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tsom gyi sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig_/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu glang po che de dag steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar 
[\[206b.6\]]mgyogs par dong ste/_'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyang ba las skum pa'am/_bskum pa las rkyong ba de bzhin du de ltar mgyogs par dong nas/_glang po che'i gtso bo de dag gis ji skad sngar smras pa'i bya ba dag byas nas phyir log ste de'i mdun 
[\[206b.7\]]du 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shin tu yid dga' bar gyur pa dang /_de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]la bab pa na bskal pa sgra snang zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par bstsags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[207a.2\]]'das kyis bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas gtugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_rdul 
[\[207a.3\]]dang rnam bral sems can rnam dag longs/_/khyod kyis sems can bye mang lung bstan to/_/byang chub phyir ni rab dag lam sbyong zhing /_/rgyal mchog sems can rnams kyi 'dren par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bram ze'i khye'u stong dang /_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[207a.4\]]bye ba phrag gsum po gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstan te/_tha ma ni sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor 
[\[207a.5\]]can dang /_thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de dag thams cad las gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol pa/_bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[207a.6\]]snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur cig_/'dod chags bdo ba dang /_zhe sdang bdo ba dang /_gti mug bdo ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig_/bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa/_
[\[207a.7\]]kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang ji zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par bgyid lags/_mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par byang chub thob par byed cing /_sems can skyabs med pa rnams dang /_dpung gnyen med pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa dag gis gtses pa rnams dang /_lta bas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams kyi don byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 
[\[207b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god par byed cing sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim par byed do zhes grag ste/_gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang 
[\[207b.3\]]ldan par smon lam 'debs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po yin par snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_khyab 'jug rlung khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das 
[\[207b.4\]]nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_skyes bu dam pa khyod der 
[\[207b.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/khyab 'jug rlung gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 
[\[207b.6\]]gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa gnyis bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig_/
[\[207b.7\]]rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze khyab 'jug rlung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' khyab 'jug rlung gi spyi bor zhabs gnyis bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/_snying rje'i bsam pa shes 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]rab rnon po longs/_/byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod gyis la/_/brtan pa nyon mongs 'ching ba dam chod cig_/khyod ni phan pas snying brtse sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[208a.2\]]pa rin po che'i snying po la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[208a.3\]]dang /_gti mug gi sems cha mnyam pa rnams dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bsam pa la mi gnas pa'i skye dgu tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[208a.4\]]snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mi mjed ces bya bar 'gyur te/_ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya zhe na/_sems 
[\[208a.5\]]can de dag 'dod chags la mi mjed pa dang /_de dag zhe sdang la mi mjed pa dang /_gti mug la mi mjed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams la mi mjed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bskal pa chen po 
[\[208a.6\]]bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ci'i phyir bzang po zhes bya zhe na/_bskal pa chen po bzang po de la sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi nang du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa stong 'byung 
[\[208a.7\]]bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po byung zhing /_skye dgu lo bzhi khri thub pa na thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'jig ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing /_theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur te/_'khor ba'i chu bos bdas pa'i sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'god 
[\[208b.2\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma skyong gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u gnyis pa tam 
[\[208b.3\]]bu ru zhes bya ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten gyi skye dgu tshe lo sum khri thub pa na sangs rgyas su 'byung bar 
[\[208b.4\]]gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du
