[\[208b.5\]]bskal pa bzang po byung ba'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags 
[\[208b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/des bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_me tog dag gis bcom 
[\[208b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi sku la 'thor zhing thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_shin tu 'brel ba legs bsgrags rab snyan gsung ba po/_/ma 'khrul ma 'dres ma rnyogs dri ma mi mnga' ba/_/khyad 'phags shin tu sdom brtson 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]blo rab blo gros ldan/_/drang srong dam pa khyod mdzes thub gtso khyu mchog lags/_/yon tan brgyas bltam yon tan mang po stsol ba khyod/_/thub mchog bde ba mdzad pa mi yi dam pas btud/_/srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra'i sems can gzhan ma 
[\[209a.2\]]mchis/_/deng khyod sems can mang po byang chub lam lung bstan/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u kun gyis bsrungs zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'u bzhag ste/_rin thang 'bum gyi bsham pas bshams 
[\[209a.3\]]nas khri'u de la gser gyi lhung bzed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba dang /_gser gyi ril ba b+h+ring ga ra dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdong dag bzhag ste/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[209a.4\]]ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po de la tshe 'grib pa dang /_rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma 
[\[209a.5\]]byung ba dang /_sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bdo zhing /_nga rgyal dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser snas kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /_sems can log par lta ba dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[209a.6\]]sems kun nas langs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems yongs su nyams pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems rnam par spangs pa dang /_log pas 'tsho zhing mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[209a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_dam pa'i chos nub nas 'jig rten long bar gyur cing /_'dren pa ma mchis pa skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na bdag bla na med pa yang 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze kun gyis bsrungs la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rtsod pa'i dus kyi 
[\[209b.2\]]mtshan ma byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa'i bar dang /_'jig rten long bar gyur cing 'dren pa med pa'i nang du smon lam btab pa ni rtogs pa che zhing ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mkhas mdzod snying rje rten ces bya bar gyur cig_/mkhas mdzod snying 
[\[209b.3\]]rje rten khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 
[\[209b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas mdzod snying rje rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[209b.5\]]snying po la me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/mi mchog phan pa mdzad pa dga' bar bgyid pa skyed pa po/_/zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes pa shin tu snyan pa'i gsung mnga' ba/_/
[\[209b.6\]]gnas mkhyen mkhas pa phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu rab mchog ldan/_/ye shes bsam gtan rnam par mthar phyin bde gshegs khyod la 'dud/_/spyod pa mang po spyad pa zhal ni rnam rgyas pa/_/khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po/_/gzhal yas 
[\[209b.7\]]byang chub slad du lung yang bstan pa mdzad/_/mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rigs kyi bu/_de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med ces bya ba la yang dag par bskul to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po de la byang chub par 'tshal mod kyi rtsod pa'i dus de lta bu 'ba' zhig mi 'tshal te/_
[\[210a.2\]]ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgu tshe lo khri thub pa na sems can sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa'i bsam pa bas pa rnams dang /_nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ston 
[\[210a.3\]]par 'du shes par sems pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_legs par spyod pa gsum dang bral ba rnams dang /_nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la brtson pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[210a.4\]]pa'i mun pas sems rnam par dkrugs pa rnams dang /_theg pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba de'i dus su ni sus kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa bsgrub par rngo mi thogs lags na/_skye dgu tshe lo stong thub pa na lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_sems can de dag kyang tshe lo brgya 
[\[210a.5\]]pa'i bar du 'gyur te/_de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ming yang ma mchis na dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa rnams kyang ci 'tshal/_re zhig snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tshe 'bri zhing lo brgya par gyur nas/_mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma nye bar gnas 
[\[210a.6\]]par gyur pa de'i dus na bdag lha rnams kyi nang nas babs shing sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/mi dge ba spangs nas dge ba la spyod par gyur cig_/sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[210a.7\]]can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyis yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig_/theg pa gsum po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig_/snyigs ma lnga dag yongs su spong bar gyur cig_/skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bdag bla na med pa yang 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_ma rig pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna chung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston cing theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par sbyor 
[\[210b.2\]]bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[210b.3\]]gang gi tshe bdag de ltar lung bstan pa thob nas theg pa gang gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyis yang don du mi gnyer la/_rang sangs rgyas kyis yang don du mi gnyer lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal 
[\[210b.4\]]pa/_bram ze'i khye'u byang chub sems dpa' le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/_le lo'i dngos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni yun ring por 'khor bar 'dod de/_lta ba'i g.yang sa dang /_'khor ba'i btson rar 
[\[210b.5\]]sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' la la cho ga dman pa dang /_grogs dman pa dang /_yongs su gtong ba dman pa dang /_
[\[210b.6\]]smon lam dman pa yin te/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dman pa yin zhe na/_'di la lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 
[\[210b.7\]]rgyu ba dang /_thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing kun la yang yongs su mi gtong la lha dang mi'i dpal dang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang yongs su mi len cing 'dul ba la rtog pa'i 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]smon lam yang yongs su mi len pa yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' le lo can ni yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 
[\[211a.2\]]thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa bsdams shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[211a.3\]]theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang /_thams cad yongs su gtong zhing kun la yang yongs su gtong la sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje'i sems bskyed cing sbyin par byed pa 
[\[211a.4\]]dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[211a.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar rton par byed pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang /_sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang /_tshangs 
[\[211a.6\]]pa'i gnas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhis ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /_chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /_
[\[211a.7\]]bsgom pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /_sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos pos ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go/_/byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i gter bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas dad pa mi zad 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba dang /_sems can dbul po yongs su gzung ba mi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag go/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su 
[\[211b.2\]]dag pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can med pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_srog med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i phyir shes rab yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir 
[\[211b.3\]]rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa ste/_byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing nam mkha'i 
[\[211b.4\]]'khor lo yang skor bar byed/_mi rtag pa'i 'khor lo dang /_mi mnyam pa'i 'khor lo dang /_brjod du med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang /_nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang /_bskor du med pa'i 'khor lo yang skor bar byed do/_/
[\[211b.5\]]bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das te/_bskal pa bzang po la bab nas ring po ma lon zhing snyigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na skye dgu tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[211b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs 
[\[211b.7\]]la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dag gis mchod pa byed pa la brtson zhing tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_mgon po khyod ni 'phral ba'i dbyes che mdzod spu 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gangs mdog mdzes/_khyod ni gser gyi ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra zhing yid du mchi/_/yon tan brgyas bltams bdag dus 'di gsungs 'gro na'ang bdag 'tshang rgya/_/thub pa khyu mchog 'jig rten sgron khyod la ni su mi 'dud/_/bram ze mdun na 'don rgya 
[\[212a.2\]]mtsho'i rdul gyis/_bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong po thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/_ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_byams pa lung bstan pa de bzhin du/_bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa seng ge dang /_
[\[212a.3\]]mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na 
[\[212a.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/_/de dag thams cad kyi nu bo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang yin pa de la yang mdun na 'don gyis 'di skad du kye bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang ring du brtag tu ci yod/_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed cig ces 
[\[212a.5\]]yang dag par bskul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang mngon par go bar byas so/_/sems can gang dag rga dang nad dang 'chi 'pho'i 'jigs pa sred pa'i klung du lhung ba dang /_/phung po rnams la zhen pa'i mi dag srid pa'i btson ra rab tu 'jigs par chud pa rnams/_/
[\[212a.6\]]phan tshun gsod par byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni sdug bsngal rgya mtshor rab tu gnas/_/gti mug gis ni lam stor long ba bzhin du mi gtsang 'khrul 'khor dag na 'khyam par 'gyur/_/log par lta la gnas pas 'byung po thams cad srid pa gsum 
[\[212a.7\]]na sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'bar/_/srog chags thams cad 'gro ba lnga po dag na ji ltar 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du 'khor/_/'gro ba lnga po dag na chos kyi mig nyams skyabs med sems can rnams ni dran gyis la/_/yang dag shes rab kyis ni nem nur yid 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]gnyis spongs la byang chub don du 'dun pa skyed/_/'gro ba rnams kyi sred pa'i mya ngan sol la sems can rnams kyi gnyen du gyur par gyis/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching ba dgral bar bya phyir byang chub don du sems kyang gzhol gyis shig_/gti mug bral ba chos 
[\[212b.2\]]mig rnam par nyams pa rnams la lam gyi dam pa sbyin par gyis/_/'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra dag na 'bar ba rnams la chos kyi bcud kyis tshim gyis shig_/phan par byed pa khyod ni myur du nye bar song la thub pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa gyis/_/re ba thams 
[\[212b.3\]]cad grub smon bkra shis ldan pa rab brtan 'dren pas sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos/_/'jig rten dag na sems can rnams kyi dbugs 'byin gyis la srid pa'i mtsho las sems can thon/_/gya nom thar pa'i lam dang dbang po'i stobs dang byang chub yan lag sbyin byed 
[\[212b.4\]]'gyur bar gyis/_/chos sprin chos kyi char pa rab tu phob ste sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar gyis/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang des kyang smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni 'khor ba las mngon par dga' ba'i dpal mi 'tshal 
[\[212b.5\]]la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang mi 'tshal te/_bla na med pa'i theg pa 'tshal ba lags kyis/_kye mkhan po yud tsam zhig gzhes la bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa la gson cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de nas phyir byung ste/_
[\[212b.6\]]rang gi bsnyen bkur ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga po dag la bos te smras pa/_kye khye'u dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de dag gis kyang smras pa/_bdag cag la gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi 
[\[212b.7\]]ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma mchis lags na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsrungs pa bdag cag gis ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/_rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bsnyen bkur ba dang po lo thang spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi kha 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dog gi rgyan dag byin/_bsnyen bkur ba gnyis pa thang la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rna cha byin/_bsnyen bkur ba gsum pa chu la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi khri byin/_bsnyen bkur ba bzhi pa shugs kyis spyod ces bya ba de la ni 
[\[213a.2\]]rin po che sna bdun gyi khar ba byin/_bsnyen bkur ba lnga pa snying po spyod ces bya ba de la ni gser gyi ri la b+h+ring ga ra byin nas smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed cag deng la dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[213a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de nas bsnyen bkur ba lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ste de ltar bkur ba'i dngos po de dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag bskal 
[\[213a.4\]]pa bzang po de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_rigs kyi bu snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[213a.5\]]snying pos bram ze'i khye'u lo thang spyod ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa brtan dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/thang la spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bde dbang blo gros zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/chu la spyod ni de'i 
[\[213a.6\]]'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa don bcas gsung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/shugs kyis spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u snying po spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen 
[\[213a.7\]]gtsug phud ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag bskal pa bzang por lung bstan ma thag tu mdun na 'don gyis yang bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la smras pa/_stobs chen shugs 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gi yon tan bkod pa dag long shig_/smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig_/sems can thams cad kyang chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer cig_/brtson 'grus brtan pos rang gi byang chub kyi spyad pa yang spyod la/_yang 
[\[213b.2\]]dang yang du ring du ma rtog shig ces lag pa nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang 
[\[213b.3\]]po de la thub pa nyi ma mang nyung ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bskal pa bzang po de la ni thub pa nyi ma stong rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i khye'us gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[213b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bskal pa chen po bzang po de la rgyal ba nyi ma gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi tha mar bram ze'i khye'u gces lag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes 
[\[213b.5\]]gnyen gtsug phud ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de srid du yun ring por bdag gis brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_thos pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_bsod nams 
[\[213b.6\]]dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs sna tshogs dag yang dag par bsdu zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bskal pa bzang po pa de dag thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par dang por bsod snyoms kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su mya ngan 
[\[213b.7\]]las 'das pa rnams kyi sku gdung dag la yang mchod par bgyi'o/_/de dag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par yang gyur cig_/sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang 'dzud cing 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems can lta ba dang bral zhing nyam nga ba thob par gyur pa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bsam pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag 
[\[214a.2\]]pa'i bsam pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/de bzhin du cho ga dang bral ba rnams ni cho ga la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang nges par ston par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dam 
[\[214a.3\]]pa'i chos nub nas ring po ma lon par bdag gis 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos 'byung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bgyid par gyur cig_/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i 
[\[214a.4\]]dus kyi tshe na sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems can rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_lam ngan pa dag nas bton cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'god par gyur cig_/nyes 
[\[214a.5\]]par spyod pa'i mun pa 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig_/legs par spyod pa'i snang ba ston par gyur cig_/'jig rten na dus kyi snyigs ma dang /_tshe dang /_lta ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i bar dag 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig_/mu ge'i bskal pa bar 
[\[214a.6\]]ma'i dus kyi tshe na bdag sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar gyur cig_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud par gyur cig_/bdag sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la sbyor bar bgyid 
[\[214a.7\]]pa na thams cad du mu ge'i mun pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_g.yul shom pa dang /_khon dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa'i me'i gdung ba dag zhi bar gyur cig_/nad kyi 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na bdag gis sems can rnams snying por 'gyur ba dang /_'thun pa'i chos drug yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi 
[\[214b.2\]]nad kyi mun par rnam par 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i bar du gyur cig_/bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du de ltar sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs 
[\[214b.3\]]su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi 'byung ba dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur pa na de'i 'og tu gdod bdag bla na 
[\[214b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi po dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam par bdag gis byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du ring bar gyur cig_/de dag 
[\[214b.5\]]gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par bdag gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig_/bskal pa bzang po de la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gis sems can ji snyed btul bar gyur pa'i sems can de snyed cig bdag gis kyang btul bar gyur 
[\[214b.6\]]cig_/sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi bslab pa la 'khrul bar gyur pa dang /_lta ba'i g.yang sar lhung bar gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma gus pa'i sems dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems su 
[\[214b.7\]]gyur pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la 'khrul pa'i sems su gyur pa dang /_'dod chags kyi sems dag dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byin 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]cing mi 'jigs pa'i khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyur cig_/ji srid du bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po yang bas par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi dam pa'i 
[\[215a.2\]]chos bas par gyur pa na bskal pa bzang po yang bas par gyur cig_/bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing mtshan re re yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs 
[\[215a.3\]]par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur te gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sku re res 
[\[215a.4\]]kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na bar gyi bskal pa zhig par ma gyur pa der de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215a.5\]]pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing slad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis shing rin 
[\[215a.6\]]po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /_gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang bral zhing nad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang tsan dan sa mchog pa dang /_
[\[215a.7\]]sbrul gyi snying po dang /_dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gi spos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig_/spos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang /_lta ba'i nad rnams dang /_lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gyur cig_/de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing mtho ris la gzhol bar yang gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 
[\[215b.2\]]gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/
[\[215b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems can rnams kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[215b.4\]]gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dag bslus par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang ma gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das srog chags bye 
[\[215b.5\]]ba phrag mang po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa/_de dag kyang bdag gis thugs byung bar bgyis par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang 
[\[215b.6\]]dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor ba na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_dge ba'i sgra dang /_dge ba'i chos bgyid pa'i sgra dag rna lam du grag par ma gyur cig_/gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bur yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing 
[\[215b.7\]]sems can rnams kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag rtag tu mnar med par rtogs par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]legs so legs so/_/khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sman du 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar byed par yang 'gyur te/_skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med ces bya bar gyur cig_/sman gyi rgyal po skar 
[\[216a.2\]]ma dri ma med pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[216a.3\]]nas ring por ma lon par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag bzhin du bsod snyoms 'bul bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud bzang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[216a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa 
[\[216a.5\]]bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed du 'gyur ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur la/_sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ji srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par 
[\[216a.6\]]ma gyur pa de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur la/_de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang /_lta ba'i nad rnams dang /_lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab 
[\[216a.7\]]tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur la/_sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris la gzhol bar byed par yang 'gyur ro//_//bam po dgu pa/_rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis bdag gi spyi bo la byug par gsol/_
[\[216b.2\]]rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa'i spyi bo la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub 
[\[216b.3\]]sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bram ze rgya 
[\[216b.4\]]mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis smon lam bzang po btab ste/_da phyin chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya mi dgos kyi ji ltar bde ba nyid du spyod cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i 
[\[216b.5\]]rdul 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di na snang ba ltar bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/sems can chen po 'di dag thams 
[\[216b.6\]]cad kyis ni smon lam rgya che ba dgu btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba sha stag yongs su blangs te/_khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod pa'i dus yongs su spangs pas bdag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na/_
[\[216b.7\]]sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer bar bya zhing brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/_bdag gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang /_lha dang /_dri za 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang /_de 
[\[217a.2\]]bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[217a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa yang mdzad la pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang yang phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[217a.4\]]dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nad dag gis bdas par gyur pa'i 
[\[217a.5\]]sems can rnams la yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang mdzad par 'gyur la sems can rnams la yang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[217a.6\]]pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa rjod cing snyan pa dang dbyangs kyang sgrogs 
[\[217a.7\]]par 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang rjod par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]par 'gyur zhing /_de dag kyang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_de nas de dag kyang smon lam de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar da ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag 
[\[217b.2\]]tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_chu bo bzhis bdas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur 
[\[217b.3\]]ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par bskyed nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de bzhin 
[\[217b.4\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ngo /_/yang de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gsil dkrol zhing /_me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig 'thun 
[\[217b.5\]]par smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon lam rab mchog dag shod la zung shig dang /_khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar 
[\[217b.6\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas tshig 'thun par smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo mchog mnga' ba smon lam brtan por 
[\[217b.7\]]thob shig dang /_bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo/_/gang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdun na 'don gyis pus mo'i lha nga btsugs pa dang de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]ji tsam pa de thams cad g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg go/_/sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol lo/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 
[\[218a.2\]]'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so/_/shing ljon pa dag las kyang me tog dag 'brul lo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs par gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung po 
[\[218a.3\]]byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_khon med pa'i sems dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems 
[\[218a.4\]]dang /_ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to/_/sems can gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'khod nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_
[\[218a.5\]]rol mo'i sgra dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gos dang /_ras bcos bu dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to/_/de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lha gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang /_bram ze'i smon lam mnyan 
[\[218a.6\]]pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/_nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing /_lha'i spos dang /_ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to/_/bram zes kyang thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[218a.7\]]dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin/_/gzugs kyis 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste/_/rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing /_/rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin/_/zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]seng ge 'dra/_/mi 'gul brtan pa lhun po 'dra ba ste/_/rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing /_/yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod/_/dri ma thams cad ded pa chu bzhin te/_/thub pa me ltar nyon mongs nags rnams sreg_/rlung ltar gang la'ang chags 
[\[218b.2\]]pa mi mnga' zhing /_/thub pa lha ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston/_/klu ltar thub pa chos kyi char 'bebs shing /_/char ba bzhin du 'gro kun ngoms par mdzad/_/pha rol mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra/_/me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong /_/tshangs pa 
[\[218b.3\]]bzhin du snyan pa'i tshig gsung zhing /_/'gro ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin/_/sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te/_/'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin mdza' bshes 'dra/_/nga rgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin te/_/thub pa mtshon bzhin srid 
[\[218b.4\]]pa'i 'khri shing gcod/_/zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing /_/klu ltar thub pa mi shes rtswa rnams bsreg_/thub pa zla ltar 'od bsil gtong mdzad cing /_/mi yi pad ma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin/_/'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra/_/thub 
[\[218b.5\]]pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor/_/rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba ste/_/'gro ba dag la sems snyoms rtswa shing bzhin/_/rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing /_/'jig rten rjes su 'thun 'jug chu dang 'dra/_/thub pa mtshan mchog mnga' ba thugs 
[\[218b.6\]]rje can/_/khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan/_/sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul/_/byang chub mchog rab tu ni bdag lung ston/_/drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog_/bdag ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'thab rtsod che/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218b.7\]]byang chub lung ston dogs chod la/_/sems can brgya dag zhi bde'i lam du 'khod/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_de na 'dug 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]pa'i de'i mod la lha dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/mdun na 'don gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[219a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal te/_de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang /_gdul sla ba dag yongs su 
[\[219a.3\]]bzung lags so/_/gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te/_skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa 
[\[219a.4\]]gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid lags mod kyi/_'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang /_rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_
[\[219a.5\]]dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang /_log par lta ba rnams dang /_'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /_phar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /_mar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /_
[\[219a.6\]]bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /_bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba rnams dang /_legs par spyod pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[219a.7\]]lha dang /_mi rnams kyi dpal dang /_'byor pa dag la brtson pa rnams nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams dang /_mkhas 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang /_srid pa'i btson rar chud pa rnams dang /_rgyun phyogs su 'das pa rnams dang /_'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang /_'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang /_gti mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i 
[\[219b.2\]]bgyi ba thams cad ma btang ba rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang /_lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /_nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs 
[\[219b.3\]]lags te/_de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na mi'i tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa 'di dag gis spangs shing bor bas de'i tshe srid pa'i dpa' glong dang /_'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor na skyob pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[219b.4\]]skyabs ma mchis pa dang /_dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag spangs nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung zhing shin tu dul ba dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun 
[\[219b.5\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma lags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_bram ze de bzhin te/_sems can bsam 
[\[219b.6\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam 'debs par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang yongs su bzung ba rnams ngas kyang de nyid du lung bstan to/_/bram zes gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dper na shing kang ku sha'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 
[\[219b.7\]]'dar zhing bdag gi yid ni shin tu skyo la bdag gi lus thams cad ni sha thang bar gyur cing mchis na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phangs te/_thams cad kyis yongs su 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas su 'gyur ba lta na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i 
[\[220a.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa na sdod cing bdag yun ring po de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar gyur cig_/bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun ring pos smin par bgyi 
[\[220a.3\]]'tshal ba'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa la spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na 'dul ba rnams yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dngos po'i mtshan ma yongs su btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/
[\[220a.4\]]zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bgyi ste/_ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan dag na slongs mo pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag mchis par 'gyur na yang de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar 
[\[220a.5\]]gyur cig_/'di lta ste/_zas dang /_skom dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gnas dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_na ba'i gsos sman gyi sbyin pa dang /_
[\[220a.6\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_'gron bu dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rdul chen dang /_sa le sbram 
[\[220a.7\]]gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang du yongs su gtong ba na bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la stsal nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i don dang /_'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/gal te yang gtang bar dka' ba slong ba'i sems can dag mchis nas 'di lta ste/_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal srid dang /_mchis brang dang /_bu dang /_
[\[220b.2\]]bu mo dang /_lag pa yongs su btang ba dang /_rkang pa yongs su btang ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_lce dang /_pags pa dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_lus dang /_srog dang /_mgo yongs su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dag slong bar 
[\[220b.3\]]bgyid na yang mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig_/bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyad par bgyi ste/_gang sngon chad nam 
[\[220b.4\]]yang sems can gang gis kyang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar ma gyur pa dang /_slan chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa gang yang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[220b.5\]]de lta bu yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/gang dag tshe rabs gzhan na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[220b.6\]]par gyur cig_/bdag gis slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig_/nyon mongs pa'i g.yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa de ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[220b.7\]]lags te/_de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs sna tshogs kyi dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang /_bdag 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/_bdag de lta bu'i bzod pa sgom par gyur cig_/ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar sgom pa la brtson 
[\[221a.2\]]zhing bla na med pa'i spyod pa las slar mi ldog pa gang lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/'du byed thams cad la phyin ci log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/rang bzhin 
[\[221a.3\]]gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/_gang dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis spyod pa la/_ji ltar sngan cad byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[221a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad cing /_slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad 
[\[221a.5\]]du spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig_/slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon 
[\[221a.6\]]tan la 'god par gyur cig_/bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par gyur cig_/bla na med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[221a.7\]]bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig_/tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang /_brtson 'grus la blang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_shes rab la 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig_/sems can 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang /_log 
[\[221b.2\]]par lta ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs shing nyam nga ba thob pa rnams dang /_lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par 
[\[221b.3\]]gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bzhag pa'i slad du bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la spro bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /_yi 
[\[221b.4\]]dgas rnams dang /_gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang /_mi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la yang spro bar gyur cig_/ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon 'jog pa ltar sems can thams cad la yang de bzhin du gyur cig_/
[\[221b.5\]]chad pa stong pa lta bu dang /_sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig_/bdag gis srid pa tha ma pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba gcig gis thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas na dus la sdod cing 
[\[221b.6\]]mchis pa ma gtogs par bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du yang lha'i bde ba skye ba dag don du mi gnyer bar bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas bdag sangs rgyas 
[\[221b.7\]]re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag bgyid par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[222a.2\]]stsol par gyur cig_/'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na yang bdag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor bar gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa dag la yang sbyor bar gyur 
[\[222a.3\]]cig_/bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis dge ba rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can sred med kyi bu dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_tshangs pa'i bar dag la dad pa 
[\[222a.4\]]rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du nam mkha' lding rnams la yang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang /_brgya byin gyi bar la yang brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis dge ba'i spyod pa dag la yang sbyor bar gyur 
[\[222a.5\]]cig_/sems can ltogs pa rnams la yang rang gi sha dang /_khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur cig_/sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la yang rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun 
[\[222a.6\]]ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po che'i shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad du gtum pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi 
[\[222a.7\]]sdug bsngal dag nod par gyur cig_/bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste/_bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/_gang gi tshe bram ze'i 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]khye'u skar ma skyong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[222b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /_mi dge 
[\[222b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams dang /_nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stongs par bor ba rnams dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spongs pa rnams dang /_lam ngan pa'i bar gyis bcom pa rnams dang /_nyam nga 
[\[222b.4\]]ba thob pa gang dag dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du stsol pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 
[\[222b.5\]]dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du stsol la 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de yang bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig_/
[\[222b.6\]]shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'bul bar yang gyur cig_/de'i tshe na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[222b.7\]]tu lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/sa non par yang gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin du stsol 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]cing slob tu stsol bar yang gyur cig_/de dag kyang ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang 'dzin par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la bab ste/_rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de'i tshe bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 
[\[223a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag pa zhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig_/de'i tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[223a.3\]]sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lags pa'i drung du mchi bar gyur cig_/mchis nas kyang mchod pa sna tshogs bgyid par gyur cig_/zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang gyur cig_/rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig_/tshul khrims 
[\[223a.4\]]dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyur cig_/chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig_/de'i tshe na sems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang /_lta ba'i lam du 
[\[223a.5\]]zhugs pa rnams dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /_nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang chos ston par gyur cig_/bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig_/
[\[223a.6\]]rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe na bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur gyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyur cig_/dus de la bab pa na lha'i 
[\[223a.7\]]'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi tshe lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du gyur pa na bde ba dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rigs dang gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing ser 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]sna can du gyur te/_snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud pa'i sems can 'dod chags bdo ba/_zhe sdang bdo ba/_gti mug bdo ba/_nga rgyal bdo ba/_sdig pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna bdo ba/_chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa/_chos ma lags 
[\[223b.2\]]pa'i longs spyod tshol ba/_log par lta ba/_phyin ci log tu mthong ba/_'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa/_bsod nams ma lags pa 
[\[223b.3\]]bgyid pa/_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi blta ba/_bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mi brtson pa/_theg pa gsum don du mi gnyer ba/_legs par spyod pa gsum la mi brtson pa/_nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa/_dge ba 
[\[223b.4\]]bcu'i las kyi lam la mi brtson pa/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa/_phyin ci log bzhis nyams pa/_rgud pa bzhi la gnas pa/_bdud bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa/_chu bo bzhis ded pa/_sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung bar 
[\[223b.5\]]'gyur lags so/_/dbang po drug gi dregs pas myos pa/_log pa brgyad la zhugs pa/_'dod pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa/_bag la nyal kun nas slong ba/_lha dang mi'i dpal dang /_'byor pa don du mi gnyer ba phyin ci log gi lta ba can/_lam ngan pas bcom 
[\[223b.6\]]pa/_mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/_dam pa'i chos spong ba/_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/_khwa ltar mu cor smra ba/_byas pa mi gzo ba/_dran pa nyams pa/_dge ba la smod pa/_shes rab 'chal pa/_thos 
[\[223b.7\]]pa nyung ba/_tshul khrims 'chal pa/_tshul 'chos pa/_ser sna can/_phan tshun mi snyan pa brjod pa/_gcig la gcig mi gus pa/_le lo can/_dbang po ma tshang ba/_nyam chung ba/_gos ma mchis pa/_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa/_bsam pa dang dran 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa'i snying po nyams pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa/_nyon mongs par gyur pa/_mdog ngan pa mi sdug pa/_ngo tsha ma mchis pa/_khrel ma mchis pa/_gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa/_gang dag snga dro gcig la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa 
[\[224a.2\]]mang du spyod pa de dag la stod cing ther zug tu lta ba'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'chums pa'i sems dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang /_gnod sems kyi sems dang /_khon 
[\[224a.3\]]du 'dzin pa'i sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems dang /_rnyog pa'i sems dang /_rtsub pa'i sems dang /_'khrugs pa'i sems dang /_ma dul ba'i sems dang /_gnod pa'i sems dang /_rgod pa'i sems dang /_chos ma lags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems 
[\[224a.4\]]dang /_khyad par la mi gnas pa'i sems dang /_phan tshun nongs pa rtsom pa'i sems dang /_'dzings pa'i sems dang /_gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang /_chos yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /_mi brtson pa'i sems dang /_chos rnams la nongs par brtson 
[\[224a.5\]]pa'i sems dang /_mi dge ba skyed pa'i sems dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mi 'tshol ba'i sems dang /_sbyin gnas ma lags pa'i sems dang /_kun tu sbyor ba dang /_'ching ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang /_nad dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba la yid 
[\[224a.6\]]rton pa'i sems dang /_kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas pa'i sems dang /_sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgyel bar bgyi ba'i sems dang /_lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i sems dang /_phan tshun mi snyan pa 
[\[224a.7\]]brjod pa'i sems dang /_gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang /_phan tshun 'tshe ba la dbang bgyid pa'i sems dang /_zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang /_gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /_'dod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang /_thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing 'jungs pa'i sems dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba'i sems dang /_gzhan gyi chung ma la brnab pa'i sems dang /_gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i sems dang /_smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang de'i tshe na 'byung 
[\[224b.2\]]bar 'gyur lags so/_/der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sgra dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dang /_nad kyi sgra dang /_rga ba'i sgra dang /_'chi ba'i sgra dang /_gsod pa'i sgra dang /_mi khom pa'i sgra 
[\[224b.3\]]dang /_rtag tu dgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang /_khung sgo dang /_khong sgril dang /_'ching ba dang /_btson ra'i sgra dang /_chad pa'i sgra dang /_gnod pa'i sgra dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_spyo ba'i sgra dang /_khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang /_tshogs 'byed pa'i sgra dang /_chom rkun gyi sgra dang /_
[\[224b.4\]]pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang /_mu ge'i sgra dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i sgra dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i sgra dang /_ltas ngan gyi sgra dang /_phra ma'i sgra dang /_tshig rtsub po'i sgra dang /_tshig kyal pa'i sgra dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna'i sgra dang /_kun tu 'dzin pa dang yongs su 'dzin 
[\[224b.5\]]pa'i sgra dang /_ngar 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /_sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i sgra dang /_'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i sgra dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang /_nyo tshong gi sgra dang /_gcig gis gcig 'khol zhing 'tshe ba'i sgra dang /_mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang /_dri 
[\[224b.6\]]nga ba'i sgra dang /_grang ba'i sgra dang /_tsha ba'i sgra dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa'i sgra dang /_ngal ba dang chad pa tshol ba'i sgra dang /_zhing las kyi sgra dang /_bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag ste/_sems can de dag gcig 
[\[224b.7\]]la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so/_/de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa/_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag gis kun tu bltam par 'gyur te/_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[225a.2\]]pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'grogs la/_mun khrod nas mun khrod du mchi ba'i sems can de dag ni de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/sems can de dag gi las kyi rkyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[225a.3\]]mi mjed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te/_sa gzhi ba tshwa can du 'gyur/_sa gzhi gor ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_rdul dang /_ri rad rod can du 'gyur/_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sbrul dang /_gcan 
[\[225a.4\]]gzan khro bo dang /_bya gdug pa dag gis kun tu bltam par 'gyur/_dus ma lags par rdul gyis 'khrigs pa'i bser ma ldang bar 'gyur/_dus ma lags par ro ma mchis pa dang /_lan tshwa dang 'dres pa dang /_mi bsil ba'i char ba 'bab par 'gyur zhing /_de ltar sa 
[\[225a.5\]]la lo thog dang /_sman dang /_rtswa dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_nor rnams dang /_sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang /_rnyog pa can dang /_rud rud 
[\[225a.6\]]po dang /_rtsub pa dang /_dug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/_sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang slar zhing rgya cher rtsub pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_khro ba dang /_gtum pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_'jungs pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang /_'jigs pa'i 
[\[225a.7\]]sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /_gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang /_khrag 'tshal ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa 'tshal ba dang /_mtshon cha thogs pa dang /_srog chags 'gums pa la brtson pa dang /_byad gzugs dang /_rigs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]dang /_rgyud dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bstan bcos dang /_yi ge dang /_rta rtsal dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_mtshon cha thogs pa dang /_'khor dang /_srer sna dang /_dregs ngas par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon 
[\[225b.2\]]par brtson par gyur pa de'i tshe na/_bdag 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/_dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyud khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i rigs su btsun mo dam pa'i 
[\[225b.3\]]khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig_/de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang /_'og tu ni gser gyi 
[\[225b.4\]]'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par gyur cig_/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha dang mi rnams su 
[\[225b.5\]]skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong zhing reg pa dang /_kun tu 'tshal bar gyur cig_/'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal zhing tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba de'i sems skyed par yang gyur cig_/dang 
[\[225b.6\]]por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di yang skyed par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston cing sems mnyam par bzhag nas zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur 
[\[225b.7\]]cig_/bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems de dag gis/_bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyil mo krung 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig_/zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_steng du 
[\[226a.2\]]ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang /_'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid par gyur cig_/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang mi rnams su skyes 
[\[226a.3\]]par gyur pa de dag kyang rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur cig/_//bam po bcu pa/_bdag ma'i mchan khung g.yas pa nas mngon par 'byung ba'i tshe yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur cig_/de'i 
[\[226a.4\]]tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad kyi sems can rnams la yang yang dag par skul bar gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon 'debs par gyur cig_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed 
[\[226a.5\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu skyed par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag gi rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa gzhi gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag rnam pa drug tu 
[\[226a.6\]]g.yos pa dang /_rab tu 'gul ba dang /_'khrug par gyur cig_/de'i tshe na bdag gis gang dag skye gnas bzhir gtogs shing 'gro ba lnga la rten pa'i sems can chu la rten pa rnams dang /_sa la rten pa rnams dang /_nam mkha' la rten pa de dag thams cad rab tu sad par 
[\[226a.7\]]bgyid par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu ma skyes pa rnams kyang skyed par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu brtan par gyur pa rnams ni theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig_/bdag btsas ma thag tu de'i mod 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de'i tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_bdud rnams dang /_brgya byin rnams dang /_zla ba rnams dang /_nyi ma rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_rdzus te skyes pa rnams dang /_
[\[226b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchis par gyur cig_/bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur cig_/bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bstsags 
[\[226b.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gang lags pa de theg pa gsum po dag gis rab tu dang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par gyur cig_/'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i sems can srid pa tha ma par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bdag gis 'dul bar gyur 
[\[226b.4\]]cig_/de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis rnam par snang byed me tog gi bzod pa thob par gyur cig_/de nas gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting 
[\[226b.5\]]nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid par 'tshal ba na de na klu'i rgyal po chen po khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag bdag la khrus bgyid par gyur cig_/
[\[226b.6\]]sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khru bar mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis theg pa gsum po dag gis ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag mngon par rtogs par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba mthong bar gyur pa dang /_rgya 
[\[226b.7\]]cher bgyid na sems can gang dag gis bdag gzhon nu rtse ba dag dang /_bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas dang /_skad sna tshogs ston pa dag dang /_bslab tu rung ba dang /_bud med rnams kyi gnas su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed mos yid 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]byung nas dgung phyed na mngon par byung ste/_rgyan dang lhab lhub spangs nas yang dang yang du gos dmar po dang /_chos gos ngur smrig yongs su tshol ba dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung du nye bar bgrod pa'i slad du mchi ba mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang bdag 
[\[227a.2\]]gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/_ci nas kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can de dag 'dun pa drag cing brtson par gyur pa de ltar chos ston par gyur cig_/de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bar gyur pa'i sems can de 
[\[227a.3\]]dag thams cad kyis rnam par snang byed me tog gi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig_/gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las 
[\[227a.4\]]yang dag par 'das par gyur cig_/bdag nyid kyis stan bting ba bsdus te byang chub kyi shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste/_mchis nas bdag dbugs 'byung ba dang /_dbugs rngub pa nye bar zhi ba de lta bu'i mkha' khyab 
[\[227a.5\]]kyi bsam gtan sgom par gyur cig_/bdag gdugs la lan cig bsam gtan las ldang bar gyur cig_/langs nas kyang zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed cig 'tshal bar gyur cig_/phyed ni slongs mo pa la stsol bar gyur cig_/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 
[\[227a.6\]]gtogs pa'i 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag thams cad kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba de srid du yun ring por bdag de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod 
[\[227a.7\]]par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de na gang dag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa bar sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag gi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig_/ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang lags pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ba'i srid pa tha mar gyur cig_/de bzhin du klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyang bdag 
[\[227b.2\]]la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du gyur cig_/gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/gling bzhi pa de na gzhan mu stegs can brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ngan pa'i dka' ba 
[\[227b.3\]]spyad pa spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la yang mi ma lags pa dag gis khyed cag dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/_ji ltar phyogs 'di na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang /_snying la yid la byed pa 'dogs shing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ngag 
[\[227b.4\]]gi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_de'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /_dbugs rngub pa dag rab tu zhi ba dang /_nyin gcig bzhin du lan re bsam gtan las langs nas/_zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed za zhing de ltar bsam gtan sgom pa'i dka' ba spyad pa de ni mthu che ba yin/_de ni 'bras 
[\[227b.5\]]bu che ba yin te/_de ni rgya che ba yin te/_de ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yid mi ches na deng la nyid kyis ltos shig ces bsgo bar gyur cig_/de dag gis kyang dka' ba spyod pa de 
[\[227b.6\]]btang ste bdag dka' ba spyod pa mthong nas gang dag gis sems kyi rgyud la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/mi'i rgyal po rnams dang /_bkrabs pa rnams dang /_grong mi rnams dang /_ljongs kyi mi 
[\[227b.7\]]rnams dang /_khyim na gnas pa rnams dang /_rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_grong khyim dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/bud med gang bdag blta ba'i 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]slad du mchi bar 'gyur ba de yang de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par 'gyur zhing /_gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya gang dag gis bdag dka' ba spyod cing mchis pa mthong bar gyur pa de 
[\[228a.2\]]dag kyang de dag gi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par gyur cig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa bar sa bon btab par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur zhing /_gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag 
[\[228a.3\]]gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/tshul de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas phra mo dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/ji srid du sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i 
[\[228a.4\]]dbang du 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dag gis sems kyi rgyud la thar pa'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag skyil mo krung gcig gis de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/ji ltar sngon chad sems 
[\[228a.5\]]can du bgrang ba gzhan mu stegs can dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa sus kyang sngon de lta bu'i dka' ba ma spyad la/_slan chad kyang sems can du bgrang ba dang /_gzhan mu stegs can su yang 
[\[228a.6\]]ji ltar bdag spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par rngo mi thogs pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyod pa bdag spyod par gyur cig_/bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa de'i tshe skyes bu'i rtsal bgyid cing bdud dpung gi tshogs dang bcas 
[\[228a.7\]]pa pham par bgyid par gyur cig_/las kyi 'bras bu'i lhag ma dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/ci nas kyang bdag sems can gcig gi 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]sems kyi rgyud la dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa la yang chos ston par 'gyur zhing /_sems kyi rgyud la yang dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par gyur cig_/sems can gcig gi 
[\[228b.2\]]don gyi slad du yang bdag cho 'phrul 'bum phrag du ma ston par 'gyur zhing de'i sems kyi rgyud la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'jog par gyur cig_/chos kyi don dang /_tshig 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyang rjod par gyur cig_/ji ltar rngo thogs pa'i 'bras bu la yang 'jog par gyur cig_/
[\[228b.3\]]sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri bo dag ye shes kyi rdo rjes 'joms par gyur cig_/theg pa rnam gsum rnam par dgod pas chos ston par gyur cig_/sems can gcig gi don du chos ston cing mi 'jigs pa'i go 'phang la rab tu dgod pa'i 
[\[228b.4\]]slad du yang bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar gyur cig_/bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing nyam chung ba dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_sems rnam par 'khrul pa dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_spyi brtol can gyi 
[\[228b.5\]]sems dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems dang /_nyon mongs pa mang pos dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_bud med kyang bdag gis bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[228b.6\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag mchis par gyur cig_/skye bo mang po dag gis bdag gi bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig_/lha rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyang 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang 
[\[228b.7\]]ldan pa la gnas pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis bdag la mtshon cha'am/_zhugs sam/_mdung ngam/_
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'debs su mchi ba dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_brlang po dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang /_dug dang 'dres pa'i bza' ba 
[\[229a.2\]]dang /_btung ba dag stobs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas pa la gnas nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can dag sngon gyi 'khon gyis 'gum pa'i yo 
[\[229a.3\]]byad kyi sbyor bas bdag la tshig rtsub po dang /_mtshon cha sna tshogs dang /_dug dang 'dres pa'i btung ba dag stsol bar 'gyur zhing /_khrag kyang 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la bdag gis tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[229a.4\]]bsgoms pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rnga sgra bsgrags pas de dag gi sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par 'gyur zhing dge ba la sbyor bar yang gyur cig_/de ltar sems can dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa 'chags par 'gyur zhing slan chad kyang sdom pa len par gyur cig_/
[\[229a.5\]]sems can de dag gi mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_zag pa zad pa la sgrib pa'i chos su yang ma gyur cig_/der bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang yongs su bas pa dang /_mthar thug pa dang /_byang bar gyur cig_/btsun pa 
[\[229a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob nas kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du bdag gi spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dag sprul zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku de 
[\[229a.7\]]dag kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu 'gyed par gyur cig_/stong pa ma lags pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gis kyang gdugs
