[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gcig la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang /_mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa'i bar dag dang /_de na sems can gang dag 
[\[229b.2\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag bslab pa dag la 'dren mar bgyid pa rnams dang /_zhig ral tu spyod pa rnams dang /_ltung ba'i 
[\[229b.3\]]rtsa ba byung ba rnams dang /_sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa rnams dang /_'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par zhugs pa rnams dang /_lam ngan pas rnam par bcom zhing nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i sems can bye ba khrag 
[\[229b.4\]]khrig phrag 'bum dag la chos ston par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i sems can de dag la yang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du de bdag gi bsngags pa rjod par yang gyur cig_/
[\[229b.5\]]der sems can rnams smon lam 'debs pa la brtson par yang gyur cig_/sems can de dag gis bdag gi bsngags pa thos nas/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal zhing smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 
[\[229b.6\]]sems can de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe mdun du ma mchis sam/_chos ma bstan tam/_sems rab tu dang bar ma bgyis na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gal te sems can de dag gum nas ngan 
[\[229b.7\]]'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag gi chos thams cad nyams par gyur cing /_bdag slar yang snang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par yang rngo mi thogs 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]par gyur cig_/gal te sems can gang dag sred med kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang /_sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gror ltung ba'i bar du gyur na/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par rngo mi thogs par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob nas kyang 
[\[230a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_lam ngan pas bcom zhing nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'i sems can dag gum nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag lags te/_sems can de dag gi kha 
[\[230a.3\]]dog sa rdul lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_sha za'i gdong 'dra ba dang /_bskyud ngas pa dang /_dri mi bda' ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa dang /_sems can de dag gi yo byad rnams kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/_sems can de 
[\[230a.4\]]dag gi don du bdag de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi gling bzhi pa ji snyed mchis par gyur pa'i gling bzhi pa thams cad du yongs su dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'bab cing ma'i mngal du skye ba ston par gyur cig_/rgya cher bgyi na gzhon nu rtse ba dang /_bzo dang las kyi gnas dang /_dka' 
[\[230a.5\]]ba spyod pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang gling bzhi pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag nye bar ston par yang gyur cig_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_sku gdung 'god pa'i bar dag nye bar ston par 
[\[230a.6\]]yang gyur cig_/bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig brjod pas chos ston par 'gyur zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyi sde snod kyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[230a.7\]]gang lags pa de dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]gang lags pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ris kyi bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[230b.2\]]rnyog pa'i sems dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/srog gcod pa rnams kyis ni snying rje bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/phrag dog dang /_ser snas zil gyis non pa rnams 
[\[230b.3\]]kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/gzugs dang gzugs ma mchis pa'i dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni btang snyoms brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi dregs pas 
[\[230b.4\]]myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni yang dag par ma lags pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/theg pa chen po pa'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa brjod pas chos bstan 
[\[230b.5\]]par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pas chos ston par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/thos pa nyung ba rnams kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis shing thos pa 'dzin pa chud mi za ba brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/lta ba 
[\[230b.6\]]ngan pa nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/smon pa ma mchis pa'i yongs su dag pa nyams pa 
[\[230b.7\]]rnams kyis ni smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/rnam par 'dres par spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni byang chub kyi sems 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mi brjed pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/zad pa'i sbyor ba drod nyams pa rnams kyis ni bcos ma ma lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rten pa ma mchis pa brjod 
[\[231a.2\]]pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang /_dge ba mi bskyud pa rnams kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang /_bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pa 
[\[231a.3\]]dang /_don dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni mngon par 'phags pa brjod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis ni bral ba brjod pa dang /_lam mi mnyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par ldog par brjod pa 
[\[231a.4\]]dang /_theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang /_'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa dang /_dge ba dang /_sa dang /_ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ni ma rmongs pa brjod pa dang /_
[\[231a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa dang /_gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni 'od zer thogs pa med pa brjod pa dang /_las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa 
[\[231a.6\]]dang /_'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa rnams kyis ni seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_bdud bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang /_
[\[231a.7\]]rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ri bo'i phung po brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang /_shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /_/gti mug 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gi mun par mchis pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang /_zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang /_bdag la dbu rdos pa lta bur mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sred med kyi bu brjod pa dang /_blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[231b.2\]]kyis ni snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /_spyi gtsug pa ltar gda' ba rnams kyis ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang /_sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni snying po can brjod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po mngon 
[\[231b.3\]]par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang /_chos thams cad la smon pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang /_sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni spyod pa dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags par 'tshal ba rnams 
[\[231b.4\]]kyis ni shes rab sgron ma brjod pa dang /_phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa dang /_chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni mig mi 
[\[231b.5\]]'dzums pa brjod pa dang /_dmigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bskor bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang /_rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[231b.6\]]rnams kyis ni rig pa la brten pa'i rjes su 'thun pa brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu ther zug tu blta ba rnams kyis ni legs par bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /_tshig 
[\[231b.7\]]dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thogs pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang /_shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba 
[\[232a.2\]]ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni ci yang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzogs pa 
[\[232a.3\]]rnams kyis ni shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshol ba rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang /_shes pa ma bsgoms shing 
[\[232a.4\]]rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems pa rnams kyis ni sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod 
[\[232a.5\]]pa dang /_phan tshun legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis ni rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis ni bsod nams che ba brjod pa dang /_chos kyi sgo'i char rab tu 'bab pas chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi sprin 
[\[232a.6\]]brjod pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen bkod pa brjod pa dang /_shes pa nyams pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni dpe ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba can thams cad kyis ni nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa dang /_
[\[232a.7\]]chos thams cad gzhan ma lags par sems pa rnams kyis ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]pa rnams kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang /_mdo sde thams cad la rnam par nges pa rnams kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod 
[\[232b.2\]]pa dang /_rnying par 'gyur ba dang /_'thun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[232b.3\]]pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par mi brtson pa rnams kyis ni ye shes thob par brjod pa dang /_nye du la yang dag par rton pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjes 
[\[232b.4\]]su song ba brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni mi choms pa brjod pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis ni 
[\[232b.5\]]mi zad pa brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang /_mnyan pa dang lta ba don ma mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyun 
[\[232b.6\]]'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mtha' ma mchis pa 
[\[232b.7\]]dang /_thug pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa/_sgyu ma mchis pa/_drang ba drang ba'i rang bzhin can te/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dag 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig gis brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po'i yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go 
[\[233a.2\]]cha chen po 'tshal bar gyur cig_/smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur cig_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig_/'di lta ste/_lus mtshan dang dpe byad rnams 
[\[233a.3\]]kyis brgyan par gyur cig_/ngag legs par smras pas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du thos pas brgyan pa dang /_gzungs bskyud pa ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pas 
[\[233a.4\]]brgyan pa dang /_'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du yid kyis brgyan cing mya ngan las 'das pas brgyan pa dang /_dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i slad du bsam pas brgyan pa dang /_dam bcas pa nyams su lon pa'i slad du sbyor bas brgyan pa dang /_sa nas sar 'phar ba'i slad du 
[\[233a.5\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyan pa dang /_dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du sbyin pas brgyan pa dang /_legs par thos pa khong du chud pa dri ma ma mchis pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis pa'i slad 
[\[233a.6\]]du bzod pas brgyan pa dang /_tshogs thams cad nye bar bstsags pa'i slad du brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du/_bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags 
[\[233a.7\]]yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yang dag par skyob pa'i rjes su mchis pa'i slad du byams pas brgyan pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du snying rjes brgyan pa dang /_chos thams cad la the 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]tsom ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i slad du dga' bas brgyan pa dang /_mthon dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang /_longs spyod mi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i 
[\[233b.2\]]slad du bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyis chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du 
[\[233b.3\]]snang bas brgyan par gyur cig_/don dang /_chos dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan par gyur cig_/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas brgyan 
[\[233b.4\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rjes su thob pa'i slad du yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i slad du chos kyis brgyan par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang 
[\[233b.5\]]bar gyur pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du 'od kyis brgyan pa dang /_phyad par lung ston pa'i slad du kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su ston pa stsol ba'i slad du rjes su 
[\[233b.6\]]ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa 
[\[233b.7\]]dang /_gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes thob pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing thams cad kyis mi choms pa'i slad du dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig_/theg pa chen po 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag la yang bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang dag par bstsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur cig_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[234a.2\]]dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig_/chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang gyur cig_/btsun 
[\[234a.3\]]pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang 
[\[234a.4\]]sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig_/sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/_rtsub pa/_sdig pa 'tshal ba/_khra khro dang /_rmu rgod kyi rgyud can/_blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la 
[\[234a.5\]]yang bdag gi sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig_/sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig_/de na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen por gyur pa de dag la yang bdag gis 
[\[234a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig_/yang de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[234a.7\]]pa par gyur pa'am/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la 'god par 'gyur zhing /_slad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig_/rnam par 'tshe ba la dga' ba 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rnams ni srog gcod pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig_/'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig_/chos ma lags pa la 'dod pas chags pa rnams ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig_/
[\[234b.2\]]phan tshun [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smra ba rnams ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyur cig_/myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag nongs pa lnga po thams cad 
[\[234b.3\]]bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni nongs pa lnga po spong zhing dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni bdag gis nyin zhag gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god 
[\[234b.4\]]par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar sbyar bar bgyi zhing /_rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god 
[\[234b.5\]]par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba de dag ni bdag gis dge ba'i chos rnams la nye bar bsgrubs nas tshangs par sbyor ba thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_kun 
[\[234b.6\]]nas 'dzin pa'i rgyud can gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gi cho 'phrul rnams kyis chos ston par gyur cig_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag 
[\[234b.7\]]ma mchis pa dang /_stong par ston par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang /_dge ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_shis pa dang /_'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/de ltar bdag 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag la chos ston par gyur cig_/gang dag rtsod pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag la bdag gis chos kyis brtsad pa'i bstan bcos rab tu ston par gyur cig_/gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag 
[\[235a.2\]]la bdag gis zhal ta bgyid pa'i las ston par gyur cig_/kha ton la mngon par dga' ba rnams la ni stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi cha gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i lam ston par gyur cig_/sems can re re'i don gyi slad du yang bdag dpag tshad 'bum phrag mang po 
[\[235a.3\]]dag tu sug pas mchi bar 'gyur zhing /_don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_thabs dang /_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gis skyo ba ma mchis shing spro bar bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar la 'god par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bdag 
[\[235a.4\]]gi tshe'i 'du byed ji tsam pa'i lnga cha 'dor bar gyur cig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe na rang gi sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing /_sems can rnams la snying rje'i slad du bdag ni slad kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur 
[\[235a.5\]]cig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur cig_/yang lo lnga brgyar ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams las rin po che rnams 
[\[235a.6\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa bgyid par spro ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang /_phyag gcig tsam dang /_bskor ba gcig tsam dang /_thal mo sbyor ba gcig tsam dang /_me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod pa bgyid 
[\[235a.7\]]par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ram/_ci skad bstan pa 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam/_tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag kun chub par bgyid dam/_klog gam/_gzhan dag la yang ston par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gis thos nas sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[235b.2\]]tha na dam pa'i chos smra ba la me tog gcig tsam dang /_phyag gcig tsam gyis mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig_/ji tsam na dam pa'i chos nub ste/_chos kyi sgron ma ni gum/_
[\[235b.3\]]chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni 'gyel bar gyur pa na bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i dogs la lhags par 'gyur zhing /_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na rin po ches phongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/_de dag nor bu bai dUr+ya tog 
[\[235b.4\]]gi blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur te zhugs ltar gda' zhing kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/de yang de nas mngon par 'phags te/_gong du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur zhing /_me tog man dA 
[\[235b.5\]]ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_pa ri ya tra ka dang /_man dzu sha ka dang /_man dzu sha ka chen po dang /_mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_ma na par+Na dang /_zla ba dri med dang /_'dab brgya pa dang /_'dab stong pa dang /_kun tu 'od dang /_kun tu dri dang /_shin tu 
[\[235b.6\]]mdzes pa dang /_rtag tu 'bras bu rgyas dang /_snying dang mig mngon par dga' ba dang /_skar 'od dang /_skar mdog dang /_kha dog mtha' yas dang /_dri mtha' yas dang /_me tog de lta bu dag gi me tog gi char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig_/me tog gi 
[\[235b.7\]]char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i sgra dang /_'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dang /_rab tu byung ba'i bslab 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa'i gzhi bcu'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i sgra dang /_tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang /_zhal ta bgyid pa'i sgra dang /_klog pa'i sgra dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog gi sgra dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[236a.2\]]yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang /_mi sdug pa'i sgra dang /_dbugs rgyu ba dang /_rngub pa'i sgra dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sgra dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[236a.3\]]mched kyi sgra dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang /_zad par gyi skye mched kyi sgra dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra dang /_nyan thos kyi 
[\[236a.4\]]sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis thos par gyur nas/_
[\[236a.5\]]rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /_sems can chen po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas/_de dag de nas babs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor 
[\[236a.6\]]zhing rab tu 'god par gyur cig_/de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang thos par 'gyur zhing /_de dag kyang sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo dang /_yid bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rgyun chad 
[\[236a.7\]]par gyur cig_/de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /_de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'god par gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang nam mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing /_'di lta ste/_dngul dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rdul 
[\[236b.2\]]can dang /_sa le sbram dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_g.yas su 'khyil pa dang /_de lta bu'i rin po che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad na thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_
[\[236b.3\]]'gyed pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_tshig rtsub cing brlang ba dang /_dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang /_nad ma mchis pa dang /_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]rtsod pa dang /_'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang /_lo legs pa dag kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang /_reg pa dang /_longs spyod pa dang /_yongs su spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum 
[\[236b.5\]]po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig_/sku gdung de dag kyang slar gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/_//bam po bcu gcig pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang 
[\[236b.6\]]de dag nor bu rin po che an da rnyil dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing /_de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/_'di lta ste/_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_pa ri ya tra ka dang /_me tog 'od mtha' yas kyi 
[\[236b.7\]]bar gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig_/me tog gi char de dag las kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]gyur cig_/yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin du gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar 
[\[237a.2\]]thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig_/ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung 
[\[237a.3\]]rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 
[\[237a.4\]]byung gi bar du yang /_bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig_/bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa 
[\[237a.5\]]spyod pa na gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang /_bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi 
[\[237a.6\]]tshe bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig_/bdag byang chub 
[\[237a.7\]]thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang /_gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang slad kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur pa na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla 
[\[237b.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_bskal pa bzang po de la bab pa na/_rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya 
[\[237b.3\]]ba zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa/_mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa mtshams med pa byed pa/_log par 
[\[237b.4\]]lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na/_des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na de'i phyir bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing /_rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[237b.5\]]skor la/_'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no/_/zhes bdag gi bsngags pa rjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang rjod par gyur cig_/gang dag byang chub don du 
[\[237b.6\]]gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gi bsngags pa dang /_grags pa dang /_snyan pa thos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs 
[\[237b.7\]]na de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces yongs su zhu bar gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di yang ston par gyur cig_/byang chub don du gnyer 
[\[238a.2\]]ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyur cig_/de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyur zhing /_de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang /_
[\[238a.3\]]nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_mi dge ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang 
[\[238a.4\]]chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang /_nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa 
[\[238a.5\]]ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes 
[\[238a.6\]]bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdzad de/_de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[238a.7\]]pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas/_nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par byas so 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig_/de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar lha dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[238b.2\]]mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[238b.3\]]thab mo dang /_snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten ldongs shing 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang /_lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /_sngar smos pa 
[\[238b.4\]]lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thogs pa lta na byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 
[\[238b.5\]]zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so/_/yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/_nyan thos kyi theg pa yang mi 'tshal/_lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 
[\[238b.6\]]'tshal/_lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/_'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi 'tshal/_lhar skye ba yang mi 'tshal/_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' lding du skye ba yang mi 'tshal 
[\[238b.7\]]la dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar yang mi bgyid de/_gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/_thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/_bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes kyang gsungs la/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239a.2\]]gang bdag gis kyang sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_thos pa las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/_gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_
[\[239a.3\]]de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i 
[\[239a.4\]]rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi 'thob pa thob par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig_/sems 
[\[239a.5\]]can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na yang de'i slad du bdag gum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing /_bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang mi stsol ba dag 'byung bar gyur 
[\[239a.6\]]cig_/bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang /_sdug 
[\[239a.7\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur cig_/bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las yang dag par [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par 'gyur ba rnams dang /_sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po 
[\[239b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'am/_kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba 
[\[239b.3\]]de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig_/sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[239b.4\]]ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i 
[\[239b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang /_'phangs pa dang /_myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du tsha ba dang /_ngu 'bod chen 
[\[239b.6\]]po dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_thig nag dang /_yang sos kyi bar dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/
[\[239b.7\]]de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du grul bum dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang /_long ba dang /_lce ma mchis pa dang /_lag pa ma mchis pa dang /_rkang pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[240a.2\]]dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig_/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[240a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur blta na/_'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[240a.4\]]dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig_/ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[240a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dpang du gyur cig_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 
[\[240a.6\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dpang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thogs 
[\[240a.7\]]shing bdag bskal pa bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi 
[\[240b.2\]]ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang /_sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /_smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so legs so/_/
[\[240b.3\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang 
[\[240b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems can rnams kyi sman dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so/_/sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su 
[\[240b.5\]]rdzogs par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig_/rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/_e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po/_/khyod 
[\[240b.6\]]ni bde la mi gnas te/_/khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan/_/khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin/_/de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags/_/dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul/_/dbang po 
[\[240b.7\]]'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de/_/gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du 'gyur/_/de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/_sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams/_/dge ba'i don du kun nas 'dus pa dag_/mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi/_/
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang /_/mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog_/phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis/_/de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os/_/byang chub sems 
[\[241a.2\]]dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/_snying rje chen pos sems can la/_/de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin/_/khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang /_/mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji 
[\[241a.3\]]ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/_/de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas/_/khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la/_/byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/_/sems can la brtse gzhan 
[\[241a.4\]]med de/_/gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog_/khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan/_/spos kyi seng ges smras pa/_khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni/_/bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe/_/sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing /_/khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[241a.5\]]kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing /_/log sgyus shin tu nyam nga ba/_/sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i/_/sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/_ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing /_/nyon mongs 'dam du bying gyur la/_/
[\[241a.6\]]mtshams med pa dag byed pa po/_/sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/spos kyi glang pos smras pa/_khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba/_/ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i/_/sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/rin 
[\[241a.7\]]po che tog gis smras pa/_ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang /_/snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/_/'phags la skur pa 'debs byed pa/_/sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa/_/khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba/_/chang pa stong 'drar gnas gyur pa/_/sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/lag na ud pa las smras pa/_khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang /_/brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom/_/skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa/_/
[\[241b.2\]]sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/_/ye shes grags pas smras pa/_nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang /_/nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag_/ye shes chu yis zhi byas te/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom/_/gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa/_/ji ltar khyod ni nyi 
[\[241b.3\]]ma bzhin/_/nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste/_/nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la med/_/ud pa la zla bas kyang smras pa/_ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos/_/srid pa'i 'ching bas rab bsdams 
[\[241b.4\]]pa/_/khams gsum po dag grol bar byed/_/dri med dbang pos smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi/_/snying rje chen po dag bstan pa/_/snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba po/_/khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/_
[\[241b.5\]]nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tshe/_/byang chub gang dag khyod la rten/_/khyod kyis nyon mongs rtsad nas bcad/_/smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/skar ma skyong gis kyang smras pa/_ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba/_/dri med smon lam btab pa yis/_/byang 
[\[241b.6\]]chub spyod phyir sems can gyi/_/sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/_kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams/_/nyon mongs nad 
[\[241b.7\]]rnams rnam par bcom/_/khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can/_/sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad/_/rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]mo sbyar te don dang /_tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[242a.2\]]btsugs pa dang /_de nas de'i mod la sa cher g.yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis yang g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_
[\[242a.3\]]ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg cing /_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[242a.4\]]dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu yang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me 
[\[242a.5\]]tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas sangs 
[\[242a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing /_me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus so/_/yang de'i tshe 
[\[242a.7\]]na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bstsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bstsags pa de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston 
[\[242b.2\]]to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang /_zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[242b.3\]]zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag nub 
[\[242b.4\]]phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs 
[\[242b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang /_gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla 
[\[242b.6\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na 
[\[242b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa bshad pa dang /_srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su 'dul 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang /_mtshams med pa byed cing mi 
[\[243a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_
[\[243a.3\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang 
[\[243a.4\]]rjod par byed do/_/sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/_/gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[243a.5\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 
[\[243a.6\]]dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges pa bstan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[243a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang /_'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i 
[\[243b.2\]]dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung ste/_mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing /_sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[243b.3\]]po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni da 
[\[243b.4\]]gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 
[\[243b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[243b.6\]]pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'dri ba mdzad de/_me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di yang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[243b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgras gang bar gyur te/_des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/_skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[244a.2\]]zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang /_yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 
[\[244a.3\]]grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/_de la kha cig smon 
[\[244a.4\]]lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[244a.5\]]gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/_rgyu gsum 
[\[244a.6\]]po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smros shig_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[244a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng la/_der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin 
[\[244b.2\]]gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che'i tog dang /_zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs te byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur 
[\[244b.3\]]phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bstsags pa nas 'phags nas/_'di lta ste dper na glog bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bstsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te 
[\[244b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems 
[\[244b.5\]]dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags brjod pa mthong ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[244b.6\]]sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa blta snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[244b.7\]]drung du phyir phyogs te/_bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang spring 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs 
[\[245a.2\]]te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang /_bram ze la me tog bskur ba dang /_yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag 
[\[245a.3\]]khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ba gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis bsgyings pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang 
[\[245a.4\]]phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/_/'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog 
[\[245a.5\]]ces bya/_cig shos ni seng ge rdo rje'i tog ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos 
[\[245a.6\]]shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[245a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg 
[\[245b.2\]]pa gsum gyis chos ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis 
[\[245b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs 
[\[245b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[245b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/_cig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/_de gnyis kyis de bzhin 
[\[245b.6\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/yang de'i tshe na 'og gi 
[\[245b.7\]]phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/_cig shos ni rnam par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar 
[\[246a.2\]]sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[246a.3\]]pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la 
[\[246a.4\]]gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrug pa zhes bya/_cig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog 
[\[246a.5\]]rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 
[\[246a.6\]]'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[246a.7\]]zhing gzhes la/_byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang /_gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[246b.2\]]rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang /_ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[246b.3\]]rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/_gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang /_mtshams med pa byed 
[\[246b.4\]]cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_
[\[246b.5\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags 
[\[246b.6\]]pa yang rjod par byed do/_/sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/_/gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur 
[\[246b.7\]]pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa chen po dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos shing 'gul ba dang /_me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par 
[\[247a.2\]]bstan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod 
[\[247a.3\]]pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems 
[\[247a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang /_gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis 
[\[247a.5\]]snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing /_sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems 
[\[247a.6\]]can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[247a.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der dong la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/_me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya 
[\[247b.3\]]ba yang byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing /_snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no/_/skyes bu 
[\[247b.4\]]dam pa de'i phyir na khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/_
[\[247b.5\]]skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang /_grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 
[\[247b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na 
[\[247b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur te de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su bzung ba dag dang /_'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur to/_/gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad 
[\[248a.2\]]kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas 
[\[248a.3\]]khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa rjod par 'gyur te/_rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smros shig_/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[248a.4\]]cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing /_me tog 
[\[248a.5\]]zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus 
[\[248a.6\]]la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang 
[\[248a.7\]]dag par 'khrugs pa dang /_gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo /_/yang 
[\[248b.2\]]de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang /_lha rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar 
[\[248b.3\]]yongs su gang bar gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_til gyi zhing ngam/_'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/_de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bu 
[\[248b.4\]]rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[248b.5\]]rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di 
[\[248b.6\]]snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[248b.7\]]dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/_bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bskur zhing skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/_yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu 
[\[249a.2\]]'bab pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/_'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_snang ba'i sgra dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /_stobs kyi sgra dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i 
[\[249a.3\]]sgra dang /_mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang /_skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /_'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /_zhi ba'i sgra dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /_byams pa chen po'i sgra dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgra dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi 
[\[249a.4\]]sgra dang /_dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang /_theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi sgra ste/_me tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i sgra de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che 
[\[249a.5\]]ba/_chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/_gang dag 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_smon lam gyi dbang dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[249a.6\]]stobs kyis/_de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong 
[\[249a.7\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]mchod pa byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te gsol pa/_
[\[249b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/_rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/_ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan 
[\[249b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang /_shing ljon pa rnams dang /_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo /_/sems can gang dag chos mnyan 
[\[249b.4\]]pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/_kha cig ni dkar po/_kha cig ni btsod kha/_kha cig ni dmar po/_kha cig ni nag po/_kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/_kha cig gi ni lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu
