[\[249b.5\]]snang /_kha cig ni me lta bur/_kha cig ni nam mkha' lta bur/_kha cig ni smig rgyu lta bur/_kha cig ni chu lta bur/_kha cig ni ri lta bur/_kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/_kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/_kha cig ni me tog lta bur/_kha cig ni nam mkha' lding lta bur/_kha 
[\[249b.6\]]cig ni seng ge lta bur/_kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/_kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/_kha cig ni skar ma lta bur/_kha cig ni bya rgod lta bu dang /_kha cig ni wa lta bu dag tu kun tu snang ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid 
[\[249b.7\]]la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kun tu snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che sna bdun gyis pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dag sa dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa'am/_
[\[250a.2\]]'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang de ltar mthong ste/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/_thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo/_/
[\[250a.3\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la 
[\[250a.4\]]phan pa byed pa dang /_'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te legs so legs so/_/bram ze 'di lta ste dper na me tog gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_reg pa sna tshogs dang /_'dab ma 
[\[250a.5\]]sna tshogs dang /_sdong bu sna tshogs dang /_rtsa ba sna tshogs dang /_sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do/_/de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/_kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/_kha cig gis ni dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang 
[\[250a.6\]]nge lhan ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te/_de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed la/_de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/_'on 
[\[250a.7\]]pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur/_yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis gtses par gyur pa de dag gis dri bsnams na ni nad thams cad las 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_smyos pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_sems rmugs pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams 
[\[250b.2\]]cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/_me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad ma dkar po mkhrang ba sra ba rdo rje las grub pa 'jam pa sdong bu ni bai dUr+ya/_'dab ma ni gser/_ze 'bru ni rdo'i snying po/_ze ba ni mu tig dmar po/_'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong /_rgyar ni dpag 
[\[250b.3\]]tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/_pad ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la/_bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas 
[\[250b.4\]]kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag na sems can gyi khams gang dag lus mi 'thun pa dang /_nad kyis nyen pa dang /_yan lag nyams pa dang /_myos pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_smyos pa dang /_gnyid log pa dang /_dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang /_sems 
[\[250b.5\]]rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig 
[\[250b.6\]]pa de dag gi ro la pad ma dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis phog gam/_dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing yang phyis langs te mdza' bshes dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/_'dod 
[\[250b.7\]]pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/_de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun ring por gnas par 'gyur 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ba dang /_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/_bram ze me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag kha 
[\[251a.2\]]phye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas lhang nge lhan ne/_shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/_kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs 
[\[251a.3\]]pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no/_/ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha phye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ner gyur nas/_nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste/_thugs rje'i 
[\[251a.4\]]'od zer dag gis/_sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang /_khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[251a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/_kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung /_kha cig gis ni yongs su 
[\[251a.6\]]ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa 
[\[251a.7\]]dag pa/_gdul sla ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/_de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no/_/de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]'jug pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su tshol ba ma yin te/_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[251b.2\]]de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no/_/gang dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ye shes dang /_bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no/_/gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[251b.3\]]sangs rgyas spangs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/_bud med rnam par spangs pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[251b.4\]]bar gyur cig_/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston par gyur cig_/bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/_yun ring 
[\[251b.5\]]du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang /_gdul sla ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang /_bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa 
[\[251b.6\]]yang ma yin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/_kha dog du ma/_kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o/_/'od 
[\[251b.7\]]zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/_de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa/_mi sdug pa/_mi dge ba'i 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/_khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams 
[\[252a.2\]]kyi khru gang dang /_mthe bo tsam gyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang /_sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[252a.3\]]'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /_mi de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag 
[\[252a.4\]]tu med grangs med pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[252a.5\]]pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/_kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[252a.6\]]yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo /_/kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag pa yongs su bzung ngo /_/de na sems can chen po des nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag 
[\[252a.7\]]ste rab tu gnas par byas nas/_der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]smon lam btab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga 
[\[252b.2\]]shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang /_sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang /_'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam 
[\[252b.3\]]nga bar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nya btang 
[\[252b.4\]]ste/_snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams 
[\[252b.5\]]kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/des dang po bla na med pa 
[\[252b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod 
[\[252b.7\]]pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo /_/des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro/_/bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang bdag na sems can tshe ring ba/_bsam pa yongs su dag pa/_bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs 
[\[253a.2\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i 
[\[253a.3\]]bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams 
[\[253a.4\]]med pa byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing smon lam khyad par can btab pas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis 
[\[253a.5\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[253a.6\]]bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/_gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma 
[\[253a.7\]]yin no/_/bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa dang /_sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /_byang chub thob 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang /_byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/_pad ma 
[\[253b.2\]]dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/_bram ze 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon 
[\[253b.3\]]mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang /_bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag 
[\[253b.4\]]par smon pa dang /_sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /_byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang /_byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung ba 
[\[253b.5\]]zhig bar mar sgrub par smon pa ste/_bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dkar po lta bu rnams zhes bya'i me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste/_byang 
[\[253b.6\]]chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o/_/bram ze 'di lta ste dper na khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying 
[\[253b.7\]]rje pad ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]tshe/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_pho nya dag kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so/_/
[\[254a.2\]]'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[254a.3\]]ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa/_'dren pa med pa/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing /_sems 
[\[254a.4\]]can lam ngan pas bcom pa/_nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/_mtshams med pa byed pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_dam pa'i chos spong ba/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa 
[\[254a.5\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/_'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog_/chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/_dbang sgyur ba'i bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag 
[\[254a.6\]]tu sgras khyab par byas nas/_khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du/_lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongs 
[\[254a.7\]]su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med 
[\[254b.2\]]pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par gyur to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus las skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po 
[\[254b.3\]]mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/_sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na gnas grong zhes bya ba na bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs 
[\[254b.4\]]med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing /_byams pa dang 'thun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang /_grogs byed par gyur nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig_/khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa na bdag 
[\[254b.5\]]khyod kyi phar gyur cig_/skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig_/gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba 
[\[254b.6\]]des kyang smras pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[254b.7\]]lung ston par gyur cig_/rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/_de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod la bsnun pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyur cig_/khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig_/brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang brgya byin pha rol sems shes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/_kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas/_
[\[255a.2\]]khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nyan thos zung du gyur cig_/gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod lta mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag 
[\[255a.3\]]kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas srid pa tha ma'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig_/gzhan yang ri rtse'i lha mo des pa king shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cing /_khyod kyis byang chub 
[\[255a.4\]]thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na bdag kyang 
[\[255a.5\]]skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang 'thun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/_khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig_/khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang 
[\[255a.6\]]chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig_/khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig_/chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig_/'chi ba med pa yang rtogs par gyur cig_/
[\[255a.7\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de na lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir smon 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lam btab ste 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar bkod do/_/de na 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/_kye bram ze chen po bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig_/bdag bskal pa dpag tu med 
[\[255b.2\]]pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig_/rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig_/mal cha dang /_stan dang /_bgo ba dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[255b.3\]]grong rdal dang /_khyim dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_lce dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_mgo dag slong bar gyur cig_/bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[255b.4\]]phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su yang gyur cig_/bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grogs su gyur cig_/nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi 
[\[255b.5\]]nyan thos kyi gnas thob par gyur cig_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig_/rjes su chos ston par gyur cig_/khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu bram ze snying rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[255b.6\]]pas de thos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas 'tsho ba mi 'gyur 'jigs byed la bos te smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba ni legs so legs so/_/khyod tshe rabs 
[\[255b.7\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir na ma 'ongs pa de'i tshe ngas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste/_khyod la yang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang 'thun par ma gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang 
[\[256a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te bdag gi mdun du slongs mo pa gang dag mchis nas zas slong bar bgyid cing tshig 'jam po'am/_tshig rtsub po'am/_brnyas pa'i tshig gam/_tshig gsal bas slong bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[256a.3\]]ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/_ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/_sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin pa stsol bar gyur na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[256a.4\]]dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig_/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[256a.5\]]rgya bar ma gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems ma dad pas sbyin pa stsol tam/_sbyin pa de yang len pa po la ma dad pas byin par 'gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/_gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig dge 
[\[256a.6\]]ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig_/gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag kyang mnar med par mchi bar gyur cig_/
[\[256a.7\]]zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slongs mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang /_mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing tshig 'jam po'am/_tshig rtsub po'am/_brnyas tshig gam/_tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/_ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/_sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas/_mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyur na/_bdag gis sangs 
[\[256b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/_bdag mnar med par mchi ba'i bar du gyur cig_/sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/_tshul khrims nas shes rab kyi bar dag yongs su gtong ba la yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin 
[\[256b.3\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/_skyes bu dam pa legs 
[\[256b.4\]]so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas de la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la 
[\[256b.5\]]gnas pa'i yid kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod ni snying por 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i chos drug gis sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho 
[\[256b.6\]]ba pa mi 'gyur/_'jigs byed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ji ltar 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed 
[\[256b.7\]]kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam de lta bu dag btab pa thos pa dang /_de nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'khor la bltas te mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa/_a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge dang /_zad pa'i dus dang /_nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon med pa'i ded dpon dang /_snang 
[\[257a.2\]]ba byed pa dang /_sgron ma byed pa dang /_byis pa skyabs med pa dang /_ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyur ba dang /_'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas tshe rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gi mgo len par 'gyur ba dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_
[\[257a.3\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_khrag dang /_kha zas kyi bar dag len par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyis spyod pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[257a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis 
[\[257a.5\]]pa de dang de dag nas byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slongs mo pa gang dag nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/_skom dag blangs par gyur pa dang /_bdag gis sug pa nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin 
[\[257a.6\]]pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gal te 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar mi bgyid dam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen pos lung ston 
[\[257a.7\]]par mi bgyid na/_bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar 
[\[257b.2\]]sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rtse 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/_skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar btab pa de 
[\[257b.3\]]bzhin du bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu lhag pa de snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/_'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer so sor rtog pa zhes bya bar skye dgu'i 
[\[257b.4\]]tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho zhes bya ba sangs 
[\[257b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cing /_lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug 
[\[257b.6\]]yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni lo stong du gnas par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong du gnas par gyur to/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 
[\[257b.7\]]me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas pa na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal pa/_sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_mi 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'thun par spyod pa/_mchod rten gyi nor 'phrog pa/_ngo tsha med pa rnams dang /_chos kyi mchod pa gcod par byed pa/_ngo tsha med pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang /_mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang /_zas 
[\[258a.2\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad gcod cing gang zag gir yongs su bzung ste/_bdag spyod par byed pa'am/_khyim pa la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub 
[\[258a.3\]]dbang phyug yang dag mtho des theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis lung bstan to/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la ngur smrig dmar po bgos pa thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to/_/
[\[258a.4\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang su dag snga ma kho na bzhin du ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang ston par 'du shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir 
[\[258a.5\]]mi ldog par lung bstan pa de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang byang chub kyi spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[258a.6\]]snying po'i spyan sngar gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di lta bu lags te/_ji srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas/_byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i bar du bdag gis sems can 
[\[258a.7\]]gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu 'god par 'gyur ba'am/_tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i sems can 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]de dag las sems can 'ga' tsam zhig bdag gis theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par ma gyur na/_bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[258b.2\]]ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig_/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas kyang sems 
[\[258b.3\]]can gang dag bdag gis bstan pa la chos gos ngur smrig bgos par gyur pa las ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa'am/_nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba la zhugs par gyur pa'am/_dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul par gyur cing /_nongs pa dang bcas par gyur 
[\[258b.4\]]pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang dag skad cig gcig tsam bdag la ston pa'i 'du shes sam/_gus pa'i sems bskyed par gyur pa'i sems can de dag las btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis tha na sems 
[\[258b.5\]]can 'ga' tsam zhig spangs shing theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par ma gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[258b.6\]]rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos ngur smrig dmar po lha dang mi rnams kyis gus par bgyis pa dang /_bla mar bgyis pa dang /_ri mor bgyis pa dang /_mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ba mthong 
[\[258b.7\]]ma thag tu ngur smrig mgul na thogs par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par gyur cig_/sems can gang dag bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang bral zhing bkres pa dang /_skom pas gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /_tha na gnod 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]sbyin dbul po rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gang dag tha na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bza' ba dang /_btung ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[259a.2\]]par gyur cig_/lha'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_klu'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_grul bum 'am/_sha za'am/_mi'am/_sems can gang dag phan tshun zhe 'gras shing 'khon gcugs 
[\[259a.3\]]mang por gyur pa rnams dang /_phan tshun 'gyed cing g.yul ngor zhugs te/_g.yul sprod par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig rjes su dran par gyur na/_sems can de dag snying rje'i sems dang /_'jam pa'i sems dang /_kho na med pa'i sems dang 
[\[259a.4\]]las su rung ba'i sems su gyur cig_/sems can gang dag g.yul ngo'am/_'gyed pa'am/_'thab pa'am/_rtsod pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang /_mchod par bgyi ba dang /_gus par bgyi ba'i slad du ngur smrig gi dum bu 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 
[\[259a.5\]]rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang /_'khrul pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba ma mchis par gyur cig_/g.yul ngo dang /_'gyed pa dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa de dag las kyang legs par yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 
[\[259a.6\]]gi chos gos ngur smrig dmar po 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan par ma gyur na/_bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/_bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 
[\[259a.7\]]rngo mi thogs pa dang /_bdag gis chos rnams bskyud par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gis gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par rngo mi thogs pa'i bar du gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ngan las 'das kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib pa bas par 'gyur zhing /_mthar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bla na med pas 
[\[259b.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_phyag gi mthil gyis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu 
[\[259b.3\]]dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba/_bzang ba/_rab tu gtan la bab pa yin te legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod ni de bzhin du 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ngur smrig dmar pos sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/kye rigs kyi 
[\[259b.4\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phyag sor ring pos yongs su bkab cing phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mthil gyis byugs pa dang /_lung bstan cing legs so zhes bya ba byin 
[\[259b.5\]]pa des mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu dad pa skyes nas/_tshe lo nyi shu lon pa lta bu'i tshad tsam du gzhon nur red do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[259b.6\]]pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur cing /_me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa byas te/_bsngags pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs kyis bstod nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/
[\[259b.7\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad ma dkar po las lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//bam po bcu gsum pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la gus pa dang bcas pas yongs su zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[260a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /_tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan 
[\[260a.3\]]pa dang /_tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /_tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[260a.4\]]ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo tshogs ji lta bu dang ldan na bstan par gnas pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa ji lta bus ni brgyan pa lags/_rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po 
[\[260a.5\]]che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi zhu ba bzang po spobs pa dge ste/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs 
[\[260a.6\]]su zhu bar sems pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang /_gces spras byed pa rgya chen po skyes pa yin te/_legs so legs so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la 
[\[260a.7\]]zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]la rjes su zhugs pa yin no/_/rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_de la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par 
[\[260b.2\]]rtse bar byed do/_/zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed do/_/zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do/_/chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 
[\[260b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad khong du chud par byed do/_/phyag rgya rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta bar byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings su rnam par song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[260b.4\]]kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par 'gro bar byed do/_/nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do/_/rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed par byed do/_/chos la 'jug pa'i 
[\[260b.5\]]phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po shin tu brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po nyid du rab tu gnas par byed do/_/'od zer 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin 
[\[260b.6\]]thams cad la 'od zer 'gyed par byed do/_/stobs kyi brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la stobs dang brtson 'grus su byed do/_/yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad las gyen du 'phags par byed do/_/nges pa'i tshig 
[\[260b.7\]]ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig la 'jug par byed do/_/tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ming gi rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]cad la rnam par lta bar byed do/_/chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyis rab tu dbye ba rjes su rtogs par byed do/_/phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par byed 
[\[261a.2\]]do/_/chos thams cad la dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad las dben pa'i chos nyid la rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed par byed do/_/chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 
[\[261a.3\]]'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi g.yo ba nyid du gnas par byed do/_/chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad sdud cing yang dag par 'du bar byed do/_/chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i ting 
[\[261a.4\]]nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'byung ba dang /_'jug pa'i rlom sems med par byed do/_/nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nam mkha' ltar khyab par byed do/_/chos thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i ting nge 
[\[261a.5\]]'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par byed do/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin par byed do/_/chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bcud 
[\[261a.6\]]'dzin par byed do/_/rin chen rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni yo byad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par ston par byed do/_/rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[261a.7\]]gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad lam me lhan ne lhang nger byed do/_/chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed do/_/tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi chos 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rnams nam yang tshol bar mi byed do/_/gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gnas pa'i chos nam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha'i ngo 
[\[261b.2\]]bo nyid lta bur snying po med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams spong bar byed do/_/gzugs mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni gzugs kun tu snang 
[\[261b.3\]]bar byed do/_/dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du byed do/_/chos thams cad mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes mu med par ston par byed do/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 
[\[261b.4\]]'dzin thams cad la shes pa mu med pa ston par byed do/_/'od thams cad byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'od byed pa'i sgo nye bar ston par byed do/_/khams kyi mtha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' med pa thams cad rnam par shes par bya 
[\[261b.5\]]ba'i phyir nye bar ston par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi chos rnams las stong pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/lhun po ltar bkra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad gsog nyid du kun tu ston par byed do/_/'od dri ma med 
[\[261b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel bar byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi brda'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid du yang dag par ston par byed do/_/dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dga' 
[\[261b.7\]]ba rab tu thob par byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa ston par byed do/_/glog 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi zad pa nyid ston par byed do/_/chos 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]thams cad la rnam par g.yeng ba med cing rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi shes pa rdul dang bral ba nye bar ston par byed do/_/mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa med pa dang /_zad 
[\[262a.2\]]pa med pa ma yin pa yang dag par ston par byed do/_/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad mig yor lta bur ston par byed do/_/gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes 
[\[262a.3\]]'bar bar byed do/_/zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad pa med pa dang /_nyams pa med par ston par byed do/_/mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la g.yo bar mi byed/_'gul bar mi byed/_'phro bar mi byed do/_/
[\[262a.4\]]rnam par 'phel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la shes bya rnam par 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od zer gyi sgo dag 'gyed par byed do/_/zla ba 
[\[262a.5\]]dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang bar byed do/_/snang ba dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par byed do/_/bya ba dang mi bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni bya ba dang mi bya ba'i bya ba byed cing 
[\[262a.6\]]ye shes rtogs kyang yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad nges par 'byed par byed cing gang la 'byed pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni sems g.yo bar mi 
[\[262a.7\]]byed/_'gul bar mi byed/_snang bar mi byed cing gnod par 'gyur ba yang med la/_de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no snyam du yang mi sems par byed do/_/kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang ba yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]byed do/_/rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas pa nyid kyis rab tu gnas par byed do/_/rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rin po che brtsegs pa lta bur kun tu snang bar byed do/_/chos dam pa'i 
[\[262b.2\]]phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed cing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad 
[\[262b.3\]]la dga' ba spong bar byed do/_/chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yi ge mi mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob par byed do/_/yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs par byed do/_/dmigs pa gcod 
[\[262b.4\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la dmigs pa rnam par gcod par byed do/_/'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la 'gyur ba mi dmigs par byed do/_/rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la phan 'dogs 
[\[262b.5\]]pa mi dmigs par byed do/_/gnas med par rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas mi dmigs par byed do/_/rab rib dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mun pa'i yul las 
[\[262b.6\]]yang dag par 'da' bar byed do/_/yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la bstsags pa spong bar byed do/_/sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la sems zhes bya ba mi dmigs par byed do/_/
[\[262b.7\]]byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad rtogs par byed do/_/dran pa rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la spobs pa grangs med pa thob par byed do/_/de byed pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/ye shes tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni khams gsum thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do/_/shes pa nye bar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad rnam par gcod 
[\[263a.2\]]pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/ye shes rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phro ba nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/gnas med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad gnas su gyur pa med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su 
[\[263a.3\]]mthong bar byed do/_/bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos 'ga' yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/rnam par sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsgrub par yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/
[\[263a.4\]]srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rnam par sel ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i ye shes 'jug cing gang la 'jug pa 'ga' yang mi rnyed par byed do/_/brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni sgra dang brda thams cad 
[\[263a.5\]]kyi rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzi brjid kyis lam me 
[\[263a.6\]]lhan ne lhang nger byed do/_/ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid ston par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la 
[\[263a.7\]]mngon par rig pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par byed do/_/sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu spong 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do/_/byed rgyu mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la zad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/gzungs kyi gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[263b.2\]]cad dang /_chos thams cad 'dzin cing yang dag pa nyid dang /_log pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/'gag pa dang 'gal ba rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad dang 'thun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/
[\[263b.3\]]'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dus byas kyi dri ma dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do/_/snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la snying po med pa mi dmigs par byed do/_/zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa'i 
[\[263b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yon tan yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed do/_/snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/_chos thams 
[\[263b.5\]]cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do/_/mnyam pa nyid rnam par snang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rtse gcig pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/nyon mongs pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 
[\[263b.6\]]'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par byed do/_/rlung gi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas par mi byed do/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed 
[\[263b.7\]]do/_/lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la 'jig tshogs mi dmigs par byed do/_/dag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la ngag gi las mi dmigs par byed 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]do/_/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med la rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur te/_de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[264a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni 
[\[264a.3\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su 
[\[264a.4\]]rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[264a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs 
[\[264a.6\]]ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[264a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni sems 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo ba med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /_khong 
[\[264b.2\]]khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[264b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab 
[\[264b.4\]]tu 'byed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni/_lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos rjes 
[\[264b.5\]]su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par spong ba'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad sgom par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus 
[\[264b.6\]]dang sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 
[\[264b.7\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing mtho ris su skye ba thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod 
[\[265a.2\]]par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ston pa'i tshogs ni shes pa gzhan la rag ma las par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad kyi sgo yin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[265a.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs ni tshogs thams cad mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i 
[\[265a.4\]]bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can 
[\[265a.5\]]thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes 
[\[265a.6\]]pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems 
[\[265a.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo yang dag par sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po la rnam par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan ji lta bus brgyan na bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_don dam pa mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i 'bad pa don yod pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos mi 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ste/_snying rje chen po 
[\[265b.3\]]dang ldan pa gang gi sems chos thams cad la nam mkha' dang lag par mnyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan yin no/_/ji ltar na bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[265b.4\]]sems can med pa nyid dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid byung ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_gang zag med pa nyid dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba'i sems nyid dang /_tshul khrims dang /_zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /_bzod pa dang /_bzod pa'i sems nyid dang /_brtson 
[\[265b.5\]]'grus dang /_dben pa'i sems nyid dang /_bsam gtan dang /_nges par sems pa'i sems nyid dang /_shes rab dang /_rgya che ba'i sems nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_dran pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med pa'i sems dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[265b.6\]]spong ba dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /_dad pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /_dran pa dang /_rang byung gi mtshan nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[265b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sems nyid dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang /_stobs dang /_mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_blo rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid dang /_lam dang /_sgom pa'i sems nyid 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dang /_zhi gnas dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /_lhag mthong dang /_rmongs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa dang /_shin tu yongs su shes pa bsgom pa'i sems nyid dang /_sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang /_mun pa med 
[\[266a.2\]]pa'i sems nyid dang /_chos yid la byed pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang /_dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang /_gnas pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid dang /_dam pa'i chos 
[\[266a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang /_zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang /_mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sems nyid dang /_bzod pa thob pa dang /_
[\[266a.4\]]dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /_'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sems nyid dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang /_khams gsum gyi snying po len pa'i sems nyid dang /_sems can thams cad las bdud tshar gcad pa'i sems dang 
[\[266a.5\]]sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems nyid dang /_byang chub dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_chos thams cad bskor ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen 
[\[266a.6\]]po kun tu ston pa dang /_'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems nyid kyi chos de la gang rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ba'am/_rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs shing /_rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos la mos par byed pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad 
[\[266a.7\]]pa na gang dag phyogs bcu nas sngon gyi tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /_tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa ya phrag drug dang 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bzhi 'bum po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang 
[\[266b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob 
[\[266b.3\]]par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /_tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 
[\[266b.4\]]gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de yang mchog tu dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba des gzhon nu lo nyi shu lon pa lta bur red nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/_/
[\[266b.5\]]rigs kyi bu rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa de yang bu stong dang /_khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang /_gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te/_mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[266b.6\]]dang /_des pa dag gis mngon par brtson par byas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas mthar gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos 
[\[266b.7\]]kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bklags shing kun chub par byas so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri lung mnos shing bklags te kun chub pa'i bar du byas so/_/de bzhin du bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i gtam la yang lus dran pa nye bar 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum lung mnos shing bklags te kun chub par byas so/_/tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang /_sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum yang lung mnos te bklags 
[\[267a.2\]]shing kun chub par byas so/_/khams kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_skye mched kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_'dod chags kyi kun tu sbyor ba spong ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_zhe sdang gi kun tu sbyor ba spong pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_gti mug gi kun 
[\[267a.3\]]tu sbyor ba spong ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing 
[\[267a.4\]]bklags te kun chub par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas chos kyi phung po 'bum phrag bcu'i bar dag kyang bzung zhing bklags te kun chub par byas so/_/rigs kyi bu ji tsam gyi dus gzhan zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[267a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des rol mo'i sgra dang /_me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos 
[\[267a.6\]]dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag gis mchod pa byas shing spos chu sna tshogs kyis bkrus nas/_sku gdung gzhag pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang 
[\[267a.7\]]du dpag tshad lnga brgya rgyar ni dpag tshad phyed yod pa yang brtsigs/_de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du rol mo'i sgra dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]mchod pa byas nas der yang sems can dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de zhag bdun po de dag 'das nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu mngon par byung ste/_skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[267b.2\]]nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/_yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byas te/_lo khri'i bar du dam pa'i chos 'dzin par gyur nas/_der yang 
[\[267b.3\]]sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang rab tu bkod do/_/dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /_dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong 
[\[267b.4\]]gi dngos po tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la yang btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/des yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa la nges par sbyar cing des pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la yang nges par 
[\[267b.5\]]sbyar/_phung po rnams dgra lta bur gyur par yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/_skye mched rnams grong stong pa lta bur yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/_chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes 'dus byas shes pa mthong ba yongs su shes pa la 
[\[267b.6\]]yang nges par sbyar/_chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang /_mig sgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bur yang bstan/_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i 'gog pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_mchog dang /_gya nom 
[\[267b.7\]]pa'i 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su shes pa yang bstan te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu bkod nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/_/sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa la snga ma bzhin du mchod pa byas te/_ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus pa dag la rus pa'i mchod pa byed pa de bzhin du/_de'i tshe na sems can de dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa dag 
[\[268a.2\]]la mchod pa byas so/_/gang gi nyin mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa de'i nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i dam pa'i chos kyang nub ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni smon lam gyi 
[\[268a.3\]]dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu skye ba yongs su bzung ste/_kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes so/_/kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du/_kha cig ni klu rnams kyi nang du/_kha cig ni lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du/_kha cig ni smon lam 
[\[268a.4\]]gyi dbang gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag tu skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri 'das pa de na 'jig rten 
[\[268a.5\]]gyi khams yang dag 'dren ces bya ba yod de/_de na mi rnams ni tshe lo brgyad cu thub la/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gtum pa/_lag pa khrag gis gos pa/_sdig pa la zhen pa/_sems can thams cad la brtse ba med par zhugs pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_phar 
[\[268a.6\]]mi 'dzin pa/_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba sha stag ste/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren der gdol pa'i rigs su skyes par gyur te/_de yang lus shin tu ring bar gyur cing /_
[\[268a.7\]]shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/_shin tu shugs dang ldan pa/_shin tu dran pa dang ldan pa/_shin tu spobs pa dang ldan pa/_shin tu mgyogs pa dang ldan par gyur nas/_des stobs kyi shugs brtan pas sems can dag bzung ste smras pa/_kye sems can dag 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]khyed cag gal te srog gcod pa spong ba dang /_ma byin par len pa spong ba dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar byed na ngas khyed cag gi srog sbyin par bya zhing /_'tsho ba'i yo byad dag kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/kye gal te mi spong 
[\[268b.2\]]na ngas srog dang phral te 'gro'o/_/de nas sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te smras pa/_mgon po khyod kyi tshig gis bdag cag da deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa nas log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar bgyid do/_/gdol 
[\[268b.3\]]pa stobs can de song nas rgyal po dang /_rgyal pos bkrabs pa dag la bsgo ba kho bo'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad du zas dang /_skom dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_spos dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[268b.4\]]dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dag dgos kyis 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po dag kho bo la phul cig_/gdol pa stobs can des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_
[\[268b.5\]]de nas mi de dag kyang tshe lo lnga brgya thub par gyur to/_/de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i blon po de dag gis gdol pa stobs can de rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug nas rgyal po bsod nams 
[\[268b.6\]]stobs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis ring po ma lon par yul der rjes su bstan te/_brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul bas yul gnyis par yang rjes su bstan nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs ring po ma lon par 'dzam bu'i 
[\[268b.7\]]gling thams cad du stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bar du gyur to/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal srid bzung nas/_de'i 'og tu sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /_log par lta ba'i bar dag spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar dag la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du theg pa 
[\[269a.2\]]gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod cing theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[269a.3\]]thams cad du sgra dbyangs rjes su bsgrags pa/_slongs mo pa gang su dag zas 'dod pa dang /_rin po che'i bar dag 'dod pa de dag thams cad tshur shog shig dang /_ngas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na 'dzam 
[\[269a.4\]]bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lhags nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs la slongs mo byed par gyur pa dang /_rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis kyang de dag las brtsams te sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byin no/_/de nas 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig rgyal 
[\[269a.5\]]po bsod nams stobs kyi drung du song ste smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhed cing sbyin pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar mdzad la/_rgyal po chen po gal te khyod kyis 
[\[269a.6\]]bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur na ni rgyal po chen po khyod rgyal ba 'jig rten gyi sgron mar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa khyod ci zhig 'dod/_'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen por rab tu 
[\[269a.7\]]'joms pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid 'tshal na/_cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa'i slad du mi gson po'i pags pa yang 'tshal/_mig kyang 'tshal te/_de'i slad du bdag khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis nas gsol ba bgyid lags so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob nas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag cig dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod cing /_theg pa gsum po dag la yang nges par sbyar te/_bdag gis sbyin pa yang dpag tu med pa zhig 
[\[269b.2\]]byin na/_da ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po len par byed pa zhig ste/_bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam nas rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas khyod la sha'i mig tha mal pa 'di sbyin par byas dga' bar gyis shig_/des ni bdag gis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 
[\[269b.3\]]spyan thob par gyur cig_/ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rang gi pags pa 'di yang sbyin par byas des ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis lag pa g.yas 
[\[269b.4\]]pas rang gi mig gnyis phyung ste 'tsho ba pa la byin nas gdong khrag gis yog bzhin du smras pa/_'di na gang dag 'dir lhags pa dang /_nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /_gnod sbyin mthu chen po rnams dang /_mi'am ci gang yin pa 
[\[269b.5\]]rnams dang /_lha ma yin gang yin pa rnams dang /_'byung po gang yin pa rnams dang /_mi gang yin pa rnams bdag la nyon cig_/bdag gis sbyin pa byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge bas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur nas/_bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 
[\[269b.6\]]rgya mtsho mi zad pa las sgrol zhing bla na med pa'i zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par gyur cig_/yang smras pa/_gal te bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lta na/_ji srid du 'tsho ba pa 'di'i rig sngags de grub par ma gyur pa de 
[\[269b.7\]]srid kyi bar du bdag gi srog gi dbang po 'gag par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi dran pa yang nyams par ma gyur cig_/bdag 'gyod par yang ma gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu rgyal pos pags pa yang khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs des mtshon rnon po blangs 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]te/_rgyal po gson po'i lus las pags pa bshus nas pags pa khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs so/_/de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi srog gi dbang po yang ma 'gags dran pa yang ma nyams/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de yang ma myong la/_
[\[270a.2\]]de la skad cig tsam yang 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na gzhan du mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[270a.3\]]snying po'i yab snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba der gyur to/_/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i dang po ni de yin no/_/ngas dang po sems bskyed pas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[270a.4\]]byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/_ngas dpa' ba'i dngos po dang /_dpa' bo'i bya ba dang po ni de yin no/_/nga smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren du gdol pa'i rigs su skyes pa de'i tshe na ngas gdol pa'i rigs su gnas nas
