[\[270a.5\]]sems can rnams dge ba la sbyar cing rang gi stobs dang rtul bas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob pa'i bar dang /_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du 'thab pa dang rtsod pa'i rnyog pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing /_tshe yang bsrings te ngas dang po lus yongs su btang ba de ni 
[\[270a.6\]]nga'i dpa' ba'i dngos po dang /_dpa' bo'i bya ba gnyis pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe ngas rang gi mig dag yongs su btang zhing rang gi pags pa yang yongs su btang ste/_de nas shi 'phos na yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren de nyid kyi gling gnyis 
[\[270a.7\]]par gdol pa'i rigs su skyes nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_der yang ngas brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba de lta bus sems can rnams dge ba'i las dag la nges par sbyar nas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar yang thob ste/_der yang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang /_
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'khon pa dang /_'gyod pa dag rab tu zhi bar byas te tshe yang bsrings so/_/der yang rang gi lus las lce dang /_rna ba dag yongs su btang ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren gyi stong chen po de kun gyi gling thams cad kyi bar du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so/_/smon 
[\[270b.2\]]lam dang brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba rjes su 'brel ba dang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la nges par sbyar cing theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 
[\[270b.3\]]'dzin du bcug ste/_'thab pa dang rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_'khon pa dang /_'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing skyes bu chen po'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[270b.4\]]su dag pa ni 'di'i phyir te/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed cing gzhan la 'jigs pa ston par mi byed la/_sems can rnams nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[270b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba'i ming yang med la/_bslab pa gzung 
[\[270b.6\]]ba yang med/_tshig rtsub po yang mi grag_/mi dge ba'i sgra yang mi grag ste/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de chos kyi sgra dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba med pa'i sgras khyab pa yin no/_/de na sems can rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa yin te/_de na nyan thos dang 
[\[270b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming du gdags pa tsam yang mi srid do/_/ngas ni gang gi tshe bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu tshig rtsub po dang 'jigs su rung bas sems can 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rnams srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa nas/_theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i bar du byas pas na/_de'i las kyi 'phros da ltar nga nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing mi 
[\[271a.2\]]dge ba'i sgras kun tu khyab la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu na theg pa gsum gyis chos ston te/_ngas ni sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing ngas 'dul ba'i 
[\[271a.3\]]sems can ji lta bu dag yongs su bzung ba de lta bu kho na'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pas byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad de smon lam ji lta bu btab cing /_sa bon ci 'dra ba btab pa de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thob bo//_//bam po bcu bzhi 
[\[271a.4\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang ba ltar/_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su ma btang la/_ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[271a.5\]]spyad pa spyod pa na sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang ba ltar phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bsdus te 
[\[271a.6\]]khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa brgyad ni ma gtogs te/_skyes bu dam pa sas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams kun dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin 
[\[271a.7\]]gshegs pa 'dres spong 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur nas skye dgu tshe lo brgya pa rnams la chos ston cing zhag bdun na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yang dag skul zhes bya ba de ni shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'pham can zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa rnams la bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa snyed du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa'i 
[\[271b.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_da dung du yang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i sku gdung rnams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying po me tog rgyas 
[\[271b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus dang /_yi dam brtan pa dang /_yongs su gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/_de bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di nas byang phyogs su snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[271b.4\]]zhing rgyu bcas yang dag 'dren ces bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba der skyes bu dam pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyur bcas nag 
[\[271b.5\]]po rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od zer kun nas 'khrugs 'dzin ces bya ba'i skyes bu dam pa de ni bskal pa chen po gcig 'das nas nub phyogs logs su snyigs ma lnga 
[\[271b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[271b.7\]]sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/legs dga' 'di yang bskal pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/_steng gi phyogs logs su bskal pa chen po rtsod rnyog mi 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]bzad yang dag 'khrug ces bya ba la snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur byed mi gtsang bstsags zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_legs dga' 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bstsags zhes bya ba der 
[\[272a.2\]]skye dgu'i tshe lo lnga bcu pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing /_de sngon gyi smon 
[\[272a.3\]]lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_de nyid kyi nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dam pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur zhing lo bcu'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de stongs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og 
[\[272a.4\]]tu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lag brkyang 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bstsags der skye dgu'i tshe lo sum cu pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin 
[\[272a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing /_de yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/_phung po'i lhag 
[\[272a.6\]]ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_de'i dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis sngar lung bstan pa thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ro myong 
[\[272a.7\]]ba thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags shing thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_sangs rgyas nyi ma bzhin du lhang nge zhing /_/'jig rten 'di na mngon 'phags lhun po 'dra/_/rnam 'dren rdul bral rnam dag spyan mnga' ba/_/snang gyur bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni byang chub dam pa tshol ba na/_/
[\[272b.2\]]bskal pa mang por khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsgoms/_/khyod kyis sngon gyi rgyal mang gang mchod pa/_/'das pa'i 'dren pa de yis lung ma bstan/_/'dod chags spangs pa yongs grol thugs mnga' ba/_/khyod 'dir 'jig rten kun tu mdzad pa mdzad/_/lam stor rnams 
[\[272b.3\]]la chos kyang ston mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams kyang srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral/_/rang byung bstan la bdag cag rab byung zhing /_/dbang po mnyam bzhag rgyal bas bstan pa yi/_/so sor thar pa'i bslab pa de bslabs nas/_/bdag cag rtag tu khyod dang nyer gyur 
[\[272b.4\]]cig_/srog la brten pa ma mchis chos 'tshal zhing /_/ston par 'du shes chos rnams mnyan bgyis nas/_/rgyal bas mngon par lung bstan don de yi/_/ro myong dbang bskur sa yang thob gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu skyes 
[\[272b.5\]]bu dam pa legs dga' dang /_rab tu lag brkyang zhes bya ba de gnyis dang /_sas byin dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag skul dang /_snying po me tog rgyas dang /_shes rab 'od zer kun 'khrugs 'dzin ces bya ba bzhi dang /_skyes bu dam pa drug po de dag gis byang chub tu sems 
[\[272b.6\]]bskyed pa las ngas dang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rdul med lhun po spos zhes bya bar gyur 
[\[272b.7\]]te/_rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bskal pa chen po byung ba na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub cing de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi pad ma'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na nga 'dzam bu'i gling las rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]nor ngan ces bya bar gyur cing bu yang stong yod par gyur nas/_ngas de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/de dag kyang dus gzhan zhig na mngon par byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi pad 
[\[273a.2\]]ma'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi pad ma'i bstan pa rgya cher 'bar bar byas so/_/gang dag rab tu ma byung zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi 'dod pa bu drug cig ma gtogs te/_ngas de dag la yang dang yang du bsgo ba/_khyed 
[\[273a.3\]]cag bsam pa ji lta bu zhig gis na khyed rab tu mi 'byung zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ni rab tu mi 'byung lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang zad pa'i dus kyi mthar dam pa'i chos gzugs brnyan du gyur pa na rab tu byung ba 
[\[273a.4\]]des ni tshul khrims kyi phung po mtha' dag kun tu 'dzin par yang rngo mi thogs la/_de nor bdun dang yang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying nas/_des slar res 'ga' zhig lha dang mi'i dpal thob par bas kyi/_rtag tu ngan song gsum po dag tu yongs su 
[\[273a.5\]]'khyam par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/_de'i slad du bdag cag rab tu mi 'byung ba lags so/_/ngas yang de dag la dris pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_gal 
[\[273a.6\]]te bdag cag la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad stsal na/_de lta na bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas de thos nas mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du bsams te/_ngas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 
[\[273a.7\]]thams cad gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la rab tu bkod cing 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa yang yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug ste/_theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug zin gyis/_gang bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di cha 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]drug tu bgos te bu drug po dag la byin la byin nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing bdag kyang mngon par byung ste/_rab tu byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas ngas de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad cha drug tu bgos te/_bu 
[\[273b.2\]]drug po dag la byin nas bdag kyang mngon par byung ste/_rab tu byung ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po de dag kyang phan tshun mi 'thun zhing 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi 'khor gyis 'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa dag byung ngo /_/de'i 
[\[273b.3\]]phyir 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mu ge byung ste/_lo tog rnams kyang mi skye/_char pa yang mi 'bab/_shing ljon pa dag las kyang lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag mi skye/_sman dang /_rtswa dag kyang mi skye bas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pas lus rab tu 'bar 
[\[273b.4\]]zhing nyam thag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na nga 'di snyam du sems te/_ngas da ltar gyi lus 'di yongs su btang ste/_rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas ngas gnas yongs su spangs te/_yul gyi dbus su song nas ri chu skyong zhes bya ba la 
[\[273b.5\]]'dzegs te smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar rang gi lus srog gtong ba ni/_/snying rje'i phyir te mtho ris phyir ma yin/_/ri 'di'i 'phang tsam dag tu gyur nas ni/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten don du 'gyur bar shog_/'di ltar gzugs mdzes phun sum gtong ba ni/_/bdud 
[\[273b.6\]]phyir ma yin brgya byin tshangs phyir min/_/bdag gi sha khrag mang por gyur nas ni/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten don ni byed gyur cig_/gang dag ri dang brag la gnas pa yi/_/lha klu gnod sbyin lha min mi rnams nyon/_/sems can phyir ni bdag gis brtse bskyed de/_/rang gi sha 
[\[273b.7\]]khrag dag gis tshim par bya/_/gang gi tshe ngas smon lam de lta bu btab pa na/_'jig rten gsum 'khrugs shing sa yang g.yos/_lhun po yang 'gul/_lha'i tshogs rnams kyang ngu'o/_/de nas ngas rang gi lus ri chu skyong gi kha nas bor ba dang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]nga'i lus ri'i tshad tsam du gyur cing /_mgo 'bum phrag du ma yod par gyur la/_khyon du ni dpag tshad brgya/_'phang du yang dpag tshad brgyar gyur nas/_mi dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya'i bar dag gis kyang sha dang khrag bza' bar brtsams so/_/rigs kyi bu nga'i 
[\[274a.2\]]lus la sems can de dag gis zos pa na nyin gcig bzhin du phyir skye zhing khyon du yang dpag tshad 'bum/_'phang du yang dpag tshad 'bum yod par 'gyur la/_thams cad nas mi'i mgo bo skra dang /_rna ba dang /_mig dang bcas pa/_mchu dang so dang bcas pa/_lce dang 
[\[274a.3\]]bcas pa'i kha 'bum phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur nas/_kha 'bum phrag du ma po de dag nas mi'i skad kyis sgra sgrogs pa/_kye sems can dag ci 'dod pa long shig_/kye sha zo shig_/khrag 'thung shig_/mig dag khyer cig_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_skra dang /_mchu dang /_
[\[274a.4\]]so dang /_lce dag khyer cig_/gang 'dod pa dang /_gang gis 'dod pa dang /_ji snyed 'dod pas lus tshim par gyur cig_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[274a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/khyed kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa 'di ni zad par yang mi 'gyur la/_khyed la dad pas byin par yang mi 'gyur gyis/_khyed cag myur ba nyid du srog zad par yang ma gyur cig ces sgra sgrogs par byed do/_/de na sems can 
[\[274a.6\]]mkhas pa gang yin pa de dag las kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg par sems skyed par byed/_kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems skyed par byed/_kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/_/kha cig ni lha dang mir skye 
[\[274a.7\]]bar sems skyed par byed cing /_sha ni za/_khrag ni 'thung ngo /_/kha cig gis ni mig dag khyer/_kha cig gis ni rna ba dag_/kha cig gis ni sna dag_/kha cig gis ni mchu dag_/kha cig gis ni so dag blangs nas khyer te dong yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sha bri bar 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]yang ma gyur/_yongs su zad par yang ma gyur la/_yang dang yang phyir skyes par gyur to/_/lo khri'i bar du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams kyang nga'i lus kyis tshim par byas te/_ngas lo khri po de'i bar du gang gA'i klung 
[\[274b.2\]]gi bye ma snyed kyi mig dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu snyed kyi khrag dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas ri rab stong snyed tsam gyi sha dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas ri khor yug tsam gyi lce dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas lhun po dang gnya' shing 'dzin tsam gyi 
[\[274b.3\]]rna ba dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas ri rab tsam gyi sna rgya chen po dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di tsam gyi so dag yongs su btang ngo /_/ngas der sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed mtha' dag gis gzhi tsam gyi rang gi pags pa yang yongs su btang ngo /_/
[\[274b.4\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar lo khri'i bar du srog gcig gis rang gi lus yongs su btang ba tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su btang zhing /_de ltar sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tshim par byas kyang nga'i sems skad cig gcig tsam yang 'gyod 
[\[274b.5\]]par ma gyur pa la ltos/_der ngas smon lam 'di lta bu yang btab ste/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na/_bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag 
[\[274b.6\]]gis gling gcig tu rang gi lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med lhun po spos 'di'i gling thams cad du yang lo stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de lta bu'i lus 'byung bar gyur cig_/gling gcig tu lo khri'i bar du ji 
[\[274b.7\]]lta ba de bzhin du gling thams cad du yang rang gi sha dang /_khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mchu dang /_lce dang /_skra dag gis sems can thams cad tshim par byas shing theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par gyur 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]cig_/mi rnams dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang /_gang dag sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba so so'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_tha na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar de dag kyang bdag gis tshim par byed par gyur cig_/
[\[275a.2\]]ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rang gi lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang rang gi sha dang /_khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_mig dang /_
[\[275a.3\]]lce'i bar dag dang /_de lta bu'i lus kyis bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu de lta bu'i lus thob nas rang gi lus dang srog gis sems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig_/gal te bdag sems can rnams tshim par bya 
[\[275a.4\]]ba'i phyir rang gi lus de lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar mi byed dam/_ji ltar bdag re zhing sems pa'i smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na bdag gis gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang /_gzhan dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas 
[\[275a.5\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig_/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas 
[\[275a.6\]]kyi sgra thos par ma gyur cig_/chos kyi sgra yang mi thos/_dge 'dun gyi sgra yang mi thos/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang mi thos/_bdud kyi dpung pham pa'i sgra yang mi thos/_mi 'jigs pa'i sgra yang mi thos pa nas/_'khor ba na dge ba'i sgra'i bar yang thos par mi 'gyur 
[\[275a.7\]]zhing /_rtag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu yang btab bo/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad kyi gling re rer yang de lta bu'i lus dag yongs su btang zhing /_rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]can rnams tshim par byas pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang de lta bu'i lus dag yongs su btang ste/_rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe ngas rgyun ma chad par mig 
[\[275b.2\]]dag yongs su btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi phung po yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i mthar thug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ltos/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[275b.3\]]pa'i lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bsdus pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de'i 'og tu bskal pa tshad med pa 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di zla ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_de yang snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur to/_/nga 
[\[275b.4\]]yang 'dzam bu'i gling der stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sgron ma snang ba zhes bya bar gyur nas ngas ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba dag la nges par sbyar to/_/phyis nga rang gis blta ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba 
[\[275b.5\]]dang /_de na ngas bcing ba dam pos phyin ka log tu bcings pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngas blon po rnams la mi 'dis ci zhig byas zhes dris pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis nga la smras pa/_lha mi 'di ni lha la nongs pa bgyis pa lags te/_dgung lo gcig 
[\[275b.6\]]la mi 'di'i 'bru dang /_lo tog ci 'khrung ba de las drug cha gcig lha'i zhal sngar 'bul ba lags na/_ji ltar lha'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_ri brags dag na gnas pa'i 'phangs las kyi mthas 'tsho ba gzhan dag 'du ba'i sgo 'bul bar bgyid pa de ltar 
[\[275b.7\]]mi 'di 'bul bar mi bgyid lags so/_/de dag la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi 'di thong la su la yang mthus nor dang 'bru dag ma sdud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha 'ga' yang sems shin tu dad pas 'bul bar mi bgyid do/_/gdugs gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]zas dang /_skyems dang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa gang lags pa dang /_lha'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_lha mo dang /_lha'i sras rnams dang /_sras mo rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dag 
[\[276a.2\]]las 'du ba lags na/_'ga' yang sems rab tu dang bas 'bul bar mi bgyid lags so/_/de nas shin tu yid mi bde ste bsams pa/_ngas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di su la sbyin par bya snyam nas/_nga la bu lnga brgya yod par gyur pa de dag 
[\[276a.3\]]kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing /_'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang cha lnga brgyar bgos te bu rnams la byin nas/_nga yang dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ste/_drang srong gi rab tu 'byung bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang ha cang yang mi 
[\[276a.4\]]ring ba'i nags khrod cig na nags kyi rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing /_shing u dum bA ra'i drung na bsam gtan sgom zhing 'dug 'dug nas mthar gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa lnga brgya zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /_
[\[276a.5\]]de dag gis kyang de nas rin po che'i phung po mang du rnyed do/_/de na ded dpon zla ba zhes bya ba skyes bu skal ba dang ldan zhing mdzangs pa zhig yod pa des kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnyed nas/_de dag rin po che'i gling de nas nor bu rin po che'i phung po rgya chen po dang /_yid bzhin gyi 
[\[276a.6\]]nor bu de khyer te phyir 'phags pa dang /_de nas rgya mtsho yang 'khrugs/_klu rnams kyang khros/_gang dag de na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ngu'o/_/de na drang srong dbugs 'byin ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' zhig kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyis der skyes nas sems can chen 
[\[276a.7\]]po des 'gron po de dag bde zhing bkra shis par rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to/_/srin po gdug pa phyir rgol zhing glags lta la/_skabs tshol ba zhig kyang 'gron po de dag gi phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas/_de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du rlung mar drag po dang /_char pa 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]chen po babs nas/_des tshong pa de dag lam rab tu stor te shin tu skrag nas sgra chen pos ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la smre sngags 'don cing lha dang /_gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan la gsol ba 'debs pa nas/_pha dang ma dang sdug pa'i bu rnams zhes bya ba'i 
[\[276b.2\]]bar du ngu 'bod par byed pa nga'i lha'i rna bas thos nas/_nga lam ji srid pa der song ste/_tshong pa dag la ma 'jigs shig_/ma 'jigs shig dang /_ngas khyed cag la lam bstan par bya zhing /_'dzam bu'i gling du bde zhing bkra shis par phyin pa'i bar du bya'o zhes tshong pa 
[\[276b.3\]]rnams dbugs phyung nas/_de'i tshe ngas ras til mar gyis bskus te rang gi lag pa dkris nas me 'bar bar byas te bden pa'i tshig brjod pa/_gal te bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa'i phyir lo nyi shu rtsa drug tu tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis 
[\[276b.4\]]nags khrod du gnas te/_nags kyi rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu za zhing klu dang gnod sbyin brgyad khri bzhi stong gis sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa lta na/_bden pa dang bden 
[\[276b.5\]]pa'i tshig de dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa des bdag gi lag pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing tshong pa rnams kyis lam rnyed par gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling du bde zhing bkra shis par phyin par gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig brjod pa dang /_nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nga'i 
[\[276b.6\]]lag pa de 'bar bar gyur nas tshong pa de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du bkod do/_/der ngas smon lam btab pa/_gal te gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na rin po che med par gyur pa de'i tshe na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[276b.7\]]'gyur ba lta na bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/bdag 'dzam bu'i gling du ded dpon du gyur la lan bdun gyi bar du yid bzhin gyi nor bu blangs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad kyi bar du rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig ces 
[\[277a.2\]]smon lam btab pa dang /_de bzhin du nga'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/_bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das kyi bar du nga ded dpon du gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu rin po che'i 
[\[277a.3\]]char dag rab tu phab ste/_gling re rer yang lan bdun bdun du rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/de ltar sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rin po che dag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas shing theg pa gsum po dag la yang nges par sbyar 
[\[277a.4\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la ltos/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa mgu byed ces bya ba byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rab rib can zhes 
[\[277a.5\]]bya bar gyur te/_snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing skye dgu tshe lo lnga stong par gyur pa na nga smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rig byed 'don pa'i bram ze nyi phreng spos zhes bya bar gyur te/_de'i tshe na sems can rnams phal cher rtag par lta zhing 'khon pa dang /_pha rol gnon 
[\[277a.6\]]pa dang bcas la/_'thab pa la gnas pa dang bcas par gyur te/_ngas sems can de dag la pha rol gnon pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyis phung po dgra lta bur gyur pa'i rab tu sbyor bas chos bstan to/_/skye mched grong stong pa lta bur so sor brtags pa dang /_rkyen gyis rjes 
[\[277a.7\]]su 'brel ba skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bcas pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pa yang bstan te/_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par sbyar nas nga nyid kyang mngon par 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i tshe na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang nga yis gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur to/_/de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang 'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_
[\[277b.2\]]khon du 'dzin pa dag spangs te/_nags khrod na gnas shing nags khrod na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za la bsam gtan sgom zhing tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe bskal pa de zad du nye ba na sbyin gnas de dag gis 'dzam bu'i 
[\[277b.3\]]gling mtha' dag khyab par gyur to/_/'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_g.yul dang /_'khon pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa de dag kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dag kyang rab tu zhi/_sa la rten pa'i lo tog rnams kyang legs par smin cing 
[\[277b.4\]]mdangs dang ldan par gyur na dus kyi nyes pas nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur nas de'i tshe nga 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar byed ma nus so snyam nas/_de'i tshe ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_gang dag bdag gis 
[\[277b.5\]]brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'jig rten skyong dang /_gzhan yang lha'i drang srong rnams dang /_klu'i drang srong rnams dang /_brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang /_mi'i drang srong rnams kyang bsags la/_sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir sman sbyar ba'i bstan bcos 
[\[277b.6\]]dag bstan par bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe nga rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong dang /_lha'i drang srong rnams dang /_klu'i drang srong rnams dang /_brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang /_mi'i drang srong rnams la bsgo nas ri lan tshwa'i bdag po gcig 
[\[277b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba lan tshwa spyod pa'i rtse mor nges pa'i gnas zhes bya ba der bsdus nas 'byung po yang dag par zlog pa so sor 'brang zhing bsrung la/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i bstan bcos dag rab tu bstan to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te sems can dpag 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]tu med grangs med pa dag gi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byas so/_/der ngas ji ltar smon lam chen po btab pa bzhin du nyi ma gcig la yang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi shes rab snang bar byas shing theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas ngan song gi 
[\[278a.2\]]lam rnams ni bcad/_mtho ris kyi lam dag la ni rab tu bkod de/_nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byas shing yongs su thar bar byas pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med pa dag la ye shes kyi snang ba byin te/_bde ba la bkod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa des na rigs 
[\[278a.3\]]kyi bu nga'i smon lam gyi re ba de yongs su rdzogs so/_/gang gi tshe ngas nyi ma gcig la sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi ngan song gi lam rnams bkag cing /_mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/_ngas nad pa rnams kyi yo byad kyi don dang /_sems can rnams kyi don 
[\[278a.4\]]gyi phyir lha'i drang srong rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams lha'i 'jig rten lan tshwa spyod pa'i rtse mor bsdus nas sems can rnams kyi nad med pa la mkhas pa rab tu bshad do/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab rib can gyi gling thams cad du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag 
[\[278a.5\]]byas te sems can rnams kyang mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi'i drang srong rnams kyang bsogs te de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir rig pa'i gnas sna tshogs dag rab tu bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab rib can 
[\[278a.6\]]'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas te/_sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar cing mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/_rig pa'i 
[\[278a.7\]]gnas sna tshogs dag rab tu bshad nas nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar byas nas rigs kyi bu nga'i bla na med pa'i re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs so/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab rib can gyi gling thams cad du ji ltar sngar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bla na med pa'i ye shes 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]kyis skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas pa de bzhin du/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i gling thams cad du yang ngas ji ltar sngon smon lam btab pa bzhin du skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag kyang byas 
[\[278b.2\]]te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs par spyad pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de la ltos/_de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa las shin tu lhag pa snyed 'das pa na dus 
[\[278b.3\]]ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po legs bcas zhes bya ba byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur te/_de yang snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur nas shar phyogs logs su gling bzhi pa lnga bcu 'das pa na 'dzam bu'i gling dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur 
[\[278b.4\]]te/_der yang nga sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyes nas gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur to/_/der yang sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod 
[\[278b.5\]]do/_/theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/thams cad sbyin zhing kun la sbyin par yang gyur to/_/de nga'i gan du slongs mo pa dag 'ongs nas 'di lta ste dbyig dang /_gser dang /_an da rnyil dang /_rin po che mthon ka chen 
[\[278b.6\]]po dang /_skar mdog dang /_chu 'dang gi bar gyi rin po che sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i slongs mo pa rnams kyis kyang rin po che mang po de snyed thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na ngas blon po rnams la dris pa/_rin po che 'di dag ga las byung /_de dag gis smras pa/_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[278b.7\]]rnams kyis gter dag bstan te/_'jig rten du gter dag byung bas rin po che rnams kyang byung bar gyur te/_lha'i zhal sngar slongs mo pa ji tsam mchis pa de tsam nyi tshe las ma bstan lags so/_/de'i tshe ngas smon lam btab pa/_gal te bdag snyigs ma lnga dang ldan 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]zhing nyon mongs pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa bdo bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten du skye dgu tshe lo brgya pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na de'i phyir bdag gi re ba 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur 
[\[279a.2\]]cig_/bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gter ston par byed pa'i klu'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs 'di'i gling thams cad kyi gling re rer yang skye ba lan bdun bdun len par gyur la/_skye ba re re zhing yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i 
[\[279a.3\]]gter bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag ston cing gtong bar gyur cig_/'di lta ste dbyig dang /_gser dang /_an da rnyil dang /_rin po che mthon ka chen po dang /_skar mdog dang /_chu 'dang gi bar dag gi gter re re zhing yang rgyar dpag tshad stong yod la/_rin po che mang pos yongs 
[\[279a.4\]]su gang ba dag byung ste/_sems can rnams la ston cing gtong bar gyur cig_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dpa' bo'i mthu de lta bu dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[279a.5\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i gling thams cad du yang sngar ji skad smos pa'i bar dag lta bur skye ba lan bdun bdun 'dzin par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe ngas smon lam de lta bu btab pa de'i tshe na nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[279a.6\]]phrag 'bum gyis bar snang las me tog gi char rab tu phab cing nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_thams cad sbyin pa legs so legs so/_/ji ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi re ba de yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil nas 
[\[279a.7\]]rgyal po nam mkha'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar btags pa skye bo phal po che rnams kyis thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis 'di la gang yongs su gtang bar dka' ba'i sbyin pa dag bslang bar bya ste/_gal te yongs su gtong 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bar byed na ni de'i tshe 'di'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste yongs su gtong bar mi byed na ni 'di'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas sems can de dag gis rgyal po nam mkha' la slas rnams kyang bslangs btsun mo rnams 
[\[279b.2\]]dang /_btsun mo dam pa dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dag kyang bslang bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' sems rab tu dang bas byin no/_/de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/_btsun mo yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni 'di la dka' ba ma yin gyis bdag cag gis rgyal 
[\[279b.3\]]po nam mkha' la yan lag dang /_nying lag gang yin pa dag bslang bar bya ste/_gal te ster na ni thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste mi ster na ni thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_de nas bram ze skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba de rgyal 
[\[279b.4\]]po nam mkha'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/_thams cad sbyin pa rgyal srid bdag la stsol cig_/rgyal po nam mkha' de thos pa dang yid mchog tu dga' ste/_bdag nyid kyis bram ze khrus byas nas rgyal thabs kyi thod bcings te/_rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang 
[\[279b.5\]]bskur nas/_rgyal srid la rab tu bzhag ste 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad phul nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad yongs su btang bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/gal te 
[\[279b.6\]]bdag gi re ba de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_gang bdag gis da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal por bcug pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du tshig gis dbang sgyur zhing tshe ring ba dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[279b.7\]]gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe rgyal tshab nyid du gyur nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/bram ze 'dod pa zhes bya ba des kyang 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]nga'i rkang pa gnyis bslangs pa dang nga nyid kyis sems rab tu dang bas mtshon cha rnon po blangs nas/_rang gi rkang pa gnyis bcad de byin nas bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkang pa thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de na bram ze lta ba 
[\[280a.2\]]srung zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i mig gnyis bslangs pa dang /_ngas mig gnyis phyung ste de la byin nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa'i spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/yang ring po ma lon par bram ze sgra bzang zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i rna ba gnyis bslangs pa dang /_
[\[280a.3\]]nga nyid kyis rang gi rna ba gnyis bcad de de la byin nas bla na med pa'i snyan thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/'tsho ba pa yang dag 'tsho zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i skyes bu'i dbang po pho mtshan bslangs pa dang /_nga nyid kyis bcad de byin nas mdoms kyi sba ba'i mtshan bla na med pa thob par 
[\[280a.4\]]bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/gzhan dag gis kyang nga'i sha dang khrag dag bslangs pa dang /_nga nyid kyis byin nas gser gyi mdog lta bu'i mtshan thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/gzhan yang kun du rgyu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba des nga'i lag pa gnyis bslangs pa dang /_nga nyid 
[\[280a.5\]]kyis lag pa g.yas pas lag pa g.yon pa bcad nas g.yas pa yang gcod du bcug ste byin nas dad pa'i phyag bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/_/gang gi tshe ngas yan lag dang nying lag dag bcad pa de'i tshe lus khrag gis yog bzhin du smon lam btab pa/_
[\[280a.6\]]gal te yongs su gtong ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na bdag gi lus kyi len pa zhig kyang gdon mi za bar rnyed par gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams dang /_khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po 
[\[280a.7\]]de dag kyang snying rje med la/_'phags pa ma yin zhing /_byas pa mi gzo bas smras pa/_'di ni blo 'chal cing shes pa chung ste/_yan lag thams cad gtubs shing rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyams pa yin pas nad sha sna gu 'di ci dgos zhes zer te de dag gis nga khyer 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol dur khrod kyi sar bor te dong ngo /_/der sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag lhags nas khrag 'jib par byed do/_/khyi dang /_wa dang /_bya rgod dag kyang lhags te sha 'thog par byed do/_/de nas ngas sems rab tu dang bas smon lam btab pa/_gang gi 
[\[280b.2\]]tshe bdag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /_lus dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su btang ba na skad cig gcig tsam yang bdag gis sems 'gyod par ma gyur cing khro ba ma skyes pa lta na/_de'i phyir bdag gi re ba 'di yongs su 
[\[280b.3\]]rdzogs par gyur cig_/bdag gi lus 'di sha'i rir kun du gnas par gyur la sems can gang su dag sha za ba dang /_khrag 'thung ba de dag bdag gi sha za bar gyur cig_/khrag 'thung bar gyur cig_/ji srid du sems can rnams sha za bar 'gyur ba dang /_khrag 'thung bar 
[\[280b.4\]]'gyur ba de srid du bdag gi smon lam gyi dbang gis lus mthar gyis skye bar 'gyur zhing /_lus kyi 'phang du ni dpag tshad 'bum yod par gyur la/_khyon du ni dpag tshad lnga stong yod par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/_der ngas lo stong gi bar du rang gi sha dang khrag gis 
[\[280b.5\]]sems can rnams tshim par byas so/_/der ngas lce ji snyed yongs su btang ste/_gcan gzan dang bya dag gis yongs su zos nas/_yang smon lam gyi dbang gis gzhan dang gzhan dag phyir skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag gi phung po yang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di'i 
[\[280b.6\]]tshad tsam du gyur te/_ljags shin tu ring ba'i mtshan bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ngas smon lam yang rtag tu btab bo/_/de nas nga shi 'phos nas smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling shing pa ta skye bar klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te klu'i rgyal po gter ston ces bya bar gyur 
[\[280b.7\]]to/_/gang gi nub mo klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de nyid kyi nub mo ngas der gter bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum kun tu bstan nas nga nyid kyis sgra bsgrags pa/_kye sems can dag phyogs 'di ni 'di lta ste/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_chu 'dang gi bar gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyis 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]yongs su gang ba'i gter dag yod kyis/_kye sems can dag khyed kyis long shig_/blangs nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par zung shig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems skyed cig_/nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_
[\[281a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi theg par yang sems skyed cig_/de nga las rin po che ji tsam dgos pa dag long shig ces kyang bsgo ste/_'dzam bu'i gling shing pa ta skye ba der sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis klu'i skye ba lan bdun brjes pa na/_lo bye ba 
[\[281a.3\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du gter dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bstan cing rab tu byin no/_/de bzhin du der sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la btsud cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod de/_rin po che 
[\[281a.4\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis tshim par byas nas/_bla na med pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang btab bo/_/de bzhin du gling gnyis par yang klu'i skye ba lan bdun brjes te skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so/_/de bzhin du gling gsum pa nas 'jig 
[\[281a.5\]]rten gyi khams rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs thams cad kyi gling kun gyi bar du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi gling re rer yang sngar ji skad smos pa'i bar bzhin du ngas 
[\[281a.6\]]klu'i skye ba de lta bu lan bdun bdun blangs shing lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun bdun du sems can rnams la gter dpag tu med grangs med pa de lta bu dag bstan cing rab tu byin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa stobs dang brtson 'grus shin tu drag 
[\[281a.7\]]pos mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su tshol ba na byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa ltar/_sngar ji skad smos pa'i skyes bu dam pa brgyad po de dag ma gtogs par sngon byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang stobs dang brtson 'grus shin tu drag po de lta bus byang chub kyi spyad pa ma spyad 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]cing /_da ltar yang su yang mi spyod la/_phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi shugs de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par mi 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa la 
[\[281b.2\]]ltos/_de'i tshe bskal pa grangs med pa 'das nas dus ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po ud pa la zhes bya ba byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di byi ru 'byung ba zhes bya ba stong zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa'i tshe/_gling bzhi pa der nga brgya byin legs par rnam par byed ces bya 
[\[281b.3\]]bar gyur nas ngas 'dzam bu'i gling de na sems can rnams mi dge ba la dad cing spyod par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngas bdag nyid gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig tu mngon par sprul te/_'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug 
[\[281b.4\]]go/_/de dag gis nga mthong nas skrag ste nga la dris pa/_khyod la ci dgos bdag cag gis khyod la dbul bar bgyi'o/_/ngas smras pa/_kho bo la kha zas dag dgos so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyi kha zas ji lta bu lags/_ngas smras pa/_kho bo ni mi dag bsad cing 
[\[281b.5\]]za ste/_mi gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong bar byed pa dang /_log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar byed pa de dag la ni nga mi za'o/_/gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[281b.6\]]dang /_nyan thos kyi theg par sems skyed par byed pa de dag la yang nga mi za'o zhes smras te/_de na nga sems can dag sprul zhing za ba de mthong ba na/_sems can de dag 'jigs pas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs so/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_log par 
[\[281b.7\]]lta ba'i bar dag kyang spangs so/_/kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed de/_gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]las kyi lam dang theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod nas der ngas smon lam btab pa/_gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/_de'i phyir bdag gis smon lam 'di yang yongs su rdzogs 
[\[282a.2\]]par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gis gling bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dge ba'i lam rnams la nges par sbyar ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi sems can thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i 'jigs pas bdag mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gis 
[\[282a.3\]]kyang sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god cing theg pa gsum po dag la yang nges par sbyor bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag gi sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[282a.4\]]la rab tu 'god cing theg pa gsum po dag la yang nges par sbyor bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/rigs kyi bu nga'i re ba dang smon lam de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs te 'jig rten gyi khams byi ru 'byung ba thams cad kyi sems can rnams gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis dge 
[\[282a.5\]]ba'i chos rnams la nges par btul to/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang ngas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis mi rnams dge ba'i lam gyi spyod pa dag la rab tu bkod do/_/de ltar ngas sems can mang 
[\[282a.6\]]po dag bsdigs shing dge ba'i spyod pa la rab tu bkod pa'i las kyi 'phro des na/_de bar nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod nas byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug pa na bdud sdig can dmag gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te nga byang chub 
[\[282a.7\]]las rnam par bzlog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa mdor bsdus pa ni de yin te/_de'i tshe ngas bzod pa zab mo dang /_gzungs zab mo dang /_ting nge 'dzin zab mo dang /_'jig rten pa'i 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste skyes bu'i rtsal chen po de lta bu dag kyang byas so/_/de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du sems can 
[\[282b.2\]]dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nyan thos kyi theg pa yang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/ngas ji 
[\[282b.3\]]srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur byas te/_ngas sangs rgyas re re'i drung nas rgya mtsho'i chu'i thigs pa snyed kyi yon tan dag yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs par ngas rang sangs rgyas 
[\[282b.4\]]bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la yang mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la yang mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin du pha dang /_ma dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams la yang mchod 
[\[282b.5\]]pa byas so/_/ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na snying brtse bas rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas te/_da ltar yang rang gi chos rnams kyis tshim par byas pa yin no/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad ma dkar po las sbyin pa'i le'u zhes 
[\[282b.6\]]bya ba ste lnga pa'o//_//rigs kyi bu ji ltar ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gzigs pa de dag kyang ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[282b.7\]]pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de ltar ngas dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]da ltar shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa dag gzigs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[283a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs rnams su yang brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[283a.3\]]ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[283a.4\]]kyang ston pa gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de yang ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so/_/ngas dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[283a.5\]]tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu'i 
[\[283a.6\]]chu klung zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs 'od zer zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi ma gnas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin 
[\[283a.7\]]gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba'i gnas rab ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'tsho zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]kyi zhing shin tu rdul med ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa stag gi 'od zer ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dga' med ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi gdugs snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'khon sbyong 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 
[\[283b.2\]]dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha' zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa snang dpal snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog 'od 
[\[283b.3\]]ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal tog ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun dbyangs lhun po yang dag ston ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[283b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med spyan zhes bya ba dang /_rigs kyi bu de dag la sogs pa shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang 
[\[283b.5\]]ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/_de dag sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa las ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag 
[\[283b.6\]]par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/_ngas dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas/_der de dag thams cad kyis dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/_/de nas 
[\[283b.7\]]de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po bzhugs pa de'i gdan rab tu g.yos so de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i gdan 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rab tu g.yos pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ba bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rab tu g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa des de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[284a.2\]]kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de da ltar 
[\[284a.3\]]'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul las brtsams te chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na des nga dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[284a.4\]]du bcug ste/_gang gis nga dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas 
[\[284a.5\]]par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des nga dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas/_der ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[284a.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste/_nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de 'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul de nyid las brtsams te chos ston pas na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[284a.7\]]pa de'i byin gyi rlabs des nga'i stan rab tu g.yos so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag las nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs bde'am zhes yongs su dri ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'gro bar spro ba su yod/_de nas de bzhin 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa gang dag der snga dro'i dus kyi tshe snang ba chen po mthong nas rnam par 'phrul 
[\[284b.2\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun du rgyas pa 'dir lhags te/_des dog sa 'di yang yud tsam zhig bskyod cing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab pa de dag lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis gsol pa/_
[\[284b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs de 
[\[284b.4\]]yang mnyan pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po de dag rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas 'phags pa dang /_de dag gis gang logs su bgrod par bya ba ma rtsol nas/_yang 
[\[284b.5\]]de dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed gang pha rol na mchis pa'i phyogs des yang ma 'tshal lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon 
[\[284b.6\]]tan rgyal po des phyag brkyang ste sor mo lnga las 'od zer sna tshogs dag rab tu bkye'o/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum dag snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i bar du yang snang bar byas so/_/des byang chub sems 
[\[284b.7\]]dpa' de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab cing nam mkha'i ngos kyang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dag gis khyab par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]tan rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab ste de na gang du byang chub sems dpa' dag gis 
[\[285a.2\]]khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang ma mchis par mthong lags so//_//bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa ste tha ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang bdag cag la gzigs shing chos ston par mthong lags so/_/de 
[\[285a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni kun tu gzigs pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na sems can gang su dag sa la 
[\[285a.4\]]gnas pa'am/_bar snang la gnas pa de dag las sems can re re yang 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni thugs thams cad kyis bdag la gzigs shing /_bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam du sems so/_/rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[285a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs gcig gis kyang kha dog dang dbyibs thams cad du chos ston par mdzad de/_rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa tshangs par yang 
[\[285a.6\]]dag par rjes su mthong zhing tshangs pa'i bdag po chen po'i sgra skad kyis chos thos so/_/gang dag bdud la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag nyi ma la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag zla ba la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag rnam thos kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag 'phags skyes po 
[\[285a.7\]]la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag mig mi bzang la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag yul 'khor srung la dad pa rnams dang /_gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang phyug chen po'i bar gyi gzugs dang /_kha dog 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dang /_dbyibs su mthong zhing /_dbang phyug chen po'i tshig dang sgra skad kyis chos thos so/_/de na kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_dad pa dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de bzhin 
[\[285b.2\]]du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba bsgrags zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' cig shos snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[285b.3\]]la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs bde'am/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 
[\[285b.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam mkhar bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_de nas dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go 
[\[285b.5\]]skabs kyang ma mchis na bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na go skabs med do zhes de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[285b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad pa dang /_bslab pa 
[\[285b.7\]]gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang /_sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /_zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa de'i thugs rje dang /_bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na 'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs 
[\[286a.2\]]shing ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po mig ces bya ba'i gnas shing sA la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun las 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na de bzhin 
[\[286a.3\]]gshegs pa'i skus sA la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te/_de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do/_/zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /_phyogs bcu nas byang 
[\[286a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri gang yin pa de logs su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa 
[\[286a.5\]]dang /_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'khor der rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis po de dag gis sA la'i phug go skabs yangs par mthong zhing 
[\[286a.6\]]der zhugs par gyur pa de ltar sA la'i phug de yangs pa dang de ltar rgya che bar gyur to/_/der byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/_der byang chub 
[\[286a.7\]]sems dpa' re res kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi khri stan dag mngon par sprul nas de la 'khod de chos nyan par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa las chos mnyan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la lan gsum mgo bos phyag byas nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dong nas ring po ma lon par sA la'i phug de yang sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[286b.2\]]pa shAkya thub pa de ni de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no/_/gling bzhi pa de na brgya byin kau shi ka zhes bya ba tshe yongs su zad de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bas 'jigs shing skrag nas de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 
[\[286b.3\]]'grogs te sA la'i phug ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gnod sbyin dbang po mig gi gnas sA la'i phug gi kho ra khor yug tu 'khod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag 
[\[286b.4\]]gis dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab ste/_dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa des dbyangs snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod na ni de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dag las bzhengs par 'gyur 
[\[286b.5\]]ro snyam nas/_de nas brgya byin kau shi kas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas pi bang blangs te/_glu dang rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa lnga brgyas 
[\[286b.6\]]bsngags pa brjod do/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa brtsams pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dbyangs snyan rnam par snang byed tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[286b.7\]]par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]dri za rnams dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad der 'dus par gyur nas/_gang dag dbyangs la dad pa de dag gis ni dbyangs thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur to/_/gang 
[\[287a.2\]]dag bsngags pa dang snyan pa la dga' ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de la shin tu dga' ba dang /_rab tu dang ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_gus pa skyes te rab tu dang bar gyur 
[\[287a.3\]]to/_/gang dag gling bu'i sgra la dga' ba de dag gis gling bu'i sgra thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te sA la'i phug gi sgor gzigs pa dang /_brgya byin nye bar song ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[287a.4\]]la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gang du mchis par bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des bka' stsal pa/_gnod sbyin dag ji snyed lhags pa rnams 'khod cig_/de nas sA la'i phug der ji ltar gnod sbyin gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis 
[\[287a.5\]]kyi bye ma snyed dag zhugs te 'khod pa de ltar sA la'i phug de rgya che bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des 'khor de dag la 'di ltar chos bstan te/_ji ltar 'khor de na gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag 'khod pa de dag gis ni nyan thos 
[\[287a.6\]]kyi theg pa'i gtam thos shing de dag las dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag dgus rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'khor de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni theg pa chen 
[\[287a.7\]]po'i gtam 'ba' zhig thos so/_/de na dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to/_/gang dag gis theg pa gsum 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]po dag tu sems mi bskyed pa de dag las kha cig gis ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag las kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par 
[\[287b.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/der brgya byin kau shi ka de yang 'jigs pa las yongs su grol zhing tshe lo stong du nur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[287b.3\]]thub pa de ni de lta de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung ba'am bgrang 
[\[287b.4\]]bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang rgya che ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[287b.5\]]bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku yang rgya che ba yin te/_de'i spyi gtsug blta ba'am/_sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa 'di dag thams 
[\[287b.6\]]cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i khong du zhugs par gyur cing de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar gyur tam/_sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo gcig tu zhugs shing 'byung bar gyur kyang /_de dag gis cher na lha'i mig gis 
[\[287b.7\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo gcig gi mtha' yang bri ba'am gang bar tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sku ni de ltar rgya che ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa dag 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongs su 
[\[288a.2\]]gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[288a.3\]]sems bskyed pa na smon lam de lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed dag lta zhog gi_/rigs kyi bu dag gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed po de ltar rgya che ba 
[\[288a.4\]]dag 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi 
[\[288a.5\]]bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po sems bskyed pa na bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam de lta bu btab pas na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[288a.6\]]thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la nub phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong 
[\[288a.7\]]ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der deng shig_/nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga' 'am thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]dri ma med pa dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od zer la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig_/
[\[288b.2\]]de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi lags 
[\[288b.3\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du deng shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang 
[\[288b.4\]]bsgrags dang /_snang ba'i 'od zer de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun du rgyas pa nas 'phags pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la so 
[\[288b.5\]]sor 'khod nas/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa de na 
[\[288b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun du rgyas pa zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 
[\[288b.7\]]gyi bsngags pa sgrogs shing 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_des nga thams 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so/_/de'i tshig gis ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[289a.2\]]des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni chos bzhi po de dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag de skad du gsungs te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog 
[\[289a.3\]]zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lags so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan yang g.yos 
[\[289a.4\]]shing byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan g.yos par mthong ste/_yongs su zhus pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o/_/de'i tshe 
[\[289a.5\]]na shar phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang mchod pa bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog 
[\[289a.6\]]zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsgrags pa dag mthar phyin ma thag tu yang 
[\[289a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs logs kyi yongs su bsgrags pa brtsams te/_rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med 
[\[289b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu'i 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rnam sgrogs zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[289b.3\]]zhing lhun po rab gnas zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sA la'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dbang po'i ba gam zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[289b.4\]]nor bu gzhir bkod ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 'gyed yang dag bsags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsgyings pa yang dag bsags zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[289b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i zla ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsan dan gyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar cho ga grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin 
[\[289b.6\]]gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rtog pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtsod med ces bya ba na de bzhin 
[\[289b.7\]]gshegs pa sA la'i thigs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla bsgrags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ba zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rin chen ngos zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon shing 'bras bu dpag med rin po che zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos sprin sgra dbyangs 
[\[290a.2\]]dbang phyug zla ba zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi gdan dag g.yos shing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang /_snyan pa 
[\[290a.3\]]dang /_grags brjod par mdzad pa dang /_de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med 
[\[290a.4\]]pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 
[\[290a.5\]]'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing spyad pa spyod pa na ngas 
[\[290a.6\]]thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[290a.7\]]pa dbyangs mkhyen mdzod ces bya ba dang /_ba bla grags pa dang /_kun du snying po dang /_tshangs pa'i me tog dang /_sku mchog rnam par gnon dang /_chos kyi shugs kyi sgron ma dang /_lhun po phrag med pa sgra dbyangs rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang /_de bzhin 
[\[290b\]]
