[\[290b.1\]]du nub phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa gang dag gi mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yongs su bsgrags pa de dag gi gdan dag g.yos shing /_de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas kyi pho nya byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[290b.2\]]dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khod pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng dang /_de bzhin 
[\[290b.3\]]du 'og dang /_de bzhin du shar lho dang /_de bzhin du lho nub dang /_de bzhin du nub byang dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs rnams su yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te brjod par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[290b.4\]]nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po 
[\[290b.5\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag yang dag par 
[\[290b.6\]]'dzin du bcug pa nas/_thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas der dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/_/gang gi tshe de'i mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa de'i 
[\[290b.7\]]tshe gdan g.yos pa nas kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_dad pa dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]ro/_/'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni 'khrugs med rtse mo zhes bya ba dang /_cig shos ni sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa 
[\[291a.2\]]rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du deng la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_
[\[291a.3\]]thugs bde'am/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig_/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyis dang nam mkha' thams cad yang dag 
[\[291a.4\]]par rjes su mthong ste/_de nas dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na/_bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 
[\[291a.5\]]na go skabs med do zhes de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te/_sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum 
[\[291a.6\]]la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad pa dang /_bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang /_sems 
[\[291a.7\]]can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /_zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na/_'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs shing ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po'i mig ces bya ba'i gnas sA la'i 
[\[291b.2\]]phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sA la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te/_de na gang du de 
[\[291b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do/_/zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /_phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin 
[\[291b.4\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri de gang yin pa de logs su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni ji 
[\[291b.5\]]skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long 
[\[291b.6\]]la/_lho nub kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der deng shig_/nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig_/
[\[291b.7\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khrugs med rtse mo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]rgyas yang dag 'dod la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig_/de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/_
[\[292a.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchis lags so/_/de 
[\[292a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du deng shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te sangs rgyas 
[\[292a.4\]]kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba de nas 'phags pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod phung po'i ri la so sor 'khod do/_/'khod nas kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 
[\[292a.5\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[292a.6\]]la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lags so bzhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g.yos te/_byang chub 
[\[292a.7\]]sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g.yos pa mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la yongs su zhus pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bzhin no/_/de bzhin du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_rnam par gnon pa chen po'i 'od zer dang /_pad ma dam pa dang /_tsan dan dang /_lhun po'i rgyal po dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_skar ma'i snying po dang /_rnam 
[\[292b.2\]]par gnon pa'i ye shes dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_phyag 
[\[292b.3\]]bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dang /_de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 
[\[292b.4\]]sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad de lta bu'i sems can dag gis kyang khyab par gyur to/_/
[\[292b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sa dang nam mkha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyur te/_gang du sems can dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na mig sman gyi thar ma gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med do/_/sems 
[\[292b.6\]]can de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par nam mkha' stong pa mthong du zad kyi gcig gis gcig ni ma mthong ngo /_/de dag mig gi lam du ri rab dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug 
[\[292b.7\]]chen po dang /_ri rnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang mi snang /_lha'i gzhal med khang rnams kyang mi snang ste/_'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo la thug pa'i bar dang /_de'i steng gi sa gzhi yang mig lam du snang bar ma 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin mkha' khyab chos sel shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo thams cad du 
[\[293a.2\]]zhugs te/_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo /_/sems can de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba dag kyang gzugs la kun du lta ba'i yid la byed pa dang bral 
[\[293a.3\]]zhing de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo 'ba' zhig tu nges par rtogs te/_der yang 'di lta ste dper na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skyed mos tshal lta bur rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang /_lo ma sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_'bras 
[\[293a.4\]]bu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i skyed mos tshal dag mthong ngo /_/shing ljon pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de dag 
[\[293a.5\]]mthong ba dang /_sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag skyed mos tshal de ltar 'dod do snyam nas/_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can dmyal 
[\[293a.6\]]ba pa rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ma gtogs par sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[293a.7\]]sku'i nang du zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te bzhengs pa dang /_de nas sems can de dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]byams pas smras pa/_kye sems can dag bdag cag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par shes bzhin gyis soms shig_/de nas sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyi nang bcas par mthong zhing ji ltar 
[\[293b.2\]]bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs te 'dus par gyur pa rang rang gi mngon sum du gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs shing sus 'dir bcug snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[293b.3\]]sems dpa' byams pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la sgras mngon par go bar byas te smras pa/_khyed cag nyon cig_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_gang gi phyir bdag cag la phan par 
[\[293b.4\]]mdzad pa'i ston pas chos ston par mdzad kyis de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyis soms shig_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad 
[\[293b.5\]]bstan to/_/de la bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'khor ba'i 'dam las bsgral ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang byung gi 
[\[293b.6\]]ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de la bsam gtan la gzud pa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa bcu ste/_'di lta ste phan pa'i dngos po yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang /_
[\[293b.7\]]sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir gru chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir ma grol ba dgrol ba'i go cha dang /_chos la bdag med par so sor brtag pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra chen pos 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]mi skrag pa'i go cha dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i go cha dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa la gnas pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[294a.2\]]thams cad snang bas rgyan par byed pa'i go cha dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'i go cha dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i go cha dang /_
[\[294a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ma lus par thob pa'i go cha dang /_spros pa med pa ste/_de dag ni bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i sgo yongs 
[\[294a.4\]]su shes pa rtogs pa'i spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med par yid la byed pa dang /_sems skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yin te/_de la ni 'jug pa dang /_ldog pa chad cing rtag pa med pa dang /_gdeg pa med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa 
[\[294a.5\]]yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gang gA'i klung dung phyur phrag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba 
[\[294a.6\]]las yang dag par 'das pa snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir thon pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[294a.7\]]dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_sku'i tshad brtags pa'i phyir phyogs bcur rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo /_/de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang /_shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyams pa med cing der yang tshig dang /_don dang /_yig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra dag de bzhin du thos te/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga na 'dug pa'i chos thos pa de bzhin du de'i chos thos so/_/gzhan yang de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[294b.2\]]shAkya thub pa'i sku yang skye ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dag gis khyab par snang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spu'i sgo gcig na yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 
[\[294b.3\]]'jug cing 'byung bar snang ngo /_/de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas spu'i sgo thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ste phyogs bcu'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs par gyur pa de 
[\[294b.4\]]dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_'bru dang /_sgra dang /_brjod pa sna tshogs dag gis bstod 
[\[294b.5\]]cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod do/_/de nas de'i mod la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa sna tshogs kyi char dag rab tu phab ste/_lha'i sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil nas lha'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[294b.6\]]ba dan dang /_na bza' dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_rgyan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med yang dag 'dren ces bya ba des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 
[\[294b.7\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lung bstan pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dang /_mang po 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i lam du sgrol ba zhes bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rtogs pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du ston pa zhes bya ba dang /_rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba 
[\[295a.2\]]dang /_bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_snying rje pad ma dkar po zhes kyang bya'o/_/yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la 
[\[295a.3\]]yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te/_da yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o/_/gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa 
[\[295a.4\]]dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /_gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[295a.5\]]dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang /_gnod 
[\[295a.6\]]sbyin dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[295a.7\]]pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang /_'chi ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_bde bar bya ba dang /_lo legs par bya ba dang /_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang /_skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med cing bde bar bya ba dang /_nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba dang /_theg pa gsum 
[\[295b.2\]]po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang /_rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang /_bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang /_byang 
[\[295b.3\]]chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /_'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang /_'khor mang por bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i grong 
[\[295b.4\]]khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad par bya/_su zhig lnga brgya pa tha ma la nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing /_chos ma yin pa lhur len pa'i sems 
[\[295b.5\]]can rnams dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par 'gyur/_chos ma yin pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams dang /_'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang /_chos log pas yongs su dkris pa rnams dang /_
[\[295b.6\]]sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams kun tu skyo ba med par 'gyur zhig gu snyam du dgongs pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po 
[\[295b.7\]]zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]grangs 'di zung la/_lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig_/de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed du chug shig_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[296a.2\]]du bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag smon lam gyis bskal pa chen po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa nas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_bdag gis sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 
[\[296a.3\]]'das pa dag tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang rab tu bkod lags te/_bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i 
[\[296a.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yongs su smin par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[296a.5\]]yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa snying rje pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar 
[\[296a.6\]]gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
